column3: Pertolongan Goddess!{nl}Monster-monster itu telah musnah.

column2: There are still a lot of things I must do...
column3: Masih banyak yang harus aku kerjakan..

column2: The adventure can continue if I get my diary back.{nl}I am happy..
column3: Petualangan ini akan berlanjut jika diaryku kembali.{nl}Aku senang sekali..

column2: Long time no see. {nl}I have a favor to ask you. Can you help?{nl}
column3: Lama tak jumpa. {nl}Aku perlu bantuanmu, maukah kamu menolongku?{nl}

column2: I want to put a monument up for my dead colleague.{nl}But I don't have any materials or tools.
column3: Terima kasih. Blacksmith Klaipeda seharusnya menjual peralatannya.{nl}Tapi pertama-tama, aku ingin memintamu untuk membawakanku bebatuan dari High Winding Road{nl}yang terkenal karena kualitasnya yang sangat baik.

column2: Thank you. The Klaipeda blacksmith should sell the tools.{nl}But first, I'd like to ask you to bring me boulders from High Winding Road {nl}that are known for their excellent quality.
column3: Terima kasih. Blacksmith Klaipeda seharusnya menjual peralatannya.{nl}Tapi pertama-tama, aku ingin memintamu untuk membawakanku bebatuan dari High Winding Road{nl}yang terkenal karena kualitasnya yang sangat baik.

column2: Tools for stonemasons? {nl}10,000 silver will do.{nl}{nl}
column3: Alat untuk stonemaisons? {nl}10,000 Sivers cukup.{nl}{nl}

column2: I just figured out how I'm going to make it.{nl}I will make it quick, so please wait.
column3: Aku baru selesai memikirkan cara membuatnya.{nl}Aku akan segera membuatkannya.

column2: It's finished. Place it at the entrance of the Royal Mausoleum at Overlooking Crossroads.{nl}Maybe this can provide enough consolation.
column3: Selesai. Tempatkan di pintu masuk Royal Mausoleum pada Overlooking Crossroads.{nl} Mungkin ini bisa memberikan cukup ketenangan.

column2: I keep thinking about my colleague.{nl}I'll never see him again, right...
column3: Aku terus memikirkan sahabatku.{nl}Aku tidak akan pernah bertemu dengannya lagi kan ..

column2: Varkis' Soul
column3: Soul of Varkis

column2: I can't leave with all my things left here
column3: Aku tidak bisa pergi dengan meninggalkan semuanya di sini

column2: I don't have any reason to stay in this land anymore.{nl}I want to meet the goddesses...
column3: Tidak ada alasan untukku tetap berada di sini.{nl}Aku akan menemui Goddess ..

column2: It was made long ago, but any stones will break it.
column3: Sudah lama sekali Ini dibuat , tapi jenis batu apapun bisa dihancurkan.

column2: Monument
column3: Monument

column2: We have all become like wind in the canyon.{nl}Although we have left, our times together will always remain with you.
column3: Kami seperti angin yang berada di Canyon.{nl}Meskipun kami pergi, saat-saat kita bersama akan selalu ada disisimu.

column2: Architect Laudi
column3: Architect Laudi

column2: I received a request to rebuild this structure, but after Medzio Diena, {nl}I have been stuck here since.{nl}I don't know if the original client is still alive or if we lack the materials, {nl}but I will finish rebuilding this structure no matter what happens.
column3: Aku mendapat permintaan untuk membuat architecture ini, tapi setelah Divine Day, Aku terpaku di tempat ini.{nl}Aku tidak tahu si pemohon masih hidup dan apakah barang-barang masih tersedia, tapi bagaimanapun aku tetap akan membuat architecture itu.

column2: I will find the key to open the last seal.{nl}After opening a space with this scroll.
column3: Aku akan mencari  kunci untuk membuka seal terakhir.{nl}Setelah membuka ruang dengan Scroll ini.

column2: The spatial chasms may exist anywhere, but they might also not exist anywhere.
column3: Ruang itu tersedia dimana mana, tapi juga tidak ada dimana mana.

column2: Hmm. Every bit as impressive as the rumors say.{nl}Rolandas will be waiting for you if you go to the base of the stone pillar.
column3: Hmm. Semuanya mengesankan seperti rumor yang dikatakan.{nl}Rolandas akan menunggumu bila kamu pergi ke dasar dari batu pilar.

column2: Nothing beats traps when it comes to gathering enemies together and striking them all at once. {nl}Of course, they're also the best means of escape.
column3: Tidak ada yang lebih baik lagi selain menggunakan Trap jika ingin mengumpulkan monster dan memusnahkannya dalam 1 serangan. {nl} Ini juga cara ampuh untuk melarikan diri.

column2: If you think a companion is just a pet, that's a huge mistake. {nl}They are like an inseparable friend to us hunters.
column3: Jika kamu pikir companion itu hanya seekor pet, kamu salah besar. {nl} Ibarat seorang teman yang tak terpisahkan dengan pemburu.

column2: Our family has been waiting for your appearance for a long time.{nl}With this igniter, please light the signal at the top.
column3: Keluarga kami telah sekian lama menantimu.{nl}Gunakan ini untuk membuat tKamu di atas sana.

column2: Since you have appeared, it is sending us a signal to greet you.{nl}After you light the signal, tell Niels that I am sorry.
column3: Semenjak kehadiranmu, ini adalah sebuah pertKamu.{nl}Setelah kamu menyalakan tKamu itu, katakan pada Niels aku minta maaf.

column2: There's nothing that Davio can't get! As long as you pay me enough.
column3: Tidak ada yang tidak bisa kudapatkan.{nl}Jika kamu memberiku uang.

column2: Do you need anything?{nl}I can get you anything as long as you pay me enough.{nl}But, it will be expensive.
column3: Ada yang kamu butuhkan?{nl}Aku bisa memberimu apapun jika uangmu cukup.{nl}Tapi harganya akan sangat mahal.

column2: Don't ever think about going by yourself without mercenaries.{nl}There are too many monsters out there, and some of them can't even be defeated by mercenaries.
column3: Jangan pernah berpikir bisa pergi sendiri tanpa seorang mercenarie.{nl}Banyak monster di luar sana, dan beberapa tidak bisa dilumpuhkan bahkan oleh mercenaries.

column2: My soldiers should've been back by now, but I haven't heard from them.{nl}If you see them, can you tell them to come back to the camp?
column3: Hanya masalah waktu dan prajuritku akan kembali, tapi aku belum mendengar kabar apapun.{nl}Jika kamu melihat mereka, katakan untuk segera kembali?

column2: If I don't take care of them, no one will.{nl}I should re-train them, damn.
column3: Jika bukan aku yang mengurusnya, tidak akan ada bersedia.{nl}Aku harus melatih mereka lagi.

column2: With things like this, I won't be able to face the Captain.{nl}I should get back the supplies that the Wendigos stole, but I'm deeply wounded.
column3: Jika hasilnya seperti ini, Aku tidak akan bisa bertemu kembali dengan The Captain.{nl}Aku harus kembali ke supplies tempat Wendigos dicuri, tapi aku sedang terluka parah.

column2: If I didn't have this wound, that monster would be nothing.{nl}I am really pissed off.
column3: Jika aku tidak sedang terluka seperti ini, monster-monster itu bukanlah masalah.{nl}Aku kesal sekali.

column2: Thanks.{nl}Since I got all those supplies back, I will try to cheer up myself one more time.
column3: Terima kasih.{nl}Setelah aku mendapatkan Supplies itu kembali, aku akan mencoba tersenyum kembali.

column2: The wound is deeper than I thought, and I can hardly move.{nl}I heard Canyon Apynys is good for alleviating pain.
column3: Lukanya lebih berat dari yang kuperkirakan, aku masih sulit bergerak.{nl}Kkudengar Canyon Apynys baik untuk menyembuhkan luka.

column2: Yep. That's Canyon Apynys, alright.{nl}I am worried about the side effects, but I hope they go away soon.
column3: Tepat sekali. Canyon Apinis.{nl}Aku khawatir dengan efek sampingnya, tapi semoga tidak akan berlangsung lama.

column2: Do you have the Canyon Apynys?{nl}I feel like I'm going to lose consciousness just from breathing.
column3: Masih jauhkah Canyon Apinis?{nl}Rasanya mau pingsan, meskipun hanya untuk bernafas.

column2: The blood has stopped, but my body feels numb.{nl}Can you defeat the monsters nearby so I can return safely?
column3: Darah sudah berhenti mengucur, tapi tubuhku seperti mati rasa.{nl}Bisakah kamu lumpuhkan monster-monster di sekitar, jadi aku bisa kembali dengan aman?

column2: It is aching more than I thought.{nl}I'll have to give up a little strength to move quickly.
column3: Sakit sekali, lebih dari yang kubayangkan.{nl}Aku harus mengurangi kekuatanku agar bisa bergerak lebih cepat.

column2: After I regain more energy, I should go back to the commander.{nl}Thank you so much.
column3: Setelah energiku kembali, Aku harus segera kembali pada commander.{nl}Terima kasih banyak.

column2: The commander is looking for me?{nl}I am sorry. I can't go back until I catch that again.
column3: Commander mencariku?{nl}Maaf. Aku tidak bisa kembali sebelum mendapatkannya kembali.

column2: They are not ordinary stones, as they emanate some sort of energy.{nl}You will know when you see them.
column3: Itu bukan batu biasa .. Penuh kekuatan {nl}Kamu akan mengetahuinya saat melihatnya.

column2: I didn't know that I would meet Saugas again, I don't know if I should like it or dislike it.
column3: Aku tidak tahu akan berhadapan lagi dengan Saugas , Aku tidak tahu harus senang atau tidak senang.

column2: Good work.{nl}Now shall we start?
column3: Bagus sekali.{nl}Bisa kita mulai?

column2: We will be ready when we rub Woodfung's poison on the stone with full of vigor.{nl}It will be done when we put this bait on the Alkune Hill.
column3: Kita sudah siap untuk menggunakan Woodfung's poison ini pada batu itu dengan kekuatan penuh.{nl}Semua selesai saat kita menyimpan umpan ini di Alkune Hill.

column2: The Saugas' just took the stones and disappeared?{nl}That's absurd.
column3: Saugas menghilang bersama dengan batu itu?{nl}Aneh!.

column2: Are you afraid of them?{nl}I still have some more stones, so could you try luring them again from there?
column3: Kupikir kamu takut.{nl}Selama batu-batu itu masih nampak, coba memancingnya kembali.

column2: Did the Saugas ran away because they caught my scent?{nl}I guess that is possible.
column3: Saugas kabur setelah menampakkan dirinya padaku?{nl}Mungkin saja.

column2: So the Saugas were just causing trouble to its peers.{nl}Okay. I will go back to the camp slowly since the commander is worrying about me.
column3: Saugas hanya mengganggu sejenisnya saja.{nl}Baiklah, aku akan kembal ke Camp karena Commander mengkhawatirkanku.

column2: There's a scary monster called Denoptic here.{nl}I need the artifacts that Denoptic swallowed. Can you get them for me?
column3: Disini Ada monster menyeramkan bernama Denoptic.{nl}Denoptic menelan Artifact yang aku cari, maukah kamu mendapatkannya untukku?

column2: I'm surprised, as this is the first time I've seen Denoptic eat stones. {nl}Is someone behind this?
column3: Aku terkejut sekali saat pertama kali melihat Denoptic menelan batu. {nl} Ada orang lain lagi?

column2: How did you find the right piece!{nl}Thank you so much.
column3: Bagaimana bisa kamu mendapatkan serpihan yang benar ini!{nl}Terima Kasih banyak.

column2: Can I ask you one more favor?{nl}I want you to defeat the monster at Odega Hills.{nl}It disturbs my research.
column3: Bisa minta tolong sekali lagi?{nl}Aku ingin kamu melumpuhkan monster di Odega Hills.{nl}Mengganggu penelitianku.

column2: Thank you.{nl}I wonder why there is no support here, because they do send mercenaries {nl}to those scholars at the entrance of the canyon.
column3: Terima kasih.{nl}Bagaimana bisa tidak ada bantuan di sini ketika mereka mengirim para mercenarie pada para scholar at the entrance of the canyon.

column2: If something were to happen to Airine, I don't know I would live....
column3: Jika sesuatu terjadi pada Irene, bagaimana aku bisa hidup..

column2: Why are monsters after these artifacts.{nl}Is there something that we should know?{nl}
column3: Ada apa dengan monster-monster itu mencari artifacts.{nl}Apa ada hal yang harus kita tidak ketahui.{nl}

column2: Anyways, thanks for helping me on the research.
column3: Terima kasih telah membantu penelitianku.

column2: Gotta run away from Niels.{nl}We should go see the stars.
column3: Tinggalkan Niels.{nl}Kita harus pergi menemui bintang-bintang.

column2: There was something important..{nl}
column3: Ada hal yang penting..{nl}

column2: What are you doing here?
column3: Apa yang kamu lakukan di sini?

column2: Dementia? That's absurd.{nl}I am okay. You guys are crazy.
column3: Sudah pikun? Aneh.{nl}Aku baik-baik saja, kalian yang sudah gila.

column2: Just where exactly did that old man go to alone?{nl}He's not even in good shape...
column3: Kemana dia pergi?{nl}Tidak tidak juga kembali normal..

column2: Instead of fighting, I chose to run away.{nl}I think my research will help us more than fighting.
column3: Dalam setiap pertempuran, aku selalu berusaha melarikan diri.{nl}Aku pikir itu bisa lebih membantu penelitian.

column2: Do those monsters like eating research materials or something?{nl}What do you think?
column3: Apakah monster-monster itu memakan bahan-bahan penelitian, atau apa?{nl}Bagaimana menurutmu?

column2: Sorry if I sounded mean.. it's just, I don't have energy to talk right now.
column3: Terdengar sadis .. Tapi aku tidak punya energi untuk bicara saat ini.

column2: I was a hunter before.{nl}Those monsters in the canyon are nothing to me.
column3: Sebelumnya aku adalah seorang Hunter.{nl}Monster-monster di Canyon itu bukan masalah bagiku.

column2: Damn... that was awesome.
column3: Sial … aku terlihat buruk.

column2: It was dangerous, but we got something out of it.{nl}Nevertheless, the disappearance incidents are a bit eerie.
column3: Ini berbahaya, tapi kita mendapat sesuatu di luar ini.{nl}Tapi kejadian-kejadian yang tidak diketahui ini menakutkan.

column2: It's raining heavily.{nl}Monsters are more erratic on these days.
column3: Hujan lebat sekali.{nl}Para monster akan sangat kuat pada saat itu.

column2: I wonder who is planning all this?{nl}I'm certain they're after the Royal Mausoleum.
column3: Siapa yang memanipulasi hal ini?{nl}Aku yakin mereka telah di royal tomb.

column2: Manipulating monsters, that's not a human thing to do.{nl}Are they demons then? Ah... this is all very confusing.{nl}What have I seen?
column3: Memanipulasi para monster, bukan kerjaan manusia.{nl}Para Demon? Ah..Aku pusing.{nl}Apa yang telah kulihat?

column2: I guess I can't sleep tight.
column3: Sepertinya aku tidak bisa tidur lelap.

column2: Can you hear it? hear it? The screams of those who died without any reasons?
column3: Kamu mendengarnya? Coba dengarkan? Jeritan-jeritan kematian yang entah apa sebabnya?

column2: The criminals who fabricate counterfeits of the Royal Mausoleum's artifacts roam about here.{nl}They already know my face, what should I do...
column3: Para penjahat yang telah memanipulasi tomb's artifacts.{nl}aku telah melihatnya sendiri, apa yang harus aku lakukan..

column2: There are many monsters here, {nl}though it appears there are stone statues moving near the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Perhaps they'll attack when the king gets disturbed in his sleep?
column3: Banyak monster di sini, tapi aku mendengar patung-patung batu itu bergerak di sekitar royal tomb.{nl}Mereka menyerang saat Raja lelap tertidur.

column2: What do we do? {nl}To add to all the chaos in the village, the Vubbes have kidnapped the villagers.
column3: Apa yang harus kita lakukan? {nl} Banyak kekacauan di village, para Vubbe menculik penduduk.

column2: Hunter
column3: Hunter

column2: Oh, you're just in time. We need your help. {nl}Monsters stole all the aids and supplies meant for the refugees. {nl}
column3: Oh, kamu datang pada waktu yang pas. Aku butuh bantuanmu. {nl} Para monster mencuri obat dan perbekalan untuk para pengungsi. {nl}

column2: Fortunately, we found them quickly.
column3: Untung saja kita cepat menemukannya kembali.

column2: I'll stay and aid the people left here. {nl}There are more people who need more than my aid, so please go on ahead.
column3: Aku akan tinggal dan menolong orang-orang di sini. {nl}Kamu pergilah dan tolong juga orang-orang yang membutuhkan pertolongan.

column2: I'm holding this because it looks like it's about to collapse. {nl}We need some stones to do something about it.
column3: Aku bertahan seperti ini karena kupikir saat ini situasi sedang genting. {nl}Untuk melakukan sesuatu tentang hal ini, kita membutuhkan Stone.

column2: We won't be able to handle it if this wall opens. {nl}How will you stop them then if people are already running away now?
column3: Kita tidak akan mampu mengatasinya jika mereka mengepung tempat ini . {nl}Jika semua orang pergi, apa yang akan kamu lakukan?

column2: Alright. That'll be enough.
column3: Baiklah, sudah cukup.

column2: I must go back to the village. {nl}But as you can see my arms are shaking. {nl}Can you defeat the monsters while I rest my arms for a while?
column3: Aku harus kembali ke village. {nl} Tapi lihatlah, tanganku gemetar. {nl} Bisakah kamu musnahkan monster-monster itu sementara aku menenangkan tanganku?

column2: The goddesses are so heartless. {nl}Had the goddesses not disappeared, the monsters wouldn't be invading.
column3: Goddess yang tidak punya perasaan. {nl} Jika Goddess tidak menghilang, tidak akan ada monster yang menyerang.

column2: Now I can return to the village with peace of mind. {nl}This grace I shall never forget.
column3: Sekarang aku bisa kembali ke village dengan tenang. {nl} Aku tidak akan melupakan semua ini.

column2: I came here to hide from the monsters, but even this area is becoming dangerous. {nl}I'm trying to make it back to the village, so can you bring the other refugees to me?
column3: Aku datang kemari untuk menghindari para monster, tetapi semakin hari tempat ini semakin berbahaya. {nl} Aku akan kembali ke village, bisakah kamu membawakan para pengungsi padaku?

column2: I see you came back safely. {nl}Well then, I must also prepare to leave.
column3: Sepertinya perjalananmu baik-baik saja. {nl} Aku akan bersiap untuk pergi.

column2: What do we do? I think there are even more monsters now than when we first came. {nl}And the patients have not recovered yet. {nl}
column3: Bagaimana ini, monster semakin banyak . {nl} Banyak pasien yang masih belum pulih. {nl}

column2: Somehow I'll treat this man. Can you defeat the monsters around?
column3: Aku akan merawat orang ini, bisakah kamu menghalau para monster?

column2: In order for these people to safely return to the village,{nl}we have to defeat these monsters.
column3: Aku harus menghalau monster.{nl}agar orang-orang aman kembali ke village..

column2: Thank you. The patient also regained his consciousness. {nl}Though... I think there is a problem.
column3: Terima kasih, para pasien telah kembali pulih. {nl} Tapi sepertinya ada masalah lain.

column2: This has to be because there is the evidence of salvation or something. {nl}I'm sure that's where the villagers were taken away to.
column3: Semua ini karena evidence of salvation atau sesuatu. {nl}Aku yakin mereka membawa para penduduk kesana.

column2: The goddess must have sent help... {nl}Follow the pathway on the right to find the Vubbe Outpost.
column3: Sepertinya Goddess telah membantu kita. {nl}Ikuti jalan ke arah kanan menuju vubbe's outpost.

column2: Thank you for saving me. {nl}Seems like you're the Revelator who's looking for evidence of salvation. {nl}
column3: Terima kasih telah menyelamatkanku. {nl} Sepertinya kamu sang Savior yang mencari Evidence of salvation. {nl}

column2: I was taken in late so I was left here, the others were all brought to the mine. {nl}I'll tell you the rest of the story in the Crystal Mine.
column3: Aku bisa disini karena terlamat masuk dan banyak orang lain yang dibawa masuk ke Mines. {nl} Aku akan menceritakan sisanya di pintu masuk Crystal Mine.

column2: You came. {nl}First, let's clear the wagons blocking the way into the mines. {nl}
column3: Nah, kamu sudah sampai. {nl} Pertama kita harus menyingkirkan gerobak yang menghalangi jalan ke mines. {nl}

column2: The wagons can be demolished with these explosives that I have prepared. {nl}I'm concerned about the Vubbes that will come after hearing the explosion {nl}but with your skills, I think we'll be fine.
column3: Gerobak itu bisa dihancurkan dengan peledak yang telah aku siapkan. {nl}Aku kuatir para Vubbe akan datang karena mendengar suara ledakan {nl}tapi dengan kemampuanmu, pasti tidak jadi masalah.

column2: I'll let you take care of the Vubbes. {nl}I have things to attend to inside. {nl}
column3: Tolong bereskan para Vubbe sendiri. {nl} Aku ada urusan lain di dalam. {nl}

column2: Thank you. Thank you very much. {nl}You're a savior of our village. {nl}
column3: Terima kasih. Terima kasih banyak. {nl} Kamu adalah penyelamat kami. {nl}

column2: Oh, have you seen a girl about 5 years of age? {nl}I heard she was together with them when the villagers were kidnapped.
column3: Oh, apakah kamu melihat gadis kecil berumur 5 tahun? {nl} Aku dengar dia juga diculik bersama penduduk lainnya.

column2: Don't just stand there. {nl}Move if you want to help or go away.
column3: Jangan hanya diam saja. {nl} Cepat bergegas bantu dan selamatkan dia.

column2: Mine Manager
column3: Manager of Coal Mine

column2: I'm hanging on somehow but I'm losing strength in my arms.
column3: Aku tetap bertahan, walapun tanganku sudah tidak kuat.

column2: I should have been more careful. {nl}It's all my fault.
column3: Aku mesti berhati-hati. {nl} Semua salahku.

column2: I have my roots deep in hunting. {nl}Don't worry about me. Go look after the others.
column3: Aku telah menjelajahi jauh ke dalam hunting area. {nl} Tidak usah khawatirkan aku, coba periksa yang lain saja.

column2: As the mayor, I cannot just leave the village like this. {nl}How could the goddesses be so indifferent?
column3: Sebagai Mayor, aku tidak bisa meninggalkan village dalam keadaan seperti ini. {nl} Mengacuhkan perintah Goddess .

column2: Aren't you a Revelator? The Goddess must've sent help. {nl}In order to enter the mine, you must save a young man name Vaidotas first. {nl}He was kidnapped and brought to the Vubbe Outpost. {nl} Please, I'm begging for your help.
column3: Bukankah kamu sang Savior? Goddess telah membantu kami. {nl} Untuk masuk ke dalam mine, kamu harus menyelamatkan seseorang bernama Vaidotas dahulu. {nl}Dia diculik dan dibawa ke Vubbe outpost. {nl} Kumohon, temukan dia.

column2: Kind Owl Sculptor
column3: Kind Owl Sculptor

column2: There are so many wandering spirits these days.{nl}This is really...
column3: Saat itu banyak sekali wandering spirits.{nl}Sungguh..

column2: Large Frame
column3: Big

column2: It's about a problem.{nl}You should take a look at it yourself rather than me explaining it to you several times.
column3: Karena masalah itu.{nl}Sebaiknya kamu melihatnya sendiri daripada aku yang menceritakannya.

column2: What's the problem? {nl}Um... it's big, very big.
column3: Apa masalahnya? {nl}Sangat banyak .. hmm.

column2: You saw it right?{nl}He is called Sequoia. {nl}He once protected us owls, but now...{nl}
column3: Kamu lihat sendiri kan?{nl}Dia dipanggil Sequoia. {nl}Dia pernah melindungi owl kami...{nl}

column2: Some humans are absurdly attacking us owls.{nl}Hence, a few owls have been destroyed and there are an increasing number of people getting hurt.
column3: Manusia menyerang owl - owl kami.{nl}Beberapa owl dimusnahkan dan banyak orang yang kesakitan.

column2: That Owl
column3: That

column2: There is an owl that knows this problem well.{nl}But what was its name...{nl}
column3: Ada  owl yang mengetahui benar masalah ini.{nl}Tapi siapa gerangan..{nl}

column2: Ah, I can't concentrate.{nl}While I try to remember, can you take care of the Ellogua?{nl}Their spores are getting in my head so my memories are scrambled.
column3: Duh, susah sekali fokus {nl}Sementara aku mengingat ini, bisakah kamu urus Ellogua?{nl}Aku tidak bisa mengingat dengan mudah.

column2: We are made of ordinary wood so we are scared of moist and insects.{nl}We are keen to being broken as well.{nl}It would have been better if we were made of iron.
column3: Kami terbuat dari kayu biasa sehingga kita takut lembab dan serangga.{nl}Kami juga mudah rusak.{nl}Mungkin akan lebih baik jika kami terbuat dari besi.

column2: Thank you!{nl}I can't scratch my head because I am a tree... Hehe...{nl}
column3: Terima kasih!{nl}Aku tidak bisa menggaruk kepalaku karena aku sebuah Pohon..hehe {nl}

column2: Hm! Yes, I finally remembered! {nl}Find the Anxious Owl.{nl}That owl was so close to Sequoia so it must know the method.
column3: Ya. Akhirnya aku bisa mengingatnya! {nl}Temukan instabilized owl.{nl}Owl ini begitu dekat dengan Sequoia jadi akan mudah dimengerti.

column2: Anxious Owl Sculpture
column3: Instabilized Owl Sculpture

column2: As promised, I will tell you. About Sequoia. {nl}
column3: Sesuai janjiku, akan aku ceritakan. Maksudku Sequoia. {nl}

column2: Sequoia is obsessed with evil energy.{nl}Must face evil energy with divine power.{nl}Yes. We must face it!{nl}
column3: Sequoia terobsesi dengan kekuatan jahat.{nl}Kamu menghadapi kekuatan jahat dengan kekuatan suci.{nl}Ya. Kita harus menghadapinya!{nl}

column2: Please gather wood pieces from the broken sculpture.{nl}Ah. the ones with the power in them. Select well.
column3: Kumpulkan serpihan-serpihan kayu dari broken sculpture.{nl}Beberapa ada yang memiliki kekuatan, pilih dengan baik.

column2: My friends became ordinary. {nl}Yes. Ordinary wooden sculptures. {nl}They must still have some divine power left, for sure. I believe...
column3: Temanku menjadi ordinary. {nl}Ya. Ordinary wooden statues. {nl}mereka semestinya masih memiliki kekuatan suci. Aku percaya..

column2: Okay. Good. This will be enough! {nl}We have enough materials. Good. Good.
column3: Oke baiklah, semua akan menjadi lebih baik! {nl}Kita memiliki cukup bahan.

column2: Hm? Sequoia? I know it well. Big mouth, big hip...{nl}Look at this. Many of my friends fell down.{nl}Sequoia did this alright.{nl}
column3: Hm? Sequoia? Aku sangat mengenalnya. ..{nl}Coba lihat ini. Temanku banyak menjadi korban.{nl}Ya ! Sequoia yang melakukannya.{nl}

column2: But, monsters are keep trying to take them.{nl}What was that? Okay. The Essence of Spirits.{nl}If you get them again, I will tell you. The Essence of Spirits. My poor friends!
column3: Tapi para monster berusaha mengambilnya.{nl}Apa itu? Ouw. Essence of Spirits.{nl}Jika kamu mendapatkannya kembali, akan kuceritakan. Essence of Spirits!

column2: They were very good friends. Bad. Yes. I mean those monsters.{nl}I will try harder for my friends. {nl}Yes. I look a little confused...
column3: Dulu mereka adalah teman baik. Sayang sekali ! Ya, Moster-monster itu.{nl}Aku akan berusaha keras untuk teman-temanku. {nl}Ya. Aku sepertinya sedikit lelah..

column2: Thanks. Yes. {nl}I will take you to a good place. For sure...
column3: Terima kasih. {nl}Aku pastikan kamu diantar ke tempat yang lebih baik..

column2: Gather them, and string them together and stab Sequoia.{nl}Then it will be surprised and run away.
column3: Kumpulkan mereka, ikat bersama-sama dan tikam Sequoia.{nl}Maka ini akan terkejut dan lari.

column2: You should succeed on your first try. Okay?
column3: Seharusnya kamu bisa berhasil pada test pertama ini. Oke?

column2: Sometimes I miss it. The old Sequoia.{nl}Why was it possessed by evil energy? There is no way to know. I am just sad. A lot.
column3: Kadang aku merindukannya. The old Sequoia.{nl}Mengapa harus dipengaruhi kekuatan jahat? Aku hanya sedih, sangat sedih dan tidak bisa berbuat apa-apa.

column2: Something is wrong. {nl}The Guide Owl is not in a good mood. I hope you go there quickly.{nl}
column3: Ada yang salah. {nl}Guide Owl tidak sedang dalam kondisi baik. Kuharap kamu pergi secepatnya.{nl}

column2: Take that stick with you. They are my friends.{nl}I think you will need it from now on.
column3: Bawalah tongkat-tongkat itu. Mereka temanku.{nl}Mulai saat ini kamu akan membutuhkannya.

column2: It will be okay. That owl is strong.{nl}It will be okay. It will be okay.
column3: Akan baik-baik saja. Qwl itu kuat.{nl}Semua akan baik-baik saja.

column2: Guide Owl Sculpture
column3: Guide Owl Statue

column2: I almost fell into eternal sleep if it weren't you.{nl}Sequoia is our enemy now. Enemy!
column3: Jika bukan kamu, mungkin aku akan terjebak dalam tidur yang panjang.{nl}Sequoia adalah musuh kita sekarang. Musuh!

column2: Sequoia is not only us owls' problem.{nl}It is attacking any living creatures!{nl}Please help us defeat it.{nl}
column3: Sequoia bukan hanya masalah Owl.{nl}Dia menyerang semua makhluk yang hidup!{nl}Tolong kami memusnahkannya.{nl}

column2: If we keep letting Sequoia act like this, us owls will be completely destroyed.{nl}Many people will die as well...{nl}There will be a flood of wandering spirits and we won't have any owls to guide us.{nl}
column3: Jika kita terus membiarkan Sequoia , Semua Owl akan musnah.{nl}Banyak orang akan mati...{nl}Akan banyak wandering spirits dan tidak akan ada Owl lagi yang menuntun kita.{nl}

column2: Sequoia is too late.{nl}They are not only attacking humans, but they also attack us who used to be it's old friends!{nl}
column3: Sequoia terlambat.{nl}Mereka tidak hanya menyerang manusia, mereka juga menyerang kami yang merupakan teman lama!{nl}

column2: The memory of Sequoia and us together... was it weaker than the evil energy?
column3: Kenangan bersama Sequoia.. sebegitu lemahkah daripada kekuatan jahat?

column2: Grave Protector Owl Sculpture
column3: Grave Protector Owl Sculpture

column2: Thanks for saving me.{nl}I don't understand how I got attacked by those little things.{nl}Maybe I am too old now.
column3: Terima kasih telah menyelamatkan kami.{nl}Aku tidak mengerti bagaimana bisa diserang oleh makhluk-makhluk itu.{nl}Mungkin saat ini aku sudah terlalu tua.

column2: It seems that the Guide Owl finally made a decision.{nl}It once tried fervently to bring Sequoia back to the way it used to be...{nl}
column3: Sepertinya Guide Owl telah memutuskan.{nl}pernah berusaha keras membawa Sequoia kembali seperti dulu lagi..{nl}

column2: Anyways, It's good.{nl}I need the Essence of Spirit from the spirit that is wandering around the grave of unknown warrior.{nl}You can do anything, just bring us the Essence.
column3: Tapi ini hal yang baik.{nl}Aku perlu Essence of Spirit dari jiwa  yang bersemayam di grave of unknown warrior.{nl}Kamu bisa melakukannya, bawakan saja aku Essencenya.

column2: Spirits that wander around for a long time will become no different than the monsters.
column3: Spirit-spirit ini berkeliaran sekian lama seperti monster.

column2: Excellent, you collected the Essences.{nl}When you go back to the Guide Owl, it will empower your weapon with the power of the spirits.{nl}Whether such power will bring about something good... Only a goddess will know.
column3: Wow, kamu telah mengumpulkan Essence-essence itu.{nl}Saat kamu kembali ke Guide Owl, senjatamu akan penuh dengan kekuatan spirit.{nl}Aku tidak yakin kekuatan yang dikeluarkan itu baik atau jahat .. Hanya Goddess yang tahu.

column2: Although this is a personal matter, there is an angry owl at Cross Hill near here.{nl}After it fell into a deep sleep due to an incident, it became obsessed with evil energy.{nl}Please wake that angry owl up and persuade it to regain its consciousness again.{nl}
column3: Ini hanya persoalan pribadi, tapi ada angry owl di Cross Hill dekat sini.{nl}Tapi setelah tertidur karena hal ini, ikut terobsesi oleh kekuatan jahat.{nl}Bangunkan angry owl ajak dia untuk kembali lagi.{nl}

column2: If it doesn't listen to you...{nl}Then please destroy it and let it go to the goddess.
column3: Jika tidak didengarkan..{nl}Hancurkan dan biarkan Goddess  yang mengurusnya.

column2: I will do anything to bring it back to what it used to be.
column3: Aku akan melakukan apapun untuk mengembalikannya pada normal status.

column2: This is the symbol of the Guide Owl which guided his spirit.{nl}When it sleeps for a long time, it gets influenced by monsters.{nl}Many of its allies changed like that.{nl}
column3: Ini adalah lambang Guide Owl yang menuntun jiwanya.{nl}Saat tertidur dalam waktu yang lama, Para monster merasukinya.{nl}Banyak dari mereka yang mengalami hal ini.{nl}

column2: I am sorry. Let me be alone for a while.
column3: Maafkan, biarkan aku sendiri dulu.

column2: So you brought the power of the spirits.{nl}I will inject the power of the spirits into your stick.{nl}With this much power of the spirits in a stick like this, you will be able to destroy Sequoia.
column3: Jadi kamu membawa power of spirits.{nl}Aku akan suntikan power of spirits ke dalam tongkat.{nl}Tongkat dengan kekuatan ini akan bisa melumpuhkan Sequoia.

column2: You must succeed.{nl}If you think about those owls that were eaten by Sequoia or burnt into deaths, you must {nl}succeed this time.
column3: Kamu harus berhasil.{nl}Jika kamu anggap para Owl telah dilahap oleh Sequoia atau dibakar sampai mati, kali ini kamu harus berhasil.

column2: What?{nl}Sequoia ran away alive?{nl}
column3: Apa?{nl}Sequoia meloloskan diri?{nl}

column2: That's a big problem!{nl}The Desperate Owl is over there...
column3: Ini masalah besar!{nl}Di sana Desperate Owl..

column2: It is my mistake. I thought it too easy. {nl}I didn't know this would happen. {nl}If the Desperate Owl gets destroyed, then I...{nl}
column3: Ini salahku. Kupikir akan lebih mudah. {nl}Aku tidak tahu akan terjadi seperti ini. {nl}Jika Desperate Owl dimusnahakn, maka Aku..{nl}

column2: Please...{nl}Please help the Desperate Owl. {nl}
column3: Tolonglah..{nl}Selamatkan Desperate Owl. {nl}

column2: Desperate Owl Sculpture
column3: Desperate Owl Sculpture

column2: It was very scary.{nl}Thanks for saving me.{nl}Although it seems that Sequoia is going crazier than usual, I feel relieved...{nl}
column3: Ini menakutkan.{nl}Terima kasih telah menyelamatkanku.{nl}Aku lega, tapi sepertinya Sequoia akan lebih gila dari biasanya..{nl}

column2: Anyways, it seems that Sequoia is moving towards the Desperate Owl.{nl}Please let nothing happen to it...
column3: Sepertinya Sequoia mendatangi Desperate Owl.{nl}Semoga tidak terjadi apa-apa..

column2: Sequoia was in a wild, angry state.{nl}I've never seen Sequoia like that before. We are going to be destroyed by it!{nl}Please lend us your strength!{nl}
column3: Aku melihat Sequoia terlihat marah dan menjadi gila.{nl}Belum pernah aku melihatnya seperti itu. Kita akan dihancurkannya!{nl}Tolonglah kami!{nl}

column2: We must try everything we can.{nl}We will need the Blackened Boughs laying around since Sequoia burned the forest.{nl}I will string them together and make a stronger stick.
column3: Lakukan apa yang kita mampu.{nl}Aku butuh blackened boughs.{nl}Aku akan mengikatnya dan menjadikannya tongkat yang kuat.

column2: Sequoia destroyed one of my friends, burned this forest, and...{nl}
column3: Sequoia menghabisi satu orang temanku, bakar hutan ini dan..{nl}

column2: Even if we are fundamentally good hearted...{nl}I will curse Sequoia until the very moment I fall into deep sleep.
column3: Pada dasarnya kita memiliki hati yang baik..{nl}Aku akan mengutuk Sequoia meskipun pada saat aku sedang tertidur.

column2: This is plenty enough.{nl}It will be better if I could string my anger into it as well.
column3: Ini akan cukup.{nl}Akan lebih baik lagi jika aku kumpulkan kekuatanku ke dalamnya.

column2: I have made the cursed stick with the Blackened Boughs that you brought.{nl}Sequoia must be still near here.{nl}Please stab Sequoia using this.
column3: Aku membuat Tongkat terkutuk dari dahan blackend wood yang kamu bawa.{nl}Sequoia pasti masih di sekitar sini.{nl}Tikam dia menggunakan ini.

column2: Sequoia will swallow us and absorb more spirits' energy.{nl}At one time, he was our friend..{nl}But we, and Sequoia, have long forgotten about those days.
column3: Sequoia akan menelan dan menghisap jiwa kita.{nl}Pada suatu saat dia akan menjadi teman kita..{nl}Tapi kita telah lupa akan itu.

column2: To see the forest burning in flames.{nl}I'm fine by it. It's not shocking anymore.{nl}The day when the Sequoia was possessed with evil energy was worse than this.
column3: Sudah biasa melihat hutan dibakar.{nl}Tidak apa-apa, aku tidak terkejut lagi.{nlWaktu dimana Sequoia dikuasai kekuatan jahat bahkan lebih buruk dari ini.

column2: I hope the owls don't feel disappointed due to their failure.{nl}Sequioia wasn't driven away, but that doesn't mean the stick had failed.{nl}The last two blows must have been especially fatal to it.
column3: Semoga owls tidak merasa kecewa atas kelalaiannya.{nl}Sequioia belum bisa dikalahkan, tapi bukan berarti tongkat ini telah kalah.{nl}Terutama 2 serang terakhir yang seharusnya memberikan efek besar.

column2: However, if we leave Sequoia as it is, then the whole forest may be set ablazed.{nl}It will recover itself by swallowing us.{nl}Please destroy Sequoia now.
column3: Bagaimanpun jika kita membiarkan Sequoia terus seperti ini, seluruh bagian hutan ini akan terbakar.{nl}Dan dia akan terus berkembang dengan menyerap jiwa-jiwa kita.{nl}Tolong musnahkan Sequoia sekarang juga.

column2: The scream from Sequoia is echoing even in my body.{nl}It wouldn't be difficult to defeat him now.{nl}You don't have time to waste anymore anyways.
column3: Suara Sequoia yang menggema disekujur tubuhku.{nl}Akan sulit sekali mengalahkannya saat ini.{nl}Tidak ada waktu lagi.

column2: You defeated Sequoia.{nl}It was once our protector, but has met a tragic end.{nl}The thoughts we had about Sequoia... It'd be hard for you to understand.
column3: Kamu kalahkan Sequoia.{nl}Pernah sekali yang menyelamatkan kami, tapi akhirnya mati dengan kondisi yang menyedihkan.{nl}Cara kita melihat Sequoia, sulit untuk dimengerti.

column2: Some purifiers don't immediately start working. {nl}For those cases, I've put in a guide so follow it step-by-step.
column3: Beberapa purifying devices tidak aktif. {nl}Aku telah membuat petunjuk yang bisa kamu ikuti.

column2: There is a shopping plaza in the lower part of Klaipeda. {nl}Stop by and look around if you need anything.
column3: Terdapat Area berjualan di bagian bawah kota Klaipeda. {nl} Cobalah untuk mampir dan melihat-lihat.

column2: It'd be great if he continued to runaway. {nl}I mean, I'm not really sure. He was a really good friend of mine...
column3: Aku hanya ingin dia pergi sejauh-jauhnya. {nl}Tapi kenyataannya aku tidah tahu. Dia teman yang sungguh baik bagiku..

column2: Okay.{nl}Please find the Grave Protector Owl from the grave of the unknown warrior.{nl}If he could lend us his power, it will be a good chance to defeat Sequioa.
column3: Oke.{nl}Temukan Grave Protector Owl di grave of the unknown warrior.{nl}Jika dia dapat meminjamkan kekuatannya, ini kesempatan baik untuk mengalahkan Sequioa.

column2: Believer Adele
column3: Believer Adele

column2: The thorny vines are plants too, so they must be weak to strong acid.{nl}What do you think? Does it seem like a good idea?
column3: Thorny vines juga merupakan tumbuhan yang akan lemah oleh cairan yang kuat.{nl}Bagaimana?ide bagus kan?

column2: The Filibo?{nl}I wouldn't be worried if it only steals food.{nl}
column3: Filibo?{nl}Aku tidak perlu takut, dia hanya pencuri makanan .{nl}

column2: It bites on any materials or military equipments that are made of wood, and breaks medicine {nl}jars. There are holes from tent to tent. Last but not least, it is not afraid of anything. {nl}It will attack even if it sees people.
column3: Merusak bahan kayu pada peralatan militer dan juga bisa merusak kotak obat.{nl}Melubangi tenda.{nl}Tidak takut apapun, dan bisa menyerang manusia.

column2: Ha! Take that, repulsive pricks. I'm feeling refreshed now!{nl}The materials and tents have came. And the equipments and supplies should be arriving soon...{nl}Finally we'll use the carts to... carts? carts?!!
column3: Ha! Aku lega sekarang!{nl}Tenda dan peralatan sudah tiba dan equipmen lainnya menyusul..{nl}Tinggal menunggu Cart.. Cart? Cart?!!{nl}

column2: Ah, I forgot about carts!{nl}I am sorry, but can you request carts to Pakelas?{nl}I can go myself, but I think I am gonna get scolded again... Haha...
column3: Ah, Aku lupa Cartnya!{nl}Maaf, tapi kamu dapat meminjamnya di Pakelas?{nl}Aku bisa berangkat sendiri, tapi rasanya aku akan kena marah lagi.. Haha..

column2: Adjutant General Pakelas
column3: Adjutant General Pakelas

column2: Ah, aren't you that famous... Oh... It's so good to see you.{nl}Why have you come here?{nl}
column3: Ah, Kamu pasti orang terkenal itu.. Oh..Senang bertemu denganmu.{nl}Apa yang membawamu kemari?{nl}

column2: Ah, carts... damn. Malt forgot them again... {nl}We have extra carts here, but most of them are waiting for maintenance, so I would check before{nl}taking them.
column3: Ah, Cart..sial. Malt melupakannya lagi..{nl}Kita punya extra carts, tapi beberapa harus diperbaiki dulu, aku akan memeriksanya.

column2: I must advise you to check the cart conditions.{nl}My soldiers should have check them, so I apologize for making you do it...{nl}I will scold Bran.
column3: Tolong periksa kondisinya.{nl}Maaf, para prajurit itu seharusnya memeriksanya..{nl}Akan kumarahi Bran.

column2: What?{nl}These are the only carts that function normally?
column3: Apa?{nl}Hanya ini carts yang bisa digunakan?

column2: Damn. The materials and the equipments should be arriving anytime now...{nl}But I'm in a hurry, I need someone to get some Hamming Stem in the meantime.{nl}Ah, that headache again...
column3: Sial. Bahan dan equipment seharusnya sudah tiba..{nl}Aku tidak sabar, Aku butuh stems of Harming saat ini.{nl}Aku sudah malas..

column2: How should I scold Malt?
column3: Haruskah aku marahi Malt?

column2: This is great!{nl}Ah, my sincerest apology for all this.
column3: Sudah cukup!{nl}Maafkan aku.

column2: So, does this mean that you will help me?{nl}Please get some claws from Velwrigglers at Rajuma Curved Path.
column3: Bisakah kamu menolongku?{nl}Dapatkan beberapa nails dari Velwritgglers di Rajuma Crooked Road.

column2: Our Revelator is so kind. Isn't he?
column3: Savior ini baik sekali.{nl}Iya kan?

column2: Darn, it's just a graze, but it hurts so bad.{nl}Well done.
column3: Agh, hanya menyerempet, tapi sakit sekali.{nl}Bagus.

column2: It will be completed if I have Truffle poison mushrooms at Ajidu intersection.{nl}I am counting on you.
column3: Akan lebih sempurna jika aku punya Truffle poison mushrooms dari Ajidu intersection.{nl}Aku berharap padamu.

column2: Where are the mushrooms from Truffles you say?{nl}Look closely at their horns. They are actually mushrooms.
column3: Apa Truffle punya mushrooms?{nl}Perhatikan horn itu. Itulah sebenarnya mushroom.

column2: Isn't it strange that mushrooms grow from their heads?
column3: Bukankan aneh, mushroom tumbuh dari atas kepala?

column2: Almost done.{nl}Please mix all the ingredients that you've gathered at the Altar of Harmony at Isdidu Fork.
column3: Sekarang sudah lengkap.{nl}Campurkan semua bahan yang kamu dapat dari Altar of Harmony di Ajidu intersection.

column2: In the past, the altar was the place to purify holy water or objects dedicated to Goddess Saule.{nl}Enough about the past, right now we just need to use it for a relevant purpose.
column3: Itu adalah tempat purify divine water atau divine objects sebagai penghargaan untuk Saule Goddess .{nl}Lupakan masa lalu. Lebih baik sekarang menggunakan tempat itu untuk sesuatu yang lebih baik.

column2: What was your impression when you saw the altar?{nl}I felt somewhat nostalgic whenever I see it.
column3: Bagaimana kesanmu melihat altar itu?{nl}Melihatnya merupakan sebuah nostalgia.

column2: Anyway, after mixing this, the acid solution will be complete!
column3: Acidic liquid akan lengkap setelah dicampur!

column2: Please melt the thorny vines with this acid solution.{nl}The thorny vines are located on the upper side of Isdidu Fork.
column3: Dengan acidic liquid ini, dapa melelehkan thorny vines.{nl}Mereka berada di bagian atas Ajidu intersection.

column2: I hope the Thorn Forest returns to what it used to look like.{nl}Birds are nowhere to be found right now.
column3: Kuharapa Vine Forest kembali seperti dahulu kala.{nl}Tidak ada seekor burungpun datang kemari.

column2: What is now the Thorn Forest was once a very beautiful forest.{nl}We, the Believers, used to hold sacred prayer ceremonies here.{nl}
column3: Dulu Vine Forest merupakan sebuah hutan yang indah.{nl}Kami bisanya mengadakan Acara Ritual di sini.{nl}

column2: After the Demon Lord Bramble came to our forest, it became like this.{nl}I can't even remember the last time I heard the sound of a songbird. How I miss the old and {nl}beautiful forest...
column3: Setelah Bramble, demon lord datang ke hutan ini, dan jadilah seperti ini.{nl}Aku tidak ingat lagi kapan terakhir kali burung berkicau di sini. Aku rindu suasana hutan yang dulu.

column2: Every now and then, I miss what the forest used to be.{nl}I also miss listening to the words of Goddess Saule.
column3: Terkadang aku merindukan hutan yang dulu.{nl}Aku juga rindu saat mendengarkan suara Saules Goddess .

column2: Believer Virgis
column3: Believer Birgis

column2: There's nothing that we can't accomplish with faith.{nl}If there is anything that we can't accomplish, then it's because our faith is not strong enough.
column3: Tidak ada yang tidak dapat dilakukan dengan keyakinan kita.{nl}Jika ada yang tidak bisa dilakukan, berarti keyakinan kita belum kuat.

column2: Believer Nojus
column3: Believer Noyus

column2: Revelator, please be careful.{nl}It seems as if a similar aura to that of the ominous voice is resonating throught the entire forest.{nl}Especially from the direction of Fallen Worry Forest... I'm sharp-eared on such things...
column3: Savior, Berhati-hatilah{nl}Tampaknya aura itu mirip dengan suara tak menyenangkan yang beresonansi di seluruh hutan.{nl}Terutama dari arah Fallen Worry Forest... Pendengaranku sangat tajam untuk hal-hal seperti ini…

column2: Supplies Officer
column3: Supplies Officer

column2: I am the supplies officer here.{nl}I received a list of neccessary supplies, but check out the length of this list.{nl}How am I suppose to handle all of these items on my own?{nl}
column3: Aku adalah Petugas Supplies di sini.{nl}Aku menerima daftar Supplies yang dibutuhkan, tapi coba lihat jumlah Supplies di sini.{nl}Aku tidak bisa mengaturnya sendiri.{nl}

column2: I will get scolded by Selina if I am late..{nl}Can you help me?{nl}I need Plantain Grass.
column3: Selina akan marah jika aku terlambat..{nl}Dapatkah kamu menolongku?{nl}Aku butuh rumput yang disebut Jilgyung.

column2: The people in charge must have forgot about our provisions.{nl}If not, do they think that we can live by eating nothing?
column3: Orang yang bertugas sudah harus melupakan bantuan.{nl}Jika tidak, apa mereka pikir kita bisa hidup tanpa makan?

column2: Wow, that was fast.{nl}But we're not done yet.{nl}If it could be finished with Plantain Grass, then I would have finished it myself.
column3: Waw, cepat sekali.{nl}Tapi ini belum selesai.{nl}Jika selesai dengan Jilgyung, lalu aku akan menyelesaikannya sendiri.

column2: What would reinvigorate our strength to fight is meat, good o' meat.{nl}The beef flanks from cows raised on apples are supreme, but there aren't any cows here.{nl}Let's try hunting Tinis, which have a similar taste.
column3: Daging adalah sesuatu yang sempurna untuk menambah semangat.{nl}Burung gagak yang memakan apel itu bahkan bisa lebih baik lagi, tapi tidak ada seekor gagakpun di sini.{nl}Ayo berburu Tinis yang rasanya tidak jauh berbeda.

column2: If only the list of goods to appropriate was any longer, then I would not be acting so hesitantly.{nl}The Vubbes stole supplies before.{nl}Nowadays, it's the Zigris causing trouble...
column3: Jumlah Supplyes bukan alasan aku kurang bergerak begitu cepat.{nl}Para Bubbe sebelumnya sudah mencurinya.{nl}Dan sekarang, zigris yang melakukannya..

column2: This is enough. Well done.{nl}I feel happy to see meat.
column3: Bagus, ini sudah cukup.{nl}Senang sekali bisa melihat daging.

column2: So... We have everything we needed... I will check the list again and report to Selina.{nl}Please wait a moment...{nl}
column3: Baiklah, kita sudah miliki semua yang dibutuhkan..Aku cek kembali sebelum melaporkannya pada Selina.{nl}Tunggu..{nl}

column2: Ah... They're worse than those Vubbes. For real!! The potion jars are all missing...{nl}Those Zigris recurrently steal things that seem unique to them.{nl}
column3: Ah.. Mereka lebih jelek dari para Bubbes. Sial!! Potion jarspun menghilang..{nl}Zigris itu kadang mencuri barang-barang yang unik juga.{nl}

column2: They are more than just thieves.{nl}If anything looks good, they'll take it away.
column3: Mereka lebih dari pencuri.{nl}Apapun yang terlihat bagus, langsung disikatnya.

column2: We don't have to worry about Zigris for a while now.{nl}They will be scared just thinking about you.{nl}
column3: Tidak perlu khawatir dengan para Zigris dulu.{nl}Mereka lebih takut kepadamu.{nl}

column2: We have everything we need now.{nl}I was able to prepare them by the deadline.{nl}I am relieved now.
column3: Kita sudah punya semua yang dibutuhkan sekarang.{nl}Aku sudah bisa menyipkan semua untuk digunakan nanti.{nl}Sekarang aku lega.

column2: Fortunately, everything look alright.{nl}Those Zigris... I want to show them how scary I am.
column3: Untunglah semua baik-baik saja.{nl}Para Zigris.. Ingin kutunjukkan pada mereka jika aku ini menakutkan.

column2: The Vubbes planted a flag at their camp not so long ago.{nl}Now they've been driven out and the Zigris have settled in.{nl}This isn't really noteworthy, what's more important is...{nl}
column3: Ada sebuah bendera di Zigris camp yang dipasang oleh para Bubbes di masa yang lalu.{nl}Sekarang para Zigris itu ada di sana.{nl}Aku tidak peduli, sekarang yang penting adalah..{nl}

column2: that they just stole all the supplies that I worked so hard to gather! I can't forgive them.{nl}Let them learn pain. Burn down their flag.{nl}In the meantime, I will... count the remaining supplies again!
column3: Mereka mencuri Supplyes yang aku cari susah payah! Tidak bisa dimaafkan.{nl}Mereka harus tau arti rasa sakit, bakar mereka semua.{nl}Aku akan memeriksanya kembali!

column2: Hahaha! Damn Zigris!{nl}Fear me!
column3: Hahaha! Zigris keparat!{nl}Ketahuilah bahwa aku sangat menakutkan!

column2: Damn, I am out of it.{nl}I have a mountain of things to do, but the monsters won't stop coming...{nl}How about this? Since only I can do my job, maybe you can do something about the monsters...
column3: Haduh, Aku bingung.{nl}Banyak yang harus dilakukan, tapi jumlah monster masih belum berkurang..{nl}Menurutmu? Aku harus bekerja, tapi para monster itu..

column2: Foreseeing Owl Sculptor
column3: Forecastor Owl Sculptor

column2: So you finally came here.
column3: Akhirnya kamu datang juga.

column2: Before we get into the assessment, we should defeat the monsters nearby.{nl}We can't proceed to the assessment like this.
column3: Sebelum kita masuk ke arena sesungguhnya, kita harus menghalau monster-monster di sekitar sini dulu.{nl}Kita tidak dapat langsung menuju ke sana.

column2: You are indeed growing.
column3: Kamu  benar-benar telah tumbuh.

column2: You are indeed the person I was waiting for.
column3: Kamu benar-benar orang yang kita tunggu.

column2: Okay. let's proceed to the assessment.{nl}You must awake the owls that will give you tests.{nl}Awake the three sculptures and try those three tests.
column3: Baiklah, ayo kita mulai .{nl}Kamu harus membangkitkan owls yang akan memberimu ujian.{nl}Bangkitkan tiga sculptures dan hadapi ujian-ujiannya.

column2: I am sure you can do it.
column3: Aku yakin kamu bisa melakukannya.

column2: Examiner Owl Sculpture
column3: Examiner Owl Sculpture

column2: I will wait at the assessment site.{nl}Please awake the other owls.
column3: Aku akan menunggu di tempat ujian.{nl}Tolong bangkitkan setiap owls.

column2: Thanks.{nl}You woke me up.{nl}Are you read for the test?
column3: Terima kasih.{nl}Kamu membangunkanku.{nl}Apakah kamu membaca ujiannya?

column2: I will wait at the assessment site.{nl}Good luck...
column3: Aku akan menunggu di tempat ujian.{nl}Semoga beruntung..

column2: You woke me up..{nl}You are ready to take the test, right?
column3: Kamu telah membangunkanku..{nl}Kamu sudah siap kan?

column2: Okay, then let's start the test.{nl}Please come to the place.
column3: Oke, mari kita mulai.{nl}Ayo ke tempatnya.

column2: You passed the first test.
column3: Kamu melewati ujian pertama.

column2: Please prepare for the second test.{nl}Please talk to me when you are ready.
column3: Persiapkan untuk ujian kedua.{nl}Katakan padaku jika kamu sudah siap.

column2: You passed the second test.
column3: Kamu melewati ujian kedua.

column2: This is gonna be the last test.{nl}Are you ready?
column3: Ujian terakhir.{nl}Kamu siap?

column2: You passed the last test.{nl}Congratulations.{nl}Please meet the Foreseeing Owl.
column3: Kamu melewati ujian terakhir.{nl}Selamat.{nl}Temui Forecastor Owl.

column2: Now proceed to the Thorn Forest again.{nl}Somebody is waiting for you there.{nl}Please put the pieces of the sculpture together at the designated place.
column3: Pergilah kembali ke hutan.{nl}Ada yang menunggumu di sana.{nl}Simpan pieces of the scupture bersamaan pada tempat yang telah disediakan.

column2: Please do not forget your valuable experiences here.{nl}Don't be afraid, please proceed.
column3: Jangan lupakan pengalaman berhargamu di sini.{nl}Jangan takut, maju terus.

column2: You woke me up to take the test.
column3: Kamu membangunkanku untuk mengikuti ujian.

column2: I've been waiting for you. I'm the Swordsman Master, the one who will help you.{nl}I'm not sure if you know about attribute training. {nl}
column3: Aku telah menunggumu. Aku Master Swordsman, satu-satunya orang yang akan menolongmu. {nl} Aku ragu kamu tahu tentang attribute training. {nl}

column2: Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl}You can learn attributes from each class master by paying them silver.
column3: Attribute bisa menambah kemampuan stats dan skills. {nl} Kamu bisa belajar Attribute dari setiap class master dengan membayar mereka menggunakan silver.

column2: You'll be able to fight easier if you learn attributes. {nl}
column3: Kamu akan mampu bertarung dengan mudah jika mempelajari Attribute. {nl}

column2: You've come to the right place. I'm the Wizard Master. {nl}I'm going to teach you about attribute training. {nl}
column3: Kamu datang ke tempat yang tepat. Aku seorang Wizard Master. {nl} Aku akan memberitahukan tentang attribute training. {nl}

column2: Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl}You can learn attributes from each class master by paying them silver.
column3: Attribute bisa menambah kemampuan stats dan skills. {nl} Kamu bisa belajar Attribute dari setiap class master dengan membayar mereka menggunakan silver.

column2: Does everything about attributes make sense? Now you'll be able to fight the enemies easier.
column3: Jadi kamu sudah mengerti tentang Attribute? Sekarang kamu bisa bertarung dengan mudah melawan musuh.

column2: How you become strong depends on what choice you make. {nl}It differs depending on your choice and thoughts.
column3: Bagaimana kamu bisa menjadi lebih kuat dengan apa yang telah kamu pilih. {nl}Semua tergantung pilihan dan apa yang ada dibenakmu.

column2: Good to see you. I am the Archer Master. {nl}Do you know about attribute training? {nl}
column3: Senang bertemu denganmu. Aku Master Archer. {nl} Tahukan kamu tentang attribute training? {nl}

column2: Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl}You can learn attributes from each class master by paying them silver.
column3: Attribute bisa menambah kemampuan stats dan skills. {nl} Kamu bisa belajar Attribute dari setiap class master dengan membayar mereka menggunakan silver.

column2: Mastering these attributes will help your skills in combat.
column3: Mastering attribute bisa meningkatkan skill dalam pertarunganmu.

column2: Willpower is the force that creates magic power. {nl}For a Wizard, there is no stronger weapon.
column3: Tekad adalah kekuatan untuk membentuk magic power. {nl} Tidak ada senjata yang lebih kuat untuk wizard daripada itu.

column2: The archer gives an arrow as a present, but the enemy take it as death.
column3: Archer memberikan anak panah sebagai hadiah{nl} tapi musuh menerimanya sebagai kematian.

column2: There are those who fit with the sword and there are those who don't. {nl}It means that you should find something of value rather than readily throw your life away.
column3: Ada orang yang cocok dengan pedang dan ada juga yang tidak. {nl} Intinya adalah temukan sesuatu yang berharga di hidupmu.

column2: A Ranger's arrows target many, not only one.{nl}
column3: Panah seorang ranger tidak hanya membidik satu target {nl}

column2: It's very likely you'll be exposed to the enemy when you shoot arrows. {nl}So my theory is that you have to use whatever comes in handy, like shields or stones.
column3: Saat kamu menembakan anak panah, kemungkinan kamu bisa diserang  musuhmu. {nl} Jadi teoriku adalah bagaimana menggunakan apa yang ada ditanganmu, seperti shields atau stones.

column2: One thing I'd like to tell you... I think your attack lacks something. {nl}If you learn skills, you'll be able to make more powerful attacks when you need to.
column3: Satu tips untukmu... Seranganmu sepertinya kurang kuat. {nl} Jika kamu belajar skills, kamu bisa melakukan serangan yang lebih kuat saat dibutuhkan.

column2: There are different skills for each class but you will be able to fight better when you learn them. {nl}Also, you can do a lot of things aside from attacking.
column3: Ada perbedaan-perbedaan skill untuk setiap class tapi kamu akan semakin berkembang dengan mempelajarinya terus. {nl} Juga akan banyak teknik bertarung yang kamu dapatkan.

column2: What do you think? There are a lot of useful skills, right? {nl}Using the skills effectively will be of great help in combat. {nl}
column3: Bagaimana? Banyak skill yang berguna, bukan? {nl} Menggunakan skill sangat membantu di saat bertarung. {nl}

column2: Oh, you said we need to assemble? {nl}Please let the Battle Commander know about it too. He's over there on the right.
column3: Oh, kamu bilang tadi kita harus berkumpul? {nl} Tolong beritahukan battle commander tentang hal itu. Dia ada di arah kanan.

column2: Guiding spirits is an important task, but it's not a pleasant task.{nl}There's nothing happier than living right?
column3: Guiding spirits adalah tugas yang penting, tapi ini juga tugas yang menyenangkan.{nl}Tidak ada yang lebih mengasyikan selain hunting kan?

column2: Blackened Boughs can be found when you defeat the monsters nearby.
column3: Blackened boughs bisa didapatkan di  monster-monster sekitar sini.

column2: Others are violent as well, but the Filibos are the worst.{nl}They are resilient as hell.{nl}I think I can relax a bit if they get taken care of.
column3: Sudah biasa jika semua ini adalah kejahatan, tapi Filibos lah yang paling jahat.{nl}Mereka sangat jahat seperti neraka.{nl}Mungkin aku bisa sedikit tenang jika mereka disingkirkan.

column2: Plantain Grass are all around here so you can easily find them.{nl}I'll be working on something else.
column3: Jilgyung ada di sekitar sini, mudah sekali menemukannya.{nl}Aku akan melakukan hal lain dulu.

column2: There are many Tinis when you climb up the hill from the road down.{nl}Eight big scoops will do.
column3: Banyak Tinis saat kamu memanjat ke atas dari arah bawah.{nl}8 big scoops akan melakukannya.

column2: We don't have time collect the potion jars again.{nl}Let's steal back the jars that the Zigris stole from us. They are the ones who started this.
column3: Kita tidak ada waktu lagi.{nl}Ayo ambil jars yang telah dicuri Zigris dari kita. Merekalah yang memulai.

column2: Monsters really like the Soul Crystal.{nl}They become strong when they absorb its power.
column3: Para monster sangat menyukai Essences of Spirits.{nl}Mereka akan semakin kuat saat menyerap kekuatannya.

column2: If something goes wrong... then go meet the Gatekeeper Owl.{nl}He is most clever among us.{nl}May the goddess bless you.
column3: Jika salah.. temuilah Gatekeeper Owl.{nl}Dia mungkin lebih cerdik dari kita.{nl}Semoga Goddess bersamamu.

column2: Nice to meet you, follower of the goddess. {nl}Do you know about learning attributes?
column3: Senang bertemu denganmu, pengikut Goddess. {nl} Apa kamu tahu tentang mempelajari Attribute?

column2: Welcome, you who follow the goal of the goddess.{nl}Do you know about training attributes?
column3: {nl}Attribute bisa menambah kemampuan stats dan skills. {nl} Kamu bisa belajar Attribute dari setiap class master dengan membayar mereka menggunakan silver.

column2: Now do you grasp what attributes are? {nl}Learning attributes will help you to easily defeat your enemies. {nl}
column3: Sekarang kamu sudah mengerti attribute kan? {nl} Mendapatkan Attribute bisa membantu kamu mengalahkan musuh. {nl}

column2: Healing and helping others is the mission of the Clerics. {nl}How can you ignore people seeking help in the name of the goddess?
column3: Healing dan membantu sesama ada visi utama dari Clerics. {nl} Bagaimana kamu bisa mengabaikan orang yang mencari bantuan dalam nama Goddess?

column2: People are still suffering from the wounds within their body and mind from Medzio Diena.{nl}They need our help.
column3: Jiwa dan raga orang tersiksa karena luka dari kejadian Divine Day.{nl} Mereka butuh bantuan kita.

column2: I am sorry, but can you please find my companion, Badat.{nl}I haven't heard anything from him since he left to do some research.
column3: Maaf, tolong temukan sahabatku Badat.{nl}Sudah lama aku tidak mendengar kabarnya lagi semenjak dia meninggalkan penelitian ini.

column2: I don't know where he went.{nl}But he will be in danger without protection from mercenaries.
column3: Aku tidak tahu kemana dia pergi.{nl}Dia akan dalam bahaya tanpa perlindungan para mercenaries.

column2: Gorath was looking for me?{nl}I am sorry. I just need to find the rest of my research materials.
column3: Gorath mencariku?{nl}Maaf. Akan selesai saat aku menemukan semua reseach materials.

column2: Thanks. I was thinking that the Tontus may have swallowed them.{nl}I promise that I will return to the Excavation Camp if you find them for me.
column3: Terima kasih. Sepertinya Tontus telah menelannya.{nl}Aku janji akan kembali ke reseachers' camp setelah kamu menemukan ini.

column2: I remember the most of it, but those are really important research materials.{nl}They contain the information on how we could enter into the Mausoleum and etc.
column3: Aku hampir ingat semuanya, tapi itu adalah reseach materials yang sangat penting.{nl}Berisi informasi penting untuk bisa masuk ke royal tomb dan lainnya.

column2: So this is all? Hmm...{nl}Thanks for finding them. I will now return to the Excavation Camp.
column3: Jadi ini ya? hmm..{nl}Terima kasih telah menemukannya, aku akan segera kembali ke reseachers' camp.

column2: Monsters will gain nothing by stealing these research materials.{nl}And yet, there are many people claiming that they lost their materials. Isn't it strange?
column3: Para monster tidak akan mendapatkan apapun dengan mengambil research materials itu.{nl}Tapi banyak orang merasa kehilangan materials itu. Bukankan ini aneh?

column2: So you want to be our apprentice, eh?{nl}Do you know who we are?
column3: Kamu mau menjadi murid kami?{nl}Kamu tahu siapa kami?

column2: We should ask for more when we are in times like this.{nl}I don't know what they are looking for, {nl}but they pay a lot when something is discovered at the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}{nl}
column3: Kita harus banyak bertanya pada saat kita berada di masa seperti ini.{nl}Aku tidak tahu apa yang mereka cari, tapi mereka akan membayar mahal jika menemukan sesuatu yang penting di royal tomb.{nl}{nl}

column2: Good, good job. This will do.
column3: Bagus. Ini sudah cukup.

column2: Now go get me some lime from the monsters that swallowed some.
column3: Temukan limes yang telah dimakan para monster sekarang.

column2: After making this, I'm outta of this town.{nl}I stayed here long enough.
column3: Setelah selesai membuat ini, Aku akan keluar dari kota ini.{nl}Aku sudah terlalu lama di sini.

column2: Good. Go meet my partner in Pillars of the Courtyard with this.{nl}He is called Vincent and he is very skillful.
column3: Bagus. Temui partnerku di Garden of Poles dengan ini.{nl}Orang memanggilknya Vincent dan dia sangat hebat.

column2: Ah. Welcome.{nl}There aren't any people in this world who can make counterfeits like us.{nl}
column3: Ah. Selamat datang.{nl}Tidak ada orang di dunia ini yang lihai membuat barang palsu seperti kita.{nl}

column2: I needed someone to do some errands.{nl}Get some of the firewood that is scattered on the ground.
column3: Aku butuh beberapa orang untuk melakukan tugas ini.{nl}Ambil beberapa kayu bakar yang berserakan di tanah.

column2: Vincent
column3: Vincent

column2: Ah, so you are the newcomer.{nl}Come see this thing behind me and if the matter inside solidifies, bring it to me.{nl}{nl}
column3: Ahh, jadi kamu pendatang baru itu.{nl}Periksalah sesuatu dibelakangku ini dan jika didalamnya bagus, bawakan padaku.{nl}{nl}

column2: Where should we go?{nl}Are there more valuable places than the Royal Mausoleum?
column3: Kemana kita akan pergi?{nl}Adakah tempat yang lebih berharga dari royal tomb?

column2: You are very skillful for a beginner.{nl}By the way... do you know how we were able to survive in this world?
column3: Sebagai seorang pemula kamu cukup hebat.{nl}Ngomong-ngomong .. Tahukan kamu bagaimana caranya kita bertahan hidup di dunia ini?

column2: I am looking for the poles that were used in building the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}If you see unique poles, please let me know.
column3: Aku sedang mencari tiang yang biasa digunakan untuk membangun royal tomb.{nl}Jika kamu menemukannya, tolong kasih tahu aku.

column2: Aren't they amazing?{nl}I wish I live here forever doing researches on those poles.
column3: Hebat kan mereka?{nl}Aku berharap tinggal di sini selamanya meneliti tentang tiang-tiang itu.

column2: They are great pieces.{nl}We should go to Zluges Historic Site.
column3: Potongan-potongan yang bagus.{nl}Kita mesti pergi ke Zlugi ruins.

column2: I request for your guard one more time.{nl}I don't want to get disturbed by the monsters while I am observing.
column3: Aku minta pengawalanmu sekali lagi.{nl}Aku tidak ingin diganggu para monster saat aku bekerja.

column2: Because of your assistance, the study went well.{nl}But, I found some traces of magics on them. Outrageous, right?
column3: Ini pelajaran yang bagus.{nl}Aku menemukan beberapa tKamu-tKamu magis pada mereka. Aku merasa kesal.

column2: Ho. As I expected.{nl}The one I am looking for should be marked.
column3: Seperti yang kuharapkan.{nl}Orang yang aku cari pasti sudah ditemukan.

column2: I am smarter than you guys think!{nl}Do you think I am gonna get deceived by you guys?
column3: Aku lebih cerdas dari yang kamu pikirkan!{nl}Kamu pikir kamu bisa mengelabuiku?

column2: It is a real honor to be chosen as a member of the research team, but I am afraid of making {nl}mistakes.
column3: Sebuah kehormatan menjadi anggota tim penelitian, tapi aku takut aku melakukan kesalahan.

column2: A man with silver hair requested something of me, what was it?{nl}Or was it blonde hair?
column3: Lelaki berambut perak itu minta sesuatu, apa itu?{nl}Rambut pirang kah?

column2: Foreseeing Owl
column3: Forecastor Owl

column2: Necroventer has obstructed the road to the Thorn Forest. {nl} You must defeat the Necroventer to enter the Thorn Forest.
column3: Necroventer telah menutup jalan ke forest of thorns. {nl} Untuk bisa pergi ke sana kamu harus  mengalahkan Necroventer.

column2: Corrupted Owl Sculpture
column3: The Owl Sculpture with anger

column2: Death to all who are resist Necroventer.
column3: Musnahkan dulu semua yang melindungi Necroventer.

column2: The Necroventer that had occupied Top Grip Peak has vanished.{nl}Top Grip Peak will become peaceful once more.
column3: Necroventer yang menguasai Top Grip Peak telah binasa.{nl}Top Grip Peak akan kembali damai.

column2: Revelator! I wanted to meet you for a long time.{nl}Pitt and I applied to the military because we wanted to listen to your heroic stories.{nl}But we are just standing guards...It's sort of dreary.{nl}
column3: Savior! Aku masih ingin bersamamu lebih lama lagi.{nl}Pitt dan Aku bergabung ke militer hanya untuk bisa mendengar cerita kepahlawananmu.{nl}Tapi kami hanya jadi penjaga … menyebalkan.{nl}

column2: If you are okay, can you persuade our commander so we can go out to the battlefield?{nl}The commander may permit us to go if you ask him...{nl}And it will be a good experience for us.
column3: Jika kamu berkenan, tolong bujuk komanda agar membawa kami ke medan perang?{nl}Mungkin komanda akan mendengarmu..{nl}Ini akan menjadi pengalaman penting buat kami.

column2: Wow, you are my role model. I respect you!
column3: Wow, kamu adalah idolaku, Aku bangga padamu!

column2: I think something good will happen since I met you.{nl}Yes... something good will happen.
column3: Semenjak bertemu denganmu semua terasa menyenangkan.{nl}Ya … sesuatu yang baik akan hadir.

column2: Hehe, I'm no different... {nl}To solve the troubles of this forest, I want... no, I was called by the military.{nl}
column3: Hm Hm, sebenarnya.. {nl}Aku di sini untuk menyelesaikan masalah.. Bukan, aku dipanggil untuk melayani para prajurit.{nl}

column2: You probably saw them when you came a while ago. The Thorny Bushes. They are very resilient, {nl}but we have a solution. I was born here so I know them well.{nl}
column3: Mungkin tadi kamu melihatnya saat datang kemari. Thorny Bushes. Mereka sangat buas, tapi kita punya solusinya.{nl}Aku lahir di sini, jadi aku sangat mengenalnya.{nl}

column2: Please gather the fluids that come out from Tinis.{nl}It has a gland that contains the fluids near it's tail.{nl}Be careful since it smells bad.
column3: Tolong bawakan fluids dari para Tini.{nl}Ada unsur khusus yang terkandung di dalamnya, cairan di dekat ekornya.{nl}Hati-hati juga baunya sangat tidak sedap.

column2: I can make it quickly if I have them a lot.{nl}Yes. Very quickly...
column3: Jika mereka banyak aku akan menyelesaikannya lebih cepat.{nl}Ya .. Sangat cepat..

column2: Wow, it's more than I thought. {nl}Please wait a bit. It will be done quickly...
column3: Wow, lebih dari yang kukira. {nl}Tunggu sebentar, ini akan lebih cepat..

column2: Okay... When you pour this onto the Thorny Bushes, they will die quickly.{nl}Yes. I grew... ah, no. I made that. I can guarantee its effectiveness.
column3: Oke.. Ketika kamu mencampurkannya pada Thorny Bushes, mereka akan mati dengan cepat.{nl}Ya aku yang memeliharanya, Tidak. Aku yang membuatnya. Aku bisa menjamin ini sangat efektif.

column2: What a lovely Thorny Bu...{nl}Ah! No. What am I saying...
column3: Thorny Bus tercinta..{nl}Ah! Tidak. Apa yang telah aku katakan..

column2: What was that? I thought we just needed to defeat the Thorny Bushes.{nl}How preposterous!{nl}
column3: Apa itu tadi? Kupikir kita hanya perlu berburu Thorny Bushes.{nl}Ini luar biasa!{nl}

column2: The herb broker is not here, anyways let's go back to the training camp!{nl}I want to tell this to Raimondas as soon as possible!
column3: Tidak ada Pengepul herbal di sini, ayo kembali ke training camp!{nl}Aku ingin mengatakan ini pada Raimondas secepatnya!

column2: So you guys are the ones who wanted go to the battlefield?{nl}You guys have no skills. There's little to expect from you guys.{nl}And those pets... are you guys crazy enough to take those pets to the perilous battlefield?
column3: Jadi kalian orang-orang yang ingin pergi ke battlefield?{nl}Kalian masih belum cukup kuat. Kalian tidak bisa diharapkan.{nl}Dan pet-pet itu.. Apa kalian gila membawa pet-pet itu ke  battlefield yang penuh bahaya?

column2: What's with those defiant glares? {nl}You guys don't wanna accept that you're not skillful?
column3: Apa itu defiant glare? {nl}Kalian tidak menerima jika kalian kurang hebat?

column2: Okay. I like your attitudes. But that is not enough.{nl}Defeat those Golems at the training camp and bring me the evidence that you defeated them. {nl}Only then will I acknowledge your skills.
column3: Oke. Aku suka prilakumu.{nl}Tapi ini tidak cukup.{nl}Kalahkan Golem-golem di training camp dan bawa buktinya jika kamu telah mengalahkannya. Maka aku akan memperhitungkan kemampuanmu.

column2: Fighting Golems will be easier than going to the battlefield.
column3: Fighting Golems akan lebih mudah daripada pergi ke battlefield.

column2: Lads. You came. Show me the evidence.{nl}You defeated Golems? or you just ran way from them?
column3: Kamu telah kembali, tunjukkan buktinya.{nl}Kamu mengalahkan para Golem? Atau kamu hanya lari dari mereka saja?

column2: Alright! Very nice. I will acknowledge your skills.{nl}Don't ever forget. The ones who survive in this war are the winners.{nl}
column3: Bagus sekali! Aku tidak akan meragukan kemampuanmu.{nl}Jangan pernah lupa. Orang yang bisa bertahan dalam perang ini, dialah pemenangnya.{nl}

column2: Okay. Return back to Raimondas.{nl}Have some confidence.
column3: Oke. Kembalilah pada Raimondas.{nl}Percaya diri lah.

column2: Okay. Have you brought the evidence?
column3: Oke. Kamu bawa buktinya?

column2: Very good. You guys are the members of my camp now.
column3: Bagus sekali. Kalian anggota campku sekarang.

column2: The feeling that you felt while you were fighting against the Golem. Don't forget it.{nl}The newcomers these day... I don't find any confidence in them...
column3: Perasaan yang kamu rasakan saat melawan Golem. Jangan lupakan.{nl}Pendatang baru saat itu.. Aku tidak melihat kepercayaan diri mereka..

column2: By the way... I don't see that hairy creature that went along with you guys.{nl}Tell me what happened to it.
column3: Omong-omong .. Aku tidak melihat makhluk berbulu yang biasanya bersamamu.{nl}Katakan apa yang terjadi padanya.

column2: Okay. I received a strange report so I was wondering what happened.{nl}I heard the dead body of a monster was found near Morku Farm.
column3: Oke. Aku menerima laporan aneh yang membuatku berpikir apa yang telah terjadi.{nl}Aku mendengar ada jasad monster di sekitar Morkos farm.

column2: That monster looked like the monster you guys used to have.{nl}I will give you the first mission. Search Morku Farm.{nl}Find out if it's the same breed or if it's the monster that you guys used to have.
column3: Monster itu mirip dengan makhluk yang biasa kamu bawa.{nl}Aku akan memberimu tugas pertama. Cari Morcus farm.{nl}Cari tahu apakah monster itu memang makhluk yang sama dengan yang kamu miliki atau bukan.

column2: Good luck on your first mission.{nl}If it really is what it is, I'm sorry for the loss.
column3: Selamat atas misi pertamamu, semoga beruntung.{nl}Jika memang sama, Sayang sekali.

column2: Ah... how could this... It's not true. This body must not be Spion's!!{nl}I can't believe it. Look closely, it must be a different monster.
column3: Ahh tidak mungkin. Jasad ini bukan Spion's!!{nl}Tidak bisa kupercaya. Perhatikan baik-baik, bukan monster yang sama.

column2: No... No way... How could you be...{nl}No...
column3: Tidak … tidak mungkin …

column2: Ah... Spion!! How... Because of me, you...{nl}We are so sorry...
column3: Ah.. Spion!! Kenapa … gara-gara aku … kamu {nl}Sayang sekali..

column2: Herb broker!! This is all because of the herb broker.{nl}I will find that broker and get revenge for Spion!{nl}Where the hell is that bastard?
column3: Pengepul Herbal!! Ini semua karena dia.{nl}Aku akan temui dia untuk melawan Spion!{nl}Dimana dia?

column2: It's not your fault that Spion turned out like this.{nl}Even if that's your fault, Spion would not have died like this.
column3: Bukan salahmu jika spion menjadi seperti ini.{nl}Jika memang salahmu, tapi tidak akan menjadi spion seperti ini.

column2: Okay. What happened to the monster's dead body?{n}
column3: Oke. Apa yang terjadi pada jasad monster itu?{n}

column2: Okay.{nl}This would have never happened if I found the identity of the broker sooner...{nl}Pitt, Bran, I am so incompetent... I am so sorry.
column3: ..Oke.{nl}Ini tidak akan pernah terjadi lagi jika aku bisa menemukan si pengepul itu secepatnya..{nl}Pitt, Bran, Maaf aku tidak berkompeten.{nl}

column2: I want to thank you.{nl}You made them real soldiers.
column3: Aku ingin berterima kasih. {nl}Kamu telah membuat mereka menjadi prajurit-prajurit yang sebenarnya.{nl}

column2: We must concentrate on capturing those demons now. May the goddess bless you.
column3: Mungkin tadi kamu melihatnya saat datang kemari. Thorny Bushes. Mereka sangat buas, tapi kita punya solusinya.{nl}Aku lahir di sini, jadi aku sangat mengenalnya.{nl}

column2: No one will help you even if you are defeated by Golems.{nl}You guys have to save yourself.
column3: Tidak akan ada yang menolongmu,  meskipun kamu dikalahkan oleh Golems.{nl}Kamu harus melindungi dirimu sendiri.

column2: Well done.{nl}Let me take over from here.{nl}Those Siaulambs should practice running away from now on.
column3: Bagus.{nl}Aku akan mengatasinya sendiri.{nl}Mulai saat ini Siaulambs itu harus belajar kabur.

column2: I can't stand this anymore.{nl}I will defeat it myself.{nl}Please accompany us. If you could help us, that will really help us out.
column3: Aku sudah tidak sabar.{nl}Aku akan mengalahkannya sendiri.{nl}Kamu juga ikuti aku. Akan sangat menolong jika kamu membantu.

column2: Thanks for saying that.{nl}I will wait at Malkos Felled Area.
column3: Terima kasih untuk itu.{nl}Aku akan menunggu di Malkos Felled Area.

column2: If I was a little richer, then I would have hired a personal mercenary.{nl}It was my mistake to rely on the goddess' blessing too much.
column3: Jika aku sedikit lebih kaya, aku akan menyewa pengawal pribadi.{nl}Salahku terlalu mengandalkan berkah dari Goddess.

column2: I know many people are missing, but no one is trying to find them.{nl}They don't even know whether those people even existed.
column3: Aku tahu banyak orang yang hilang, tapi tak seorangpun yang mencarinya.{nl}Bahkan tidak tahu apakah mereka masih ada atau tidak.

column2: In such a anarchic world, it's completely justified to hoard.{nl}Ah, forget I said anything.
column3: Ketika dunia ini sedang kacau kita harus bisa mencari uang.{nl}Ah, lupakanlah.

column2: Farewell to this land when this is over.{nl}I never saw that scary man before.
column3: Ketika ini berakhir, selamat tinggal tempat ini.{nl}Aku tidak pernah melihat lelaki yang menakutkan sebelumnya.

column2: No one will believe what I saw.{nl}I learned something interesting from it.
column3: Tidak ada yang percaya aku melihatnya.{nl}Aku belajar sesuatu yang menarik dari sini.

column2: I will lure Saugas.{nl}Bring me the poison from Woodfung near Alkune Stairway.{nl}And please also bring me the Spiritual Stone.{nl}
column3: Aku akan memancing Saugas.{nl}Bawakan aku racun dari Woodfung di sekitar Alkune Stairway.{nl}Juga bawakan aku stone with vigor.{nl}

column2: It's fortunate that both of you are okay.{nl}Thanks for recognizing me. May the goddess bless you.
column3: Beruntunglah kalian berdua baik-baik saja.{nl}Terima kasih telah mengenalku. Semoga Goddess selalu bersamamu.

column2: Good luck.
column3: Semoga beruntung.

column2: I would feel more comfortable doing it myself, but I took an arrow to the knee before, and{nl}it aches quite a bit.
column3: Aku akan merasa nyaman jika melakukannya sendiri, tapi kakiku sedang terluka.

column2: If you look closely at the stones across Apynys Habitat, it will definitely appear.{nl}I hope the artifacts haven't been digested fully yet.
