column3: Jika kamu perhatikan lebih dekat ke bebatuan di seberang Apynys Camp, maka akan muncul.{nl}Semoga artifacts itu belum dilahap semuanya.

column2: The evil presence has caused the Guardians to break the Royal Slate, which contains the rules of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Defeat the Guardians and bring back the pieces.
column3: Karena trik makhluk jahat itu, Protectors itu menghancurkan stone plate yang berisi rules of royal tomb.{nl}Hancurkan protectors itu dan bawa kembali stone plate itu.

column2: Those Guardians are trying to break a stone lantern of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}Stop them. They are out of control.
column3: Protectors itu mencoba merusak stone lantern Di royal tomb.{nl}Tahan mereka. Mereka sedang mangamuk.

column2: Everything at the Royal Mausoleum is designed for the revelation.
column3: Semua yang ada di royal tomb ini didesain khusus untuk revelation.

column2: With the Great King's will weakened within them, some Guardians now prioritize the Royal Slate more than the revelation.{nl}It's tragic.
column3: Kehendak Sang Raja akan lemah bersama mereka, saat ini para penjaga lebih mementingkan Royal Slate daripada The Revelation.{nl}Tragis sekali.

column2: The rules of the Royal Mausoleum are in place.{nl}We can prevent the evil beings from getting near the revelation.
column3: The rules of the royal tomb ada di tempatnya.{nl}Kita bisa menahan para makhluk itu mendekati The revelation.

column2: My wound is deep, so please pass the supplies on for me when you find them.{nl}You can find Kepeck at Apvija Hill.
column3: Lukaku sangat dalam, tolong berikan padaku benda itu saat kamu berhasil mendapatknya.{nl}Temui Kepect di Apvija Hills.

column2: I welcome you with our family's courtesy.{nl}To obtain the Great King's spell, you need to be more than qualified.{nl}You also need to possess courage and wisdom to release the seal.
column3: Aku menyambutmu dengan baik di keluarga ini.{nl}Untuk mendapatkan the great king's spell, kamu harus memiliki kemampuan dan kebijaksanaan untuk bisa melepaskan seal.

column2: There's a white oak tree at Zeme Highland.{nl}First, extract some fluids from it.
column3: Terdapat white oak wood di Zeme Plateau.{nl}Extract beberapa fluids darinya.

column2: Preparations are ongoing to undo the seal at Awaiting Stone Bridge.{nl}Please handle it with care as it is sap collected gradually throughout hundreds of years.
column3: Persiapan sedang dilakukan untuk melepaskan segel di Awaiting Stone Bridge.{nl}Tolong tanganani dengan hati-hati karena sap yang dikumpulkan merupakan akumulasi dari ratusan tahun.

column2: This will be enough.{nl}Let's move on to the next step.
column3: Ini sudah cukup.{nl}Mari lanjut ke tahap berikutnya.

column2: With this sap, I will prepare a crystal that can release the seal.{nl}In the meantime, please collect a bundle of Canyon Amalas at Pamirstas Highland.
column3: Dengan fluids ini, Aku akan membuat patung untuk melepas seal.{nl}Sementara itu, selamatkanlah Amalas di Pamirsit plateau.

column2: You need to get one that isn't poisonous.{nl}You may pass out for a while if you get poisoned by it, so be careful.
column3: Kamu harus mendapatkannya tanpa terkena racunnya.{nl}Berhati-hatilah, mungkin kamu akan tidak sadar beberapa saat ketika mendapatkannya.

column2: Our family has been waiting for the chosen one for hundreds of years.{nl}It is a real honor for it to be our generation to meet you.
column3: Sudah ratusan tahun keluarga kami menunggu orang-orang yang terpilih.{nl}Ini adalah penghargaan besar buat generasi kami bertemu denganmu.

column2: This is it.{nl}Go to the Broken Pillar Canyon with the Seal Release Crystal.{nl}The Disciples of Gustas will give you a very warm welcome.
column3: Ini dia.{nl}Pergilah ke Broken Pillar Canyon dengan Seal Release Crystal.{nl}Disciple Gustas akan menyambutmu dengan hangat.

column2: It is sealed with two seals so that only the chosen one can obtain it.{nl}The chosen one must possess courage and wisdom to unleash all the seals.{nl}
column3: Benda ini disegel oleh 2 seal, hanya orang yang terpilih yang bisa melakukannya.{nl}Orang itu harus memiliki keberanian dan kebijaksanaan untuk bisa melepas seal ini.{nl}

column2: Of course our family's men will guide you.{nl}We know that you are qualified.
column3: Tentu, keluarga kami akan membimbingmu.{nl}Kami tahu kamu qualified.

column2: This is a sap that we've collected for hundreds of years.{nl}Be careful since lots of monsters are after it.
column3: Itu fluids yang kukumpulkan ratusan tahun.{nl}Hati-hati terhadap monster-monster itu.

column2: The day for the Great King's inheritance to find an owner has finally come.{nl}Now, go to the Disciples of Gustas at Broken Pillar Canyon.
column3: Warisan dari Great King untuk menemukan pemiliknya akhirnya tiba.{nl} Sekarang, pergilah ke Disciple Gustas di Broken Pillar Canyon.

column2: It's very fortunate that Jonas regained consciousness.
column3: Beruntung sekali Jonas telah kembali sadar.

column2: I was waiting for you.{nl}Do you have the Great King's keys?{nl}
column3: Aku telah menunggumu.{nl}Kamu memiliki key of the great king?{nl}

column2: Alright. Now you need to find the map that indicates the seals' locations.{nl}There has been a lot of false information going around about its location, so you'll have to check {nl}various places.
column3: Oke. Temukan peta yang menunjukkan seal itu berada.{nl}Banyak informasi menyesatkan di sana, jadi kamu harus memeriksanya benar-benar.

column2: The map is something that should not be in the hands of those demons.{nl}But even I don't know its exact location.
column3: Ini adalah sesuatu yang tidak boleh diserahkan kepada iblis-iblis itu.{nl}Aku tidak tahu tepatnya dimana.

column2: Nothing here.
column3: Tidak ada apa-apa di sini.{nl}

column2: But, there are still places to check.{nl}I will mark them on the map, so please check all those marked places.
column3: Masih ada tempat lain untuk diperiksa.{nl}Aku akan memberi tKamu pada peta ini agar bisa dicek satu persatu.

column2: You found it.{nl}The inheritance of the Great King Zachariel is waiting for you.
column3: Kamu menemukannya.{nl}The inheritance of Zachariel, The great king, telah menunggumu.{nl}

column2: This map contains all the locations of the seal devices at Awaiting Stone Bridge.{nl}When you unleash the seals with the king's key, you will realize what to do next.
column3: Pada Peta ini terdapat semua lokasi seal devices di Awaiting Stone Bridge.{nl}Saat kamu melepas seals menggunakan king's key, kamu akan mengetahui apa yang harus dilakukan selanjutnya.

column2: He isn't breathing because of the poison.{nl}Hurry, borrow some antidote from the other people at Stone Pole Platform.
column3: Dia tidak bernafas karena racun itu.{nl}Cepat, minta beberapa obat penawar dari orang lain di Stone Pole Platform.

column2: Have you gotten any antidotes yet?{nl}His pulse is fading.{nl}
column3: Belum ada antidotes ?{nl}Denyut nadinya melemah.{nl}

column2: Thank you!{nl}Fortunately, he is breathing again.{nl}
column3: Terima kasih!{nl}Syukurlah, dia bernafas kembali.{nl}

column2: We'll rest a little more and return when he regains his strength.{nl}May the goddess bless you.
column3: Kita istirahat sebentar dan kembali setelah dia pulih.{nl}Semoga Goddess melindungimu.

column2: The Revelator is here?! Thank the goddess.{nl}I am Rexipher, a historian. I am studying the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}
column3: Savior di sini, Tuhan menolong kami.{nl}Aku seorang historian, Rexipher. Aku belajar di royal tomb.{nl}

column2: We already have most of the answers.{nl}But for the last answer, I need to borrow your power as the Revelator.
column3: Kita telah banyak menerima jawaban.{nl}Untuk tahu jawaban terakhir, aku membutuhkan bantuanmu.

column2: There are things that only Revelator could see.{nl}The questions from the owner of the tomb...
column3: Ada beberapa hal yang hanya bisa disaksikan oleh Savior.{nl}Pertanyaan dari Sang Pemilik The tomb..

column2: It is so good to meet a person like you, I guess this is divine grace.
column3: Senang sekali bertemu orang sepertimu, Ini adalah anugerah Tuhan.

column2: Alright.{nl}The next epitaph is at Serno Highland. Let's go.
column3: Bagus.{nl}Epitaph berikutnya ada di Shirnas Plateau. Ayo.

column2: I wonder what they tried to protect by building the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}I'd like to see it with my own eyes.
column3: Aku membayangkan apa yang mereka lakukan untuk melindungi The tomb.{nl}Aku ingin melihatnya sendiri.

column2: Are you okay?{nl}The next epitaph is at Dykyne Fork.
column3: Kamu baik-baik saja?{nl}Epitaph berikutnya berada di Dykyne intersections.

column2: The god is quiet. {nl}I think the tomb will be the same.
column3: Tuhan itu tenang. {nl}Sepertinya The tomb akan tetap sama.

column2: It was dangerous.{nl}But conversely, we couldn't stop because it was dangerous.
column3: Berbahaya.{nl}Tapi kita tidak boleh berhenti.

column2: The next tomb is at the left side of Dykyne Fork.{nl}Is it the fourth tomb? I'm looking forward to it.
column3: Tomb berikutnya berada di sisi kiri Dykyne Fork.{nl}Apakah itu tomb keempat? Aku tak sabar untuk melihatnya.

column2: What do I want to obtain from the Royal Mausoleum?{nl}That is a secret.
column3: Apa yang aku inginkan dari The royal tomb?{nl}Itu rahasia.

column2: The ordeal of the Great King Zachariel is not easy.{nl}With the skill you have, he should have recognized you.
column3: Perjalanan Zachariel itu tidak mudah.{nl}Dengan kemampuan yang kamu miliki, dia akan mudah mengenalimu.

column2: The last epitaph is at Apatinis Cliff.{nl}I hope the Great King Zachariel will understand our sincerity.
column3: Epitaph terakhir berada di Apati cliff.{nl}Semoga Zachariel mengerti kita.

column2: Soon we should have all clues.{nl}I am looking forward to it.
column3: Kita harus segera mengetahui petunjukknya.{nl}Aku mencari-carinya.

column2: We finally have all five clues.{nl}Now let us begin the interpretation of these clues.
column3: Akhirnya kita memiliki kelima petunjuk.{nl}Sekarang ayo kita mulai penafsiran dari petunjuk ini.

column2: Is that so...{nl}The clues are covered with something so I can barely see them.{nl}
column3: Jika begitu..{nl}Petunjuknya ditutupi oleh sesuatu sehingga sulit untuk ditemukan.{nl}

column2: How about this, can you bring me the teeth of Hogma?{nl}I understand that this will take some time.
column3: Bagaimana jika kamu membawakan Hogma Tooth?{nl}Tidak masalah jika butuh waktu lama.

column2: I will wait here patiently.{nl}No need to hurry since we have the clues.
column3: Aku akan sabar menunggu di sini.{nl}Tak perlu terburu-buru asalkan kita sudah dapat petunjuknya.

column2: Oh, I didn't know I could count on you.{nl}I will see you at Isvalyta Historic Site.
column3: Aku merasa tersanjung.{nl}Sampai ketemu di Isvalyta Ruins.

column2: Explained about the writings on the epitaph.
column3: Jelaskan tulisan dari Epitaph itu.

column2: Historian Odell
column3: Historian Odell

column2: There was an order to withdraw from here.{nl}I still have many things to research on.
column3: Ada himbauan yang bisa ditarik di sini.{nl}Aku masih ada banyak hal yang harus diteliti.

column2: Are you looking for someone?{nl}Can you tell me the name of the person you are looking for?
column3: Kamu mencari seseorang?{nl}Siapa namanya?

column2: Are you sure the name is Rexipher?{nl}There's no one with that name on our list.{nl}You could try asking the other people to see if they know this Rexipher.
column3: Kamu yakin namanya Rexipher?{nl}Tidak ada satupun di sini dengan nama itu.{nl}Coba tanyakan sama yang lain.

column2: I searched the list and asked other people about it, however...{nl} there's no one with the name Rexipher.{nl}I am sorry that I couldn't be of help.
column3: Aku telah memeriksa daftarnya dan menanyakan pada orang-orang..{nl}Tidak ada satupun dengan nama Rexipher.{nl}Maaf tidak bisa menolongmu.

column2: Rexipher? I am not sure.{nl}Are you sure that's the correct name?
column3: Rexipher? Aku tidak yakin.{nl}Apakah namanya benar-benar itu?

column2: He must have a lot of courage if he runs around with the name Rexipher.
column3: Berputar-putar untuk sebuah nama, Rexipher, dia pasti sangat pemberani.

column2: Hold on for a minute. I've seen this before from a book.{nl}Wasn't Rexipher a Demon Lord who is part of the army of Vaiga, the Demon King?
column3: Tunggu. Aku membacanya pada sebuah buku.{nl}Rexipher adalah demon lord yang memuja Demon King, Baiga.

column2: Using the name of a demon, that doesn't look like they have good intentions.
column3: Dengan menggunakan nama Demon, terlihat seperti bukan sesuatu yang baik.

column2: Rexipher?{nl} The one with silver hair, wearing a robe?
column3: Rexipher?{nl}Rambut perak dengan jubah di tubuhnya?

column2: He is a crazy person who can control monsters.{nl}He's the reason I'm wounded like this, and he also destroyed the altar which I used for research.{nl}
column3: Dia yang mengontrol semua monster di sini.{nl}Dia membuatku seperti ini, dan juga merusak altar tempat aku melakukan penelitian.{nl}

column2: First, go to the Chesed Altar. {nl}He is also going for the Gedulah Altar.
column3: Pergilah ke Cheses altar terlebih dahulu. {nl}Arah yang sama menuju Gedula altar.

column2: Good. As it should be. {nl}First, destroy the Royal Mausoleum Defense Device at Sesija Entrance.
column3: Bagus. Seperti seharusnya.{nl}Pertama-tama, hancurkan Royal Mausoleum Defense Device di Sesija Entrance.

column2: I caused you trouble.. I'm really sorry. {nl}
column3: Aku tutup jalanmu ... Maaf!{nl}

column2: We shouldn't be hanging around like this.{nl}We need to go after Rexipher.
column3: Kita tidak bisa begini terus.{nl}Kita harus segera mengejar Rexipher.

column2: The seals that haven't been destroyed yet at the King's Plateau will block Rexipher.{nl}That means you will have enough time to chase after Rexipher.
column3: Seals yang belum dihancurkan di king's plateau akan menahan Rexipher.{nl}Kita masih punya waktu untuk mengejar Rexipher.

column2: Please head to the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}We must find out what Rexipher has in his mind.
column3: Pergilah ke royal tomb.{nl}Kita harus cari tahu apa yang akan dilakukan Rexipher.

column2: As Laulas' injury are severe, I'm here in his stead.{nl}The seal is released, what exactly happened here?
column3: Aku kemari saat Laulas terluka parah.{nl}Bagaiaman bisa dia melepas seal itu?

column2: Dense Mist Plateau. I never even thought of it.{nl}What are they trying to do by releasing the seal?{nl}
column3: Dense Mist Plateau. Tidak pernah terpikir olehku.{nl}Apa yang mereka coba lakukan dengan melepaskan segel itu?{nl}

column2: Rexipher will go after the remaining altar.{nl}Go to the Tzedej Altar nearby. It is on the way to Keturka Access Road.
column3: Rexipher terus menuju ke altar-altar berikutnya.{nl}Pergilah ke Chedeque's altar terdekat. Arah menuju ke Keturka Entrance.

column2: Ruklys committed treason, so his monument saw prejudice and neglect.{nl}It was broken into five pieces, which all disappeared.{nl}
column3: Dulu Ruklys berkhianat, patunyapun dirusak.{nl}Dihancurkan menjadi 5 bagian, dan akhirnya hilang.{nl}

column2: For now, one thing you could do it to try and find a Stumpy Tree in Balkonas Wilderness.{nl}With a wooden piece from that monster, we can make a divining rod.
column3: Aku berusaha menemukan salah satunya dengan menggunakan pohon kecil di Balkonas wilderness.{nl}Menggunakan potongan kayu dari monster kita akan membuat suatu tongkat sebagai alat untuk menemukannya.

column2: I believe there is a piece of the monument below Seklus Bridge.{nl}But Achat is around there so I can't reach it.
column3: Ada satu bagian di sebelah bawah Secrus Bridge yang dianggap sebagai potongan tersebut.{nl}Tapi Achat berada disekitarnya, jadi aku belum bisa mendekat.

column2: The Tree Ambulo that live at Gaisra Hall Site like to collect pieces of stone.{nl}Perhaps the pieces from the monument could be there.
column3: Tree Ambulo yang tinggal di Gaisra Hall hobi mengkoleksi pecahan batu.{nl}Mungkin beberapa potongan ada di sana.

column2: Hmm.. Let's see.
column3: Hmm.. Mari kita lihat.

column2: {nl}Ah, here it is. I found it.{nl}Now I can string the pieces together.
column3: {nl}Ah, Aku menemukannya.{nl}Sekarang aku dapat mengikat semuanya.

column2: We are the Believers of Goddess Saule.{nl}We are here to prevent Thorny Bushes from growing in this forest.{nl}
column3: Kami adalah pengikut Saule Goddess.{nl}Kita di sini untuk mencegah Thorny Bushes tumbuh di hutan ini.{nl}

column2: If it weren't for us, this entire forest would be covered with thorny vines.
column3: Jika bukan karena kami, seluruh hutan ini akan ditumbuhi thorny bushes.

column2: A human controlling monsters... That's the first time I've seen such a thing.{nl}Also, I don't understand why he even broke the altar.
column3: Manusia yang menguasai monsters.. Itu yang pertama kali aku lihat.{nl}Dan kenapa dia menghancurkan altars..

column2: The only thing that is known is that it's a seal that's associated to the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}I don't know what Rexipher is trying to do by breaking it.
column3: Satu-satunya hal yang diketahui adalah bahwa segel itu berkaitan dengan Royal Mausoleum.{nl} Aku tidak tahu apa yang Rexipher coba lakukan dengan merusakknya.

column2: Please get rid of those Tamas. They've been disturbing me.{nl}Before I even know it, they cluster around and stare at me.
column3: Tolong urus Tama-tama itu. Aku merasa terganggu.{nl}Ketika aku tersadar, Tama-tama itu mengelilingiku dan menatapku.

column2: The artifacts that Raymond is looking for are not there.{nl}I think probably Tama has swallowed it.{nl}What do you think?
column3: Artifacts yang dicari Raymond tidak ada di sana.{nl}Mungkin Tama menelannya.{nl}Menurut kamu?

column2: I argue that a Tama swallowed it. Or do you want to bet?
column3: Aku pastikan Tama menelannya. Mau bertaruh?

column2: It really exists!{nl}Is it worth a lot? I wonder how much.
column3: Benar-benar ada.{nl}Apa ini mahal? Aku tak tahu seberapa mahal ini.

column2: Can you see the good source of money? I mean the fluids from the Stumpy Trees.{nl}How about we make money together?
column3: Kamu bisa melihat sumber uang yang bagus? Maksudku fluids dari pohon-pohon kecil.{nl}Bagaimana jika kita bekerjasama?.

column2: I don't care what's it's used for.{nl}If I can sell it, then I'll be happy.
column3: Aku tak peduli apa gunanya ini.{nl}Tapi aku senang ini sangat bernilai.

column2: You brought a lot.{nl}Thank you so much!
column3: Kamu membawanya banyak sekali.{nl}Terima kasih!

column2: I saw some fragments buried in the ground as I ran away from the Tamas towards the {nl}Crossroads Vacant Lot. I am trying to negotiate a deal with Raymond on those fragments,{nl}could you bring them to me?
column3: Aku melihat potongan-potongan itu terkubur di dalam tanah ketika aku lari dari Tamas di persimpangan itu. {nl}Aku coba negosiasi dengan Raymond untuk menggunakan itu, jadi maukan kamu membawakannya untukku?

column2: It's okay if you quit.{nl}I can't do anything at the moment due to those monsters.
column3: Tak apa kalau kamu berhenti.{nl}Pada saat itu aku tidak bisa berbuat apa-apa terhadap monster-monster itu.

column2: This is great.{nl}I wonder if I can bring these back?
column3: Ini cukup.{nl}Mereka akan melakukan apapun jika kamu membawakannya.

column2: Thanks.{nl}They even appeared in my dreams.
column3: Terima kasih.{nl}Ini hanya dalam mimpi.

column2: I will pray for the goddess to bless you.{nl}You should stop him no matter what.
column3: Aku akan berdoa untukmu.{nl}Kamu harus menahan mereka.

column2: I came here after hearing that her epitaph is here, but it will be difficult to find it all alone.{nl}I hope you can be an ally. Are you interested?
column3: Aku datang kemari setelah mendengar epitaphnya di sini, tapi akan sulit menemukannya sendiri.{nl}Kuharap kamu mau menemani. Apakah kamu tertarik?

column2: He is the traitor of the Kadumel Era and the owner of Earth Tower.{nl}He was branded as the best swordsman, even when he was young, and many people followed him.
column3: Dia pengkhiatan pada masa Kadumel, dia pemilik Tower of the Earth.{nl}Dia dianggap sebagai swordsman terbaik meskipun di usianya yang masih muda, dia memiliki banyak pengikut.

column2: He lusted for more power, so he started a coup d'etat.{nl}If the great Premier Eminent wasn't around, then history could have turned out much differently.
column3: Dia terlalu serakah dan ingin merampas kekuasaan.{nl}Jika great merchant, Premier Eminent tidak di sana, sejarah akan sangat berubah.

column2: Ruklys and I were taught by the same teacher.{nl}That's why I know what he was trying to achieve.
column3: Ruklys belajar pada orang yang sama dengan pengajarku.{nl}Jadi aku tahu betul apa yang diinginkan dan jadi motivasinya.

column2: We have no choice. We should get charcoal ourself.{nl}Those trees with long branches at the square at the brook will do us good.
column3: Tidak ada pilihan. Kita haru segera memperoleh sendiri charcoal itu.{nl}Pepohonan dengan dahan yang besar bisa didapatkan di bantaran sungai.

column2: This is almost like she's praising him. I need to get rid of it.{nl}Carrying something that praises the traitor may get me sent to prison.
column3: Ini sebuah sanjungan. Aku harus bersungguh-sungguh.{nl}Mengemban sesuatu tentang ini bisa membawaku ke penjara.

column2: The fourth epitaph is at the Shiluma Altar Site and the last epitaph is beyond Griuve Highway. {nl}Let's say farewell here, since I should also check them myself from here.
column3: Epitaph ke-empat berada di Shiluma Altar dan Epitaph terakhir berada di luar Griuve. {nl}Mari kita pergi dari tempat ini dan memeriksanya di tempat lain.

column2: (You cannot read the rest because the gravestone is damaged.){nl}
column3: [Epitaph yang rusak tidak bisa dideteksi keberadaannya.]{nl}

column2: As I walked this land as a bystander, I read the epitaphs of my predecessors.{nl}Long ago, Ruklys tried to accomplish a revolution,{nl}Lydia Schaffen also formed her forces, and they still remain to this day.
column3: Aku datang kemari sebagai bystander, Aku melihat pitaphs dari para pendahulu.{nl}Konon, Ruklys mencoba melakukan revolusi,{nl}Lydian Schaffen juga ikut membentuk pasukannya, dan mereka masih diingat sampai sekarang.

column2: If you are talking about that epitaph, it was broken a long time ago when monsters attacked it.
column3: Jika kamu bicara tentang epitaph, dari dulu sudah rusak saat para monster mengambilnya.

column2: But, I have a rubbing of it.{nl}If you could find my bag for me, then I may tell you about it.
column3: Tapi aku punya salinannya.{nl}Aku akan ceritakan kepadamu jika kamu berhasil menemukan tasku.

column2: Thanks. As promised, I will tell you what it said.{nl}
column3: Terima kasih, seperti janjiku akan kuceritakan kepadamu tentang ini{nl}

column2: But I was ignorant then.{nl}I too might have believed in furthering only my own, personal goals.
column3: Tapi aku bersikukuh.{nl}Aku juga harus tetap fokus untuk menyelesaikan misi ini.

column2: When you use this collection device on those Stumpy Trees, their sap will be collected inside.{nl}Bring me their sap.
column3: Ketika kamu menggunakan collecting device ini pada pohon-pohon kecil,  fluids akan masuk ke dalamnya.{nl}Ambilkan untukku.

column2: I'll be counting on you. The first and the second epitaphs are located near Virdului Mountain {nl}Cabin. I will give you the necessary tools, so please bring their rubbings.
column3: Aku yakin. Epitaph pertama dan kedua berada di dekat Virdului Cabin. {nl}Aku akan memberimu alat khusus dan bawakan salinannya.

column2: May my tower soar towards Goddess Gabija and pass the answers to her.{nl}For that, I will not be like my predecessors and let my personal feelings get in the way.
column3: Menaraku yang langsung berhadapan dengan Goddess  Gabija bisa jadi memiliki jawaban tentang ini.{nl}Tapi aku tidak akan merusaknya, seperti yang telah dilakukan para pendahuluku.

column2: When you throw this bomb to the long branch trees, they will burn.{nl}When you feel they are burnt enough, destroy those tress to get wood coals.{nl}
column3: Lempar bom ini ke dahan pohon yang besar, maka dia akan terbakar.{nl}Ketika mereka telah terbakar, hancurkan dan dapatkan wood coalnya.{nl}

column2: The third epitaph is at Kriakul Brook.{nl}Let's continue the rubbings with that epitaph.{nl}
column3: Epitaph ketiga berada di Kriakul Brook.{nl}Ayo dapatkan kembali epitaph itu.{nl}

column2: I got my bag back with your help so I will help you again.{nl}
column3: Dengan bantuanmu barang-barangku telah kembali dan aku akan menolongmu juga.{nl}

column2: Go to Pelena Site. {nl}On the way there, there is the next epitaph you are looking for.
column3: Pergilah ke Pelena. {nl}Di tengah perjalanan ke sana, kamu akan menemukan Epitaph yang sedang kamu cari.

column2: Let's see, it may take little time to put them together.{nl}Can you take care of the monsters nearby while I focus on this?
column3: Lihatlah, ini membutuhkan waktu lama untuk menggabungkannya.{nl}Tolong urus monster-monster itu, aku sedang fokus?

column2: Well done.{nl}It took a while because there was this small piece..
column3: Bagus.{nl}Memakan waktu yang lama karena satu potongan ini.

column2: It must be terrible to be remembered as a traitor.{nl}Even though he was a respected swordsman, the monument mourning him was shoddily built.
column3: Pengkhianat adalah suatu kejahatan.{nl}Dia dulu seorang swordsman yang disegani, tapi bahkan monumennya tidak dalam kondisi baik setelah kematiannya.

column2: They even casted magic on the monument after it was broken into pieces.{nl}It's hard to find those pieces because of the monsters that were affected by that magic.
column3: Bahkan dia disihir ke dalam monumen itu sampai akhirnya hancur berkeping-keping.{nl}Sulit menemukan serpihan-serpihan itu karena karena para monster terkena efek magis nya.

column2: Ah, That's the thing I ordered.{nl}It finally came.
column3: Ah, Ini barang yang aku minta.{nl}Akhirnya datang juga.

column2: Don't you want to know what to do with it?{nl}I will call the powerful spirit from Dumbliu Pond.
column3: Kamu mau tahu apa yang harus dilakukan?{nl}Aku akan memanggil powerful spirit dari Dumbil pond.

column2: Thanks.{nl}It will take some time to dry the waterweed.{nl}
column3: Terima kasih.{nl}Butuh waktu untuk mengeringkannya.{nl}

column2: It should be quite the experience. Look forward to it.
column3: Akan menjadi pengalaman yang menyenangkan.

column2: I need a live creature to sacrifice to complete this spell.{nl}The Lizardmen on the way to Dumbliu Pond will work.
column3: Aku butuh satu makhluk yang hidup untuk menyempurnakan spell ini.{nl}Lizard Man di jalan menuju Dumbal Pond juga bagus.

column2: The spirits are mischievous and primitive.{nl}The Lizardmen will work wonders for the experiment since they are very fast.
column3: Spirit-spirit jahil dan primitif.{nl}Lizard Man cukup bagus untuk percobaan.

column2: The Lizardmen that you sent to me were really lively.{nl}We are almost done.
column3: Lizard Man yang kamu kirim ini benar-benar hidup.{nl}Kita hampir selesai.

column2: Infroburks play an important role in this spell too.{nl}I will give you a stone that controls their minds, please bring me some Infroburk.
column3: Incroberk punya peranan penting dalam spell ini.{nl}Aku akan berikan batu ini untuk mengontrol mereka, bawakan beberapa Incroberk.

column2: The Infroburk you brought me are not enough.{nl}Please try harder.
column3: Incroberk yang kamu bawa masih kurang.{nl}Coba lagi.

column2: Well done.{nl}This will be enough.
column3: Bagus.{nl}Ini cukup.

column2: Thank you for making your way here. {nl} I am Knight Commander Uska and I am in charge of Siauliai and Klaipeda. {nl}
column3: Terima kasih telah datang kemari. {nl} Aku Knight Commander Uska dan aku yang bertanggung jawab atas Saule dan Klaipeda. {nl}

column2: The Bishop told me to send the Revelator to the Crystal Mine as soon as they arrive. {nl} The goddess told him in his dreams that the evidence of salvation would be found there. {nl}
column3: Sang Bishop memberitahuku untuk segera mengirim Savior ke Crystal Mine secepatnya. {nl} Goddess memberitahunya dalam mimpi bahwa tKamu dari keselamatan dapat ditemukan disana. {nl}

column2: The monsters there are unspeakably dangerous so please be careful.
column3: Monster disana sangat berbahaya sebaiknya kamu berhati-hati.

column2: All right. {nl} Oh, do not forget to offer worship to the Goddess Statue before you leave. {nl}
column3: Baiklah. {nl} Oh, jangan lupa berdoa pada Statue of Goddess sebelum kamu pergi. {nl}

column2: Also, drop by the Item Merchant for the warp scrolls I left with him.
column3: Dan, pergilah ke Item Merchant untuk warp scrolls yang telah aku titipkan.

column2: Seems like you're really curious.{nl}Okay. Bring me some waterweed that grows at Kriakul Brook.
column3: Kamu kepo sekali ya.{nl}Oke. Bawakan aku rumput yang hanya tumbuh di Kriakul Stream.

column2: Please use this stone on the Lizardmen.{nl}Once you gain control of one, it will run to me.
column3: Gunakan batu ini pada Lizard Man.{nl}Setelah dapat mengontrolnya, dia akan datang kepadaku.

column2: The Kadumel Era was a period of turbulence.
column3: Masanya Kadumel merupakan masa yang penuh gejolak.

column2: Kadumel the Tyrant, Premier Eminent the Chancellor, and Maven's disciples...{nl}They all lived extraordinary lives.{nl}
column3: Tyrant Kadumel, Premier Eminent yang dikenal sebagai great merchant dan murid dari Maven..{nl}Hidup mereka sungguh luar biasa.{nl}

column2: There are many artifacts here that praise the heroes of that time.{nl}And there are countless side stories about them as well.
column3: Ada banyak artifacts di sini yang menunjukkan kebesaran para pahlawan sepanjang masa.{nl}Dan berbagai cerita di setiap kehidupannya.

column2: When you use the stone on Infroburks and defeat them, they will automatically come to me.{nl}I will look forward to getting them.
column3: Saat kamu gunakan batu ini pada Incroberks, mereka akan otomatis datang padaku.{nl}Oke, aku mengandalkanmu.

column2: She is the most impressive archer in history.{nl}She defeated Ruklys, who was a traitor and a great swordsman, with a single arrow.{nl}
column3: Dia seorang Archer paling hebat sepanjang sejarah.{nl}Dia mengalahkan Ruklys dengan sebuah anak panah.{nl}

column2: That's why there are archers who are willing to put large sums of silver into purchasing items {nl}that are related to her. She is like a goddess to us archers.
column3: Itulah kenapa para Archer selalu mencari apapun yang berhubungan dengannya walaupun harganya sangat mahal.{nl}Dia itu seperti Dewanya para Archer.

column2: There was a priest named Maven in the past.{nl}He is the person who built the Great Cathedral.{nl}
column3: Dahulu kala ada seorang priest bernama Maven.{nl}Dia yang membangun great cathedral.{nl}

column2: Maven lived for a long time and had three disciples.{nl}The first one was Ruklys and the second one was Lydia Schaffen.{nl}
column3: Sepanjang hidupnya Maven memiliki 3 orang murid.{nl}Salah satunya adalah Ruklys dan yang kedua adalah Lydia Schaffen.{nl}

column2: And when Lydia Schaffen grew old, Agailla Flurry became the last disciple.{nl}As the other two disciples were, Agailla Flurry was a great person.
column3: Dan ketika Lydia Schaffen semakin tua, Agailla Flurry menjadi murid yang terakhir.{nl}Seperti murid-murida lainnya, Agailla Flurry adalah orang yang hebat juga.

column2: She learned all the magic that existed then.{nl}She also built the Mage Tower. What an amazing woman she must've been.
column3: Dia belajar berbagai macam magic pada saat itu.{nl}Dia juga membangun Magicians' Tower. Dia sungguh luar biasa.

column2: Our old man always complains.{nl}Even when I give him the best things, he complains.{nl}
column3: Orang tua kami selalu mengeluh.{nl}Meskipun kami selalu memberinya yang terbaik, dia selalu saja komplen.{nl}

column2: He always complains, so I don't want to help him.{nl}Sorry, but can you tell that old man there how I feel?
column3: Aku tidak mau menolongnya lagi.{nl}Maaf, tapi bisakah kamu sampaikan perasaan kami pada orang tua itu?

column2: When he first came here, he had a hard time adapting to the new environment.{nl}I used to cook him food and make him clothes...
column3: Saat pertama kali dia datang kemari, dia melewati masa-masa yang sulit untuk beradaptasi.{nl}Aku selalu menyiapkan makanan dan pakaian untuknya..

column2: Why didn't Cahill come here, and why are you saying that?{nl}Well, it doesn't matter. Are you finished?
column3: Bagaimana bisa Cahill tidak mau datang kemari, dan apa yang kamu katakan tadi?{nl}Tapi tak apalah, apa kamu sudah selesai?

column2: Hey. Since you came, please do some errands for me.{nl}You see that pile of lumber over there? Bring me the good ones among them.
column3: Karena kamu telah datang, lakukan beberapa tugas ini.{nl}Kamu lihat lumbers di sebelah sana? Bawakan satu yang bagus kepadaku.

column2: Cahill is helpful. {nl}Except for his complaints..
column3: Cahill sangat penolong. {nl}Kecuali komplen-komplennya..

column2: What?! Can't you find more decent ones?{nl}Well... that's still okay...
column3: Tidak bisakah mendapatkan yang lebih baik?{nl}Baiklah .. Tidak apa-apa.

column2: Please give these crutches I made to Cahill.{nl}Well, where oh where did Cahill hurt his ankle...
column3: BerikanCrutches yang kubuat sendiri ini pada Cahill.{nl}Dimana Cahill merasa sakit pada anklenya..

column2: Get outta here before I change my mind.
column3: Pergi dari sini! Sebelum aku berubah pikiran.

column2: Crutches from Old Man Moses...{nl}I really don't know what he is thinking.
column3: Crutches dari Moze..{nl}Aku tidak tahu apa yang dia pikirkan.

column2: I didn't say it's over.{nl}Please get me the leather of Flying Frogs near this camp.{nl}
column3: Aku tidak bilang ini telah berakhir.{nl}Bawakan aku leather of Wing Frogs disekitar camp ini.{nl}

column2: Why would an old man like me be trying to figure out what this does?
column3: Aku tidak mau tahu gunanya ini.

column2: Darn, it's worse than the lumber that you brought me just a while ago{nl}Wait, I haven't told you to leave yet.
column3: Sial, Ini lebih jelak dari lumber dari yang kamu bawa waktu itu{nl}Tunggu, aku belum menyuruhmu pergi.

column2: Believer Domas
column3: Follower Domas

column2: I am going to burn the thorny vines that are blocking the road.{nl}Can you help me?
column3: Aku akan membakar thorny bushes yang menghalangi jalan.{nl}Maukah kamu menolongku?

column2: Please get me some Thornball Remains first. {nl}There are many of them at Geisma Access Road.
column3: Tolong bawakan dulu aku ashes of Dunball. {nl}Banyak ditemui di Rustebi Woods.

column2: There's a demon that I want you to defeat.{nl}The monster is called Likaous and it is at Thorny Pillar Garden. It brings vicious atmosphere with him.
column3: Ada sesosok demon yang harus kamu kalahkan.{nl}Monster ini bernama Likaous di Thorny Pole Garden. Ada energi jahat bersamanya.

column2: Now is the time to defeat it.{nl}We spent a long time finding it.
column3: Saatnya mengalahkannya.{nl}Kita sudah menghabiskan banyak waktu mencarinya.

column2: Fire will never catch on the thorny vines here.{nl}And I don't want to touch them due to their evil energy.
column3: Api tidak akan bisa menyentuh thorny bushes di sini.{nl}Mereka masih dipengaruhi energi jahat.

column2: Good job.{nl}I was worried that you would get hurt, but I guess I underestimated you.
column3: Kamu telah  membawanya.{nl}Aku khawatir kamu akan terluka, tapi sepertinya aku tidak perlu khawatir lagi.

column2: Four years ago, this forest was normal.{nl}But it has became like this ever since Bramble went deep into the forest.
column3: 4 tahun lalu, hutan ini adalah hutan yang biasa.{nl}Tapi setelah Bramble masuk ke sini, semuanya berubah seperti ini.

column2: Who'd have thought that they would be using the power of our own altar?{nl}I don't know how I can face the goddess now.
column3: Siapa yang tahu dia memanfaatkan kekuatan dari altar kami?{nl}Aku tidak dapat melihat Goddess .

column2: Believer Bronius
column3: Follower Bronews

column2: I only survived because of you.{nl}I should warn the other Believers to be careful.
column3: Berkat kamu aku bisa bertahan hidup.{nl}Aku akan meminta semua Priest agar berhati-hati.

column2: Believer Jurga
column3: Priest Yurga

column2: I can feel Bramble is suffering.{nl}He is getting retribution for extracting all vigor from this land.
column3: Aku bisa merasakan Bramble sedang menderita.{nl}Dia dibayar untuk menyerap semua kekuatan di tempat ini.

column2: You're the Savior the goddess sent. What an honor. {nl}Are you ready to fight Bramble?
column3: Kamu adalah utusan Savior the Goddess. Sebuah penghormatan. {nl} Kamu sudah siap bertarung melawan Bramble?

column2: You'll need to be prepared if you want to defeat Bramble. {nl}First, take this.
column3: Kamu perlu persiapan dulu sebelum melawan Bramble. {nl} Pertama-tama, ambilah ini.

column2: It will be hard for Bramble to recover now.{nl}We can save the dying trees as well.
column3: Saat ini Bramble sedang kesulitan untuk memulihkan diri.{nl}Kita bisa menyelamatkan dying trees sebaik-baiknya.

column2: Try to hold it in even if it's dirty. {nl}This is the best I can do.
column3: Cobalah terus memegangnya meskipun ini kotor. {nl} Ini yang bisa aku lakukan.

column2: You found the revelation. {nl}Are you hurt? {nl}
column3: Kamu telah mendapatkan petunjuk. {nl} Sakitkah? {nl}

column2: Bramble. {nl}The poor thing was trying to go against its foreseen fate.
column3: Bramble. {nl} Makhluk malang yang harus melawan takdir.

column2: Old Man of Andale Village
column3: The oldman of andail Village

column2: So you're the one who wants to meet Goddess Saule. {nl} If you're here about the pond, don't worry. Our priest is working on it. {nl}
column3: Jadi kamu salah satunya yang ingin menemui Goddess Saule. {nl} Tidak perlu khawatir dengan kolam itu. Priest-priest kami telah menyiapkannya. {nl}

column2: The priest is at Cerpe Crossroads. {nl}I heard he needed Black Maize Venom, so try getting that to him as a gift.
column3: Para Priest berada di Cerpe crossroads. {nl}Kudengar dia membutuhkan venom of black maize, tolong carikan buat dia.

column2: We would have never been able to see the portal even in our dreams if it wasn't for you. {nl}You truly are God's grace.
column3: Kami tidak pernah bermimpi tentan portal ini jika bukan untukmu. {nl} Kamu benar-benar anugerah Tuhan.

column2: Andale Village Priest
column3: andail's village Priest

column2: Aren't these Black Maize Venom? {nl}Oh, thank you very much! {nl}
column3: Inikah venom of the black maize? {nl} Terima kasih banyak. {nl}

column2: You can count on me on helping you meet Goddess Saule. {nl}Now that the Holy Pond has been purified, we just need to solve the problem with the Obelisk.
column3: Kamu bisa bertemu Goddess Saule bersamaku. {nl} Sekarang diving pond sedang  dimurnikan, kita hanya perlu menolong Obelisk.

column2: Magic letters are carved on the Obelisk. {nl}But some letters were erased since the Holy Pond became corrupted. {nl}
column3: Magic letters terukir pada Obelisk. {nl} Tapi beberapa kalimat terhapus divine pond yang telah terkontaminasi. {nl}

column2: If the letters are gone, then we will need to write them back on. {nl}Now that you've collected the Black Maize Venom, we will need White Oak Sap.
column3: Jika huruf nya hilang, kita hanya perlu menulisnya kembali. {nl} Saat ini kamu telah mengumpulkan venom of Black Maize, kita hanya membutuhkan Sap Of A White Oak,

column2: I think we'll be able to meet Goddess Saule. We just need to restore the Obelisk.
column3: Kita hanya perlu mengembalikan Obelisk pada Goddess Saule.

column2: Bring that venom to the Village Priest at Cerpe Crossroads.
column3: Bawalah poison itu ke Village priest di Cerpe crossroads.

column2: I see you've completed making the dye. {nl}Now go and draw in new letters according to the faint patterns left on the Obelisk. {nl}
column3: Campurannya telah selesai. {nl} Telusuri pola-pola yang hilang di bagian kiri Obelisk dan buat  yang baru. {nl}

column2: The Obelisk is located at Slepingas Stream.
column3: Obelisknya ada di dalam Slepingas stream.

column2: I'm sure the goddesses will be very pleased with you.
column3: Aku yakin Tuhan pasti tidak akan kecewa padamu.

column2: You're almost done. {nl}After completing the rituals to cleanse your body, you will be able to meet the goddess. {nl}
column3: Hampir selesai. {nl} Setelah menyelesaikan ritual untuk membersihkan tubuhmu, kamu akan segera bertemu dengan Goddess. {nl}

column2: Let us head on the road to the right to Indigo Trees Plateau.{nl}The village priest is awaiting your arrival.
column3: Mari kita menuju ke jalan sebelah kanan dari Indigo Trees Plateau.{nl}Priest village sudah menunggu kedatanganmu.

column2: Use this tranquilizer on the Black Maize and extract its venom. {nl}The Maizes need to be weakened for the tranquilizer to work.
column3: Gunakan obat bius ini pada black maize dan ekstrak racunnya. {nl}Maize akan lemah pada saat obat bius ini bekerja.

column2: Thank you! {nl}By the way, what was that vibration?
column3: Terima kasih banyak! {nl}Getaran apa itu?

column2: Andale Village Priest
column3: The disciple of andail Village

column2: You're the Revelator, right? {nl}Upents are preying on the village so we can't hold the ritual right now. {nl}
column3: Kamu Savior itu kan? {nl} Wupen sedang menyerang village jadi aku tidak bisa menghentikan ritual ini sekarang juga. {nl}

column2: I'm thinking about making bombs from Languid Herbs. {nl}Please bring me Languid Herbs from Narvas Curved Path.
column3: Aku sedang berpikir untuk membuat lazy flower bombs. {nl} Tolong bawakan aku lazy flowers dari Narvas tracks.

column2: It is safe where the Languid Herb blooms so do not worry.
column3: Tidak usah takut, saat Lazy flower mekar semua aman.

column2: Glad you're back safely. {nl}Did any monsters attack?
column3: Senang sekali kamu kembali dengan selamat. {nl} Para monster tidak menyerang kan?

column2: Please get the Strongly Scented Soul Flowers in Dvyni Wetland too. {nl}Languid Herbs alone will not be effective enough. {nl}
column3: Bawakan juga flower of souls di Dvyni swamp. {nl} Lazy flowers saja tidak akan efektif. {nl}

column2: I hope we'll be successful this time.
column3: Semoga sukses kali ini.

column2: I'll do the ritual right away if we can get rid of the Upents.{nl}So hurry and get me the Strongly Scented Soul Flowers.
column3: Aku akan segera melakukan ritual jika kamu telah mengalahkan Upent.{nl}Jadi cepat bawakan flower of the soul.

column2: That'll do. {nl}I'll send the materials to the elderly, please go and get the explosives.
column3: Ini sudah cukup. {nl} Aku akan mengirim materials ini pada elderly, jadi pergilah dan dapatkan explosives itu.

column2: Andale Village Headman
column3: The headman of andail Village

column2: Explosives? Ah. {nl}Go to the warehouse lot at the upper side of the village.
column3: Explosives? Ahh. {nl} Pergilah ke gudang, akan banyak ditemukan di sebelah atas village.

column2: It's probably in one of the bigger barrels. {nl}Don't worry, they won't explode.
column3: Mungkin di dalam kontainer besar. {nl} Tenang saja tidak akan meledak.

column2: Don't worry, it's safe. They will not explode.
column3: Tidak usah takut, aman dan tidak akan meledak.

column2: It was in a small barrel? {nl}I must be getting old and mixed up. {nl}Normal people would have been incinerated, but for a Revelator, it's different.
column3: Apa kontainer kecil ini? {nl} Aku sudah tua dan aku sedikit bingung. {nl} Biasanya orang terbakar akan hilang tanpa meninggalkan jejak tapi beda dengan seorang savior.

column2: Combine the ingredients at the Thorn Tree Altar once you have gathered them all.
column3: Gabungkan bahan-bahan di Thorn Tree Altar setelah kamu berhasil mengumpulkan semuanya

column2: God or goddess, their title isn't really important. {nl}Eventually, aren't we all just one being? {nl}
column3: God atau Goddess, tidak masalah kamu memanggilnya apa. {nl} Pada dasarnya kita semua satu? {nl}

column2: Is this hard to comprehend? {nl}You will understand it one day.
column3: Sulit untuk dimengerti? {nl} Suatu hari nanti kamu akan mengerti.

column2: Here, this is a Languid Herb Bomb. {nl}Take it to Melaginags Cliff.
column3: Ini, Lazy flower bomb. {nl} Bawa ke cliff of Melagingas.

column2: Hurry now.{nl}We can finally end it this time.
column3: Sekarang, cepat! {nl} Akhirnya kita bisa menyelesaikannya sekarang.

column2: This time, it can finally come to an end.
column3: Akhirnya, semua berakhir hari ini.

column2: Hmm... So... The procedure is...{nl}Wash your body in the water, pray, and then...{nl}
column3: Hmm . Jadi prosedurnya gimana. {nl}Bersihkan badanmu dengan air dan berdoalah, lalu.. {nl}

column2: It's too complicated so I'll explain it later.
column3: Terlalu complicated, akan kujelaskan nanti.

column2: Now gather me some Sap from Coliflowers near Rajuma Curved Path.{nl}The parts covered in sap are highly flammable.
column3: Sekarang berikan kepadaku beberapa Sap dari Coliflower disekitar Rajuma Curved Path.{nl}Bagian yang dilapisi dengan sap sangat mudah terbakar.

column2: Is it alright to walk over the Goddess Statue?'{nl}I wouldn't mind it. Why do you ask?
column3: Kamu bisa pergi ke Statue of the Goddess? {nl}Tak masalah, kenapa memang?

column2: It will be hard without Coliflower Sap because of the rain.{nl}Who knows how long it will keep raining?
column3: Akan sulit tanpa Colli flowers' fluids karena hujan.{nl}Kapan hujan akan berhenti.

column2: Well done.{nl}This will be enough.
column3: Bagus.{nl}Ini sudah cukup.

column2: Using this, we can burn the thorny vines blocking the Rustybe Dead Tree Area.{nl}You should be able to ignite them even in the rain.
column3: Bakarlah thorny bushes yang menutup jalan Rustybe Dead Trees Region dengan ini.{nl}Meskipun hujan, kamu akan mudah membakarnya.

column2: Go up a bit more to get to the Rustybe Dead Tree Area.{nl}It was a real honor to meet you, Revelator.
column3: Bergeser sedikit dari Rustybe Dead Trees Region.{nl}Merupakan suatu kehormatan bisa bertemu denganmu, Savior.

column2: You're the Revelator right? {nl}A very ominous voice is looking for you, so please be careful.
column3: Kamu Savior itu kan? {nl}Hati-hatilah, suara yang tidak menyenangkan sedang mencarimu.

column2: Have you seen my ring?{nl}If you see my ring, please bring it to me.
column3: Sudah lihat cincinku?{nl}Tolong bawakan padaku jika itu benar cincin milikku.

column2: My ring is full of divine energy so it will be hard for monsters to swallow it.{nl}Unless the monster is big.
column3: Cincin itu penuh dengan divine energy, monster akan kesulitan memakannya.{nl}Walaupun itu monster besar.

column2: You found my ring! {nl}Thanks. Thank you so much!
column3: Kamu telah mendapatkan cincinnya! {nl}Makasih ya, makasih banyak!

column2: The priests are having hard time due to thorny vines.{nl}Can you help them?
column3: Para Priest sedang bekerja keras menghadapi thorny bushes.{nl}Gimana kalau kamu tolong mereka?

column2: I will write down the process for you.{nl}How about you start by recharging the mana of the magic crystal?
column3: Akan kucatatkan prosesnya untukmu.{nl}Gimana kalau dimulai dengan mengisi ulang mana of magic crystal?

column2: Okay, show me that you can overcome anything with your faith, such as facing those thorny vines.{nl}You can't call yourself a Believer if you are faint-hearted.
column3: Oke, tunjukkan padaku kamu bisa bertahan melawan those thorny bushes dengan keyakinanmu itu.{nl}Ketika kamu sedang lemah seperti sekarang, kamu tidak bisa disebut sebagai pengikut.

column2: The first place I felt the evil energy is Fallen Worry Forest.{nl}It is such a strong aura that it will probably continue to be like this even if Bramble is defeated.
column3: Tempat pertama aku merasakan keberadaan energi jahat di Fallen Worry Forest.{nl}Aura itu sangat kuat, hal ini mungkin akan terus seperti ini walaupun Bramble telah dikalahkan.

column2: I don't know if it's the thorny vines or the evil energy, but... {nl}this forest makes people very depressed.
column3: Aku tak tahu ini disebabkan oleh thorny bushes atau evil energy, tapi.. {nl}Hutan ini membuat orang-orang stress.

column2: I personally believe that one day this forest will be okay again.
column3: Aku percaya suatu saat hutan ini akan kembali seperti semula.

column2: Are you okay?{nl}I almost lost my consciousness due to that voice.{nl}Who is he anyways...
column3: Kamu baik-baik saja?{nl}Aku hampir hilang kesadaran karena suara itu.{nl}Siapa dia sebenarnya..

column2: The evil energy is growing in Fallen Worry Forest, and our believers are growing wary.{nl}I would be very grateful if you will be able to help.{nl}
column3: Energi jahat tumbuh di Fallen Worry Forest, dan pengikut kami mulai waspada.{nl}Saya akan sangat berterima kasih bila kamu bisa ikut membantu.{nl}

column2: The evil energy is becoming stronger and the Believers are getting tired. The situation is bad
column3: Kondisinya semakin berat dan para priest sudah mulai kelelahan, ini tidak baik.

column2: Thanks.{nl}I wonder what would have happened if you weren't here.
column3: Terima kasih.{nl}Aku membayangkan apa yang akan terjadi padamu.

column2: While the Merog Shamans are performing their rituals, you might have a chance to try something.{nl}Can you take care of them?
column3: Merogg sorcerers menguasai rituals itu, Aku akan mencobanya.{nl}Tolong urus sorcerers itu?

column2: Thank you for your help.{nl}Now the demons won't be able to act so freely.
column3: Terima kasih atas pertolongannya.{nl}Sekarang para demon tidak bisa bergerak bebas lagi.

column2: I did not know those demons could use summoning crystals.{nl}They may overwhelm us.
column3: Aku tidak mengiri monster itu akan menggunakan Summon crystal.{nl}Mereka mungkin berda di sekitar kita.

column2: I want to study the Demon Summoning Circle that has been emanating evil energy and {nl}summoning demons over there. It's a precious sample, so please go gentle so you don't {nl}break much of it.
column3: Aku butuh informasi mengenai magic field.{nl}Berhati-hatilah untuk tidak merusak sampel yang penting.

column2: We should be able to find a way to use it.{nl}Those demons used our altars, so we can use theirs too.
column3: Dengan cara ini kita akan menemukan jalan keluarnya.{nl}Para demon menggunakan altar kita, tentunya kita juga bisa menggunakannya.

column2: Believer Onute
column3: Believer Onute

column2: The shamans are trying to summon Archon.{nl}It should frighten them if you can defeat Archon and destroy their summoning circles.
column3: Mereka menunggu Akon disummon.{nl}Jika kamu menghancurkan semua magic fields bersama Akon, mereka akan ketakutan.

column2: Thanks.{nl}They will not be able to attack us easily now.{nl}
column3: Terima kasih.{nl}Sekarang tidak mudah mereka menyerang kita.{nl}

column2: Thanks.{nl}The Believers are distributed to their areas so find them and help them.
column3: Terima kasih.{nl}Para pengikut telah dikirimkan ke tempatnya masing-masing temukan dan tolonglah mereka.

column2: If you don't have anything to do here, then it would be best to leave this place as soon as possible.{nl}It's no good for a person who doesn't know how to purify to stay here for too long.
column3: Jika kamu tidak ada kerjaan di sini, sebaiknya segera pergi dari sini.{nl}Tidak baik bagi orang yang tidak mengerti tentang penghapusan dosa berada di sini terlalu lama.

column2: Maybe this entire forest has become the origin of the evil energy of the Fallen Worry Forest.{nl}I hope that I am just being overly anxious.
column3: Mungkin seluruh hutan ini telah berubah menjadi sumber energi jahat dari Fallen Worry Forest.{nl}Aku harap ini hanya kecemasanku saja.

column2: Goddess Saule would not want the evil energy spreading to other forests. {nl}Therefore, we're here.
column3: Aura jahat Saule Goddess  Quezon itu tidak akan menyebar ke tempat lain. {nl} Itulah kenapa kita masih berada di sini.

column2: It angers me to see those filthy demons freely roaming around.
column3: Aku sangat kesal melihat demon-demon biadab itu berkeliaran.

column2: I gave up a long time ago since I can't see an end to that evil energy.{nl}I just think of it as my destiny.
column3: Aku sudah pasrah dari dulu, sejak tidak bisa menyaksikan akhir dari evil energy itu.{nl}Aku pikir inilah tujuanku.

column2: Now we just need to find out the Merogs' plan.{nl}Until then, please defeat those shamans.
column3: Sekarang tinggal menunggu rencana para Meroggs.{nl}Setelah itu bersiaplah menghadapi para magician.

column2: Goddess Saule said to absolutely not speak of our presence. {nl}She said it would only bring further chaos to the world.
column3: Goddess Saule berkata untuk tidak membicarakan kehadiran kita. {nl} Dia berkata bahwa tidak masuk akan untuk mengacaukan dunia luar.

column2: This is all my fault. I shouldn't have underestimated it.
column3: Semua salahku, aku terlalu meremehkan hal ini.

column2: This will only end once the origin of the evil energy {nl}located in the depths of Fallen Worry Forest is removed.{nl}It is vexing to see that everyone seems to be so short-sighted.
column3: Ini hanya akan berakhir setelah sumber dari energi jahat{nl}yang terletak di kedalaman Fallen Worry Forest dimusnahkan.{nl}Sangat menjengkelkan melihat setiap orang tampaknya begitu meremehkannya.

column2: I am okay about the sample so just break it so that it won't activate.{nl}I am gonna take a look at it myself.
column3: Mengenai sampel nya tidak jadi masalah, jadi hancurkan saja supaya tidak dapat diaktifkan kembali.{nl}Aku akan melihatnya sendiri.

column2: I get angry every time I enter that Thorn Forest.{nl}How could such dirty things happen to the goddess' sacred forest?
column3: Setiap masuk Thorny Forest aku selalu merasa kesal.{nl}Bagaimana bisa hal itu terjadi di divine forest of the Goddess ?

column2: Help me. Merogs are after me.{nl}When they are grouped up like that, I can't face them.
column3: Tolong. Para Merogg di depan.{nl}Saat mereka bergerak aku tidak bisa berbuat apa-apa.

column2: Great. {nl}Now we're going to destroy the roots of Bramble.
column3: Bagus. {nl} Sekarang kita akan melumpuhkan roots of Bramble.

column2: Believer Samantha
column3: Believer Samanta

column2: Whenever I try to purify the Thornbush Rest Place, those monsters attack.{nl}Is there some way to avoid them?
column3: Setiap kali aku akan mensucikan Thorny Trees fountain, para monster menyerang.{nl}Apa ada cara lain menghindarinya?

column2: Monsters are becoming more violent as they enter deeper into the forest of thorns.{nl}Maybe that is because of the evil energy.
column3: Monsters semakin buas dan terus merangsek ke dalam thorn forest.{nl}Mungkin karena pengaruh vicious energy.

column2: Now I can relax and purify Thornbush Rest Place.{nl}Thank you so much.
column3: Aku dapat sedikit tenang dan bisa mensucikan the fountain.{nl}Terima kasih banyak.

column2: I think I can count on you.{nl}Please protect the altar until the fountain is purified.
column3: Aku mengandalkanmu.{nl}Lindungilah Altar sampai Fountain itu bisa disucikan.

column2: Put Merog saliva in this potion and shake it. {nl} It will help you withstand the muddy energy of Bramble.
column3: Masukan Merlog's saliva pada ramuan ini kemudian aduk. {nl} Ini akan membantumu bertahan dari muddy aura of Bramble.

column2: Bramble is trying to recover by ingraining his roots around the Thorn Forest. {nl}Cutting those roots will hurt him.
column3: Bramble memulihkan diri dengan menanamkan akarnya di Thorn Forest . {nl} Potong akar-akar itu.

column2: You mustn't let your guard down, even if Bramble is weakened. {nl}After all, it is a Demon Lord, no matter how injured it is.
column3: Kamu tidak boleh membiarkan para penjaga turun meskipun Brambles sedang melemah. {nl} Seperti apapun lukanya, dia adalah Rajanya para Demon.

column2: Now we can make a full-scale attack on Bramble. {nl}I'll go on ahead to Giliaii Courtyard to keep an eye on Bramble, please come along.
column3: Sekarang kita akan menyiapkan kekuatan penuh untuk melawan Bramble. {nl} Aku akan berangkat ke Giliaii courtyard dan mengawasi Brambles dulu, ikuti aku.

column2: The most important roots are at Sviesa Hill Areas and Tankinta Vacant Lot. {nl}Cut them both.
column3: Akar-akar yang sangat berguna di Sviesa hills dan Tankinta lot. {nl} Petiklah semua.

column2: Even after all of the vicious energy is removed, this forest will remain as it is.{nl}But someday, we will also end that.
column3: Meskipun semua energi jahat dimusnahkan, hutan ini akan tetap seperti ini.{nl}Tapi suatu saat kita akan mengakhirinya.

column2: Believer Kazis
column3: Believer Kazis

column2: The Honeypin is hidden somewhere in Karadas Path, but I can't find it. {nl}My purification duties has been delayed because of that monster.
column3: Suatu tempat di single road Caracas memiliki hidden Honeypin yang bisa kamu temukan. {nl} purification terhenti karena para monster.

column2: You will need to activate the Altar of Purification.{nl}Do this without letting the Honeypin know.
column3: Kamu hanya perlu mengaktifkan altar of purification.{nl}Tanpa sepengetahuan Honeypin.

column2: Are you hurt?{nl}I heard the sound of Honeypin's webs, but I am relieved to see you are okay.
column3: Kamu tidak terluka?{nl}Aku mendengar kepakan sayap Honeypin, tapi aku lega melihat kamu baik-baik saja.

column2: Bramble and the revelation are in the depths of Giliaii Courtyard. {nl}It must be agonizing since the roots for healing the scars have all been cut off.
column3: Bramble dan revelation berada di tengah Giliaii courtyard. {nl} Akar yang digunakannya untuk pemulihan semuanya telah dipotong, ini pasti menyakitkan.

column2: Don't forget to use the stimulant whenever you breathe in its evil energy. {nl}May the blessings of Goddess Saule be with you.
column3: Jangan lupa gunakan snimultant setiap kamu kehabisan nafas. {nl} Semoga kamu selalu dilindungi Goddess.

column2: Don't forget to use the stimulant whenever you breathe in its evil energy. {nl}May the blessings of Goddess Saule be with you.
column3: Jangan lupa gunakan snimultant setiap kamu kehabisan nafas. {nl} Semoga kamu selalu dilindungi Goddess.

column2: If you feel that you are close to danger, quickly run away.{nl}The place is more dangerous due to the evil energy.
column3: Jika kamu dalam bahaya, segera pergi dari sistu.{nl}kapal ini berbahaya selama masih diliputi evil energy.

column2: This is the worst part of Fallen Worry Forest.{nl}Not only because of the concentration of evil energy, {nl}but your safety cannot be guaranteed either.
column3: Ini adalah bagian terburuk dari Fallen Worry Forest.{nl}Bukan hanya karena konsentrasi dari energi jahatnya,{nl}tetapi juga keselamatanmu tidak terjamin.

column2: I am not afraid of dying.{nl}The Goddess Saule will guide me well.
column3: Aku tidak takut mati.{nl}Goddess Saule akan menuntunku.

column2: Achat is the faithful Guardian of the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}But, once it gets corrupted, it will never return to its original state.
column3: Echart adalah pelindung setia royal tomb.{nl}Tapi setelah dirusak sulit mengembalikannya seperti semula.

column2: Broken Royal Mausoleum Tombstone
column3: The broken epitaph of the royal tomb

column2: Guardian Shnayim.{nl}Defeat the intruder who disturbs the Great King Zachariel's rest.
column3: The protector, Shnayim.{nl}Defeat the intruder who disturbes Zachariel's rest.

column2: Royal Mausoleum Tombstone
column3: Royal Mausoleum Tombstone

column2: The Guardians will cause a disturbance when the magic that flows in the Royal Mausoleum gets disrupted.
column3: Sang Protector akan mengganggumu saat unsur magis yang mengalir di royal tomb sedang kacau.

column2: Royal Mausoleum Guardian
column3: The protector of the royal tomb

column2: Once a Guardian gets corrupted, it can never come back to its original status.{nl}Eternal slumber will be the only fate for that Guardian.
column3: Sekalinya protector dirusak, tidak bisa kembali ke keadaan semula.{nl}Hanya dalam istirahat panjang yang bisa membuatnya tenang.

column2: Corrupted Royal Mausoleum Guardian
column3: Ruined protector of the royal tomb

column2: Anyone who disturbs the King's rest will meet their end here.
column3: Barangsiapa yang mengusik Sang Raja, tempat ini akan menjadi kuburannya.

column2: Destruction by the Revelator is a preferable alternative to corruption by the evil energy.
column3: Aku lebih baik dinodai oleh seorang Savior daripada harus dicemari evil energy.

column2: The name of the Revelator's has been erased and only the demon' name remain.{nl}You must protect yourself.
column3: Nama Savior akan hilang, hanya nama demon yang tetap eksis.{nl}Kamu harus bisa melindungi dirimu sendiri.

column2: I have recieved orders from Goddess Saule to keep a close eye on Bramble.{nl}He is the source of all evil beings in this forest.
column3: Aku sedang mengawasi Bramble seperti yang diperintahkan oleh Goddess  Saule.{nl}Dia adalah sumber dari kekuatan iblis di sini.

column2: It was a real honor to meet you.{nl}I will pray to Goddess Saule that your future be blessed.
column3: Sebuah kehormatan bisa bertemu denganmu.{nl}Untuk masa depanmu, mari kita hormati Saule Goddess.

column2: Do not disturb Zachariel's rest
column3: Jangan mengusik ketengan Zachariel.

column2: I told you that there's an way to block those demons at Fedimian.
column3: Aku sudah katakan ada cara menghadang para demon di Fedimian.{nl}Aku akan menyelesaikan jewel of prominence di sini lalu menolong Goddess  Gabija.{nl}

column2: I pray that the goddess can endure until then.
column3: Aku berharap Goddess  masih ada saat ini.

column2: Well done.{nl}But, this is just an empty stone.{nl}You can complete it by empowering it with various ingredients.
column3: Bagus sekali.{nl}Tapi ini hanya sebuah batu yang polos.{nl}Kamu dapat melengkapinya dengan menambahkan kekuatan dari ramuan-ramuan khusus.

column2: I will fill the Jewel of Prominence with Flame Vapor.{nl}There is a Flame Vapor with magic possesed in it at the reading room.
column3: Aku akan mengisi Jewel of Prominence dengan uap panas.{nl}Ada uap panas yang memiliki unsur magis di sekitar reading room.

column2: You should search for it hard.{nl}The Flame Vapor is not clearly visible.
column3: Kamu harus kerja keras mendapatkannya.{nl}Uap panas ini tidak mudah terlihat.

column2: This is enough. Well done.
column3: Oke ini sudah cukup, baguslah.

column2: Now we have to fill the Essence of Fire into the jewel, but it's complicated.{nl}
column3: Sekarang kita masukan Essence of Fire ke dalam jewel, tapi ini agak rumit.{nl}

column2: First, unleash the Flame Vapor from Jewel of Prominence.{nl}Then the Flame Vapor will collect the Essence of Flame that are hovering in the air.{nl}You just have to fill that in the jar. Okay?
column3: Pertama-tama, melepaskan Jewel of Prominence.{nl}Kemudian Steam akan mengumpulkan Essence of Flame yang menguap di udara.{nl}Kamu cukup memasukannya ke dalam botol, oke?

column2: Don't worry. It won't explode or hurt you.
column3: Jangan khawatir, tidak akan melukai atau meledak.

column2: Hew.. {nl}We almost completed the Jewel of Prominence!
column3: Hew.. {nl}Kita hampir menyelesaikan Jewel of Prominence!

column2: I will collect the sources of the flame into the last pot.{nl}You can get them from the monster that has the power of fire.
column3: Aku akan mengumpulkan sources of the flame ke dalam wajan terakhir.{nl}Kamu dapat memperolehnya dari para monster yang memiliki power of fire.

column2: Gabija will recover her energy if we could make the Jewel of Prominence completely.
column3: Gabija akan pulih jika kita berhasil membuat Jewel of Prominence dengan lengkap.

column2: Good!{nl}Now we just have to combine the flame into the jewel.
column3: Bagus!{nl}Sekarang kita tinggal menggabungkan flame ke dalam jewel.

column2: Let's go to the fusion machine.{nl}We just have to put all materials in it and the jewel will be completed when we activate the device.
column3: Ayo ke fusion machine.{nl}Cukup masukan semua bahan ke dalamnya dan jewel akan sempurna setelah kita mengaktifkan alatnya.

column2: We must succeed...
column3: Seharusnya kita berhasil..

column2: So this is the Jewel of Prominence... I can feel it's great energy.{nl}Let's quickly give this to Gabija. There's stairs to go up on the right side.
column3: Jadi inilah Jewel of Prominence.. Aku bisa merasakan energi yang sangat kuat ini.{nl}Segera berikan ini kepada Gabija. Ada tangga naik di sebelah kanan.

column2: To find the Jewel of Prominence, just use this detector.{nl}When you use this detector near the place where the jewel is located, the jewel will come out.
column3: Untuk menemukan Jewel of Prominence, gunakan detektor ini.{nl}Saat kamu menjalankan detektor ini di sekitar tempat jewel itu berada, maka jewel akan muncul.

column2: The portal that you tried to open is the gate of lies.{nl}The villagers hear are the tricks of demons' lord, Bramble.
column3: Portal yang kamu coba buka adalah gate of lies.{nl}Villager mendengar ini siasat dari Demon Lord, Bramble.

column2: It's embarrassing, but I am also tricked and captured causing to lose my strength. {nl} Please destroy the magic circles imprisoning me.
column3: Memalukan sekali jika aku terjebak kedalamnya, aku akan kehilangan pamorku. {nl} Hancurkan lingkaran magis yang mengurungku ini.

column2: The binding magic circles are located in Drugys Courtyard and in Vapsva Vacant Lot. {nl}Please hurry.
column3: Lingkaran magis confinement ini terletak di Drugys Courtyard dan Vapsva lot. {nl} Cepatlah.

column2: Thank you for saving me. {nl}
column3: Terima Kasih telah menolongku. {nl}

column2: I am Saule, goddess of the sun. {nl}Everything is just like how Laima has foreseen.
column3: Aku adalah Saule, Goddess of the sun. {nl} Semuanya sesuai dengan apa yang sudah diramalkan oleh Laima.

column2: Thank you. But this is not the only barrier imprisoning me in here. {nl}We've got to find the inspetor, Clymen, hiding in between the gap of dimensions.
column3: Terima kasih, tapi bukan Cuma ini barrier yang mengurungku di sini. {nl} Kita haru menemukan inspetor, Clymen, bersembunyi diantara gap of dimensions.

column2: Please bring me the sacrifice tools in the Grand Corridor. {nl}I will try to use the divine power that dwell in the tool.
column3: Tolong bawakan aku sacrifice tools di Grand Corridor. {nl} Aku akan coba menggunakan divine power yang ada pada alat tersebut.

column2: Thank you. {nl}I should be able to work with this amount of divine energy.
column3: Thank you. {nl}Terima kasih. {nl} Divine power ini mungkin akan cukup.

column2: Now I'll focus my efforts on finding Clymen.{nl}I'd appreciate it if you could stifle the evil energy a little by dealing with the demons nearby.
column3: Sekarang aku akan memfokuskan upayaku untuk mencari Clymen.{nl}Aku akan sangat menghargai jika kamu bisa menahan energi jahat dari para demon di sekitar.

column2: Just a little bit more. Please suppress the evil energy.
column3: Sedikit lagi, ayo beri kejutan untuk Magi.

column2: I sense Clymen's presence at Ishpirki Access Road.{nl}Hurry and go deal with him.{nl}
column3: Aku merasakan keberadaan Clymen di Ishpirki Access Road.{nl}Cepatlah dan pergi hadapi ia.{nl}

column2: That is the key. {nl}Please free me from this cage.
column3: Ini kuncinya {nl} Tolong biarkan aku dulu.

column2: Thank you in the name of Saule, goddess of the Sun. {nl}
column3: Terima kasih, atas nama Saule, Goddess of the sun. {nl}

column2: It's a shame but the revelation is in the hands of Bramble. {nl} The reason he imprisoned me instead of killing me is to use my divinity to interpret the revelation. {nl}
column3: Ini memalukan, tapi revelation ini ada ditangan Bramble. {nl} Alasannya mengurungku dan tidak membunuhku adalah karena dia membutuhkan kemampuanku untuk menafsirkan kehendak Tuhan. {nl}

column2: But the Bramble is also not in its normal condition due to the previous battle. {nl} Please stop the Bramble in the gateway with my Believers and get the revelation back.
column3: Sementara Bramble saat ini dalam kondisi belum pulih akibat dari pertempuran terakhir. {nl} Tolong hentikan Bramble di gateway bersama para pengikutku dan bawa kembali revelation.

column2: Please show me the revelation. And I will show you its meaning.
column3: Tunjukan revelationnya. {nl}Aku akan tunjukkan artinya.

column2: If there are any shrine offering tools around that still contains divine energy, then we can {nl}surely use them to find Clymen. {nl}
column3: Jika ini divine power yang menghuni sacrifice items, dipastikan kita bisa menggunakannya untuk menemukan Clymen. {nl}

column2: Lyliana
column3: Lyliana

column2: I wish I could meet my family that lives on Indigo Tree Plateau. {nl}I... I also wish I could apologize to my brother about the big arguement we had.
column3: Aku berharap aku bisa bertemu dengan keluargaku yang tinggal di Indigo Tree Plateau.{nl}Aku... Aku juga berharap aku bisa meminta maaf kepada saudaraku mengenai perselisihan besar yang terjadi diantara kami.

column2: I really want to know how my family is doing, but I'm too scared of the monsters to go back. {nl}I just ran out of the house and now I regret it a lot.
column3: Sebenarnya aku rindu akan keluargaku di tempat lain namun aku sangat takut keluar karena monster. {nl} Aku pernah mencoba keluar dari rumah dan aku menyesalinya.

column2: I remember singing with my brother as we dipped our feet into a stream on Indigo Tree Plateau.
column3: Aku ingat bernyanyi bersama saudaraku dengan memasukkan kaki kami ke dalam aliran air di Indigo Tree Plateau.

column2: I just feel sorry to my brother.
column3: Aku ingin minta maaf pada saudaraku.

column2: Old Man of Andale Village
column3: Old man of andail village

column2: God looks after our village, so the water is clear. The air is fresh. And there are no disasters.
column3: Tuhan melindungi desa kami, desa kami tidak kekurangan air dan udara. Dan tidak ada bencana di sini.

column2: So the Revelator has finally come.{nl}Very healthy and reliable. This time, we can do it.
column3: Sampai akhirnya Savior datang.{nl}Sangat nyaman dan tentram. Kupikir kita bisa melakukannya sekarang.

column2: Aren't you the Revelator? {nl}So, what brings you to our village? {nl}
column3: Kamu kah Savior itu? {nl} Apa yang membawamu datang ke desa ini? {nl}

column2: Goddess Saule? {nl}We haven't seen her for a long time. {nl}
column3: Goddess Saule? {nl} Sudah sangat lama kami tidak melihatnya. {nl}

column2: The portal that leads to Goddess Saule doesn't open. {nl}I think it's because the Holy Pond is corrupted.
column3: Portal menuju Goddess Saule tidak akan terbuka. {nl}Mungkin dikarenakan diving pond telah terkontaminasi.

column2: The Tanus in Zvelgian Vacant Lot carry Purifying Stones. {nl}They will be able to purify the Pond.
column3: Tanu di Zvelgian vacant lot mempunyai purifying stone. {nl}Itu mungkin bisa mensucikan pond.

column2: Just like there are many demons, the same goes for the goddesses. {nl}The five goddesses are the only ones who became well known.
column3: Seperti banyak sekali demon, sama halnya dengan Goddess . {nl} Lima Goddess  hanya satu yang paling dikenal.

column2: Our village serves the Goddess Saule, who overlooks the sun. {nl}We used to go see her a lot through the portal, but one day that portal closed.
column3: Desa kami meyakini Goddess Saule yang menghadap Matahari. {nl}Kita dulu sering menemuinya melalui portal itu, hingga suatu hari portal itu ditutup.

column2: I haved carved the owls for a long time.{nl}At one point in time, they got their lives and determination.{nl}
column3: Aku telah memahat owls sejak dulu.{nl}Pada satu waktu, mereka memperoleh hidup dan keteguhan diri mereka sendiri.{nl}

column2: When I gained my consciousness, a few hundreds of years have passed.
column3: Saat aku kembali sadar, beberapa ratus tahun yang kulewati.

column2: Carvers should be careful not to exaggerate their skills. They should be humble.
column3: Scuptors tidak boleh terlalu memamerkan kemampuannya.{nl}Mereka harus menjadi seorang yang rendah hati.

column2: It is a good sign that you, the Revelator, came here.{nl}We've been waiting for you for a long time.
column3: Ini pertKamu yang baik, saat kamu , Savior tiba di sini.{nl}Kami sudah menunggu begitu lama.

column2: Please come to our village.{nl}The villagers will really like you.{nl}For sure.
column3: Datanglah ke desa kami.{nl}Orang-orang desa akan sangat menyukaimu.{nl}Pasti.

column2: It was through God's guidance that we were able to meet.
column3: Tuhan telah mempertemukan kita.

column2: Please refrain from thinking about any suffering. We have all received a blessing.
column3: Jangan mengiri bahwa ini menyakitkan. Kita menerima hidayah.

column2: Believe in God.{nl}We can become one with the tree.
column3: Percayalah pada Tuhan.{nl}Kita bisa bersama di dalamnya.

column2: We will be saved by sticking together.{nl}Because God told us to do that.
column3: Kita akan selamat jika bersama.{nl}Tuhan telah mengatakannya kepada kami.

column2: Not yet?{nl}Where is the girl?
column3: Belum?{nl}Dimana gadis itu?

column2: I can't use my power since I was deceivied by the demon's trick.{nl}You should find my power to guide you to the revelation.
column3: Gara-gara siasat jahatnya demon, aku tidak bisa menggunakan kekuatanku.{nl}Untuk menuntunmu menuju revelation, carikan kekuatan.

column2: That portal is a gate to lies.{nl}Laima has brought you to me because of that.
column3: Portal gate to lies.{nl}Untuk itulah Laima membawamu kepadaku.

column2: Demon Lord Bramble can never be forgiven.
column3: Bramble, Raja iblis yang tidak bisa dimaafkan.

column2: Bramble must be recovering his power even at this moment.{nl}Please meet the Believers at Gate Route.
column3: Bramble harus memulihkan kondisinya dalam keadaan seperti ini.{nl}Temuilah para believer di Gate Route.

column2: Please be careful of the Beholder's tricks at Gate Route.
column3: Berhati-hatilah pada observer di Gate Route.

column2: I am gonna stay here and recover my lost energy.{nl}I don't wanna create chaos in this world so please do not tell my existence to anyone.
column3: Aku akan tinggal di sini dan memulihkan kondisiku.{nl}Aku tidak ingin membuat heboh dunia, tolong rahasiakan keberadaanku di sini.

column2: The Mausoleum you should go can be reached only through the portal that I have opened for you.{nl}May the goddess bless you.
column3: The royal tomb, kamu bisa langsung ke sana melalui portal yang aku buatkan.{nl}Semoga Goddess selalu bersamamu.

column2: It seems that the rain just won't stop. In fact, it rarely stops.{nl}Do you think this is because of the evil energy?
column3: Sepertinya hujan tidak akan berhenti.{nl}Apakah kamu juga mengira ini karena vicious energy?

column2: These thorny vines just keep growing even after we cut them.{nl}But it's still better to cut them than leave them.
column3: These thorny bushes akan terus tumbuh meskipun kita telah memotongnya.{nl}Tapi tak apalah, daripada kita tidak berbuat apa-apa.

column2: Even if Bramble disappears, I think things are going to stay like this for a while.{nl}The entire forest is covered with thorny vines. They are gigantic.
column3: Meskipun Bramble telah tidak ada, Sepertinya aku masih akan tinggal di sini.{nl}Seluruh bagian hutan telah dikelilingi thorny bushes. Mereka besar-besar.

column2: You seem to live up to your reputation. {nl}The people in our village just cowardly hope that the goddess will take care of everything.
column3: Jadi, sepertinya kamu harus meningkatkan reputasimu. {nl} Orang desa penakut dan selalu berharap kepada Goddess yang akan menyelesaikan semuanya.

column2: By the way, did you see a young man from our village? {nl}I told him to go check if the portal is working, but I have not heard from him since then.
column3: Tidakkah kamu melihat seorang anak muda di desa kami? {nl} Aku menyuruhnya untuk memeriksa portal yang aku buat, tapi sampai saat ini belum ada kabar.

column2: Thank you. {nl}The portal is at Nugria Sanctum.
column3: Terima kasih. {nl} Portalnya berada di Nugria Sanctuary.

column2: Injured Villager
column3: Injured Villager

column2: Thank you for saving me.
column3: Terima kasih telah menyelamatkanku.

column2: So you're the Revelator the headman spoke about. {nl}I'm fine, please check the portal up at the sanctum.
column3: Jadi kamulah Savior yang dibilang oleh Mayor. {nl}Aku baik-baik saja, coba cek portal of the Sanctuary.

column2: The portal can be opened from the altar at Nugria Sanctum.
column3: Portalnya bisa dibuka dari altar di Nugria Sanctuary

column2: It doesn't work? {nl}Well, that's going to be a big problem. {nl}
column3: Tidak berfungsi. {nl} Ini masalah besar. {nl}

column2: Could you let the elder of Rhombuspaving Dale know instead of me?{nl}It's a short ways up to the left from here.
column3: Bisakah kamu memberitahu Elder Rhombuspaving Dale menggantikanku?{nl}Ada Jalan pintas ke atas kiri dari sini.

column2: That portal is... a fantasy... No. A portal going to Goddess Saule. {nl}Opening the portal is very important.
column3: Portalnya. fantasy... Tidak, Portal menuju Goddess Saule. {nl} Anyway, kita harus bisa membuka portalnya.

column2: My injuries are not that severe, don't worry. Please go on ahead and check the portal at the {nl}sanctum.
column3: Lukanya tidak begitu parah, ga usah khawatir. Periksa dulu portal di sanctuary.

column2: I will move again if I take a little rest.{nl}But first, the portal...
column3: Aku akan segera bangkit setelah sedikit istirahat.{nl}Portalnya dulu..

column2: Ah, so you are the Revelator!{nl}It's a real honor.
column3: Ah, jadi kamu savior itu!{nl}Sungguh suatu kehormatan.

column2: Monsters are trying to attack us, but we can't just abandon our purification duties.{nl}Goddess Saule gave us our duties.
column3: Monster mencoba menyerang kita, tapi kita tidak boleh menghentikan proses purification.{nl}Saule telah mengatakannya.

column2: The most important roots should be somewhere in Fallen Worry Forest, {nl}but we must have been poking around the forest too much.{nl}We could put a damper on the forest's growth if only we could cut it off.
column3: Akarnya seharusnya berada di suatu tempat di Fallen Worry Forest,{nl}tetapi kita telah mencari-cari di hutan.{nl}Kita bisa meredam pertumbuhan hutan bila kita bisa memotongnya.

column2: We want to live quietly serving Goddess Saule.
column3: Kami ingin hidup damai dalam lindungan Saule.

column2: Royal Mausoleum Guardian's Stone Statue
column3: The statue of the protector of the royal tomb

column2: The Order of the Royal Mausoleum is being disrupted by the evil presence.
column3: The rules of the royal tomb sedang dirusak oleh makhluk-makhluk jahat.

column2: Guardian's Stone Statue
column3: The statue of the protector

column2: It is our mission to protect the Great King Zachariel as he rests.{nl}We will defeat anyone who disturbs the Great King Zachariel's rest.
column3: Misi kita untuk melindungi Zachariel yang sedang tenang.{nl}Kita akan mengusir semua yang mengganggu ketenangan Zacharielt.

column2: We will destroy anyone who intrudes into the Royal Mausoleum.
column3: Kita hancurkan siapapun yang mencoba mengusik royal tomb.

column2: It is our mission to protect the Great King Zachariel as he rests.{nl}We will defeat anyone who disturbs the Great King Zachariel's rest.
