column3: Misi kita untuk melindungi Zachariel yang sedang tenang.{nl}Kita akan mengusir semua yang mengganggu ketenangan Zacharielt.

column2: Wheelen! Oh, my faithful Guardians...{nl}If the chosen one comes here, do your best to give him the weapon of Saam.{nl}The spear that will break the armor of evil.
column3: Wheelen! Oh, pelindungku yang terpercaya..{nl}Jika sang terpilih datang kemari, lakukan yang terbaik untuk memberikannya weapon of Saam.{nl}Spear yang dapat menghancurkan armor of evil.

column2: Venucelos are very brave and loyal.{nl}But if their loyalty is to our enemies, they are worthless.{nl}Dogs that are unable to protect the Royal Mausoleum shall lose their leash with the king's {nl}name on it.
column3: Venucelos yang sangat berani dan setia.{nl}Dia akan sangat berharga dalam mengatasi musuh-musuhku.{nl}Anjing-anjing yang tidak bisa menjaga Royal Tomb akan lepas dengan nama Sang Raja.

column2: Demonstration of Might! Does it sound beautiful..? {nl}Creating the gigantic guardians was what most satisfied the Great King Zachariel. {nl}Only those who defeat the guardians can acquire the royal treasure he hid inside them.
column3: The proof of powerfulness! Kata-kata yang indah..{nl}Zachariel sangat bangga menciptakan pelindung raksasa.{nl}Dia menyimpan dokumen rahasia kerajaan di dalamnya, untuk bisa mendapatkan dokumen itu harus mengalahkan pelindung raksasa itu terlebih dulu.

column2: Guardian's Stone Statue
column3: The statue of the protector

column2: Listen quietly with your eyes closed.{nl}The nature keeps singing to us the songs of lives.
column3: Tutup matamu dan dengarkan baik-baik.{nl}Suara alam yang merdu dalam kehidupan.

column2: Broker between life and death for humans. {nl}That's what Bokor is, if you ask.
column3: Broker antara hidup dan mati manusia. {nl} Seperti itulah Bokor, jika kamu mau tahu.

column2: You don't look like a delivery man. What's up?{nl}
column3: Kamu tidak terlihat seperti biasanya, ada apa?{nl}

column2: There's no Long-Branched Tree head in here. Should I tell them to get it themselves?
column3: Aku tidak bisa melihat ujung pohon dengan cabang yang panjang, kamu mau aku mengambilkannya untukmu?

column2: Klaipeda is a small and quiet town. {nl}We haven't had this many people come to town before.
column3: Klaipeda adalah kota yang kecil dan sunyi. {nl} Kami belum begitu banyak melihat orang disana.

column2: Did the goddess mention her whereabouts in a dream of revelation?
column3: Apakah Goddess memberitahukan dimana dia saat kamu didalam dream of revelation?

column2: Go on ahead to Klaipeda. {nl}Commander Uska is waiting for you at the Central Plaza.{nl}
column3: Pergilah ke Klaipeda. {nl} Commander Uska sedang menunggunmu di Central Plaza.{nl}

column2: I heard the bishop also had a dream about a goddess, so it might have something to do with that.
column3: kudengar bishop juga pernah bermimpi tentang Goddess... Dan kupikir ini harus dilakukan.

column2: Speaking of that girl. {nl}She simply appeared in our village some time ago. {nl}
column3: Gadis itu. {nl} Dia muncul di kota beberapa waktu lalu. {nl}

column2: She didn't speak and her clothes were all dirty. {nl}She seemed hungry so I brought her home to feed her some food, but then the Vubbes came {nl}to the village.
column3: Bajunya sangat kotor, dia tidak berkata apa-apa. {nl} Dis sangat kelaparan, jadi aku membawanya pulang dan memberinya makanan, lalu semua ini terjadi.

column2: And you saw that the girl was imprisoned with us just a while ago. {nl}Do you think she has a family? She never said anything the entire time. {nl}
column3: Maksudku gadis yang bersama kami terakhir kali. {nl} Menurutmu dia punya keluarga? Sepertinya dia tidak bisa bicara apa -apa. {nl}

column2: If I was a parent, I probably would be bawling while searching for my daughter. {nl}Parents nowadays are really irresponsible, don't you think? {nl}
column3: Jika aku orang tuanya, aku akan mencarinya kemana mana. {nl} Orang tua sekarang sangat tidak bertanggung jawab. {nl}

column2: The girl really did not speak at all. {nl}Furthermore, the fact that a young lady all grown up walked barefooted all the way to this remote {nl}village. Doesn't that seem strange to you?
column3: Gadis itu tidak berkata apa-apa. {nl} Selain itu juga sepanjang perjalanannya dia tidak menggunakan alas kaki. Bukankah itu aneh?

column2: Can we go home...
column3: Bolehkah kami pulang..

column2: I want to go home soon...
column3: Aku ingin segera pulang..

column2: I am curious about the girl said to have broken the seal as well.{nl}This is not a seal that can be easily broken.{nl}{nl}
column3: Aku juga ingin tahu mengenai gadis yang mengatakan untuk merusak segel.{nl}Ini bukanlah segel yang dapat dengan mudah dirusak.{nl}{nl}

column2: Husband of a Refugee Family
column3: Husband of refugee family

column2: I ran away with my wife to avoid the monsters.{nl}Goddess Zemyna is protecting us, but I don't know how long she can hold out.
column3: Aku melarikan diri bersama istriku untuk menghindari para monster.{nl}Goddess Zemyna melindungi kami, namun aku tidak tahu berapa lama ia bisa bertahan.

column2: Oh, the Accessory Merchant said she has a gift for you. {nl}Would you mind visiting her?
column3: Oh, Accessory Merchant bilang dia punya hadiah untukmu. {nl} Maukah kamu mengunjunginya?

column2: You can meet the Accessory Merchant if you go straight to the left from here.
column3: Kamu bisa menemui Accessory Merchant dengan berjalan ke arah kiri dari sini.

column2: Accessory Merchant
column3: Accessory Merchant

column2: Nice to meet you! Are you the Revelator chasing the dream of the goddess? {nl}I'd like to give you this accessory as a present. {nl}
column3: Hai! Kamu kan sang Savior yang bermimpi tentang Goddess? {nl} Aku akan memberikanmu accesory ini sebagai hadiah. {nl}

column2: If armor protects you from physical attacks, accessories protect you from magic attacks. {nl}I hope this will be useful for you.
column3: Jika armor melindungi kalo dari physical attack, accessories melindungi kamu dari magic attack. {nl} Semoga ini berguna untukmu.

column2: You can meet the Accessory Merchant if you head straight to the left from here. {nl}
column3: Kamu dapat menemui Accessory Merchant jika kamu terus lurus ke arah kiri dari sini. {nl}

column2: Ah, I was waiting for you.{nl}Are you the person chosen by the Eyes of the Great King Zachariel?
column3: Ah, Aku sedang menunggumu.{nl}Kamu yang dipilih oleh eyes of Zachariel kan?

column2: Welcome.
column3: Selamat datang.

column2: Oh, it seems like you have some Jukopus leaves and Kepa stems. {nl}Can you share some with me?
column3: Oh, sepertinya kamu memilki Yukopus leaves dan Kepa stems. {nl} Aku sedang membutuhkannya, bolehkah kamu bagi beberapa?

column2: Thank you very much. {nl}I want to treat the injured in our village but I don't have enough materials to do so.
column3: Terima kasih banyak. {nl} Aku membutuhkannya untuk mengobati orang-orang sakit, tapi aku tidak cukup memilikinya.

column2: I know you are doing your best but I will need more.
column3: Aku tahu kamu telah berusaha keras, tapi aku masih membutuhkannya.

column2: I still need more Jukopus Leaves and Kepa Stems. {nl}But I don't want to just take them from you. How about trading it with the potions I have?
column3: Aku masih butuh Yukopus leaves dan Kepa stems. {nl} Tapi tidak hanya darimu. Bagaimana jika ditukar dengan potion?

column2: Your act of kindness really gives me a lot of strength.
column3: Kebaikanmu membuatku semakin kuat.

column2: Thanks you! {nl}I hope it would be helpful for you.
column3: Terima kasih! {nl}Semoga ini bisa membantumu.

column2: Jukopus and Kepas appear around the Miners' Village.
column3: Yukopus dan Kepas appear bisa ditemui di sekitar Miner's Village.

column2: Hey, are you going to take on those Vubbes? {nl} But your equipment seems a bit shabby... Do you mind if I help you with it?
column3: Hey, kamu akan melawan para Vubbe itu? {nl} Tapi Equipment yang kamu pakai jelek sekali... Bagaimana jika aku membantumu?

column2: Get me a few materials and I'll help you craft some new armors. {nl} The materials needed can be obtained from Large Red Kepa, Yukofus, and Vubbe Thief.
column3: Bawakan aku bahan-bahannya dan aku akan membuatkanmu Armor. {nl} Bahan-bahannya bisa diperoleh dari Large Red Kepa, Yukofus, dan Vubbe Thief.

column2: Large Red Kepa, Red Kepa, Yukopus, and Vubbe Thief. {nl} Not sure if it's a good thing but you can craft some pretty useful stuff with what the monsters drop.
column3: Large Red Kepa, Red Kepa, Yukopus,dan Vubbe Thief. {nl} Tidak menjamin ini bisa sangat berguna, tapi setidaknya bisa membuat barang yang lebih baik dari dropan monster itu.

column2: I'll give you the recipe so try crafting the armor with the materials I gave you. {nl} You will feel more reassured. Well then, may the Bless of Goddess be with you!
column3: Aku akan memberikan resepnya, kamu coba membuat sendiri dengan bahan yang telah aku berikan. {nl}Kamu akan lebih percaya diri. Baiklah, semoga Goddess selalu bersamamu!

column2: I am looking for medicines to cure the injured.
column3: Aku butuh obat-obatan untuk orang-orang yang sedang terluka.

column2: Oh you brought it. {nl} This is the front plate. {nl} Keep it until we have all the parts ready to craft an armor.
column3: Ouw kamu telah membawanya. {nl} Ini front plate. {nl} Simpan ini sampai kita memperoleh semua bagian yang lengkap untuk membuat Armor.

column2: Oh, here we are. Let's see. {nl} Seems like you brought enough of what we needed. {nl} You can make a Mantle with it. {nl} This reminds me of the good old days.
column3: oke, mari kita coba. {nl} Sepertinya sudah cukup. {nl} Kamu bisa membuat Mantel. {nl} Mengingatkanku pada hara-hariku yang telah lalu.

column2: Ordinary Man
column3: Ordinary Man

column2: This is the back plate. {nl} I'll let you craft when we have all the other materials ready.
column3: Ini back plate. {nl} Setelah semua bahan dilengkapi aku serahkan padamu untuk membuatnya.

column2: Here you go. This is a Chest protector made of leather. {nl}It was fun to do this in a long time.
column3: Ini dia, Chest protector dari bahan leather. {nl}Menyenangkan membuatnya dalam waktu yang cukup lama.

column2: (You see bone fragments in the well.)
column3: Bone fragments bisa didapatkan di dalam sumur.

column2: I'm both furious and upset. {nl}If only we had gotten here sooner, we wouldn't have been totally wiped out... {nl}
column3: Aku kesal dan marah. {nl} Mungkin jika kami datang lebih cepat, kita bisa selamat dari ini .. {nl}

column2: Dear Revelator, I have a favor to ask of you. {nl}Can you recover my comrades' mementos?
column3: Dear Savior, aku butuh bantuanmu. {nl}Maukah kamu mengambilkan keepstakes milik temanku?

column2: It's bad enough that they were killed by the Vubbes, but even their keepsakes are being abused. {nl}How awful...
column3: Ini menyedihkan bahwa mereka dibunuh oleh para Vubbes, hingga keepstakes mereka disalahgunakan. Mengerikan sekali.

column2: Thank you. {nl}My comrades may now be able to rest in peace.
column3: Terima kasih. {nl} Temanku yang telah tiada itu akan tenang di alam sana.

column2: Oh my God. The Vubbes stole all our food supplies. {nl}They even took our food for today... Please help us, we need your strength.
column3: Astaga. Para Vubbes telah mencuri food Supplyes. {nl} Mereka mengambil semua makanan kami, tolong kami.

column2: They stole the food meant for both the army and the residents. {nl}What will we do if we can't get our food back.. {nl}
column3: Mereka mengambil semua  makanan untuk prajurit dan warga. {nl} bagaimana jadinya jika kami tidak dapat mendapatkannya kembali.. {nl}

column2: Thank you. {nl}This will at least get us through the next few days.
column3: Terima kasih. {nl} Ini cukup bagi kami untuk dapat menyambung hidup.

column2: Thank you for your help earlier, but there are more mementos that need to be retrieved. {nl}My comrades will be unable to rest in peace without them...{nl}
column3: Terima kasih banyak atas pertolonganmu waktu itu, tapi masih banyak keepstakes yang perlu diambil. {nl} Demi temanku yang sudah tiada.. {nl}

column2: So please help us. {nl}If you can return the rest of the mementos to us, we will provide compensation.
column3: Tolonglah kami. {nl} Jika kamu dapat membawakannya kembali, kami akan memberikan sesuatu buat kamu.

column2: Thank you, but we still need more... {nl} Sorry... {nl}
column3: Terima kasih, tapi kami masih butuh banyak... {nl} Maafkan.. {nl}

column2: We've almost collected all the keepsakes... {nl} Please help us til the end.
column3: Kami kumpulknan hampir semua keepsakes.. {nl} Tolong kamu sampai semuanya berakhir.

column2: It hurts to think about giving these keepsakes to my dead comrades' families.
column3: Sedih rasanya membayangkan untuk memberikan keepstakes ini pada keluarga mereka.

column2: Thank you very much. {nl} My comrades can now rest in peace with the Goddesses.
column3: Terima kasih banyak. {nl} Temanku saat ini akan tenang di sisi-Nya.

column2: We survived the immediate danger with your help earlier, but we still need some assistance. {nl}Could you help us out a bit more?
column3: Dengan pertolonganmu kami masih bisa bertahan, tapi itu belum cukup. {nl} Maukan kamu menolong kami lagi?

column2: I'm enraged thinking about the Vubbes who will be heartily satisfied with our food. {nl}Especially with such difficult times nowadays.
column3: Aku kesal sekali, Para Vubbes itu begitu menikmati makanan kami. {nl}Terlebih ini adalah masa-masa yang sulit bagi kami.

column2: Thank you. {nl}We're still lacking some goods, but at least we got back this much.
column3: Terima kasih. {nl} Kami masih kekurangan saat ini, tapi ini sudah cukup lumayan.

column2: Fedimian Resident
column3: Fedimian Resident

column2: I heard that Sir Maven, who built the Great Cathedral, left five necklaces.{nl}I also heard that the one who collects those five necklaces will possess a great power.
column3: Kudengar wise man Maven yang telah membuat great cathedral meninggalkan 5 buah necklaces.{nl}Aku juga mendengar, mereka yang memiliki salah satunya akan memilki kekuatan yang hebat.

column2: Hey, if you are planning to continue your journey, don't get close to the Cursed City.{nl}It didn't receive a blessing at all on Medzio Diena. You will turn into stone if you get too close to {nl}that city.
column3: Hey, Jika kamu ingin melanjutkan petualanganmu, jangan mendekati cursed city.{nl}Kota yang telah dikutuk. Kamu akan berubah menjadi batu jika mendekati kota ini.

column2: It's true that I am looking for the Revelator, but I need someone skillful.{nl}I am sorry, but you don't look like the Revelator I am looking for.
column3: Benar, aku sedang mencari seorang Savior, tapi aku butuh seorang yang hebat.{nl}Maaf, kamu bukan orang yang aku cari.

column2: The Great Cathedral, built by Maven, is beyond the Pilgrim's Way.{nl}Ruklys, Lydia Schaffen, and Agailla Flurry are all his disciples.
column3: Ada sebuah great cathedral yang dibuat oleh Maven di luar Pilgrim's Way.{nl}Ruklys, Lydia Schaffen, Agailla Flurry adalah murid-muridnya.

column2: The Great Cathedral was significantly damaged on Medzio Diena, so I wonder if people {nl}still go there. Back then, a great number of people would go there to do various rituals.
column3: The great cathedral banyak mengalami kerusakan pada saat divine day, kupikir masih banyak orang ingin berkunjung ke sana, tapi..{nl}Sebelum-sebelumnya banyak orang berkunjung ke sana untuk berbagai aktifitas ritual.

column2: They call the trail to the Great Cathedral, the Pilgrim's Way.
column3: Mereka menyebutnya, Pilgrim's Way.

column2: Welcome. {nl} Only hard-to-find stuff here.
column3: Selamat datang. {nl} Item itu susah diperoleh.

column2: Klaipeda Peddler
column3: Hawkers of Klaipeda

column2: I came all the way from Klaipeda to pray.{nl}That another disaster never occurs, and that my son{nl}who joined the army will be able to come back and see me.
column3: Aku datang jauh dari Klaipeda untuk berdo'a. {nl} ketika belum ada bencana, Aku seperti seorang Moruchonhi.

column2: My husband and I come here to pray every time we come here from Klaipeda.{nl}I know the goddess protected us during Medzio Diena,{nl}but I hope she can hear out at least one of my wishes.
column3: Kami kesini dari Klaipeda hanya untuk berdo'a. {nl} Aku tahu Goddess akan mendengarkan kami.

column2: Don't you ever think about going to the Great Cathedral.{nl}Even if you prepare for the dangers due to its deterioration...
column3: Jangan berpikir untuk pergi ke great cathedral.{nl}Selain banyak bahaya dari kerusakan ini..

column2: Yes. If you want to go to the Great Cathedral, you have to go through the impassable Pilgrim's {nl}Way. You see... the spirits of fallen Pilgrims haunt the area. They probably prey on passing {nl}travelers.
column3: Ya. Kamu harus melewati Pilgrim's Way terlebih dahulu jika akan pergi ke great cathedral.{nl}Ah Ya … semangat fallen Pilgrims hadir kembali di sana. Mungkin mereka ke sana sebagai untuk beribadah.

column2: Vubbe Tokens, Panto Horns, Merog Hearts, and Hogma Teeth. {nl}That is a lot of stuff!{nl}
column3: Vubbe Tokens, Panto Horn, Merog Heart, Hogma Tooth. {nl} Banyak sekali! {nl}

column2: The reward that you'll obtained are not to be boasted about.{nl}On that note, let's continue with our bet?
column3: Bootys yang kamu peroleh tidak bisa dibanggakan.{nl}Berani bertaruh?

column2: I'd say the monsters at Owl Burial Ground should prove to be a fairly equal wager for you.{nl}What do you think?
column3: Aku rasa monster di Owl Burial Ground merupakan hal yang setara untuk bertaruh bersamamu.{nl}Bagaimana menurutmu?

column2: Haha, I lost.{nl}You are great as I heard so. Here, it's your reward as promised.
column3: Haha, Aku kalah.{nl}Kamu memang hebat. Ini hadiah yang pantas buatmu.

column2: I have buried a Revelator once in the past.{nl}He burdened the goddess and placed too much faith in his abilities.
column3: Dulu aku pernah mengubur seorang savior.{nl}Aku terlalu arogan dengan kepercayaan kepada Goddess .

column2: It's frightening to think that blunder happened at all.{nl}I don't even know if I will have to bury another Revelator in the future... {nl}We both may never know.
column3: Menakutkan sekali membayangkan aku berubah seperti ini.{nl}Aku tak tahu suatu saat akan mengubur seorang savior kembali.. Kamu tidak akan pernah tahu.

column2: Are you proud of your skills as you talk to me at this moment while time passes?
column3: Apa kamu bangga dengan kemampuanmu berbicara padaku, sementara waktu terus berlalu?

column2: If a person becomes a handful of soils after his death, can you imagine how he will be treated.{nl}The soils that once conquered this world...
column3: Jika seorang manusia menjadi segumpal tanah setelah mati, bayangkan bagaimana kita diperlakukan nanti.{nl}Tanah yang pernah menaklukan dunia..

column2: Yes. You managed to avoid being like me. Yes...
column3: Ya, kamu mampu menghindariku, Ya …

column2: Without the blessing from the goddess, you would probably be with the goddess now too.{nl}Nonetheless, a lot of people are already like without such blessing.{nl}
column3: Tanpa berkah dari Goddess , Kamu harus dekat dengan Goddess  mulai sekarang.{nl}Tapi kebanyakan orang tidak dapat melakukannya.{nl}

column2: The Chapparition of Remaining Tree Dale has claimed many lives.{nl}Dispose of that abomination in the name of the goddesses.
column3: Chapparition dari Sisa Pohon Dale telah merenggut banyak nyawa.{nl}Hentikan kekejiannya dengan nama Goddess .

column2: We can't revive the people who died by the Chapparitions.{nl}I feel sorry, but we can't just do nothing.
column3: Kami tidak bisa membangkitkan orang mati di Chapparitions.{nl}Maafkan, aku tidak bisa berbuat apa-apa.

column2: Innocent Spirit
column3: Innocent Spirit

column2: Do not be surprised. {nl}For sure, there is something to given before returning to the goddesses. {nl}
column3: Jangan kaget. {nl} Ada sesuatu untukmu sebelum kembali pada Goddess. {nl}

column2: I want to apologize to my sister who left the house because of me but now I can't even do that. {nl}Can you find my sister for me and give her this necklace?
column3: Aku ingin minta maaf sama saudariku yang pergi dari rumah karena aku tapi saat ini sudah tidak bisa. {nl} Bisakah kamu temui dia dan berikan necklace dariku ini?

column2: My brother asked you to give this necklace to me? {nl}Where is my brother?
column3: Saudaraku menyuruhmu memberikan necklace ini padaku? {nl} Dimanakah dia?

column2: Innocent Soldier
column3: Innocent Soldier

column2: You are new here. Defeat all monsters nearby on my behalf.{nl}I can't move somehow.
column3: Kamu orang baru di sini. Musnahkan monster di sekitar sini.{nl}Saat ini aku tidak dapat berbuat apa-apa.

column2: Now I can go back to my hometown.{nl}Do you best, newcomer...
column3: Sekarang aku bisa kembali ke kota kelahiranku.{nl}Lakukan yang terbaik, orang baru..

column2: Errand Man
column3: Errand Man

column2: What. This isn't the Ripper? {nl}But since you've seen my face, you'll soon be cursed to death. {nl}
column3: Apa, ini bukan Ripper? {nl}Tapi sejak kamu menatap wajahku, kamu akan segera dikutuk sampai mati. {nl}

column2: Wait a minute. No. No. {nl}Delivering this letter will just make it bounce back to you.{nl}You'll have to deliver it to Ripper, the guard of Fedimian. Do not look at what's written in the {nl}letter.
column3: Tunggu ! {nl} Kirim pesan ini dan aku akan menemuinya. {nl} Kirim saja pada Ripper, the guard of Fedimian. Jangan lihat isinya.

column2: A letter for me? I wonder what's in it... {nl}
column3: Letter forme? Apa ini.. {nl}

column2: A curse? Oh I get it, I get it alright!{nl}I'll give you his money, so please tell him to not curse me!
column3: Kutkan? Aku mengerti!{nl} Akan kuberi uang ini padamu, tolong katakan padanya untuk tidak mengutuk!

column2: huhu. Poor guy. He won't be able to see the light soon {nl} Whether it's in prison or coffin, only he will know. {nl} I feel sorry for the dead soldiers.
column3: huhu. Pria malang, dia tidak akan bisa melihat matahari esok hari {nl} Entah di penjara atau dalam peti mati, hanya dia yang tahu. {nl} Maafkan aku untuk prajurit-prajurit yang mati itu.

column2: Oh, I really am thankful for your help the other time. {nl}My injury is getting better now that I can move. {nl}
column3: Ahh, terima kasih sekali untuk waktu itu. {nl}Lukaku semakin membaik dan aku bisa kembali beraktifitas. {nl}

column2: But, uh, I'm too hungry and I don't have the energy to go back to the captain. {nl}If you have anything to eat, can you share some, please?
column3: Tapi aku tidak punya energi, aku lapar sekali {nl} Jika kamu punya makanan, maukan berbagi?

column2: Oh, thank you so much! {nl}I'll take this to recover and return to the commander for sure.
column3: Oh, terima kasih banyak! {nl} Aku akan memulihkan diri dan segera kembali pada Commander.

column2: The young birds... they remind me of Sparnas.{nl}I don't want ever see him. Even in my dreams.
column3: Mereka mengingatkanku pada Sparnas.{nl}Aku tidak mau bertemu mereka, meskipun dalam mimpi.

column2: Hmm, alright. I have accessories that will fit.{nl}I don't need them anymore so I want to give them to you if you could take care of the {nl}monsters nearby.
column3: Hm, Oke. Aku punya perhiasan yang pas untuk itu.{nl}Aku tidak membutuhkannya lagi, aku akan berikan padamu jika kamu mau membantuku mengusir monster di sekitar.

column2: Not done yet?{nl}They'll will fit on you nicely.
column3: Belum?{nl}Ini akan sangat pas untukmu.

column2: Yes. Well done.{nl}Here you go. It's a gift to you as promised.{nl}
column3: Ya, bagus sekali.{nl}Nih, sesuai janjikku … ambilah.{nl}

column2: Don't underestimate it. It was a strong animal in the old stories.{nl}In some places, one becomes an enemy to all other people just by touching that animal.
column3: Jangan meremehkannya. Dulu ini adalah binatang yang sangat kuat.{nl}In some places, one becomes an enemy to all other people just by touching that animal.

column2: I'm sorry, but could you burn the funeral ode in front of an epitaph at Dense Mist Plateau?{nl}I'd say that you would be the most well suited to calm their {nl}spirits as you have explored the gorge regions from top to bottom.
column3: Maaf, tapi bisakah kamu membakar syair pemakaman ini di depan sebuah epitaph di Dense Mist Plateau?{nl}Aku yakin kamu adalah orang yang tepat untuk menenangkan spirit{nl} mereka karena kamu telah menjelajahi gorge region dari atas sampai bawah.

column2: The canyon area is like a grave for many explorers and historians. {nl} And we study to find more factual history on top of their graves.
column3: Canyon area seperti kuburan bagi para sejarawan dan para petualang. {nl} Kita mencari informasi mengenai mereka di atas kuburan-kuburan itu.

column2: Thank you. {nl}Our scholars will not forget him either.
column3: Terima kasih. {nl} Akademia kami tidak akan melupakan hal itu.

column2: Yes. The Revelator who said the same things lies at rest here.{nl}If you can survive after facing nearby monsters for 2 minutes, then I'll think better of you.
column3: Savior itu tergeletak di sini setelah mengatakan hal itu.{nl}Jika dia berhasil bertahan menghadapai monster dalam 2 menit,

column2: From now on, be careful when using shared equipment. Nonetheless, an impressive show of strength.
column3: Lain kali hati-hati menggunakan fasilitas umum. {nl} itulah, dan kamu memiliki kekuatan yang hebat.

column2: Well... just looking at it leaves me at loss for words. {nl}Was it really this fragile...
column3: Aneh sekali, setiap melihat ini aku seperti tidak bisa berkata-kata. {nl} Apakah ini benar-benar rapuh..

column2: This isn't good.{nl}We may have to evacuate from here.
column3: Aku sedang merasa ga enak.{nl}Mungkin kita akan evakuasi dari sini.

column2: Deal with all the monsters that you can at Owl Burial Ground before you return.{nl}How about 40 of them? I'll bet that you can't do it.
column3: Kalahkan semua monster yang terdapat di Owl Burial Ground sebelum kamu kembali.{nl}Bagaimana kalau sekitar 40 dari mereka? Aku berani bertaruh kalau kamu tidak dapat melakukannya.

column2: I will pray for that monster.{nl}If it even has a soul to listen to my prayer...
column3: Aku akan berdoa untuk monster-monster itu.{nl}Jika mungkin ada jiwa di sana yang mendengar do'aku ini..

column2: Unfortunately... I don't know where my brother is. {nl}He also probably won't know where I am too.
column3: Sayang sekali, aku tidak tahu dimana saudaraku. {nl} Dia juga mungkin memiliki hal yang sama denganku.

column2: I cannot leave until I have completed the mission...
column3: Aku tidak bisa meninggalkan tempat ini sampai misi ini selesai..

column2: He is so stupid. {nl}He could have given it sooner in good terms rather than get on my nerves. {nl}Hmm. Maybe I am belittling myself too.
column3: Bodoh sekali dia. {nl}Dia bisa saja memberikannya lebih cepat daripada saling meragukan. {nl} Hmm. Mungkin aku terlalu meremehkan diri sendiri.

column2: Don't act like you know me! {nl}It's not my fault. Everything is because of him!
column3: Jangan sok tahu ya! {nl} Bukan salahku, tapi orang lainlah yang bego!

column2: Is it ready yet?{nl}I could eat anything to recover right now...
column3: Apakah kita pernah ke sana? {nl}Kita butuh makan untuk mengembalikan kekuatan kita.

column2: Frankly, I'm afraid of what the world will turn into.
column3: Sebenarnya, Aku takut jika dunia akan berubah menjadi kacau.

column2: Cyrenia Odell
column3: Cyrenia Odell

column2: Hmm.. where is this place?{nl}What about Rexipher? Where is he?
column3: Hmm.. Dimana ini?{nl}Bagaimana dengan Rexipher? Dimana dia?

column2: Oh? The woman. I forgot.{nl}I will release her as promised. Do try to keep her alive.
column3: Ah? Wanita, aku lupa.{nl}Aku akan melepaskanmu sesuai janjiku, ayo bangkitkan dia.

column2: Sincerity is our strength. {nl}There will be no problems if you sincerely believe and follow the goddess.
column3: Ketulusan adalah kekuatan kami. {nl} Tidak akan ada masalah jika kamu mengikuti dan percaya pada Goddess.

column2: My throat hurts.. I think being confined in there damaged my throat. {nl}I wonder about the girl who was with us? Where did she go?
column3: Sepertinya tenggorokanku sakit gara-gara dikurung di sana. {nl} Bagaimana dengan gadis yang waktu itu bersama? Kemana dia pergi?

column2: Aren't you the Revelator who saved us last time? {nl}We were more than glad to see you back then.
column3: Kamu kah Savior yang menyelamatkanku waktu itu? {nl} Kami sangat gembira bisa bertemu denganmu kembali.

column2: The goddess must have sent you.{nl}If you didn't come... we'd be already... It's too scary to think about it.
column3: Pasti Goddess  yang mengirimmu.{nl}Jika bukan karena itu, kami tidak akan seperti ini … menyeramkan sekali kalo dipikir-pikir.

column2: It was horrible in captivity. {nl}The Vubbes would come and smelled us.. {nl}and make us dig here and there using pickaxes..
column3: Menyedihkan sekali berada di dalam tahanan. {nl} Vubbes menghampiri dan mencium bau kami.. {nl} membuat kita harus terus menggali di sana sini..

column2: Rexipher... Was he really a demon?
column3: Rexipher .. Dia benar-benar Asmodian?

column2: You saved us. Thank you so much. {nl}But I have a question for you.
column3: Terima kasih kamu telah menyelamatkanku. {nl} Tapi aku punya sebuah pertanyaan untukmu.

column2: Healing magic. {nl}Can normal people easily do it?
column3: Healing magic. {nl} Bisakah semua orang melakukannya?

column2: Okay but listen to my story a little. {nl}When I was taken to the mine, I injured my knee. {nl}
column3: Dengarkan ceritaku ini. {nl} Saat aku masuk ke dalam Mine itu, kakiku terluka. {nl}

column2: But a girl touched my knee and the pain was gone. {nl}Even the wound disappeared. {nl}
column3: Tapi gadis itu mengusap kakiku dan seketika itu juga kakiku sembuh. {nl} Bahkan lukanya hilang tak berbekas. {nl}

column2: Strange huh? I made her a flower ring to give to her. {nl}But I don't know where she's went.
column3: Emeyzing sekali kan?Jika aku dapat bertemu dengannya lagi, akan kubuatkan cincin bunga. {nl} Tapi aku tak tahu kemana dia pergi.

column2: Good job.{nl}I will take the Jewel of Prominence.
column3: Bagus.{nl}Aku akan mengambil Jewel of Prominence.

column2: Strange Sack
column3: Strange Sack

column2: Found a letter in the sack
column3: Ditemukan sepucuk surat di dalam kantong

column2: The letter in the sack
column3: The letter in the sack

column2: Receiver: Drasius{nl}Address: Virdului Mountain Cabin{nl}I am sending you the head of the Long-Branched Tree that you ordered.
column3: Receiver : Drashoes{nl}Address : Virdului Cabin{nl}Aku kirimkan pucuk pohon dengan cabang yang panjang sesuai dengan perintahmu.

column2: 400 years would have passed by the time this revelation reaches you. {nl}Thank you in advance for your continued pursuit of finding this revelation. {nl}
column3: 400 Tahun telah dilalului saat kamu menerima revelation ini. {nl} Terima kasih atas kerja kerasmu untuk menemukan revelation. . {nl}

column2: As I'm sure the demons will prey on the revelation, I will leave this revelation in the hands of {nl}Rimgaudas, the first Paladin. If you find this revelation, it would mean that he had done an {nl}excellent job in fulfilling his mission. {nl}
column3: Seperti yang telah aku bilang jika demon akan selalu memangsa revelation, Aku akan meninggalkan revelation ini pada Rimgaudis, Paladin pertama. {nl} Jika kamu menemukan revelation ini, Ini berarti dia telah menyelesaikan misi yang sangat penting. {nl}

column2: The demons have been chasing the revelation before I made this revelation. {nl}Gesti, the leader of the demons whom you have met is one of them. {nl}
column3: Para demon telah memburu revelation ini sebelum aku membuatnya. {nl} Gesti, demon yang pernah kamu temui itu adalah salah satunya. {nl}

column2: There are two Demon Kings and one Demon Queen with many Demon Lords to serve them.{nl}Giltine is the one that rules over them all.{nl}
column3: Tiga demon Kings dan demon leaders yang mengikuti mereka. {nl}Giltine adalah pemimpin mereka. {nl}

column2: All these catastrophes are her plans. {nl}The disasters will continue and at the end of it will be the end of the human race. {nl}
column3: Semua bencana di sini adalah hasil rencananya. {nl} Bencana terus menerus, dan akhir dari bencana ini adalah akhir dari kehidupan manusia. {nl}

column2: My ability to see all of this have made my existence threatening to them. {nl}That's why Giltine is attempting to send me back to the world's waters.
column3: Karena aku bisa melihat semua ini, penting bagiku untuk berada di sini. {nl}Itulah kenapa Giltine mencoba mengembalikanku. {nl}

column2: Also, they will extend their evil powers to the goddesses who go against their will. {nl}
column3: Mereka juga akan menambah kekuatan jahat mereka. {nl}

column2: Now disasters are happening just as I saw them to be. {nl}But it also means that hope, which I saw further away, will also definitely come. {nl}
column3: Tapi bencana terjadi ketika aku baru saja melihatnya. {nl}Dan ini berarti, harapan yang aku lihat juga akan segera datang. {nl}

column2: Dear Savior, our sister Saule is losing her light. {nl}Reach her light at the iridescent valley and you will be guided to the next revelation.
column3: Dear Savior, saudari kita Saule telah kehilangan cahayanya. {nl} Bawa kembali cahaya itu dari colorful valley dan kamu akan dibimbing menuju revelation berikutnya.

column2: Revelation of Crystal Mine
column3: Revelation of Crystal Mine

column2: Dear Savior, {nl}in order for me to regain my whole appearance and stop the demons, {nl}you must find all the revelations hidden in the axis of all times. {nl}
column3: Dear Savior, {nl} dalam rangka memulihkan kondisiku dan persiapan melawan para demon, {nl} kamu harus terus mencari semua revelation tersembunyi di seluruh penjuru dunia . {nl}

column2: But only you and I can save the world. {nl}I will wait for you in the high gardens.
column3: Tapi hanya aku dan engkau yang bisa menyelamatkan dunia. {nl} Aku akan menunggumu di highest gardens

column3: Knight Commander Uska mencari orang yang pergi ke Klaipeda karena mimpi Goddess. Temui Uska dan ceritakan tentang dream of Revelation.

column2: Knight Commander Uska is looking for people who came to Klaipeda after witnessing the dream of goddess. Meet Sir Uska and tell him about the Dream of Revelation.
column3: Knight Commander Uska is looking for people who came to Klaipeda for the dream of Goddess. Meet Uska and tell him about the dream of Revelation.

column3: Bicara pada Knight Aras

column3: Search scout bilang Vubbe Fighter ada di Nudegi Felled area dan harus menunggu pasukan lain. Kamu harus masuk ke Crystal Mine secepatnya, jadi sebaiknya kita mengalahkan Vubbe Fighter langsung.

column3: Kumpulkan batu sebagai bahan dari Memorial Stone pada High Crooked Road

column3: Stone Mason Piforty ingin mendirikan Memorial Stone untuk para penjelajah dan temannya yang mati di tempat ini. Bawakanlah batu yang ada di High Crooked Road.

column3: Kalahkan Achat dan dapatkan %s

column3: Beli peralatan stonemason di blacksmith kota Klaipeda

column3: Kamu telah mengumpulkan bahan-bahannya, kini butuh peralatannya. Beli peralatannya pada Blacksmith di kota Klaipeda.

column3: Berikan pada Stonemason Pipoti
