column3: Kalahkan Siaulago.

column2: Looks like Soldier Blak has something to say about the monsters that raided the warehous. Talk to him again.
column3: Soldier Blak punya sesuatu yang ingin disampaikan terkait monster yang menyerang gudang. Bicara lagi padanya.

column2: Give Soldier Blak's Report to Officer Liudas
column3: Sampaikan Soldier Blak's Report pada Officer Ludas

column2: Soldier Blak wants to give the report to Officer Liudas. Deliver the report to Officer Liudas in Central Supplies Camp.
column3: Soldier Blak ingin memberikan laporan pada Officer Ludas. Kirim laporannya pada Officer Ludas di Central Supplyes Camp.

column2: Talk to Soldier York
column3: Bicara pada Soldier York

column2: Soldier York is breathing heavily. Talk to him.
column3: Soldier York terlihat cemas. Bicara padanya.

column2: Defeat the Siaulamb Lagoon
column3: Kalahkan Siaulamb Lagoon

column2: Soldier York is frustated at the monsters crossing the line. Go to the 2nd supplies warehouse and defeat the Siaulamb Lagoons.
column3: Soldier York sedang pusing mikirin monster yang mengganggu. Pergilah ke 2nd Supplyes warehouse dan kalahkan Siaulamb Lagoons.

column2: Defeated the Siaulamb Lagoons. Tell Soldier York about it.
column3: Telah mengalahkan Siaulamb Lagoons. Laporkan pada Soldier York.

column2: Talk to Adjutant General Paulina
column3: Bicara pada Adjutant Polyna

column2: Adjutant General Paulina seems angry. Talk to him.
column3: Adjutant Polyna sepertinya sedang kesal, Bicara padanya.

column2: Retrieving the supplies stolen by the Siaulambs in each warehouse
column3: Mengambil suplai yang dicuri oleh Siaulambs di setiap warehouse

column2: Polyna states that the stolen supplies must be retrieved. Get back the supplies from the Siaulambs nearby each warehouse.
column3: Polyna mengatakan bahwa suplai harus diambil. Dapatkan kembali suplai dari Siaulambs terdekat masing-masing warehouse.

column2: Deliver to Adjutant General Paulina
column3: Kirimkan ke Polyna

column2: Retrieved much of the stolen supplies. Give it to Adjutant General Volda in Central Supplies Camp.
column3: Mengambil banyak suplai yang dicuri. Berikan keAdjutant Volda di Central Supplyes Camp.

column2: Collect %s from Siaulamb Shaman
column3: Kumpulkan %s dari Siaulamb Shaman

column2: Talk to Officer Luders
column3: Berbicara kepada Officer Ludas

column2: Ready to hunt Sparnas. Talk to Officer Luders.
column3: Bersiap untuk memburu Sparnas. Berbicara kepada Officer Ludas.

column2: Lure Sparnas in the last quarters.
column3: Pancing Sparnas di Last District.

column2: Officer Luders told you to lure Sparnas with bait and defeat it. Place the bait in Malkos Felled Area and defeat Sparnas when it appears.
column3: Ludas mengatakan untuk memancing Sparnas dengan umpan dan kalahkan dia. Taruh umpan di Malkos felled area dan kalahkan Sparnas ketika mereka muncul.

column2: Report to Officer Luders
column3: Lapor ke Ludas

column2: Successfully defeated Sparnas. Report back to Officer Liudas.
column3: Sukses mengalahkan Sparnas. Kembali dan lapor kepada Return and report to Officer Ludas.

column2: Defeat the lured Sparnas.
column3: Kalahkan Sparnas yang terpancing.

column2: Talk to Liaison Officer Niels
column3: Bicara kepada messenger Niels

column2: Arrived safely at the Gateway of the Great King. Find the person in charge.
column3: Tiba dengan selamat di Gateway of the Great King. Carilah orang yang berwenang.

column2: Find the missing archivist, Jonas.
column3: Cari Madman Recorder Jonas.

column2: Liaison Officer Niels is looking for an old man named Jonas. Be sure to bring him back when you find him.
column3: Messenger Niels sedang mencari pria tua yang bernama Jonas. Sebaiknya bawa dia ketika kamu menemukannya.

column2: Find Archivist Jonas
column3: Menemukan Recorder Jonas

column2: Talk to Archivist Jonas
column3: Berbicara kepada Jonas

column2: You were proven to be the right person by the Eye of the Great King. Talk to Archivist Jonas.
column3: Kamu terbukti sebagai orang yang tepat oleh Eye of the Great King. Berbicara kepada Jonas.

column2: Light the signal fire
column3: Nyalakan Sinyal Api

column2: Archivist Jonas wants to light up a signal fire to let the families know that the chosen one has come. Light up the signal at the top of the valley.
column3: Recorder Jonas ingin menyalakan sinyal agar keluarganya tahu yang terpelih telah datang. Nyalakan sinyal di puncak lembah.

column2: Return to Liaison Officer Niels at the Excavation Camp
column3: Kembali ke Messenger Niels di Research Camp

column2: Seems like the signal fire was lit well. Return to Niels at the Excavation Camp.
column3: Apinya menyala dengan baik. Kembali ke Niels di Research Camp.

column2: Archivist Jonas wasn't the only problem troubling Niels. Help Niels again.
column3: Recorder Jonas bukan satu-satunya masalah Niels. Bantu Niels.

column2: Find Mercenary Mirta
column3: Temukan Soldier Martha

column2: Niels is worried as he hasn't heard back from Historian Kepeck. {nl}Mercenary Mirta went to look for Kepek and he is also missing. {nl}Try to look for Mercenary Mirta first.
column3: Niels khawatir kehilangan kontak dengan Historian Kepeck. Soldier Martha pergi mencari Kepeck tapi dia juga menghilang. Pertama, coba temukan Soldier Martha.

column2: Found Mercenary Mirta but he looks injured. Ask him what happened.
column3: Historian Bierd terlihat serius. Mari kita coba berbicara dengan dia.

column2: Talk to Historian Viode
column3: Berbicara kepada Historian Bierd

column2: Historian Viode has a serious face. Try talking to him.
column3: Historian Bierd terlihat serius. Mari kita coba bicara kepadanya.

column2: Defeat the monsters attacking the camp
column3: Kalahkan monster yang menyerang camp.

column2: Monsters are attacking the camp. Defeat them.
column3: Monster menyerang camp. Kalahkan mereka.

column2: That was close. Talk to Viode who is hiding in a safe place.
column3: Hampir saja. Bicara kepada Bierd yang bersembunyi di tempat aman.

column2: Defeat the monsters that threaten the historian
column3: Kalahkan monster yang mengancam historian

column2: Talk to Historian Kepeck
column3: Berbicara kepada Historian Kepeck

column2: Looks like Historian Kepeck wants some help. Talk to Historian Kepeck again.
column3: Sepertinya Kepeck butuh bantuan. Bicara kepada Kepeck lagi.

column2: Record the artifact that Kepeck discovered
column3: Catat artefak yang Kepeck temukan

column2: Kepeck is somehow in a hurry and needs your help. Go and take an Artifact Record of the Royal Mausoleum at the right side of Apvija Hill.
column3: Kepeck terburu-buru dan butuh bantuanmu. Pergi dan ambil catatan artefak dari Royal Tomb di sisi kanan Apvija Hill.

column2: Successfully recorded the artifacts of Royal Mausoleum. Give it to Liaison Officer Niels.
column3: Sukses mengambil catatan artefak dari Royal Tomb. Berikan ke Messenger Niels.

column2: Defeat Ginklas
column3: Kalahkan Ginklas

column2: Talk to Soldier Alan
column3: Berbicara kepada Soldier Alan

column2: Soldier Alan is staring at you. Talk to him.
column3: Soldier Alan sedang menatapmu. Bicaralah kepadanya.

column2: Scout the upper area of Valdyti Vancant Lot
column3: Perikasa area atas dari Valdyti Vancant Lot

column2: Soldier Alan mistaken you as a new recruit. Anyhow, scout the northern area of the Valdyti Vacant Lot.
column3: Soldier Alan mengira anggota baru datang. Aneh, coba cek area utara dari Valdyti Vacant Lot.

column2: Report back to Soldier Alan
column3: Lapor kepada Soldier Alan

column2: Monsters appeared but you took care of them well. Return to Soldier Alan and report about it.
column3: Monster muncul tapi kamu mengurusnya dengan baik. Kembali ke Soldier Alan dan laporkan tentang itu.

column2: Soldier Alan says he remembered something terrible. Talk to him.
column3: Soldier Alan berkata dia ingat sesuatu yang mengerikan. Bicaralah dengannya.

column2: Deliver it to Commander Wallace
column3: Kirimkan ke Commander Wallace

column2: Soldier Alan wants you to deliver the report to Commander Wallace. Talk to Commander Wallace at Bird Footprint Junction.
column3: Alans ingin kamu mengirimkan laporan ke Commander Wallace. Bicaralah kepada Commander Wallace di Bird Footprint Crossroad.

column2: Talk to Commander Wallace
column3: Bicaralah kepada Commander Wallace

column2: Commander Wallace also thinks you are a new recruit. {nl}Talk to him.
column3: Commander Wallace juga mengira kamu anggota baru. Bicara kepada Commander Wallace.

column2: Get Kepa Raider Sap
column3: Dapatkan Kepa Raider Extract

column2: Commander Wallace asked you to gather materials needed for hunting Gaigalas. Collect Kepa Raider Sap from Kepa Raider at Bird Footstep Junction and Ianutis Waterfall.
column3: Commander Wallace memintamu untuk mengumpulkan bahan-bahan yang dibutuhkan untuk memburu Gaigalas. Kumpulkan Kepa Raider Extract dari Kepa Raider di Bird Footstep Crossroad dan Lanutis Falls.

column2: Collected the Kepa Raider Sap needed. Give them to Commander Wallace.
column3: Sudah mengumpulkan Kepa Raider Extracts. Berikan ke Commander Wallace.

column2: Talk to Soldier Weiz
column3: Berbicara kepada Soldier Weiz

column2: Soldier Weiz is getting ready for battle. Talk to him.
column3: Soldier Weiz sudah siap untuk pertempuran. Bicara kepadanya'.

column2: Collect Ducky Fat
column3: Kumpulkan Duckey Oil

column2: Weiz says he needs Ducky Fat to battle against Gaigalas. Defeat Duckys in Lengvas Garden and collect Ducky Fat.
column3: Weiz mengatakan dia butuh Ducky Oil untuk melawan Gaigalas. Kalahkan Ducky di Rangbas Garden dan kumpulkan Ducky Oil.

column2: Deliver them to Soldier Weiz
column3: Berikan ke Soldier Weiz

column2: Collected the Ducky Fat needed. Give them to Soldier Weiz.
column3: Sudah mengumpulkan Duckey Oil. Berikan ke Soldier Weiz.

column2: Defeat Ducky and obtain %s
column3: Kalahkan Ducky dan mendapat %s

column2: Talk to Commander Wallace to gather the next materials.
column3: Berbicara kepada Commander Wallace untuk mengumpulkan bahan selanjutnya.

column2: Collect Cronewt Leather
column3: Kumpulkan Cronewt Leather

column2: The next material needed in order to defeat Gaigalas is Cronewt Leather. Collect Cronewt Leather from the Cronewt in Lengvas Garden.
column3: Bahan berikutnya dibutuhkan untuk mengalahkan Gaigalas adalah  Cronewt Leather. Kumpulkan Cronewt Leather dari Cronewt di Langbas Garden.

column2: Collected the Cronewt Leather needed. Give them to Commander Wallace.
column3: Sudah mengumpulkan Cronewt Leather. Berikan ke Commander Wallace.

column2: Defeat Cronewt and obtain %s
column3: Kalahkan Cronewt dan mendapat %s

column2: Soldier Weiz feels like hunting Gaigalas quickly. Talk to Weiz again.
column3: Soldier Weiz ingin memburu Gaigalas dengan cepat. Bicara kepada Weiz lagi.

column2: Light fire in the marked area
column3: Nyalakan api di area yang ditandai'

column2: Weiz says Gaigalas will appear when it smells the Ducky Fat burning. Light fire to burn the Ducky Fat in an airy area in Lengvas Garden.
column3: Weiz berkata Gaigalas akan muncul ketika mencium aroma Duckey Oil yang terbakar. Nyalakan api dan bakar Duckey Oil di area berangin dari Langbas Garden.

column2: Report to Soldier Weiz
column3: Lapor ke Soldier Weiz

column2: You burned the Ducky Fat and Gaigalas appeared. Quickly return to Weiz and let him know that Gaigalas appeared.
column3: Kamu telah membakar Duckey Oil dan Gaigalas muncul. Cepat kembali ke Weiz dan biarkan dia tahu bahwa Gaigalas muncul.

column2: Talk to the Old Owl Sculpture
column3: Berbicara kepada Old Owl Statue

column2: During the battle with Gaigalas, the Owl Sculpture was looking at you strangely. Talk to the Old Owl Sculpture.
column3: Ketika pertempuran dengan Gaigalas berlangsung, dan owl statue melihat ke arahmu dengan aneh. Bicara kepada Old Owl Statue.

column2: Collect Infro Holder's Horn
column3: Kumpulkan Infro Holder's Horn

column2: The Old Owl Sculpture says you can't defeat Gaigalas fighting the way you did. Gather Infro Holder's horn to make a Memory Fragment.
column3: The Old Owl Statue berkata kamu tidak bisa mengalahkan Gaigalas jika kamu seperti itu. Kumpulkan Infro Holder's Horn untuk membuat fragmen memori.

column2: Deliver it to the Old Owl Sculpture
column3: Berikan ke Old Owl Statue

column2: Collected the Infro Holder's Horn needed. Give them to Old Owl Sculpture.
column3: Mengumpulkan Infro Holder's Horn. Berikan ke Old Owl Statue.

column2: Defeat Infro Holder and obtain %s
column3: Mengalahkan Infro Holder dan mendapat %s

column2: Defeat Infro Holder
column3: Kalahkan Infro Holder

column2: The Old Owl Sculpture seems to have sensed something and is tilting its head. Talk to the Owl Sculpture.
column3: Old Owl Seems to have sensed something and is tilting its head. Talk to the Owl Statue.

column2: The Old Owl Sculpture showed you a scene from the past where soldiers who tried hunting Gaigalas were wiped out. Talk to the Owl Sculpture.
column3: Old Owl Statue memperlihatkan kepadamu sebuah pemandagan dimasa lalu ketika soldier mencoba memburu Gaigalas dikalahkan. Bicara kepada Owl Statue.

column2: Talk to the Worrying Owl Sculpture.
column3: Berbicara kepada Worrying Owl Statue.

column2: Heed the words of the Old Owl Sculpture and bring the Memory Fragment to the Worrying Owl Sculpture at Bandyma Crossroad.
column3: Lakukan seperti yang dikatakan Old Owl Statue dan bawa fragment of memory ke Worrying Owl Statue di Bandyma Crossroad.

column2: Awaken the Memories of the Sleeping Owl Sculptures
column3: Membangkitkan memori dari Sleeping Owl Statue

column2: In order to defeat Gaigalas, you need power of the Owl Sculptures that fell asleep without completing their magic. Awaken the memories of the Sleeping Owl Sculptures to complete the magic that will weaken Gaigalas.
column3: Untuk mengalahkan Gaigalas, kamu butuh kekuatan Owl Statue yang tertidur sebelum menyelesaikan sihirnya. Membangunkan memori dari Sleeping Owl Statue dan selesaikan sihir yang akan melemahkan Gaigalas.

column2: Report to the Worrying Owl Sculpture
column3: Lapor ke Worrying Owl Statue

column2: Completed the magic that will weaken Gaigalas. Return and tell it to the Worrying Owl Sculpture.
column3: Menyelesaikan sihir yang akan melemahkan Gaigalas. Kembali dan bilang kepada Worrying Owl Statue.

column2: Summon and Defeat Gaigalas
column3: Summon dan kalahkan Gaigalas

column2: Completed the magic that will weaken Gaigalas. Summon Gaigalas and defeat it.
column3: Meyelesaikan sihir yang akan melemahkan Gaigalas. Summon Gaigalas dan kalahkan dia.

column2: Defeat Gaigalas at Ishimtini Access Way
column3: Kalahkan Gaigalas di Ishimtini Entrance

column2: Completed the magic that will weaken Gaigalas. Defeat Gaigalas at Ishimtini Access Way.
column3: Menyelesaikan sihir yang akan melemahkan Gaigalas. Kalahkan Gaigalas di Ishimtini Entrance.

column2: Talk to Archaeologist Dezic
column3: Berbicara kepada Archaeologist Dezik

column2: Archaeologist Dezic looks anxious. Talk to him.
column3: Archaeologist Dezik terlihat cemas. Bicaralah kepadanya.

column2: Defeat the nearby monsters for Archaeologist Dezic
column3: Kalahkan monster didekat Archaeologist Dezik

column2: Dezic asked for your help in getting rid of the monsters nearby so that he can go look for his assistant Airine.
column3: Dezik memintamu untuk menolongnya mengalahkan monster didekatnya sehingga dia bisa pergi mencari asistennya Irine.

column2: This will be safe enough for Dezic to go to the soldiers. Return to Dezic.
column3: Ini akan cukup aman bagi Dezik untuk pergi ke soldier. Kembali ke Dezik.

column2: Talk to Technician Heinen
column3: Berbicara kepada Technician Heinen

column2: You need to use the cable car to go over to the Radas Fork Road easily. Talk to Technician Heinen to use the cable car.
column3: Kamu harus menggunakan gondola untuk menyeberangi Radas Fork Road dengan mudah. Bicaralah kepada Technician Heinen untuk menggunakan gondola.

column2: Defeat the monsters around the cable car
column3: Kalahkan monster disekitar gondola

column2: Heinen says he'll let you use the cable car once if you defeat the monsters nearby. Defeat the monsters for Heinen.
column3: Heinen berkata dia akan membiarkanmu menggunakan gondola sekali jika kamu mengalahkan monster yang ada didekatnya. Kalahkan monster untuk Heinen.

column2: Talk to Technician Heinen
column3: Berbicara kepada Techinician Heinen

column2: Looks like the monsters are cleared enough. Talk to Heinen.
column3: Sepertinya monster sudah cukup dikalahkan. Bicaralah kepada Heinen.

column2: Defeat the monsters threatening the cable car
column3: Kalahkan monter yang mengancam gondola

column2: You completed Heinen's favor and can now use the cable car. Talk to Heinen again.
column3: Kamu telah menolong Heine dan kamu bisa menggunakan gondola. Bicaralah kepada Heinen lagi.

column2: Destroy the Western Barrier at Nutoles  Cliff
column3: Hancurkan West Barrier di Nuotori Cliff

column2: Heinen seems impressed by your abilities. Heinen says that the source of monsters is the west barrier at Nutoles  Cliff and will allow you to use the cable car freely if you destroy the barrier.
column3: Heinen terlihat terkesan dengan kemampuanmu. Asal monster dari West Barrier di Nuotori Cliff dan Heinen berkata kamu bisa menggunakan gondola sesukamu jika kamu menghancurkan barrier itu.

column2: You destroyed the western barrier as requested by Heinen. Talk to Heinen to use the cable car.
column3: Kamu telah menghancurkan Western Barrier seperti yang diminta oleh Heinen. Bicaralah kepada Heinen untuk menggunakan gondola.

column2: Destroy the West Barrier
column3: Hancurkan West Barrier

column2: Archaeologist Dezic is desperately looking for someone. Try talking to him.
column3: Archeologist Dezik sangat butuh bantuan. Temui Dezik kembali.

column2: Talk to Archaeologist Dezic.
column3: Berbicara kepada Archeologist Dezik

column2: Archaeologist Dezic informed you that Airine is imprisoned with barriers in Rodoma 2nd Ruins. You must hurry and find her.
column3: Archeologist Dezik mengatakan bahwa Irene sedang dipenjara dalam Barrier Device di Rodoma 1st Archeologist Site.

column2: Talk to Assistant Airine
column3: Bicara pada Assistant Irene.

column2: You found Assistant Airine. Get to her cautiously to avoid the monsters harming her.
column3: Kamu menemukan Assistant Irene. Bawa dia perlahan untuk menghindari serangan monster padanya.

column2: Talk to Airine
column3: Bicara pada Irene

column2: Airine can't move since she is binded to three barriers. Talk to Airine.
column3: Irene tidak bisa bergerak karena diikat ke Barrier Device. Bicara pada Irene.

column2: Remove the barriers from Airine
column3: Singkirkan Barrier Device dari Irene

column2: Remove all the barriers from Airine. The three barriers are at the west, east, and north side of the site.
column3: Singkirkan semua barrier dari Irene. Ada tiga barrier berada di sisi barat, timur dan utara.

column2: Removed all the barriers. Check if Airine is okay.
column3: Singkirkan semua barrier. Periksa jika Irene baik-baik saja.

column2: Talk to Mercenary Glen
column3: Berbicara kepada Mercenary Glen

column2: Glen needs your help.
column3: Glen butuh bantuanmu.

column2: Defeat Sauga and find clues about the disappearances
column3: Temukan petunjuk orang hilang dengan mengalahkan Sauga

column2: Mercenary Glen seems troubled about the disappearances that have been occurring lately. Check if there are some clues in the items that you will obtain after defeating Sauga.
column3: Mercenary Glen sepertinya peduli dengan tragedi kehilangan akhir-akhir ini. Periksa jika ada petunjuk pada item yang akan kamu dapatkan setelah mengalahkan Sauga.

column2: The items that came out from Sauga's pockets seem useless. Talk to Glen again.
column3: Item dari kantong Sauga sepertinya tidak berguna. Bicara pada Glen lagi.

column2: Fortunately, the items don't belong to Airine. Talk to Glen again.
column3: Untungnya, item itu bukan milik Irene. Bicara pada Glen lagi.

column2: Defeat the monsters on the way to Rodoma Ruin.
column3: Kalahkan monster dalam perjalanan ke Rodoma Archeological Site.

column2: Glen asked you to defeat the monsters that turned violent since no one knows what will happen in the future. Defeat the monsters that are on the way to Rodoma 1st Ruins.
column3: Glen memintamu untuk mengalahkan monster yang mengganas karena tidak ada yang tahu masa depan. Kalahkan monster yang berada dalam perjalanan ke Rodomo 1st Archeological Site.

column2: It should be safe now that you defeated all the violent monsters. Talk to Glen again.
column3: Menjadi lebih aman karena kamu telah mengalahkan monster yang mengganas. Bicara pada Glen lagi.

column2: Defeat Ticens and Tucens
column3: Kalahkan Ticen dan Tucen

column2: Assistant Airine seems alright. Talk to Airine again.
column3: Assistant Irene sepertinya baik-baik saja. Bicara pada Irene lagi.

column2: Protect Airine from the monsters
column3: Lindungi Irene dari monster

column2: Airine told you that she got into this mess while chasing a boy. As a thought, who would do something like this? Anyways, protect Airine since monsters are coming.
column3: Irene memberitahumu bahwa ia mengalami kecelakaan ketika sedang mengikuti seseorang. Siapa yang melakukan ini? Lindungi Irene karena monster berdatangan.

column2: Airine seems alright. Talk to Airine again.
column3: Irene sepertinya baik-baik saja. Bicara pada Irene lagi.

column2: Talk to Airine. She is trembling.
column3: Bicara pada Irene. Dia gemetar.

column2: Report back to Dezic
column3: Kembali ke Dezik lagi.

column2: Airine returned to Dezic. Return to Dezic to check whether she returned safely.
column3: Irene kembali pada Dezik. Periksa jika Irene kembali ke Dezik dengan selamat.

column2: Dezic collapsed from Scorpio's attacks! Talk to Assistant Airine again.
column3: Dezik pingsan setelah terkena serangan Scorpio! Bicara pada Assistant Irene lagi.

column2: Defeat Scorpio
column3: Kalahkan Scorpio

column2: Talk to the New Researcher in the Royal Mausoleum
column3: Bicara pada New Researcher di Royal Tomb

column2: The New Researcher seems to be in trouble. You better help him.
column3: New Researcher sepertinya dalam masalah. Mungkin kamu harus menolongnya.

column2: Find the lost research documents.
column3: Temukan dokumen research yang hilang

column2: The New Researcher told you that he lost his research documents and reports at the Abandoned Old Workshop. Pino, Geppetto and Tontus may be hanging around there.
column3: New Researcher memberitahumu bahwa ia menghilangkan semua research document dan laporan di  Abandoned Old Workshop. Pino, Geppetto dan Tontus mungkin menunggumu di sana.

column2: Return to the New Researcher
column3: Kembali ke New Researcher

column2: It seems that you collected all the documents that the New Researcher mentioned. Return to the New Researcher.
column3: Sepertinya kamu telah mengumpulkan semua dokumen yang New Researcher sebutkan. Temui lagi New Researcher.

column2: Defeat Pino, Geppetto or Tontus and obtain %s
column3: Mengalahkan Pino, Geppetto dan Tontus dan mendapatkan %s

column2: Retrieve the lost research documents after defeating Pino, Geppetto and Tontus
column3: Mendapatkan research document yang hilang setelah mengalahkan Pino, Geppetto dan Tontus

column2: Look for the old research reports
column3: Cari old research report

column2: The New Researcher told you that he lost his research documents and reports at the Abandoned Old Workshop. Geppetto may be amusing itself with them by now.
column3: New Researcher memberitahumu bahwa ia menghilangkan semua research document dan laporan di Abandoned Old Workshop. Geppetto mungkin berada di sana.

column2: It seems that you collected all the documents that the New Researcher mentioned. Return to the New Researcher.
column3: Sepertinya kamu telah mengumpulkan semua dokumen yang New Researcher sebutkan. Temui lagi New Researcher.

column2: Obtain %s by defeating Geppetto at the Abandoned Old Workshop
column3: Mendapatkan %s dengan mengalahkan Geppetto di Old Abandoned Workshop

column2: Obtain the research report by defeating Geppetto
column3: Mendapatkan research report dengan mengalahkan Geppetto

column2: Torn Research Record
column3: Ripped Research Records

column2: Records
column3: Collect

column2: The New Researcher told you that he lost his research documents and reports at the Abandoned Old Workshop. Tontus may be amusing itself with them by now.
column3: New Researcher memberitahumu bahwa ia menghilangkan semua research document dan laporan di Abandoned Old Workshop. Tontus mungkin berada di sana.

column2: Obtain %s by defeating Tontus at Dulkiu Hill
column3: Mendapatkan %s dengan mengalahkan Tontus di Dulkiu Hill

column2: Obtain Ripped research Records by defeating Tontus
column3: Mendapatkan Ripped Research Record dengan mengalahkan Tontus

column2: Talk to the New Researcher
column3: Bicara pada New Researcher

column2: Move to the Records Repository
column3: Pindah ke Records Repository

column2: Move to the Records Repository which the New Researcher told you about
column3: Pindah ke Records Repository yang New Researcher katakan padamu

column2: It seems that Archivist Jonas went up to Dulkiu Hill. Persuade him to go back since it is dangerous.
column3: Sepertinya Archivist Jonas pergi ke Dulkiu Hill. Ajak dia kembali karena di sana berbahaya.

column2: Protect Archivist Jonas.
column3: Lindungi Archivist Jonas

column2: You were attacked by monsters while you were persuading Jonas. Protect Jonas from the monsters.
column3: Kamu diserang oleh monster ketika mengajak Jonas. Lindungi Jonas dari monster.

column2: It seems that you defeated all the attacking monsters, and Archivist Jonas regained his conscious. Try persuading Jonas again to go back to camp with you and meet Niels.
column3: Sepertinya kamu telah mengalahkan semua monster yang menyerang dan Archivist Jonas telah sadar. Ayo ajak Archivist Jonas kembali ke camp dan temui Niels.

column2: Talk to Niels
column3: Bicara pada Niels

column2: You should retrieve the records which Jonas gave to Niels. Talk to Niels.
column3: Kamu harus mendapatkan record yang Jonas berikan pada Niels. Bicara pada Niels.

column2: Talk to Merchant Davio
column3: Berbicara kepada Merchant Davio

column2: Talk to Davio and ask for a medicine that can regain Jonas' conscious.
column3: Berbicara kepada Davio dan dapatkan medicine untuk mengembalikan kesadaran Jonas.

column2: Bring the reports Jonas requested and find a way to feed the medicine to Jonas.
column3: Bawakan laporan yang Jonas minta dan temukan cara untuk memberikan obat ini ke Jonas.

column2: Defeat the monster that is disturbing Jonas' guidance.
column3: Kalahkan monster yang mengganggu bimbingan Jonas.

column2: Archivist Jonas seem to have finally regained his conscious. Jonas told you to follow him as there is a task that you are qualified to do. In order for Jonas to guide you safely to Beacon Hill Pass, defeat monsters along the way.
column3: Archivist Jonas akhirnya sadarkan diri. Jonas menyuruhmu untuk mengikutinya karena ada tugas untuk yang terpilih. Dengan arahan Jonas, kalahkan monster untuknya.

column2: It seems that you have successfully arrived at the destination with Archivist Jonas. Talk to Jonas.
column3: Sepertinya kamu telah sampai dengan Archivist Jonas. Bicara pada Jonas.

column2: Talk to Gorath
column3: Bicara pada Gorath

column2: You made Badat to return safely. Talk to Gorath about it.
column3: Kamu berhasil mengembalikan Badat dengan selamat. Bicaralah dengan Gorath.

column2: Defeat Molich
column3: Kalahkan Molich

column2: We don't know where Molich chased after us from, but let's defeat it first!
column3: Kita tidak tahu dari mana Molich mengejar, tapi ayo kita kalahkan dulu!

column2: You have defeated Molich. Talk to Gorath again.
column3: Kamu telah mengalahkan Molich. Bicara pada Gorath lagi.

column2: Defeat Molich
column3: Mengalahkan Molich.

column2: It seems that Jonas' conscious is coming back to him. Talk to him.
column3: Sepertinya Jonas mengingat kenangannya. Bicara padanya.

column2: Observe the Eyes of the Great King besides the Archivist Jonas.
column3: Observasi Eyes of the Great King di samping Archivist Jonas.

column2: Archivist Jonas is asking you to prove that you are qualified for his task by using the Eyes of the Great King.
column3: Archivist Jonas memintamu untuk membuktikan bahwa dirimu berkualitas dengan menggunakan Eyes of the Great King.

column2: The Eyes of the Great King have responded. Talk to Archivist Jonas.
column3: Eyes of the Great King merespon. Bicara pada Jonas.

column2: Talk to the Medicine Dealer
column3: Bicara pada Herb Merchant

column2: Merchant Davio told you that he needs one more herb to complete the medicine, but he already sent off the Medicine Dealer to get the herb. Meet the Medicine Dealer at Kapas Highway.
column3: Merchant Davio memberitahumu bahwa ia membutuhkan satu herb lagi untuk menyelesaikan obatnya, tapi sudah dikirim oleh Herb Merchant. Temui Herb Merchant di Kapas Highway.

column2: Collect Canyon Metos
column3: Kumpulkan Canyon Metos

column2: The Medicine Dealer told you that all other ingredients is ready, except for Canyon Metos. Collect Canyon Metoses in Metos Field in order to complete the medicine that will bring back Jonas' conscious.
column3: Herb Merchant memberitahumu bahwa semua ingredient telah siap, kecuali Canyon Metos. Dapatkan Canyon Metos di Metos Field yang akan mengembalikan ingatan Jonas.

column2: You have enough Canyon Metos. Return to the Medicine Dealer and complete the medicine that will bring back Jonas' conscious.
column3: Kamu telah memiliki cukup Canyon Metos. Kembali ke Herb Merchant dan selesaikan obat yang akan mengembalikan ingatan Jonas.

column2: Niels asked Merchant Davio for a medicine that can bring back Jonas' conscious. Retrieve the medicine from Davio.
column3: Niels meminta kepada Davio sebuah obat yang dapat mengembalikan ingatan Jonas. Dapatkan obat dari Davio.

column2: Collect Golden Pieces from Lichenclops
column3: Kumpulkan Golden Pieces dari Lichenclops

column2: Davio is asking for extra charges since it took him a long time to get the medicine for Jonas. Davio will be satisfied if you give him Golden Pieces from Lichenclops.
column3: Davio meminta biaya extra karena butuh waktu lama mendapatkan obat untuk Jonas. Davio akan senang jika kamu memberikan Golden Pieces dari Lichenclops.

column2: You have collected enough Golden Pieces. Return to the Medicine Dealer.
column3: Kamu telah mengumpulkan cukup Golden Pieces. Kembali ke Herb Merchant.

column2: Obtain %s by defeating Lichenclops
column3: Mendapatkan %s dengan mengalahkan Lichenclops

column2: Collect Golden Pieces.
column3: Mengumpulkan Golden Pieces dari Lichenclops

column2: Return to Davio to complete the medicine
column3: Kembali ke Davio untuk menyelesaikan obat

column2: Return to Jonas and give him the records. Make sure he takes the medicine that Davio gave to you.
column3: Kembali ke Jonas dan berikan ia recordnya. Pastikan ia meminum obat yang Davio berikan padamu.

column2: Return to Jonas and give him the records. Make sure he takes the medicine that Davio gave to you. Jonas is probably at the Abandoned Old Workshop.
column3: Kembali ke Jonas dan berikan ia recordnya. Pastikan ia meminum obat yang Davio berikan padamu. Jonas mungkin berada di Abandoned Old Workshop.

column2: Talk to Mercenary Mirta
column3: Bicara pada Mercenary Mirta

column2: Mirta seems to be severely injured. Ask him why he is injured and where the materials to be sent to Kepeck are.
column3: Mirta tampak terluka parah. Tanyakan padanya kenapa ia terluka dan dimana material untuk dikirim ke Kepeck.

column2: Retrieve the materials to be sent to Kepeck.
column3: Mendapatkan material yang akan dikirim ke Kepeck

column2: Mercenary Mirta says that he lost the materials from monsters' attacks. Retrieve the materials and send them to Kepeck on behalf of Mirta.
column3: Mercenary Mirta berkata bahwa ia kehilangan semua material karena serangan monster. Dapatkan material dan kirim ke Kepeck atas nama Mirta.

column2: Find Historian Kepeck at Apvija Hill
column3: Temukan Historian Kepeck di Apvija Hills

column2: It seems that you retrieved most of the materials. Give them to the Historian Kepeck at Apvija Hill.
column3: Sepertinya kamu telah mendapatkan semua material. Berikan pada Historian Kepeck di Apvija Hill.

column2: Talk to Vaidotas in the Mine
column3: Bicara pada Vaitodas di Mine

column2: Enter the Crystal Mine and talk to Vaidotas.
column3: Masuk ke Crystal Mine dan bicara pada Vaidotas.

column2: Repair the Purifiers on 1F
column3: Perbaiki Purifier di 1st Floor

column2: Repair all the Purifiers on the 1st floor. Some are easy to repair, while others that are more difficult to repair will need the use of the compass Vaidotas gave you.
column3: Perbaiki semua Purifier di 1st Floor. Beberapa mudah diperbaiki tapi beberapa membutuhkan compass yang Vaidotas berikan.

column2: Inspect the Entrance Purifier on the 1st Floor
column3: Periksa Entrance Purifier di 1st Floor

column2: The Purifiers in the Crystal Mine are not working and toxic fumes are present. Activate the Purifiers to clean the air.
column3: Purifier di Crystal Mine tidak berjalan dan kamu bisa mencium bau racun. Aktifkan Purifier untuk membersihkan udara.

column2: Search for Purifier Parts on the floor
column3: Cari Purifer Part di lantai

column2: Check the floor. You need to find missing parts for the Purifier.
column3: Periksa di lantai. Kamu harus mencari part Purifier yang hilang.

column2: Assemble the Entrance Purifier on the 1st Floor
column3: Menggabungkan Entrance Purifier di 1st Floor

column2: You found a part for the Entrance Purifier. Assemble it to the Purifier.
column3: Kamu menemukan bagian Entrance Purifier. Gabungkan ke Purifier.

column2: Find %s on the floor
column3: Menemukan %s di lantai

column2: Retrieve Purifier Parts
column3: Mendapatkan Purifier Part

column2: Retrieve Purifier Parts from the Vubbe with a question mark on its head.
column3: Mendapatkan Purifier Part dari Vubbe dengan tKamu tanya di kepala.

column2: Repair the Entrance Purifier on 1F
column3: Memperbaiki Entrance Purifier di lantai 1

column2: Found the missing parts of the Entrance Purifier. Try to assemble and activate it.
column3: Temukan part Entrance Purifier yang hilang. Coba gabungkan dan aktifkan.

column2: Search for Purifier parts on the floor
column3: Cari Purifier part di lantai

column2: Repair the Purifiers on 2F
column3: Perbaiki Purifier di lantai 2

column2: Repair all the Purifiers on 2F
column3: Perbaiki semua Purifier di lantai 2

column2: Inspect the Central Purifier
column3: Periksa Central Purifier

column2: The Mine Compass is pointing towards the Central Purifier on 1F. Inspect the purifier.
column3: Mine Compass menunjuk pada Central Purifier di lantai 1. Periksa purifier.

column2: Use the Mine Compass
column3: Gunakan Mine Compass

column2: Use the Mine Compass to find the Spare Purifier located somewhere on 1F.
column3: Gunakan Mine Compass untuk menemukan Spare Purifier yang berada di suatu tempat di lantai 1.

column2: Search District 4 for the Spare Purifier
column3: Cari Spare Purifier di District 4

column2: The Mine Compass is pointing towards District 4. Follow its lead and find the Spare Purifier that can be used to repair the Purifier.
column3: Mine Compass menunjuk ke District 4. Ikuti dan temukan Spare Purifier yang bisa digunakan untuk memperbaiki Purifier.

column2: Get parts from the Spare Purifier in{nl}District 4
column3: Dapatkan part dari Spare Purifier di District 4.

column2: Get the replacement parts from the Spare Purifier
column3: Dapatkan part pengganti dari Spare Purifier.

column2: Obtained spare parts for the Central Purifier. Replace the parts of the Purifier.
column3: Mendapatkan spare part untuk Central Purifier. Ganti part Purifier.

column2: Defeat Cyclops in the Crystal Mine
column3: Kalahkan Cyclops di Crystal Mine

column2: Cyclops is rampaging in the Crystal Mine. Defeat Cyclops.
column3: Cyclops mengamuk di Crystal Mine. Kalahkan Cyclops.

column2: Defeat Cyclops
column3: Kalahkan Cyclops

column2: Inspect the Passage Purifier on 1F
column3: Periksa Passage Purifier di lantai 1

column2: There is a problem with the purifier on the path to Crystal Mine 2F. Go and inspect it.
column3: Ada masalah dengan purifier di jalur Crystal Mine 2nd Floor. Pergi dan periksa.

column2: Use the Mine Compass to find the parts needed to repair the purifier.
column3: Gunakan Mine Compass untuk menemukan part untuk memperbaiki purifier.

column2: Search District 6 for Purifier Parts
column3: Cari Purifier Part di District 6

column2: The Mine Compass is pointing towards District 6. Follow it and find parts to repair the purifier.
column3: Mine Compass menunjuk pada District 6. Ikuti dan temukan part untuk memperbaiki purifier.

column2: Retrieve %s from Specter Monarch
column3: Mendapatkan  %s dari Specter Monarch

column2: Repair the Passage Purifier on 1F
column3: Perbaiki Passage Purifier di lantai 1

column2: Found the parts needed to repair the Passage Purifier. Try to assemble and activate it.
column3: Temukan part untuk memperbaiki Passage Purifier. Coba gabungkan dan aktifkan.

column2: Inspect the Circulation Purifier
column3: Periksa Circulation Purifier

column2: The Circulation Purifier on the 2nd Floor is not working. Figure out what the problem is.
column3: Circulation Purifier di lantai 2 tidak bekerja. Temukan masalahnya.

column2: Repair the Purifier Pipe
column3: Perbaiki Purifier Pipe

column2: The Circulation Purifier is unable to absorb the toxic fumes. Examine the purifier in District 3 and fix it.
column3: Circulation Purifier tidak mampu menghisap asap racun. Periksa purifier di District 3 dan perbaiki.

column2: Inspect the Circulation Purifier
column3: Periksa Circulation Purifier

column2: The Purifier in District 3 seems to be working properly now. Try activating the Circulation Purifier again.
column3: Purifier di District 3 sudah bekerja. Coba aktifkan Circulation Purifier lagi.

column2: Inspect the Purifier Pipe in District 2
column3: Periksa Purifier Pipe di District 2

column2: Check if the Purifier Pipe in District 2 is functioning properly.
column3: Periksa apakah  Purifier Piper di lantai 2 bekerja dengan baik.

column2: Defeat Carapace
column3: Kalahkan Carapace

column2: Activate the Circulation Purifier
column3: Aktifkan Circulation Purifier

column2: All Purifier Pipes seems to be working properly. Activate the Circulation Purifier.
column3: Semua Purifier Pipes bekerja dengan baik. Aktifkan Circulation Purifier.

column2: Inspect the Auxiliary Purifier on 2F
column3: Periksa Auxiliary Purifier di lantai 2

column2: The Auxiliary Purifier on the 2nd Floor is halted. Find out why it is halted.
column3: Auxiliary Purifier di lantai 2 berhenti bekerja. Cari tahu kenapa itu terjadi.

column2: Use the Mine Compass
column3: Gunakan Mine Compass

column2: Use the Mine Compass to check what you need to fix the Auxiliary Purifier.
column3: Gunakan Mine Compass untuk memeriksa apa yang kamu butuhkan untuk memperbaiki Auxiliary Purifier.

column2: Inspect the Magic Supply Device
column3: Periksa Magic Supply Device

column2: The Mine Compass is pointing towards the Magic Supply Device in District 4. Check what the problem is.
column3: Mine Compass menunjuk pada Magic Supply Device di Distrik 4. Periksa apa masalahnya.

column2: Use the Mine Compass to check what you need to fix the Auxiliary Purifier.
column3: Gunakan Mine Compass untuk memeriksa apa yang kamu butuhkan untuk memperbaiki Auxiliary Purifier.

column2: Search for tools to remove rust
column3: Cari tool untuk menghilangkan karat

column2: Follow the lead of the Mine Compass and find a way to remove the rust.
column3: Ikuti Mine Compass untuk menemukan cara menghapus karat.

column2: Restore the Magic Supply Device in District 4
column3: Perbaiki Magic Supply Device di Distrik 4

column2: Seems like you can fix the Magic Supply Device in District 4 with lubricant.
column3: Sepertinya kamu bisa memperbaiki Magic Supply Device di Distrik 4 dengan pelumas.

column2: Activate the Auxiliary Purifier on 2F
column3: Aktifkan Auxiliary Purifier di lantai 2

column2: The Magic Supply Device seems to be working well. Activate the Auxiliary Purifier.
column3: Sepertinya Magic Supply Device bekerja dengan baik. Aktifkan Auxiliary Purifier.

column2: Check the Main Purifier
column3: Periksa Main Purifier

column2: The Main Purifier is not working. Go and inspect it.
column3: Main Purifier tidak bekerja. Pergi dan periksalah.

column2: Use the Mine Compass to locate the missing parts of the purifier
column3: Gunakan Mine Compass untuk mengetahui lokasi part hilang

column2: Use the Mine compass to find the parts of that were purifier destroyed and scattered.
column3: Gunakan Mine Compass untuk menemukan part purifier yang hancur dan berserakan.

column2: Retrieve the torn Purifier Pipes
column3: Dapatkan Torn Purifier Pipes

column2: Find and retrieve the Purifier Pipe that is somewhere on the way to District 7.
column3: Dapatkan Purifier Pipe di perjalanan menuju District 7

column2: Retrieve %s
column3: Mendapatkan %s

column2: Use the Mine Compass to find the parts of the Main Purifier that were destroyed and scattered by monsters.
column3: Gunakan Mine Compass untuk menemukan part dari Main Purifier yang hancur dan berserakan.

column2: Search District 6 for parts
column3: Cari part di Distrik 6

column2: The compass is pointing towards District 6. Look for parts in District 6.
column3: Compass menunjuk ke Distrik 6. Cari part di Distrik 6.

column2: Fix the Main Purifier
column3: Perbaikin Main Purifier

column2: You defeated the Stone Whale and got the parts. Return to the Main Purifier and fix it.
column3: Kamu mengalahkan Stone Whale dan mendapatkan part. Kembali ke Main Purifier dan perbaiki.

column2: Defeat the Stone Whale
column3: Kalahkan Stone Whale

column2: You defeated the Stone Whale and got the parts. Return to the Main Purifier, repair it and then activate it.
column3: Kamu mengalahkan Stone Whale dan mendapatkan part. Kembali ke Main Purifier dan aktifkan setelah diperbaiki.

column2: Talk to Ahylas Jonas
column3: Bicara pada Ahylas Jonas

column2: You should listen to Ahylas Jonas on how to use the Seal Release Crystal to access the Great King's inheritance.
column3: Kamu harus mendengarkan Ahylas Jonas cara menggunakan  Seal Release Crystal yang akan memberikanmu akses ke warisan the Great King.

column2: Talk to the Disciple of Gustas to learn how to release the seal
column3: Bicara pada Disciple of Gustas cara melepas seal

column2: Before you unleash the important seal at the Broken Pole, it will be better to talk with the Disciple of Gustas.
column3: Sebelum melepas seal penting di Broken Pole, akan lebih baik untuk bicara pada Disciple of Gustas.

column2: Talk to the Disciple of Gustas
column3: Bicara pada Disciple of Gustas

column2: You have unleashed the seal of Pasagos Cliff. Return to the 2nd Disciple of Gustas.
column3: Kamu telah melepas seal of Pasaga Cliff. Kembali ke 2nd Disciple of Gustas.

column2: Examine the rock.
column3: Periksa batu itu.

column2: Something is hidden behind the rock.  Go and examine it closely.
column3: Sesuatu tersembunyi di balik batu. Pergi dan periksa dengan teliti.

column2: Defeat Iltiswort
column3: Kalahkan Iltiswort

column2: Iltiswort appeared after you touched the rock. Defeat it.
column3: Iltiswort muncul setelah kamu menyentuh batunya. Kalahkan dia

column2: There are still many seals left before you go to the sanctum that will lead you to the inheritance of Zachariel. Talk to the 2nd Disciple of Gustas about the seal.
column3: Masih banyak seal tersisa sebelum kamu pergi ke sanctum yang akan mengarahkanmu ke harta warisan Zachariel. Bicara pada 2nd Disciple of Gustas tentang seal.

column2: Unleash the seal device
column3: Lepaskan seal device

column2: You have to unleash all seals to enter into the sanctum that will lead you to the inheritance of Zachariel. Unleash the 2nd seal that is on the middle of the way to the Broken Sanctum. Be careful of monsters' attacks.
column3: Kamu harus melepas semua seal untuk masuk ke sanctum, itu akan mengarahkanmu ke harta warisan Zachariel. Lepaskan 2nd seal yang berada di tengah perjalanan ke Broken Sanctum. Hati-hati dengan serangan monster.

column2: Talk to Gustas Jonas
column3: Bicara pada Gustas Jonas

column2: You have unleashed the 2nd seal. Meet Gustas Jonas to listen to the guides for the next seal to get to the inheritance of Zachariel.
column3: Kamu telah melepas 2nd seal. Pergi temui Gustas Jonas dan dengarkan petunjuk ke seal selanjutnya untuk pergi ke harta warisan Zachariel.

column2: Talk to Mercenary Toby
column3: Bicara pada Mercenary Toby

column2: Mercenary Toby is looking for someone who can help him. Talk to Toby
column3: Mercenary Toby mencari seseorang untuk membantunya. Bicara pada Toby.

column2: Prove your skills
column3: Buktikan kemampuanmu

column2: Toby is looking for someone who can help him with simple jobs. But, since he can't give the jobs to anyone, he needs to test your skills. Show him that you can defeat Desert Chupabra and Zinute.
column3: Toby mencari seseorang untuk membantunya dengan pekerjaan yang simpel. Tapi, ia tidak bisa memberikan pekerjaannya pada sembarang orang, ia harus menguji kemampuanmu dulu. Tunjukkan kalau kamu bisa mengalahkan Desert Chupabra dan Zinute.

column2: Talk to Mercenary Toby
column3: Bicara pada Mercenary Toby

column2: Toby seems to be very satisfied. Return to Toby.
column3: Toby terlihat puas. Kembali pada Toby.

column2: Fortunately, Toby is very satisfied. Talk to Toby again.
column3: Untungnya, Toby sangat puas. Bicara pada Toby lagi.

column2: Find and collect the equipment for graverobbing
column3: Kumpulkan equipment untuk penggalian

column2: Tobi is looking for evidence that someone has been graverobbing. If you find any evidence, please give it to Toby.
column3: Toby mencari bukti penggalian. Jika kamu menemukan bukti, berikan pada Toby.

column2: You picked up equipment for graverobbing. Return to Toby.
column3: Kamu mengambil equipment untuk penggalian. Kembali pada Toby.

column2: Talk to the Owl Sculpture of Forecasts
column3: Bicara pada Owl Sculpture of Forecast

column2: Talk to the Owl Sculpture of Forecasts
column3: Bicara pada Owl Sculpture of Forecast

column2: Defeat Necroventer
column3: Kalahkan Necroventer

column2: Talk to Archaeologist Laudi
column3: Bicara pada Archeologist Laudi

column2: Archaeologist Laudi is looking for someone who is stronger than anyone. Talk to Archaeologist Laudi.
column3: Archeologist Laudi mencari seseorang yang lebih kuat dari yang lain. Bicara pada Archeologist Laudi.

column2: Obtain the Relic Fragment by defeating Denoptic
column3: Mendapatkan  Relic Fragment dengan mengalahkan Denoptic

column2: Laudi said that he can not continue his research due to the charcoal-eating Denoptic. Bring him the Relic Fragment that haven't been digested inside Denoptic beyond Apynys Camp. When you survey the charcoal, Denoptic should appear.
column3: Laudi bilang ia tidak bisa melanjutkan researchnya karena charcoal-eating Denoptic. Bawakan dia Relic Fragment yang belum dimakan Denoptic di Apynys Camp. Ketika kamu mencari charcoal, Denoptic akan muncul.

column2: Give the Relic Fragment to Archaeologist Laudi
column3: Berikan Relic Fragment kepada Archaeologist Laudi

column2: There was a Relic Fragment inside Denoptic's stomach. Take it to Archaeologist Laudi.
column3: Ada sebuah Relic Fragment di dalam perut Denoptic. Bawa itu ke Archaeologist Laudi.

column2: Obtain %s after defeating Denoptic
column3: Mendapatkan %s setelah mengalahkan Denoptic

column2: Defeat Denoptic
column3: Kalahkan Denoptic

column2: Talk to Laudi
column3: Bicara pada Laudi

column2: It seems that Laudi has something to say to you. Talk to Archaeologist Laudi again.
column3: Sepertinya Laudi punya sesuatu yang akan disampaikan. Bicara pada Archaeologist Laudi lagi.

column2: Defeat the monsters that abide near the place where Archaeologist Laudi will do his research
column3: Kalahkan monster yang berada di sekitar tempat Archaeologist Laudi akan melakukan penelitiannya.

column2: Archaeologist Laudi is asking you to defeat the monsters. Defeat the monsters at Odega Uphill and return to Laudi.
column3: Archaeologist Laudi memintamu untuk mengalahkan monster. Kalahkan monster di Odega Uphill dan kembali pada Laudi.

column2: Now, Archaeologist Laudi can do his research safely. Return to Laudi.
column3: Kini, Archaeologist Laudi bisa melakukan penelitiannya dengan aman. Kembali pada Laudi.

column2: There is a stone pillar standing in the middle of the way to Alkune Stairs. What would happen when you examined it?
column3: Ada pilar batu di tengah perjalanan menuju Alkune Stairs. Apa yang terjadi ketika kamu memeriksanya?

column2: Collect the old inheritance
column3: Kumpulkan Old Inheritance

column2: Some other stone pillars appeared while you were examining the pillar! Break these pillars!
column3: Tiang batu yang lain muncul ketika kamu memeriksanya! Hancurkan tiang-tiang ini!

column2: Obtained %s by destroying the stone pillars
column3: Mendapatkan %s dari menghancurkan tiang batu.

column2: There is a stone pillar when you go up the Alkune stairs. Examine the pillar.
column3: Ada tiang batu ketika kamu pergi ke Alkune Stairs. Periksa tiang itu.

column2: Defeat the monster that suddenly appeared
column3: Kalahkan monster yang tiba-tiba muncul.

column2: As you examined the pillar, monsters suddenly appeared! Defeat them.
column3: Ketika kamu memeriksa tiang, monster tiba-tiba muncul! Kalahkan mereka.

column2: Examine the pillar again
column3: Periksa tiangnya lagi.

column2: You have defeated all the monsters. Examine the pillar again.
column3: Kamu telah mengalahkan semua monster. Periksa tiangnya lagi.

column2: Defeat Wendigo
column3: Mengalahkan Wendigo

column2: Defeat Woodfung
column3: Mengalahkan Woodfung

column2: Defeat Dumaro
column3: Mengalahkan Dumaro

column2: There is an unknown pole on the upper side of Overlong Bridge Valley.  Investigate the pole.
column3: Ada unknown pole di bagian atas Overlong Bridge Valley. Investigasi pole tersebut.

column2: As you touched the pole, Shnayim appeared! Take the artifacts away from Shnayim!
column3: Ketika kamu menyentuh pole, Shnayim muncul! Ambil artifact dari Shnayim!

column2: Obtain %s by defeating Shnayim
column3: Mendapatkan %s dengan mengalahkan Shnayim

column2: Defeat Shnayim
column3: Kalahkan Shnayim

column2: Talk to Vio
column3: Bicara pada Vio

column2: Supply Commander Vio is looking for one of his men. Talk to Vio.
column3: Supply Commander Vio sedang mencari prajuritnya. Bicara pada Vio.

column2: Find Mercenary Lindt
column3: Temukan Mercenary Lindt

column2: Vio wants you to find his men who ran away somewhere. Go to Apynys Habitat where Lindt is likely to be at.
column3: Vio menginginkanmu menemukan prajuritnya yang lari ke suatu tempat. Pertama, pergi ke Apynys Habitat dimana Lindt seharusnya berada.

column2: Talk to Mercenary Lindt
column3: Berbicara pada Mercenary Lindt

column2: The man who is leaning on the tree and taking a rest seems to be Lindt. Talk to him since he seems badly hurt.
column3: Seseorang yang bersender di pohon dan istirahat sepertinya  Lindt. Bicara padanya karena ia tampak terluka parah.

column2: Retrieve the supplies which Wendigo stole
column3: Mendapatkan suplai yang Wendigo curi

column2: Mercenary Lindt told you that he was chasing after a Wendigo for stolen supplies instead of running away from the monsters. Defeat the Wendigo and retrieve the stolen supplies for Lindt.
column3: Mercenary Lindt memberitahumu bahwa ia mengejar Wendigo untuk suplai curiannya, bukan lari dari monster. Kalahkan Wendigo dan dapatkan suplai curian untuk Lindt.

column2: Give the supplies to Lindt
column3: Memberikan supply pada Lindt

column2: You have retrieved all the supplies that were stolen from Wendigo. Give them to Lindt.
column3: Kamu telah mendapatkan semua suplai yang dicuri Wendigo. Berikan pada Lindt.

column2: Obtained %s after defeating Wendigo
column3: Mendapatkan %s setelah mengalahkan Wendigo

column2: Obtained the supplies from Wendigo
column3: Mendapatkan suplai dari Wendigo

column2: Mercenary Lindt is badly hurt. Talk to Lindt again.
column3: Mercenary Lindt terluka parah. Bicara pada Lindt lagi.

column2: Collect Canyon Apynys
column3: Kumpulkan Canyon Apynys

column2: Mercenary Lindt's wounds are worse than you expected. You have to get him Canyon Apynys.
column3: Keadaan Mercenary Lindt lebih buruk dari yang kamu bayangkan. Bawakan dia Canyon Apynys.

column2: You have enough Canyon Apynys. Return to Mercenary Lindt.
column3: Kamu telah memiliki cukup Canyon Apynys. Kembali ke Mercenary Lindt.

column2: Mercenary Lindt's face doesn't look well. Ask him if he is okay.
column3: Mercenary Lindt terlihat tidak sehat. Tanya apakah dia baik-baik saja.

column2: Mercenary Lindt can barely move due to the effects of the medicine. Defeat the monsters nearby for Lindt.
column3: Mercenary Lindt tidak bisa bergerak karena efek obat. Kalahkan monster yang mendekati Lindt.

column2: You defeated all the monsters nearby. Report to Mercenary Lindt again.
column3: Kamu telah mengalahkan monster di sekitarnya. Lapor ke Lindt.

column2: Talk to Mercenary Eta
column3: Bicara pada Mercenary Eta

column2: You found Mercenary Eta. Pass him Vio's orders for him to return to the camp.
column3: Kamu menemukan Mercenary Eta. Berikan ia pesan Vio untuk kembali ke camp.

column2: Collect the poison of Woodfung and the stone with the vigor at Alkune Hills.
column3: Kumpulkan Poison of Woodfung dan Stone with Vigor di Alkune Hills.

column2: Eta is saying that he will not return to the camp unless he defeats Saugas. You better send him to the camp as quickly as possible. Get the poison of Woodfung and the stone with the vigor at Alkune stair way.
column3: Eta berkata bahwa ia tidak akan kembali ke camp kecuali ia mengalahkan Saugas. Sebaiknya kamu suruh dia kembali ke camp secepatnya. Dapatkan Poison of Woodfung dan Stone with Vigor di Alkune Stairway.

column2: You obtained the stone with the vigor and the poison of Woodfung. Return to Eta.
column3: Kamu mendapatkan Stone with Vigor dan Poison of Woodfung. Kembali ke Eta.

column2: Eta needs the poison of Woodfung and the stone with the vigor.
column3: Eta membutuhkan Poison of Woodfung dan Stone with Vigor.

column2: Get the poison of Woodfung
column3: Dapatkan poison of Woodfong

column2: Eta is saying that he will not return to the camp unless he defeats Saugas. You better send him to the camp as quickly as possible. Get the poison of Woodfung at Alkune stair way.
column3: Eta berkata bahwa ia tidak akan kembali ke camp kecuali ia mengalahkan Saugas. Sebaiknya kamu suruh dia kembali ke camp secepatnya. Dapatkan poison of Woodfung di Alkune Stairway.

column2: You obtained the stone with the vigor and the poison of Woodfung. Return to Eta.
column3: Kamu mendapatkan Stone with Vigor dan Poison of Woodfong. Pergi kembali ke Eta.

column2: Obtained %s after defeating Woodfung
column3: Mendapatkan %s setelah mengalahkan Woodfung

column2: Obtained the poison of Woodfung
column3: Mendapatkan poison of Woodfung

column2: You are all ready to lure Saugas. Talk to Eta who is confident.
column3: Kamu telah siap memancing Saugas. Bicara pada Eta.

column2: Put to stone with the vigor on Alkune Stairway.
column3: Letakkan Stone with Vigor di Alkune Stairway.

column2: Mercenary Eta told you to put the stone on Alkune Stairway to lure Saugas. Is he trying to defeat Saugas by himself?
column3: Eta memberitahumu untuk meletakkan Stone di Alkune Stairway untuk memancing Saugas. Apakah ia mau mengalahkan Saugas sendirian?

column2: The Sauga took the stone and ran away! Return to Eta and ask him.
column3: Saugas mengambil batunya dan lari! Kembali ke Eta dan tanya.

column2: Defeat the Sauga
column3: Kalahkan Saugas

column2: Eta can't believe that a group of Sauga ran away with the stone. Talk to Eta again.
column3: Eta tidak percaya Saugas lari dengan batunya. Bicara pada Eta lagi.

column2: Lure Saugas from the right side of Alkune Stairway
column3: Pancing Saugas dari sisi kanan Alkune Stairway

column2: Mercenary Eta is saying that it can't be true that the Sauga just ran away with the stone. Let's put the stones on the deepest place of Long Bridge Valley where Saugas often shows up.
column3: Mercenary Eta berkata tak mungkin Saugas lari dengan batunya. Ayo letakkan batu di tempat yang lebih dalam di Long Bridge Valley dimana Saugas biasanya muncul.

column2: Saugas didn't show up, and another group of Sauga appeared instead. Suggest to Eta to give up and go back to the camp.
column3: Saugas tidak muncul, namun Sauga muncul. Sarankan Eta untuk menyerah dan kembali ke camp.

column2: Defeat the monsters that are rushing in
column3: Kalahkan monster yang memaksa masuk

column2: Talk to Vio
column3: Bicara pada Vio

column2: Eta told you that he will return to the camp. Tell this to Vio.
column3: Eta mengatakan bahwa ia akan kembali ke camp. Beri tahu Vio.

column2: Eta promised you that he will return to the camp. Tell this to Vio.
column3: Eta berjanji padamu bahwa ia akan kembali ke camp. Beri tahu Vio.

column2: Finally, it seems that you can enter into the sanctum that will lead you to the inheritance of the Great King Zachariel. Talk to Gustas Jonas.
column3: Akhirnya, kamu bisa memasuki sanctum yang akan mengarahkanmu ke warisan Zachariel. Bicara pada Gustas Jonas.

column2: Release the seal inside the sanctum
column3: Lepas seal di dalam sanctum

column2: The sanctum was the first seal to protect the inheritance of the Great King Zachariel. Go into the sanctum and unleash the seal.
column3: Sanctum adalah seal pertama untuk melindungi warisan Zachariel. Pergi ke sanctum dan lepas seal.

column2: You finally released the first seal. Talk to Gustas Jonas.
column3: Kamu berhasil melepas first seal. Bicara pada Gustas Jonas.

column2: Investigate the Miners' Village(1)
column3: Mining town canvassing (1)

column2: Arrival at the Miners' Village
column3: Kehadiran Mining Town

column2: You must enter the Crystal Mine in pursuit of the goddess' revelation, but it seems as if the Miners' Village has been attacked by the Vubbes. Rush to the Miners' Village!
column3: Untuk pergi ke mining town, ubah revelation of Goddess. Ubah mining town yang telah diserang oleh Bouvet. Cepat kembali ke mining town!

column2: Go to the Miners' Village Mayor and find out about the village's situation.
column3: Pergi ke Miner's Village Mayor untuk mengetahui keadaan village.

column2: Talk to the Miners' Village Mayor
column3: Bicara dengan kepada desa Miners' Village

column2: Talk to the Hunter
column3: Bicara pada Hunter

column2: You need to go to the Crystal Mine as told by the Goddess in the Bishop's dream but you can't just leave the refugees. Help the angry hunter.
column3: Kamu harus pergi ke Crystal Mines seperti yang Goddess katakan di mimpi Bishop tapi kamu tidak bisa meninggalkan pengungsi. Bantu hunter yang lapar.

column2: The Hunter says that monsters stole all the relief supplies meant for the villagers. {nl}Try to pick up at least what's left on the road.
column3: Hunter berkata bahwa monster mencuri semua barang-barang untuk penduduk desa. Coba ambil yang tersisa di jalan.

column2: Gathered all the relief supplies. Talk to the Hunter.
column3: Kumpulkan semua relief supplies. Bicara pada hunter.

column2: Talk to Mine Manager Brinker
column3: Bicara pada Mine Manager Brinker

column2: You need to go to the Crystal Mine as told by the goddess in the bishop's dream but you can't just leave the refugees. Mine Manager Brinker is standing by the wall with one hand on the wall. Ask what is happening.
column3: Kamu harus pergi ke Crystal Mines seperti yang Goddess katakan di mimpi bishop tapi kamu tidak bisa meninggalkan pengungsi. Mine Manager Brinker berdiri di dinding dengan satu tangannya. Tanyakan apa yang terjadi.

column2: Collect Reinforcement Stones from the rubbles nearby
column3: Kumpulkan batu untuk mengganjal dinding dari puing-puing di sekitar.

column2: The wall may collapse if Brinker releases his hands off the wall. Let's look for some rocks nearby to block the holes on the wall for Brinker.
column3: Dinding mungkin akan runtuh jika Brinker melepas tangannya dari dinding. Cari beberapa batu untuk menghalang lobang di dinding untuk Brinker.

column2: Give the Reinforcement Stones to Brinker
column3: Berikan batu-batu kepada Brinker

column2: Give the stones you collected to Brinker.
column3: Berikan batu yang kamu kumpulkan pada Brinker.

column2: Repaired the wall but Brinker still looks anxious. Talk to him.
column3: Perbaiki dinding tapi Brinker masih terlihat cemas. Bicara padanya.

column2: Defeat the monsters nearby
column3: Bunuh monster di sekitarnya.

column2: Defeat the monsters nearby so that Brinker can return safely.
column3: Bunuh monster di sekitarnya jadi Brinker bisa kembali dengan selamat.

column2: Tell Brinker that it is safe
column3: Beri tahu Brinker semua sudah aman

column2: Tell Brinker that he can return safely.
column3: Beri tahu Brinker ia bisa kembali dengan selamat.

column2: Talk to the Healer Lady
column3: Bicara pada Healer Lady

column2: You need to go to the Crystal Mines as told by the goddess in the bishop's dream but you can't just leave the refugees. Help the Healer Lady to treat the injured people.
column3: Kamu harus pergi ke Crystal Mines seperti yang Goddess katakan di mimpi bishop tapi kamu tidak bisa meninggalkan pengungsi. Bantu healer lady merawat orang-orang yang terluka.

column2: Bring the refugees
column3: Membawa para pengungsi

column2: Healer Lady is asking a favor for you to bring the other refugees. Bring the couple near the Statue of Goddess Zemyna to the Healer Lady.
column3: Healer Lady meminta bantuanmu untuk membawa para pengungsi. Bawa beberapa di dekat Statue of Goddess Zemyna ke Healer Lady.

column2: Turn over the refugees to the Healer Lady
column3: Kembalikan pengungsi ke Healer Lady

column2: Brought back the refugees safely. Talk to the Healer Lady.
column3: Bawa pengungsi ke tempat aman. Bicara pada Healer Lady.

column2: Tell the Healer Lady to go back to the village again.
column3: Bicara pada Healer Lady untuk kembali ke village kembali.

column2: Defeat the monsters
column3: Bunuh semua Monster

column2: The lady says she can't go back with her patients because there are too many monsters. Defeat the monsters for her.
column3: Gadis itu berkata tidak dapat kembali bersama pasien karena banyak monster. Kalahkan monster untuk membantunya.

column2: Defeated the monsters. Tell the lady to go back to the village.
column3: Telah mengalahkan monster. Beritahu gadis itu untuk kembali ke village.

column2: Talk to the Miners' Village Mayor
column3: Bicara dengan Miner's Village Mayor

column2: Talk to the mayor again to enter the Crystal Mines.
column3: Bicara lagi pada Mayor untuk masuk Crystal Mines.

column2: Rescue Vaidotas who is kidnapped by the Vubbes
column3: Selamatkan Vaidotas yang diculik para Vubbe

column2: The goddess' revelation is important but you can't leave the kidnapped villagers. To save the villagers trapped in the Crystal Mine, go to the Vubbe Outpost and save Vaidotas first.
column3: Revelation of Goddess itu penting namun kita tidak bisa membiarkan penduduk diculik. Untuk menyelamatkan warga yang terjebak di Mine, pergi ke markas Vubbe dan selamatkan Vaidotas dahulu.

column2: Intercept the Vubbe raid
column3: Blok Gerombolan Vubbe

column2: The Mayor seems to have a problem. Talk to him.
column3: Mayor sepertinya sedang ada masalah. Bicara padanya.

column2: Defeat the Vubbes who invaded the village
column3: Singkirkan Vubbe yang menguasai village

column2: Vubbes are taking over the village! Let's drive them out.
column3: Vubbes menguasai village! Ayo kalahkan mereka.

column2: Seems like you drove out the Vubbes. Inform the Village Mayor about it.
column3: Kamu telah mengusir para Vubbe. Beritahu Village Mayor tentang itu.

column2: Defeat the Vubbes
column3: Kalahkan semua Vubbe

column2: You found Vaidotas. Discuss with him on how you can get into the Mines.
column3: Kamu menemukan Vaitodas. Tanyakan padanya cara masuk ke Mines.

column2: Defeat the Vubbes
column3: Kalahkan para Vubbe

column2: There's a suspicious treasure box. Go and open it.
column3: Ada treasure box yang mencurigakan. Temukan dan bukalah.

column2: Red Vubbe Fighter that abruptly appeared
column3: Red Vubbe Fighter tiba-tiba muncul appeared

column2: Red Vubbe Fighter appeared when you kicked the box! Defeat it.
column3: Red Vubbe Fighter appeared when you kicked the box! Please throw it away.

column2: There were no kidnapped people but only Vubbes. You better go back to Vaidotas.
column3: There were no kidnapped people but only Vubbes. You better go back to Vaitodas.

column2: You need to remove the wagons in order to enter the mines. Talk to Vaidotas about how to remove them.
column3: Kamu harus menghancurkan gerobak untuk masuk ke mines. Bicara pada Vaitodas untuk cara menghancurkannya.

column2: Defeat any Vubbe that assembles after hearing the explosives
column3: Kalahkan vubbe yang mencoba masuk setelah ledakan. .

column2: Vaidotas says the wagons can be destroyed with explosives. But the Vubbes could attack when they hear the explosives, so you must be cautious.
column3: Vaidotas bilang gerobak dapat di hancurkan dengan ledakan. Tapi akibatnya akan ada Vubbbe yang datang, jadi berhati-hatilah.

column2: Enter Crystal Mine 1st Gallery
column3: Masuk Crystal Mine 1st Gallery

column2: You removed the wagons and can finally enter the Crystal Mines. Meet Vaidotas at Crystal Mine 1F.
column3: Kamu telah membereskan jalan masuk ke Crystal Mines. Temui Vaitodas di Crystal Mine 1st Gallery.

column2: Talk to Kind Owl Sculpture
column3: Bicara pada Kind Owl Sculpture

column2: Talk to Kind Owl Sculpture
column3: Bicara pada Kind Owl Sculpture

column2: Investingate the upper side of the field
column3: Investigasi bagian atas lapangan

column2: The Kind Owl
column3: The Kind Owl

column2: has a problem due to a reason.
column3: memiliki masalah karena sesuatu.

column2: A gigantic monster is blocking the road and sleeping on the road on the uppder side of the field. Return to the Kind Owl.
column3: Monster besar menghalangi jalan dan tertidur di bagian atas lapangan. Kembali ke Kind Owl.

column2: Talk to the Kind Owl again to solve the problem.
column3: Bicara pada Kind Owl lagi untuk menyelesaikan masalah.

column2: Defeat Elloguas nearby
column3: Kalahkan Elloguas di sekitar

column2: He knows an owl that can solve the problem but, he can't remember clearly due to Forza of Black Grieva. Defeat the Elloguas nearby for the kind owl.
column3: Ia tahu sebuah owl yang bisa menyelesaikan masalah, tapi ia tidak bisa mengingat dengan jelas karena Forza of Black Grieva. Kalahkan Elloguas di dekat Kind Owl.

column2: For the Kind Owl
column3: Untuk Kind Owl.

column2: remember the owl to solve the problem, you defeated Elloguas nearby. Return to the Kind Owl.
column3: Ingatlah owl untuk menyelesaikan masalah, kamu telah mengalahkan Elloguas di sekitar. Kembali ke Kind Owl.

column2: Defeat Elloguas
column3: Mengalahkan Elloguas

column2: Talk to the Unstable Owl Sculpture
column3: Bicara pada unstable Owl Sculpture

column2: Talk to the Unstable Owl Sculpture to ask for a way to move Sequoia from blocking the road.
column3: Bicara pada unstable Owl Sculpture untuk menanyakan cara memindahkan Sequoia yang menghalangi jalan.

column2: Collect the divine wood fragments
column3: Kumpulkan divine wood fragment

column2: To move Sequoia from blocking the road, the unstable owl told you to face it with the divine power. Go get divine wood fragments from Broken Owl Sculpture.
column3: Untuk memindahkan Sequoia yang menghalangi jalan, unstable owl menyuruhmu untuk menghadapinya dengan divine power. Dapatkan divine wood fragment dari broken owl sculpture.

column2: You have collected enough divine wood fragments to move Sequoia from blocking the road. Return to unstable owl.
column3: Kamu telah mengumpulkan cukup divine wood fragment untuk memindahkan Sequoia yang menghalangi jalan. Kembali ke unstable owl.

column2: The unstable owl seems little confused, but it knows the way to move Sequoia from blocking the road. Talk to the unstable owl again.
column3: Unstable owl seperti bingung, namun ia tahu cara memindahkan Sequoia yang menghalangi jalan. Bicara pada unstable owl lagi.

column2: Collect the Essence of Spirits
column3: Kumpulkan Essence of Spirit

column2: The unstable owl can't just tell you how to move Sequoia from blocking the road for nothing. It told you to get the Essence of Spirits back from the monsters. Go get the Essence back from the monsters.
column3: Unstable owl tidak akan memberitahumu cara memindahkan Sequoia dari menghalangi jalan secara gratis. Ia memerintahkanmu untuk mendapatkan Essence of Spirit dari monster. Dapatkan Essence dari monster.

column2: You have retrieved the Essence of Spirits. Let's return to the unstable owl.
column3: Kamu telah mendapatkan Essence of Spirits. Kembali pada unstable owl.

column2: The Essence of Spirits
column3: Essence of Spirits

column2: You have enough divine wood fragments. Return to unstable Owl.
column3: Kamu memiliki cukup divine wood fragment. Kembali ke unstable Owl.

column2: Move Sequoia
column3: Pindahkan Sequoia

column2: To move Sequoia from blocking the road, use the sharp wood stick. Open Inventory near Sequoia and use it.
column3: Untuk memindahkan Sequoia yang menghalangi jalan, gunakan sharp wood stick. Buka Inventory di dekat Sequoia dan gunakan.

column2: Sequoia was surprised by the sharp stick and ran away.
column3: Sequoia terkejut karena sharp stick dan lari.

column2: Sequioa ran away, but the unstable owl seems to be nervous. Talk to Unstable Owl again.
column3: Sequoia lari, tapi unstable owl sepertinya gugup. Bicara pada Unstable Owl lagi.

column2: Find the Guide Owl
column3: Temukan Guide Owl

column2: The Unstable Owl told you that when Sequoia ran away, something bad seemed to happen to the Guide Owl. You better go see the Guide Owl.
column3: Unstable Owl mengatakan bahwa ketika Sequoia lari, sesuatu yang buruk terjadi pada Guide Owl. Sebaiknya kamu pergi temui Guide Owl.

column2: Talk to the Guide Owl.
column3: Bicara pada Guide Owl.

column2: The Guide Owl seems to be very angry. Talk to the Guide Owl.
column3: Guide Owl sepertinya sangat marah. Bicara pada Guide Owl.

column2: Find the Grave Protector Owl
column3: Temukan Grave Protector Owl

column2: The Guide Owl told you that if Sequoia doesn't get defeated, all owls will be destroyed by Sequoia and they can't go meet the sculptor since they can't be guided. To defeat Sequoia, you should go meet the Grave Protector Owl.
column3: Guide Owl mengatakan bahwa jika Sequoia tidak dikalahkan, semua owl akan dihancurkan oleh Sequoia dan mereka tidak bisa bertemu dengan sculptor karena tidak bisa dibimbing. Untuk mengalahkan Sequoia, kamu harus bertemu Grave Protector Owl.

column2: Talk to the Grave Protector Owl
column3: Bicara pada Grave Protector Owl

column2: Defeat the flame of Sequoia
column3: Kalahkan flame of Sequoia

column2: You saved the Grave Protector Owl that was being attacked by the flame of Sequoia. Ask the owl how to defeat Sequoia.
column3: Kamu menyelamatkan Grave Protcetor Owl yang diserang oleh flame of Sequoia. Tanya owl cara mengalahkan Sequoia.

column2: Obtain Essence of Spirits from the specters at the Entrance of Kateen Forest
column3: Mendapatkan Essence of Spirit dari specter di Katyne Forest

column2: The Grave Protector Owl told you that in order to make a blow to Sequoia, you need the Essence of Spirits.  Collect the Essences of Spirits from the specters that are hovering around the grave of the unknown warrior.
column3: Grave Protector Owl berkata untuk membuat ledakan pada Sequoia, kamu membutuhkan Essence of Spirits. Kumpulkan Essences of Spirits dari specter yang berkeliaran di sekitar makan warrior yang tak diketahui.

column2: You have enough Essences of Spirits to make a blow to Sequoia. Talk to the Grave Protector Owl Sculpture.
column3: Kamu memiliki cukup Essences of Spirits untuk meledakan Sequoia. Bicara pada Grave Portector Owl Sculpture.

column2: Talk to the Guide Owl Sculpture
column3: Bicara pada Guide Owl Sculpture

column2: Talk to the Guide Owl Sculpture
column3: Bicara pada Guide Owl Sculpture

column2: Persuade the angy owl sculpture
column3: Bujuk angry owl sculpture

column2: Persuade the angry owl sculpture that is corrupted due to the influnce of vicious power like Sequoia
column3: Buju angry owl sculpture yang rusak karena pengaruh kekuatan jahat seperti Sequoia

column2: You failed to persuade and there is no way, but to break the angry owl.  Take the fragments of the angry owl sculpture and go back to the Guide Owl.
column3: Kamu gagal membujuk dan tidak ada jalan lain kecuali menghancurkan angry owl. Ambil fragment of angry owl sculpture dan kembali ke Guide Owl.

column2: Defeat the angry owl
column3: Kalahkan angry owl

column2: The Grave Protector Owl told you that if you use the power in the Essences of Spirits, you may defeat Sequoia. Return to the Guide Owl.
column3: Grave Protector Owl berkata jika kamu menggunakan power pada Essences of Spirits, kamu bisa mengalah Sequoia. Kembali ke Guide Owl.

column2: Use the stick with the vigor to Sequoia
column3: Gunakan stick with vigor pada Sequoia

column2: You put the power of sprits into the sharp stick to make the stick with the vigor. Use the stick with the vigor to Sequoia.
column3: Kamu meletakan power of spirit di sharp stick untuk membuat stick with vigor. Gunakan stick with vigor pada Sequoia.

column2: Sequoia ran away as you used the stick with the vigor to it. Let's go back to the Guide Owl.
column3: Sequoia lari ketika kamu menggunakan stick with vigor. Kembali ke Guide Owl.

column2: Talk to the Desperate Owl Sculpture
column3: Bicara pada Desperate Owl Sculpture

column2: Sequoia ran away to the direction where the Desperate Owl Sculpture is at. The Desperate Owl may be in danger.  Hurry to the Desperate Owl.
column3: Sequoia lari ke ara Desperate Owl Sculpture berada. Desperate Owl mungkin dalam baha. Cepat pergi ke Desperate Owl.

column2: Rescue Desperate Owl Sculpture
column3: Selamatkan Desperate Owl Sculpture

column2: When Sequoia was about to break the Desperate Owl, you were able find it right before. Help the Desperate Owl to stand up.
column3: Ketika Sequoia ingin menghancurkan Desperate Owl, kamu berhasil menemukannya terlebih dahulu. Bantu Desperate Owl berdiri.

column2: You helped the Desperate Owl to stand up. Ask it whether it is okay.
column3: Kamu membantu Desperate Owl berdiri. Tanyakan apakah ia baik-baik saja.

column2: The owl in urgency is asking you to help it since it never saw Sequoia running around like that. Talk to the owl in urgency.
column3: Owl in urgency meminta bantuanmu karena ia tidak pernah melihat Sequoia lari-larian seperti itu. Bicara pada owl in urgency.

column2: Obtain the blackend wood stick
column3: Mendapatkan blackend wood stick

column2: The owl in urgency told you that it will be better to use the blackend stick. Collect the sticks nearby.
column3: Owl in urgency memberitahumu bahwa lebih baik menggunakan blackend stick. Kumpulkan stick di sekitar.

column2: You have enough blackened sticks. Return to the owl in urgency.
column3: Kamu memiliki cukup blackened stick. Kembali ke owl in urgency.

column2: Talk to the owl in urgency.
column3: Bicara pada owl in urgency.

column2: The owl in urgency substitued the old stick for the blackend stick. Talk to the owl in urgency again
column3: Owl in urgency mengganti old stick dengan blackened stick. Bicara pada owl in urgency lagi

column2: Use the cursed stick to Sequoia

column2: Thrust the cursed stick to Sequoia so it can never run around again!
column3: Tusuk cursed stick pada Sequoia jadi ia tidak lari-larian lagi!

column2: Talk to the gatekeeper owl

column2: Unfortunately, the cursed stick wasn't effective on Sequia. As the owl in urgency told  you, talk to the gatekeeper owl again.

column2: Sequoia is burning the whole forest, but the gatekeeper owl seems to be alright. Talk to the gatekeepr owl.
column3: Sequoia membakar seluruh hutan, namun gatekeeper owl sepertinya baik-baik saja. Bicara pada gatekeeper owl.

column3: Kalahkan Sequoia

column3: Gatekeeper owl berkata bahwa stick masih berguna jika kamu menyerang Sequoia langsung dengan ini, dan mungkin dia akan kalah. Kalahkan Sequoia di Cradle of Sequoia.

column2: You finally defeated Sequoia. Ask the gatekeeper about the way to the Sculptor
column3: Kamu berhasil mengalahkan Sequoia. Tanyakan gatekeeper tentang jalan menuju Sculptor

column3: Kamu memberitahunya bahwa kamu akan mengantar restored tombstone fragments yang kamu dapatkan dari Epigraphist Raymond untuk asistennya Smid.

column3: Hancurkan Denoptic, sumber polusi.

column3: Temukan guardian yang mencoba menyebabkan kehancuran

column3: Guardian mencoba untuk menghancurkan Mausoleum untuk menghentikan serangan demon. Hentikan para guardian dan cegah kehancuran Royal Tomb.

column3: Ini bukan satu-satunya tempat yang guardian coba hancurkan. Cari tempat lainnya.

column3: Kalahkan guardian yang mencoba menghancurkan Royal Tomb.

column3: Cegah guardian dari menghancurkan Stone Statue

column3: Determination of the King mencoba menghancurkan Royal Tomb untuk mencegah Rexipher mendapatkan will of the Goddess. Kalahkan Bearkaras untuk mencegah kehancuran Royal Tomb.

column3: Kumpulkan sources of magic of the Royal Tomb

column3: Secret Guardian mencoba menghalangi Rexipher dari mendapatkan revelation. Kumpulkan sources of magic of the Royal Tomb dari guardian.

column3: Kamu telah mengumpulkan semua sources of the magic. Kembali ke Secret Guardian.

column3: Mendapatkan Soul Pot

column3: Secret Guardian memberitahumu bahwa Royal Tomb of the Great King Zachariel sebenarnya dibuat untuk mengalahkan Rexipher berdasarkan ramalan Goddess. Bicara pada Secret Guardian.

column2: Pour the magic sources into the jars
column3: Tuangkan sources of the magic ke dalam wadah

column3: Secret Guardian memberitahumu bahwa Royal Tomb of the Great King Zachariel sebenarnya dibuat untuk mengalahkan Rexipher berdasarkan ramalan Goddess. Isi ulang sources of the magic power of the Mausoleum pada pot yang telah disiapkan.

column2: You have poured all the sources of magic into all the jars. Talk to the Secret Guardian.
column3: Kamu telah mengisi semua sources of magic ke semua pot. Bicara pada Secret Guardian.

column3: Sepertinya kamu mendengar suara tangisan demon. Bicara pada Secret Guardian.

column3: Pancing dan hisap Madakia ke dalam pot

column3: Kamu harus memberikan fatal blow pada Rexipher dengan will of the Guardians. Taruh Soul Pot dan pancing guardian ke dalam pot untuk mengisinya.

column2: You filled the wills of the Guardians into the pot. Talk to the Secret Guardian.
column3: Kamu mengisi wills of the Guardians ke dalam pot. Bicara pada Secret Guardian.

column2: Give the pot to the Secret Guardian
column3: Berikan pot pada Secret Guardian

column3: Ini adalah waktu yang tepat untuk menyerang Rexipher dan temukan Revelation of the Goddess. Siapkan pot dengan  pot dengan wills of the Guardians.

column2: Defeat Rexipher
column3: Kalahkan Rexipher
