column3: Semua energi dari Royal Tomb menahan Rexipher. Kalahkan Rexipher.

column2: Go to the burial chamber of the Royal Mausoleum
column3: Pergi ke burial chamber of the Royal Tomb

column3: Dengarkan nasihat Zachariel

column3: Dengarkan interpretasi dari revelation dari will of the greatest king Zachariel.

column3: Dapatkan Burning Stone dari Guardians of the Royal Tomb.

column3: Untuk menyucikan kekuatan sihir  yang tercemar, kamu harus menyalakan stone lantern dengan Burning Stone. Kalahkan Royal Tomb Guardians dulu untuk mendapatkan Burning Stone.

column2: Light up the stone lantern with the Burning Stone
column3: Nyalakan stone lantern dengan Burning Stone

column3: Kamu telah mengumpulkan cukup Burning Stone. Temukan stone lantern of the Royal Tomb dan nyalakan dengan Burning Stone.

column3: Kalahkan Royal Tomb Guardians dan dapatkan %s

column3: Mendapatkan power supply of the stone lantern

column3: Lindungi stone lantern of the Royal Tomb dari para demon.

column3: Mengalahkan Clymen

column3: Kumpulkan activation stone untuk menghancurkan Suppressor of the Royal Tomb.

column3: Mendapatkan %s dengan mengalahkan Guardian

column3: Hancurkan Suppressor of the Royal Tomb

column3: Mendapatkan energi Guardian

column3: Mengalahkan Tomb Lord

column2: Collect the Blazing Magic Sources
column3: Kumpulkan Blazing Magic Sources

column2: The Guardian's Stone Statue told you that the magic to suppress the Guardians was distorted due to demons' schemes. To fix this, get the Blazing Magic Sources that are inside the Guardians.
column3: Guardian's Stone Statue mengatakan padamu bahwa sihir untuk mengikat guardian berubah karena trik demon. Perbaiki ini, dapatkan Blazing Magic Sources yang ada di dalam guardian.

column2: You've collected enough amount of Blazing Magic Sources. Return to the Guardian's Stone Statue.
column3: Kamu telah mengumpulkan cukup Blazing Magic Sources. Kembali ke Guardian's Stone Statue.

column2: Obtain %s by defeating Vikaras and Vekarabe
column3: Mendapatkan %s dengan mengalahkan Vikaras dan Vekarabe

column2: Obtained the magnet of the Mausoleum
column3: Mendapatkan magnet of the Mausoleum

column2: To fix the flow of regulatory magic, you've collected the Blazing Magic Sources. Light up the stone lantern of the Royal Mausoleum and protect it to fix the flow of regulatory magic.
column3: Untuk memperbaiki aliran sihir, kamu telah mengumpulkan blazing magic sources. Nyalakan stone lantern of the Royal Tomb dan jaga untuk memperbaiki aliran magic.

column2: Light up the stone lantern and protect it
column3: Nyalakan stone lantern dan jaga

column2: You should change the flow of the magic by using the Blazing Magic Sources. Light up the stone lantern and protect it from the monsters rushing in so it won't break.
column3: Kamu harus mengganti aliran magic dengan menggunakan Blazing Magic Sources. Nyalakan stone lantern dan lindungi dari monster yang masuk jadi agar tidak hancur.

column2: You were able to fix the flow of the magic, but there are still demons interfering with the flow of magic. Talk to the Guardian's Stone Statue.
column3: Kamu berhasil memperbaiki aliran sihir tapi, masih ada beberapa demon tersisa yang menggangu aliran sihir. Bicara pada Guardian's Stone Statue.

column2: Defeat the Guardians near the Magic Vessels
column3: Kalahkan guardian di dekat magic power containers.

column2: The Guardian's Stone Statue told you that the corrupted Guardians are trying to break the Magic Vessels. Defeat the Guardians near the Magic Vessels.
column3: Guardian's Stone Statue memberitahumu bahwa corrupted Guardian coba menghancurkan magic power containers. Kalahkan Guardian di dekat magic power containers.

column2: You were able to protect the vessels by defeating the Guardians. Return to the Guardian's Stone Statue.
column3: Kamu berhasil melindungi container dengan mengalahkan Guardian. Kembali ke Guardian's Stone Statue.

column2: Defeat the Guardian who threatens to break the Vessels
column3: Kalahkan guardian yang mengancam menghancurkan container.

column2: Remove the corrupted cores
column3: Hilangkan corrupted cores

column2: The Guardian's Stone Statue told you that there are lots of corrupted cores caused by the evil energy. Find the lumps and remove them.
column3: Guardian's Stone Statue memberitahumu bahwa ada banyak corrupted cores yang disebabkan energi jahat. Temukan lump dan kalahkan mereka.

column2: You completely removed all the cores. Return to the Guardian's Stone Statue.
column3: Kamu berhasil menghilangkan semua lump. Kembali ke stone statue of protector.

column2: Destroy the corrupted Stone Lantern
column3: Hancurkan corrupted Stone Statue

column2: Evil energy has corrupted a lantern while spreading within the flow of regulatory magic. Destroy the corrupted lantern.
column3: Energi jahat menyebarkan banyak polusi seperti tercemarnya lentera melalui aliran sihir. Hancurkan corrupted lantern.

column2: Destroy the corrupted Stone Lantern
column3: Hancurkan corrupted lantern.

column2: Evil energy has corrupted a lantern while spreading within the flow of regulatory magic. Talk to the Guardian's Stone Statue.
column3: Energi jahat menyebarkan banyak polusi seperti tercemarnya lentera melalui aliran sihir. Bicara kepada Guardian's Stone Statue.

column2: Destroy the corrupted regulator
column3: Hancurkan corrupted suppressor

column2: Evil energy is spreading via a corrupted regulator. Destroy the corrupted regulator.
column3: Energi jahat menyebarkan banyak polusi seperti tercemarnya lentera melalui aliran sihir. Hancurkan corrupted lantern.

column2: You've destroyed the corrupted regulator and its sources. Return to the Guardian's Stone Statue.
column3: Kamu telah menghancurkan corrupted suppressor dan sumbernya. Kembali ke Guardian's Stone Statue.

column2: Defeat Archon
column3: Kalahkan Archon

column2: Check the Royal Mausoleum Archive
column3: Periksa Royal Tomb Archive

column2: Many things were prepared for the Revelator at the Royal Mausoleum. Find the reports and read them.
column3: Banyak hal disiapkan untuk Savior di Royal Tomb. Temukan laporannya dan baca.

column2: Collect Wheelen Marks
column3: Kumpulkan Wheelen Marks

column2: It is written that Wheelen Marks give power to the Royal Mausoleum Archive. Collect the Wheelen Marks.
column3: Terulis bahwa Wheelen Marks memberikan kekuatan pada Royal Tomb Archive. Kumpulkan Wheelen Marks.

column2: You've collected all the Wheelen Marks. Check the Royal Mausoleum Archive again.
column3: Kamu telah mengumpulkan semua Wheelen Marks. Periksa Royal Tomb Archive lagi.

column2: Obtain %s from Wheelen
column3: Mendapatkan %s dari Wheelen

column2: Obtain sandstone
column3: Mendapatkan sandstone

column2: Read the Royal Mausoleum Archive
column3: Baca Royal Tomb Archive

column2: Destroy the hostile Venucelos
column3: Hancurkan hostile Venucelos

column2: The Royal Mausoleum Archive records of what terror a defected Venucelos can be. Defeat Venucelos.
column3: Royal Tomb Archive records ditulis tentang teror akibat pengkhiatan Venucelos. Kalahkan Venucelos.

column2: Destroy the hostile Venucelos
column3: Hancurkan hostile Venucelos

column2: Obtain the secret treasure after defeating Rocktortuga
column3: Mendapatkan secret treasure setelah mengalahkan Rocktortuga.

column2: The Royal Mausoleum Archive indicates that the secret treasure is hidden inside the gigantic Guardian. Defeat Rocktortuga and obtain the secret treasure.
column3: Royal Tomb Archive menunjukkan bahwa secret treasure tersembunyi di dalam gigantic Guardian. Kalahkan Rocktortuga dan dapatkan secret treasure.

column2: Defeat Rocktortuga
column3: Kalahkan Rocktortuga

column2: Talk to Follower Donatas
column3: Berbicara dengan Follower Donatas

column2: Follower Donatas is seeking for help from somone on the first floor of the Tenet Church.
column3: Follower Donatas mencari bantuan seseorang di first floor of Tenet Church.

column2: Collect demon souls
column3: Kumpulkan demon souls

column2: Follower Donatas told you that you should know more about the demons in order to convert them. Collect their souls after defeating them.
column3: Follower Donatas memberitahukan kamu harus tahu tentang demon sebelum mengubah mereka. Kumpulkan demon soul setelah mengalahkan mereka.

column2: You have collected enough demon souls. Return to Follower Donatas.
column3: Kamu telah mengumpulkan cukup demon souls. Kembali ke Follower Donatas.

column2: Talk to Coben
column3: Berbicara dengan Coben

column2: You can see Coben pointing at you, hinting something. Talk to Coben.
column3: Kamu dapat melihat Coben melihatmu dengan sinis. Bicaralahdengan Coben.

column2: Find the diary Coben is looking for
column3: Temukan buku harian yang Coben cari.

column2: Coben needs the diary of his relative. Find the diary at the Abandoned Farm.
column3: Coben membutuhkan buku harian dari kerabatnya. Temukan buku harian di Abandoned Farm.

column2: Hand the diary over to Coben
column3: Menyerahkan buku harian itu ke Coben.

column2: You found the diary at the Abandoned Farm. Hand it over to Coben.
column3: Kamu telah menemukan buku harian di Abandoned Farm. Serahkan kepada Coben.

column2: Coben found something inside the diary. Talk to Coben again.
column3: Coben menemukan sesuatu di dalam buku harian itu. Bicara dengan Coben lagi.

column2: Check the monument at the Crumbled Chapel
column3: Periksa epitaph di Crumbled Chapel.

column2: Coben wants to check the monument that is written about his relative who was a thief, but he can't go due to the monsters. Check what is written on the epitaph for Coben.
column3: Coben ingin memeriksa  tulisan di epitaph tentang kerabatnya yang seorang pencuri, tapi dia tidak bisa pergi karena banyak monster. Periksa apa yang tertulis di epitatph untuk Coben.

column2: Tell Coben what was written on the monument
column3: Beritahu Coben tentang apa yang tertulis di epitaph tersebut.

column2: It was the monument with the person's promise to himself written on it. Tell Coben about it.
column3: Di epitaph ada janji seseorang untuk dirinya sendiri tertulis di atasnya. Beritahu Coben tentang hal itu.

column2: Coben is excited to hear that the person once challenged himself to enter the Mage Tower. Talk to Coben again.
column3: Coben sangat tertarik  mendengar bahwa orang yang  menantangnya untuk naik ke Mage Tower. Bicara dengan Coben lagi.

column2: Check the writings on the second monument
column3: Periksa tulisan di epitaph kedua.

column2: Coben told you to look for the next monument and he also told you that if the monument is unreadable due to its deterioration, you can read the writings again when you rub them with Cockatrice Fat. Get the Fat near the Crumbled Chapel and check what is written on the second monument.
column3: Coben memberitahumu untuk mencari epitaph berikutnya dan ia juga mengatakan kepada kamu bahwa jika epitaph tersebut tidak terbaca karena rusak, kamu dapat membaca tulisannya dengan menggosokkan Cockatrice Fat. Dapatkan Fat dekat Crumbled Chapel dan cek tulisan apa di epitaph kedua.

column2: Tell Coben what was written on the monument
column3: Berbicara kepada Coben tentang tulisan di epitaph.

column2: The second monument was written about the person's promise to himself to do something at the Mage Tower in order to become the greatest thief of all time. Tell Coben about it.
column3: Epitaph kedua menulis tentang seseorang berjanji pada dirinya sendiri untuk melakukan sesuatu di Mage Tower untuk menjadi pencuri terbesar sepanjang masa. Beritahu Coben tentang hal itu.

column2: Coben disappeared after telling you that he will follow his brother's footsteps. Find Coben and talk to him.
column3: Coben menghilang setelah mengatakan bahwa ia akan mengikuti jejak saudaranya. Cari Coben dan bicara dengannya.

column2: Check what is written on the third monument
column3: Memeriksa tulisan di epitaph ketiga.

column2: Coben told you that the third monument is located at the left side of Negyvas field. Check what is written on the third monument on behalf of Coben.
column3: Coben mengatakan bahwa epitaph ketiga terletak di sebelah kiri Negyvas field. Periksa tulisan di epitaph ketiga untuk Coben.

column2: As a thief, Coben's brother seemed to have found a way to achieve complete victory at the Mage Tower. Tell Coben about it.
column3: Sebagai seorang pencuri, saudara laki-laki Coben sepertinya menemukan cara untuk mencapai kemenangan di Mage Tower. Beritahu Coben tentang hal itu.

column2: Coben seems to be excited to hear that. Talk to Coben again.
column3: Coben sepertinya tertarik mendengarnya. Bicara dengan Coben lagi.

column2: Check what is written on the fourth monument
column3: Periksa yang tertulis di epitaph keempat.

column2: Coben told you that you can't use fat anymore to read what's on the next monument. Check what is written on the fourth monument at the right side of Negyvas Field by obtaining charcoals from Hallowventers.
column3: Coben mengatakan kamu tidak dapat menggunakan fat lagi untuk membaca epitaph berikutnya. Periksa tulisan di epitaph keempat disisi kanan Negyvas Field dengan mendapatkan charcoals dari Hallowventers.

column2: A method of entering the Mage Tower was written on the monument. Tell Coben about it.
column3: Cara untuk masuk ke Mage Tower tertulis di epitaph. Beritahu Coben tentang hal itu.

column2: It seems that there is a way for one to enter the Mage Tower. Talk to Coben again.
column3: Sepertinya di sana ada jalan untuk masuk ke Mage Tower. Berbicara dengan Coben lagi.

column2: Recharge the Strong Magical Power Absorption Jar
column3: Mengisi Strong Magical Power Absorption Jar.

column2: Coben showed you a device his brother left him. Could this device help one gain access to the Mage Tower? Charge the device first.
column3: Coben menunjukan kamu device yang ditinggalkan saudara laki-lakinya. Apakah device ini membantu mencapai Mage Tower? Isi device itu dulu.

column2: The device is now fully charged. Talk to Coben.
column3: Device terisi penuh. Bicara kepada Coben.

column2: You may meet Coben's brother soon. Talk to Coben.
column3: Kamu mungkin akan bertemu saudara laki-laki Coben. Bicara pada Coben.

column2: Check the writings on the Commanding Monument
column3: Periksa tulisan di Commanding Monument

column2: The name of the monument is strange which should be the last monument. Check what is written on it.
column3: Nama epitaphnya aneh mungkin adalah epitaph terakhir. Periksa apa yang tertulis di atasnya.

column2: Sadly, the last monument reads that Coben's brother died after failing to invade the Mage Tower. Tell Coben about it.
column3: Sayang sekali, tampaknya saudara laki-laki Coben itu tewas setelah gagal naik ke Mage Tower. Beritahu Coben tentang hal itu.

column2: Defeat Devilglove
column3: Kalahkan Cursed Devilglove

column2: Talk to Caroline Canolyn
column3: Bicara dengan Caroline Canolyn

column2: You met Caroline Canolyn who seems very anxious. Talk to Caroline Canolyn.
column3: Kamu bertemu Caroline Canolyn yang tampaknya sangat cemas. Bicaralah dengan Caroline Canolyn.

column2: Defeat Cockatrice
column3: Kalahkan Cockatrices

column2: Caroline Canolyn is worried about the Cockatrices that is blocking the way to Fedimian. Defeat Cockatrices that is blocking the way to Fedimian.
column3: Caroline Canolyn khawatir tentang Cockatrice yang menghalangi jalan ke Fedimian. Kalahkan Cockatrices yang menghalangi jalan ke Fedimian.

column2: Report to Caroline Canolyn
column3: Lapor ke Caroline Canolyn

column2: You defeated enough Cockatrices. Report to Caroline Canolyn.
column3: Kamu mengalahkan cukup Cockatrices. Laporkan ke Caroline Canolyn.

column2: Caroline Canolyn told you that the monsters stole all the tools. Talk to Caroline Canolyn again.
column3: Caroline Canolyn mengatakan bahwa monster mencuri semua alat. Bicara kepada Caroline Canolyn lagi.

column2: Defeat Moa
column3: Kalahkan Moa

column2: Caroline Canolyn told you that a monster called Moa stole the tool box. Defeat the Moa that ran away to the upper side of the Abandoned Farm and retrieve the tool box.
column3: Caroline Canolyn mengatakan bahwa monster yang bernama Moa telah mencuri tool box. Kalahkan Moa yang berlari ke sisi atas Abandoned Farm dan dapatkan kembali tool box.

column2: Unfortunately, the toolbox wasn't there. Return and talk to Caroline Canolyn.
column3: Sayang sekali, tool box itu tidak ada. Kembali dan berbicara dengan Caroline Canolyn.

column2: Talk to Tara Miles
column3: Bicara ke Tara Miles

column2: Tara Miles wants your help.
column3: Tara Miles butuh bantuanmu

column2: Defeat the monsters nearby
column3: Kalahkan monster didekatnya.

column2: Tara Miles is looking for someone who can defeat the monsters that are spreading a dangerous disease. Defeat Cockatrices nearby.
column3: Tara Miles mencari seseorang yang dapat mengalahkan monster yang menyebabkan penyakit berbahaya.  Kalahkan Cockatrices.

column2: You have defeated many of the monsters that are spreading disease. Return to Tara Miles.
column3: Kamu telah banyak membunuh banyak monster yang menyebarkan penyakit. Kembali ke Tara Miles.

column2: Tara Miles told you that she will be waiting at Negyvas Field. Find Tara Miles and talk to her.
column3: Tara Miles bilang bahwa dia akan menunggu di Negyvas Field. Cari Tara Miles dan berbicara dengannya.

column2: Collect dust samples from Hallowventers
column3: Kumpulkan dust sample dari Hallowventer.

column2: Tara Miles told you that there are many reasons for the spread of the disease. First, obtain the dust samples from Hallowventers.
column3: Tara Miles mengatakan bahwa ada cara untuk menyebarkan penyakit. Pertama, dapatkan dust sample dari Hallowventer.

column2: Hand over the dust samples to Tara Miles
column3: Serahkan dust sample ke Tara Miles

column2: You obtained many dust samples from Hallowventers. Hand them over to Tara Miles.
column3: Kamu memperoleh banyak dust sample dari Hallowventer. Serahkan kepada Tara Miles.

column2: Obtain %s from Hallowventer
column3: Mendapatkan %s dari Hallowventer

column2: Collect Dust Samples
column3: Mengumpulkan Dust Sample

column2: It seems that Tara Miles' investigation is not done yet. Talk to Tara Miles again.
column3: Tampaknya penyelidikan Tara Miles belum selesai. Bicara dengan Tara Miles lagi.

column2: Obtain Big Cockatrice Tails
column3: Dapatkan Big Cockatrice Tail

column2: Tara Miles wants the tails from the Big Cockatrices that are already diseased. Get the tails from Big Cockatrice beyond the camp of beekeepers.
column3: Tara Miles menginginkan ekor dari Big Cockatrice yang berpenyakit. Dapatkan ekor dari Big Cockatrice di luar camp of beekeepers.

column2: Hand over the Big Cockatrice Tails to Tara Miles
column3: Serahkan Big Cockatrice Tail ke Tara Miles

column2: You obtained enough Big Cockatrice Tails. Return to Tara Miles.
column3: Kamu memperoleh cukup Big Cockatrice Tail. Kembali ke Tara Miles.

column2: Obtain Big Cockatrice Tails
column3: Dapatkan Big Cockatrice Tail

column2: Someone is looking for you
column3: Seseorang mencarimu

column2: There is a person who is looking for you in Fedimian. Go to the gigantic Goddess Statue in Fedimian.
column3: Ada seseorang yang mencari kamu di Fedimian. Pergi ke gigantic Statue of Goddess di Fedimian.

column2: Talk to Grita at Crystal Brook
column3: Bicara dengan Grita di Crystal Brook

column2: Grita was waiting at the Karsta Hall Site near Crystal Brook. Go and talk to Grita.
column3: Grita sedang menunggu di Karsta Hall Site dari Crystal Brook. Cari dan bicaralah dengan Grita.

column2: Once you arrived at Karsta Hall Site near Crystal Brook, it seems as if Grita was waiting there. Go and talk to Grita.
column3: Setelah coba pergi ke Karsta Hall Site dari Crystal Brook, Grita sedang menunggu. Cobalah bicara dengan Grita.

column2: Go to the Mage Tower
column3: Pergi ke Mage Tower

column2: Grita told you that the Goddess Gabija is resisting the attacks of the demons at the Mage Tower. Go to the Mage Tower to help the goddess.
column3: Grita berkata bahwa Goddess Gabija memblokir serangan demon di Mage Tower. Pergi ke Mage Tower untuk membantu Goddess.

column2: Talk to Grita
column3: Bicara pada Grita

column2: You finally arrived inside the Mage Tower. Talk to Grita.
column3: Akhirnya kamu tiba di Mage Tower. Bicara kepada Grita.

column2: Light up the signal
column3: Nyalakan sinyal.

column2: Grita told you that Gabija was protecting the tower, but since the monsters are still around, something bad must have happened to the goddess. Light up the signal at the left hallway to let the goddess know that you are here.
column3: Grita mengatakan bahwa Gabija melindungi tower, tapi karena monster masih berada di sekitar, sesuatu yang buruk akan terjadi pada Goddess. Nyalakan sinyal di lorong kiri sehingga Goddess tahu kamu ada di sini.

column2: You successfully lit up the signal. Talk to Grita again.
column3: Kamu berhasil menyalakan sinyal. Bicaralah dengan Grita lagi.

column2: Defeat the Rubblems
column3: Kalahkan Rubblem

column2: You lit up a signal to let the goddess know that help is coming. Discuss what to do next with Grita.
column3: Kamu menyalakan sinyal sehingga Goddess tahu pertolongan telah datang. Diskusikan dengan Grita langkah selanjutnya.

column2: Check the 1st Transport Magic Circle
column3: Periksa 1st Transport Magic Circle.

column2: Grita told you that using the Transport Magic Circle is the fastest way to go upstairs. Go to the 1st Transport Magic Circle to see whether it is working correctly.
column3: Grita mengatakan menggunakan Transport Magic Circle adalah cara tercepat naik ke atas. Pergi ke 1st Transport Magic Circle untuk melihat apakah itu benar.

column2: You defeated the monsters that were rushing in and arrived at the place where the 1st Transport Magic Circle is located at. Talk to Grita.{nl}{nl}Grita finished checking the 1st Transport Magic Circle. Ask Grita if it works.
column3: Kamu mengalahkan monster yang masuk dan tiba di lokasi 1st Transport Magic Circle. Bicaralah dengan Grita. {nl}{nl} Gritta selesai memeriksa 1st Transport Magic Circle. Tanyakan Grita apakah itu bekerja.

column2: Defeat interfering Phyracons
column3: Kalahkan interfering Phyracons

column2: Defeat interfering Drakes
column3: Kalahkan interfering Drakes

column2: Grita's face turned grim as she was checking the Transport Magic Circle. Talk to Grita.
column3: Wajah Grita berubah muram saat ia sedang memeriksa Transport Magic Circle. Bicaralah dengan Grita.

column2: Activate the 2nd Transport Magic Circle
column3: Aktifkan  2nd Transport Magic Circle

column2: Grita told you that the 1st Transport Magic Circle is badly broken and recommended to use the other, larger Transport Magic Circle. Look for the 2nd Transport Magic Circle and activate it.
column3: Grita mengatakan bahwa 1st Transport Magic Circle rusak parah dan merekomendasikan untuk menggunakan yang lain, Transport Magic Circle yang lebih besar. Carilah 2nd Transport Magic Circle dan aktifkan.

column2: You thought you could use the 2nd Transport Magic Circle, but there was a trap set by the demons. Talk to Grita again.
column3: Kamu berpikir bisa menggunakan 2nd Transport Magic Circle, tapi ada perangkap yang dibuat demon. Bicaralah dengan Grita lagi.

column2: Destroy the 2nd Transport Magic Circle restraining Grita
column3: Hancurkan 2nd Transport Magic Circle yang menahan Grita.

column2: Grita told you that with the present danger, the plan to directly reach Goddess Gabija via the Transport Magic Circles should be abandoned, and you should focus on the monsters rushing into the tower. Talk to Grita for more details.
column3: Grita mengatakan bahwa itu berbahaya, rencana untuk mencapai Goddess Gabija dengan the Transport Magic Circles harus ditinggalkan, dan kamu harus fokus dengan monster yang menyerang ke tower. Bicara pada Grita untuk detailnya.

column2: Charge the Absorbing Gem
column3: Mengisi Absorbing Gem

column2: Grita said in order to activate the Tower's Barrier Device again, it would need a great amount of energy. Set the gem Grita gave you on the ground and recharge the gem with the monsters' life force.
column3: Grita mengatakan jika ingin mengkatifkan Tower's Barrier Device lagi, butuh energi yang sangat besar. Atur gem yang diberikan Grita di lantai dan isi gem itu dengan energi kehidupan monster.

column2: You were able to charge the Absorbing Gem with monsters' life force. Return to Grita.
column3: Kamu mampu mengisi Absorbing Gem dengan energi kehidupan monster. Kembali ke Grita.

column2: You finished charging the Absorbing Gem with monsters' life force. Talk to Grita about the method of activating the Barrier Device.
column3: Kamu selesai mengisi Absorbing Gem dengan energi kehidupan monster. Bicara pada Grita cara mengaktifkan Barrier Device.

column2: Activate the Barrier Device
column3: Aktifkan Barrier Device

column2: The Barrier Device is at the end of the left hallway. Activate the Barrier Device.
column3: Barrier Device di ujung lorong sebelah kiri. Aktifkan Barrier Device.

column2: You were able to activate the Barrier Device. Talk to Grita again.
column3: Kamu mampu mengaktifkan Barrier Device. Bicara kepada Gritta lagi.

column2: You arrived on the 2nd floor of the Mage Tower. Talk to Grita about what to do next.
column3: Kamu tiba 2nd floor of the Mage Tower. Bicara dengan Gritta apa yang harus dilakukan selanjutnya.

column2: Search for the Jewel of Prominence
column3: Mencari Jewel of Prominence

column2: Find the Jewel of Prominence. Use the detector to look for the Jewel of Prominence on the 2nd floor of the Mage Tower.
column3: Cari Jewel of Prominence. Gunakan detektor untuk mencari Jewel of Prominence di 2nd floor of the Mage Tower.

column2: You found the Jewel of Prominence. Talk to Grita.
column3: Kamu menemukan Jewel of Prominence. Bicaralah dengan Grita.

column2: You got the Jewel of Prominence. Talk to Grita about how you can input the power into the Jewel of Prominence.
column3: Kamu mendapat Jewel of Prominence. Bicara dengan Grita tentang bagaimana cara memasukkan kekuatan ke dalam Jewel of Prominence.

column2: Collect Flame Vapor
column3: Kumpulkan Flame Vapor

column2: Grita told you that in order to complete the Jewel of Prominence, you should fill it with Flame Vapor. Fill it with the Flame Vapor that leaks in the Large Reading Room.
column3: Grita mengatakan bahwa untuk menyelesaikan Jewel of Prominence, kamu harus mengisi Flame Vapor ke dalamnya. Mengisinya dengan Flame Vapor yang bocor di Large Reading Room.

column2: You filled the Jewel of Prominence with Flame Vapor. Return to Grita.
column3: Kamu mengisi Jewel of Prominence dengan Flame Vapor. Kembali ke Grita.

column2: You collected all the Flame Vapor. Ask Grita what to do next to complete the Jewel of Prominence.
column3: Kamu mengumpulkan semua Flame Vapor. Tanyakan pada Grita apa yang dilakukan selanjutanya untuk menyelesaikan Jewel of Prominence.

column2: Charge the Jewel
column3: Mengisi Jewel

column2: If you unleash the Flame Vapor, it will bring the Essences of Flame. Fill the Essences to the 2nd pot.
column3: Jika kamu melepaskan Flame Vapor, akan membawa Essences dari Flame. Isi Essences untuk pot kedua.

column2: You filled the Jewel of Prominence with the Essence of Fire. Talk to Grita.
column3: Kamu mengisi Jewel of Prominence dengan Essence of Fire. Bicaralah dengan Grita.

column2: You filled all the Essences of Fire. Ask Grita what to do next.
column3: Kamu mengisi semua  Essences of Fire. Bertanya pada Grita apa yang harus dilakukan selanjutnya.

column2: Obtain Flame Sources by defeating monsters
column3: Mendapatkan Flame Sources dengan mengalahkan monster.

column2: The energy is not enough yet, so Grita told you that you should enhance the energy with Flame Sources. Defeat the monsters nearby and collect Flame Sources.
column3: Energi tidak cukup, Grita memberitahu kamu harus meningkatkan energi dengan Flame Sources. Kalahkan monster di dekatnya dan kumpulkan Flame Sources.

column2: You collected enough Flame Sources. Talk to Grita again.
column3: Kamu mengumpulkan cukup Flame Sources. Bicara kepada Grita lagi.

column2: Obtain %s from the monsters nearby
column3: Mendapatkan %s dari monster terdekat.

column2: Obtain Flame Sources
column3: Mendapatkan Flame Sources

column2: Now, there is one more step to complete the Jewel of Prominence. Talk to Grita.
column3: Sekarang, satu langkah lagi untuk menyelesaikan Jewel of Prominence. Bicaralah dengan Grita.

column2: Combine materials with the Jewel of Prominence in the Flame Fusion Machine
column3: Menggabungkan material dengan Jewel of Prominence di dalam Flame Fusion Machine.

column2: Grita told you that since the Jewel of Prominence is not complete yet, you should combine materials with it in the Flame Fusion Machine. Combine the materials at the Flame Fusion Machine.
column3: Grita mengatakan jika Jewel of Prominence belum selesai, kamu harus menggabungkan material dengan itu di dalam Flame Fusion Machine. Gabungkan material di Flame Fusion Machine.

column2: You successfully completed the Jewel of Prominence. Talk to Grita.
column3: Kamu berhasil menyelesaikan  Jewel of Prominence. Bicara kepada Grita.

column2: Grita is waiting at the third floor of Mage Tower. Go to Grita.
column3: Grita menunggu di third floor of Mage Tower. Bicaralah dengan Grita.

column2: Defeat Krumadok
column3: Kalahkan Krumadok

column2: It seems that the mad magician Antares is loose. Defeat the Krumadok which Antares has summoned.
column3: Tampaknya mad magician Antares kalah. Kalahkan Krumadok yang di panggil oleh Antares.

column2: You defeated Krumadoks which Antares summoned. Talk to Grita.
column3: Kamu mengalahkan Krumadoks yang dipangil Antares. Bicara kepada Grita.

column2: It was the mad magician, Antares who summoned the Krumadoks. Talk to Grita.
column3: Dia adalah mad magician, Antares yang memanggil Krumadoks. Bicara kepada Grita.

column2: Destroy the first Magic Control Valve
column3: Hancurkan First Magic Control Valve.

column2: Grita told you to break the Magic Control Valve to stop Antares. Destroy the valve at the Laboratory.
column3: Grita memberitahumu menghancurkan Magic Control Valve untuk menghentikan Antares. Hancurkan valve di Laboratory.

column2: As you destroyed the valve, it exploded. While it cleared away the monsters, it was really dangerous. Talk to Grita again.
column3: Ketika kamu menghancurkan valve, terjadi ledakan. Melenyapkan monster, itu sangat berbahaya. Bicara kepada Grita lagi.

column2: Destroy the Magic Control Valve
column3: Hancurkan Magic Control Valve.

column2: The Magic Control Valve was way more powerful than you expected. You better discuss it with Grita.
column3: Magic Control Valve lebih kuat dari yang kamu bayangkan. Lebih baik diskusi dengan Grita.

column2: Look for info on the Magic Control Valve
column3: Mencari informasi tentang Magic Control Valve.

column2: Grita told you that since Antares did research on the flow of magic, the research information must be left nearby. Search Antares' books and find information on the valves.
column3: Grita mengatakan sejak Antares meneliti aliran sihir, informasi penelitian tersebut pasti ada didekatnya. Cari Antares Book dan dapatkan informasi tentang valves.

column2: It seems that you found information on the flow of magic. Talk to Grita.
column3: Tampaknya kamu menemukan informasi tentang aliran sihir. Bicara dengan Grita.

column2: You found the way to destroy the magic safely. Talk to Grita.
column3: kamu menemukan cara untuk menghancurkan sihir dengan aman. Bicaralah dengan Grita.

column2: Find the 2nd Valve in the Central Control Room
column3: Temukan 2nd Valve di Central Control Room.

column2: Most of the monsters would receive tremendous damages if you could destroy all the valves to explode the magic. Find the 2nd valve in the central control room which is the only one remaining.
column3: Sebagian besar monster akan menerima damage yang luar biasa jika kamu bisa menghancurkan semua valve untuk meledakkan sihir. Temukan 2nd Valve di Central Control Room yang merupakan satu-satunya yang tersisa.

column2: Antares left a trap. Talk to Grita.
column3: Antares meninggalkan sebuah jebakan. Bicara kepada Grita.

column2: Check the Immobile Mineloader
column3: Periksa  Immobile Mineloader

column2: There is a Mineloader at the Mage Tower that acts as a guard. Check the immobile Mineloader.
column3: Ada Mineloader di Mage Tower sebagai penjaga. Periksa  Immobile Mineloader.

column2: Defeat the hostile Mineloader
column3: Kalahkan Hostile Mineloader.

column2: Defeat the suddenly mobile Mineloader
column3: Kalahkan Suddenly Mobile Mineloader.

column2: Grita is waiting at the fourth floor of the Mage Tower. Go to Grita.
column3: Grita menunggu di 4th floor Mage Tower. Bicaralah dengan Grita.

column2: Check the status of the Jewel of Prominence after defeating all nearby monsters
column3: Periksa status pada Jewel of Prominence setelah mengalahkan semua monster disekitarnya.

column2: The Jewel of Prominence's status became abnormal since the Antares incident on the 3rd floor. Check its status as you defeat the monsters nearby.
column3: Status dari Jewel of Prominence menjadi abnormal sejak insiden Antares di lantai 3. Periksa statusnya setelah mengalahkan monster di sekitarnya.

column2: You felt the power of flames as you defeated the monsters. Talk to Grita.
column3: Kamu merasakan kekuatan api saat kamu mengalahkan monster. Bicara kepada Grita.

column2: You defeated all the monsters nearby, but Grita's speaking tone is little abnormal. Talk to Grita again.
column3: Kamu mengalahkan semua monster di dekatnya, tetapi nada bicara Grita adalah sedikit aneh. Bicara dengan Grita lagi.

column2: Activate the stabilizer of the magic
column3: Mengaktifkan stabilizer of the magic.

column2: Grita told you that the energy of the Jewel is unstable, so you need to go through a process to stabilize it. Activate the stabilizer and defeat the monsters to stabilize the Jewel.
column3: Grita mengatakan energi pada Jewel tidak stabil, jadi kamu membutuhkan proses untuk menstabilkan. Aktifkan stabilizer dan kalahkan monster untuk menstabilkan Jewel.

column2: You successfully stabilized the energy of the Jewel. Talk to Grita.
column3: Kamu berhasil menstabilkan energi dari Jewel. Bicara pada Grita.

column2: Defeat the monsters that rushed in after hearing the sound of the explosion
column3: Mengalahkan monster yang berlari setelah mendengarkan ledakan.

column2: You stabilized the jewel using the stabilizer, but the jewel is still unstable. Ask Grita what to do about it.
column3: Kamu menstabilkan jewel menggunakan stabilizer, tapi jewel belum stabil. Tanya Grita apa yang harus dilakukan.

column2: Collect Flame Crystals
column3: Kumpulkan Flame Crystals

column2: Grita told you that in order to stabilize the Jewel fully, you need to get Flame Crystals. Collect the Crystals from the Center Large Brazier.
column3: Grita mengatakan untuk menstabilkan jewel sepenuhnya, kamu memerlukan Flame Crystals. Kumpulkan Crystals dari Center Large Brazier.

column2: Hand over the Flame Crystals to Grita
column3: Menyerahkan Flame Crystals pada Gritta.

column2: You collected enough Flame Crystals. Hand them over to Grita.
column3: Kamu mengumpulkan cukup Flame Crystals. Serahkan kepada Grita.

column2: Look for the Laboratory
column3: Cari di Laboratory

column2: You collected all the Essences of Flame to stabilize the Jewel of Prominence. Now, hand them over to Grita and return to the Laboratory.
column3: kamu mengumpulkan semua Essences of Flame untuk menstabilkan Jewel of Prominence. Sekarang, serahkan kepada Grita dan kembali ke Laboratory.

column2: Protect Grita who is stabilizing the Jewel of Prominence
column3: Lindungi Grita yang sedang menstabilkan Jewel of Prominence.

column2: Grita told you that she can stabilize the jewel fully at the Laboratory. Protect Grita while she is stabilizing the jewel.
column3: Grita mengatakan bahwa dia dapat menstabilkan jewel sepenuhnya di Laboratory. Lindungi Grita sementara dia menstabilkan jewel.

column2: Look for Grita, who just ran away
column3: Cari Gritta yang lari.

column2: You should retrieve the jewel from Grita
column3: Kamu harus mengambil jewel dari Grita.

column2: Defeat Minivern
column3: Kalahkan Minivern

column2: Look for Grita, who just ran away
column3: Cari Grita yang baru saja lari.

column2: Grita suddenly ran away with the jewel! You are confused about this situation. Chase after Grita.
column3: Grita tiba-tiba berlari dengan jewel! Kamu bingung dengan situasi ini. kejar Grita.

column2: Defeat the monsters that were summoned by the demon, Grita
column3: Mengalahkan monster yang di summon oleh demon, Grita.

column2: Grita was in fact a demon. Were you deceived by Grita all along? Defeat the monsters that were summoned by Grita.
column3: Grita adalah demon. Apakah selama ini kamu ditipu oleh Grita? Kalahkan monster yang dipanggil oleh Grita.

column2: Defeat Grinende
column3: Kalahkan Grinende

column2: Destroy Helgasercle's 1st Magic Suppressor
column3: Hancurkan Helgasercle's 1st Magic Suppressor.

column2: Helgasercle created Magic Suppressors on the 5th floor to weaken the Mage Tower's power. Destroy the 1st Suppressor located at the Hall of Fire.
column3: Helgasercle membuat Magic Suppressors di 5th floor untuk melemahkan kekuatan Mage Tower. Hancurkan 1st Suppressor yang ada di Hall of Fire.

column2: Destroy the Magic Suppressor
column3: Hancurkan Magic Suppressor

column2: Destroy Helgasercle's 2nd Magic Suppressor
column3: Hancurkan Helgasercle's 2nd Magic Suppressor.

column2: Helgasercle created Magic Suppressors on the 5th floor to weaken the Mage Tower's power. Destroy the 2nd Suppressor located at the Reception Room.
column3: Helgasercle membuat Magic Suppressors di 5th floor untuk melemahkan kekuatan Mage Tower. Hancurkan 2nd Suppressor yang ada di Reception Room.

column2: Destroy Helgasercle's 3rd Magic Suppressor
column3: Hancurkan Helgasercle's 3rd Magic Suppressor.

column2: Helgasercle created Magic Suppressors on the 5th floor to weaken the Mage Tower's power. Destroy the 3rd Suppressor located at the Small Hall.
column3: Helgasercle membuat Magic Suppressors di 5th floor untuk melemahkan Mage Tower. Hancurkan 3rd Suppressor yang ada di Small Hall.

column2: Destroy Helgasercle's 4th Magic Suppressor
column3: Hancurkan Helgasercle's 4th Magic Suppressor.

column2: Helgasercle created Magic Suppressors on the 5th floor to weaken the Mage Tower's power. Destroy the 4th Suppressor at the Reading Room.
column3: Helgasercle membuat Magic Suppressors di 5th floor untuk melemahkan Mage Tower. Hancurkan 4th Suppressor yang ada di Reading Room.

column2: Find Helgasercle
column3: Cari Helgasercle

column2: You destroyed all four Magic Suppressors that Helgasercle prepared. It is now time to liberate the Mage Tower from the demon's powers. Find Helgasercle at the Great Hall.
column3: Kamu menghancurkan semua empat Magic Suppressors yang disiapkan Helgasercle. Sekarang saatnya membebaskan Mage Tower dari kekuatan demon. Cari Helgasercle di Great Hall.

column2: Defeat Helgasercle
column3: Kalahkan Helgasercle

column2: Defeat Helgasercle
column3: Kalahkan Helgasercle

column2: Use the Jewel of Prominence
column3: Gunakan Jewel of Prominence

column2: You should help Gabija now with the Jewel of Prominence. Put the jewels in the center of Keturidu great hall.
column3: kamu harus membantu Gabija sekarang dengan Jewel of Prominence. Letakkan jewel di tengah Keturidu Great Hall.

column2: Talk to Goddess Gabija
column3: Bicara pada Goddess Gabija

column2: You received the revelation from the goddess.{nl}Ask the goddess what to do next.
column3: Kamu mendapatkan wahyu dari Goddess.{nl}Bicara kepada Goddess apa yang harus dilakukan selanjutnya.

column2: Now it's time to destroy the 2nd Valve. Talk to Grita.
column3: Sekarang waktunya menghancurkan 2nd Valve. Bicaralah dengan Grita.

column2: Grita told you that the 2nd Valve is in the Central Control Room. Go to the Central Control Room.
column3: Grita 2nd Valve ada di Central Control Room. Pergi ke Central Control Room.

column2: Antares touched the wrong part of the valve, so the valve exploded. Talk to Grita.
column3: Antares menyentuh bagian yang salah dari valve, sehingga valve meledak. Bicara dengan Grita.

column2: Check the Barrier Activation Device
column3: Periksa Barrier Activation Device.

column2: The Barrier Activation Device is an important piece of equipment that protects the Mage Tower. Carefully inspect it.
column3: Barrier Activation Device adalah bagian penting dari peralatan yang melindungi Mage Tower. Periksa dengan teliti.

column2: Defeat Salamander
column3: Kalahkan Salamander

column2: The Salamander suddenly disappeared as you tried to inspect the Barrier Activation Device.
column3: Salamander tiba-tiba menghilang saat kamu mencoba untuk memeriksa Barrier Activation Device.

column2: Talk to Soldier Bran
column3: {memo X}bicara dengan Soldier Bran.

column2: Soldier Bran is gazing at you with his bright eyes shining. Talk to Soldier Bran.
column3: Soldier Bran menatapmu dengan mata bersinar. Bicara dengan Soldier Bran.

column2: Talk to Commander Raimondas
column3: Bicara dengan Commander Raimondas.

column2: Soldier Bran want you to persuade Commander Raimondas for him since he wants go out to battle fields with his friend, Pitt. Meet Commander Raimondas at Gyveni Garden.
column3: Soldier Bran ingin kamu membujuk Commander Raimondas untuknya karena dia ingin pergi berperang dengan temannya, Pitt. Temui Commander Raimondas di Gyveni Garden.

column2: Talk to the herb broker
column3: Bicara dengan Herb  Broker.

column2: Commander Raimondas told you that he will test you whether you possess abilities to train soldiers well by seeing how you help the herb broker. Talk to the herb broker.
column3: Commander Raimondas mengatakan dia akan menguji kamu apakah kamu memiliki kemampuan untuk melatih soldier dengan baik dengan melihatmu membantu Herb Broker. Bicara kepada Herb Broker.

column2: Before actual trainings, you should help the herb broker's tasks in order to fulfill Commander Raimondas' standards. Talk to the herb broker.
column3: Sebelum latihan yang sebenarnya, kamu harus membantu tugas Herb Broker dalam rangka memenuhi standar Commander Raimondas. Bicara dengan Herb Broker.

column2: Get Tiny's secreting fluid
column3: Dapatkan Tiny's secreting fluid.

column2: The herb broker told you that you need the secreting fluid of Tinis to defeat the thorny bushes that interferes with the supply route. Defeat Tinis at Gyveni Garden and get the secreting fluid of Tinis.
column3: Herb Broker mengatakan kamu butuh secreting fluid of Tinis untuk mengalahkan Thorny Bushes yang mengganggu jalur suplai. Kalahkan Tini di Gyveni Garden dan dapatkan secreting fluid of Tinis.

column2: Hand it over to the herb broker
column3: Menyerahkan kepada Herb Broker.

column2: You obtained all the fluids of Tinis. Hand them over to the herb broker.
column3: Kamu mendapatkan semua fluids of Tinis. Serahkan ke Herb Broker.

column2: Obtain the secreting fluids of Tinis.
column3: Mendapatkan secreting fluids of Tinis.

column2: It seems that the herbicide is all completed. Talk to the herb broker.
column3: Tampaknya herbisida sudah selesai semua. Bicara dengan Herb Broker.

column2: Use the herbicide on the thorny bushes
column3: Gunakan herbicide pada thorny bushes.

column2: The herb broker gave you the herbicide that he made. Use it on the place below where thorny bushes are located.
column3: Herb Broker memberi kamu herbicide yang dia buat. Gunakan di bawah dimana thorny bushes berada.

column2: A gigantic monster appeared as you used the herbicide, but you were able to defeat it. Talk to the soldier, Bran.
column3: Seekor monster besar muncul setelah kamu menggunakan herbicide, tapi kamu mampu mengalahkannya. Bicara pada Soldier Bran.

column2: Defeat Rytaswort
column3: Kalahkan Rytaswort

column2: &Check the Flame Fusion Machine
column3: Periksa Flame Fusion Machine.

column2: &The Flame Fusion Machine in Mage Tower 2F has a function to enhance the power of the flame. Check the Flame Fusion Machine.
column3: Flame Fusion Machine di 2nd floor Mage Tower memiliki fungsi untuk meningkatkan power of the flame. Periksa Flame Fusion Machine.

column2: &Archon appeared as you were checking the Flame Fusion Machine. Defeat Archon.
column3: Archon muncul saat kamu memeriksa Flame Fusion Machine. Kalahkan Archon.

column2: Talk to the trainining officer Alryus
column3: Bicaralah dengan Trainining Officer Alryus.

column2: To become the official soldier of the Raimondas' military, you need the symbol of the training. Talk to Alryus.
column3: untuk menjadi official soldier of the Raimondas' military, kamu butuh simbol dari training. Bicara kepada Alryus.

column2: Defeat Golem and obtain the symbol of the completion of the training
column3: Kalahkan Golem dan mendapatkan simbol dari completion of the training.

column2: The training officer, Alryus told you to defeat Golem and obtain the symbol of the completion of the training. Defeat the grey golem at the highest place of the training camp and obtain the symbol.
column3: Training officer, Alryus bilang untuk mengalahkan Golem dan mendapatkan simbol completion of the training. Kalahkan Golem di tempat tertinggi training camp dan dapatkan simbol.

column2: You were successful obtaining the symbol by defeating the grey golem. Tell Alryus that you obtained the symbol.
column3: Kamu berhasil mendapatkan simbol dengan mengalahkan Grey Golem. Beritahu Alryus bahwa kamu mendapatkan simbol.

column2: Defeat Golem
column3: Kalahkan Golem

column2: The commander, Raimondas was happy at first when he saw Peter and Bran, but soon his face turned grim. Ask him what's wrong.
column3: Commander, Raimondas senang pada awalnya ketika melihat Peter and Bran, tapi wajahnya berubah menjadi muram. Tanyakan padanya apa yang salah.

column2: Investigate the dead body that is presumed to be Spion
column3: Investigasi mayat yang di duga Spion.

column2: Raimondas congratulated you for obtaining the symbol and he also gave you one more mission. Go to Morku Farm and investigate the dead body that is presumed to be Spion.
column3: Raimondas mengucapkan selamat untuk kamu karena memperoleh Simbol dan dia memberikan kamu satu misi lagi. Pergi ke Morcus farm dan investigasi mayat yang diduga Spion.

column2: Talk to Soldier Pitt
column3: Bicara dengan Soldier Pitt.

column2: Soldier Pitt doesn't know what to say in front of the dead body that is presumed to be Spion. Talk to Soldier Pitt.
column3: Soldier Pitt tidak tahu harus berkata apa di depan mayat yang diduga Spion. Bicara dengan Soldier Pitt.

column2: Check whether the dead body is Spion's
column3: Periksa apakah mayat tersebut adalah Spion.

column2: Pitt is not conscious enough to check the dead body. Check the dead body on behalf of Pitt.
column3: Pitt tidak siap untuk memeriksa mayatnya. Periksa mayatnya untuk mewakili Pitt.

column2: As you were trying to check the body, the herb broker who turned into a demon, took the body and left. Talk to Pitt.
column3: Ketika kamu memeriksa tubuhnya, Herb Broker yang berubah menjadi demon. Ambil tubuh dan tinggalkan. Bicara kepada Pitt.

column2: Pitt is crying due to the sadness of Spion's death. Talk to Pitt.
column3: Pitt menangis sedih atas kematian Spion. Bicara kepada Pitt.

column2: Chase after the herb broker to the Big Rock Face Hills
column3: Kejar Herb Broker ke Big Rock Face Hills.

column2: Pitt wants avenge the herb broker for Spion's death. It seems that the herb broker went to the direction of Big Rock Face Hills. Chase after the herb broker.
column3: Pitt ingin membalas Herb Broker atas kematian Spion. Tampaknya Herb broker pergi ke Big Rock Face Hills. Kejar Herb Broker.

column2: Report to the commander Raimondas
column3: Lapor ke Commander Raimondas.

column2: Spion who was definitely dead became violent because of the herb broker so you had no other choice,  but to defeat him. Return to Raimondas and tell him what happened.
column3: Spion mati karena tindakan Herb Broker kamu tidak punya pilihan lain, selain untuk mengalahkannya. Kembali ke Raimondas dan ceritakan apa yang terjadi.

column2: Defeat Bebraspion
column3: kalahkan Bebraspion

column2: You should now return to meet Raimondas since you obtained the symbol. Talk to Alryus before you meet Raimondas.
column3: sekarang kamu harus kembali menemui Raimondas karena kamu sudah mendapatkan simbol. Bicara kepada Alryus sebelum kamu menemui Raimondas.

column2: It seems that you are qualified to become an official soldier since you obtained the symbol. Meet Raimondas and show him the symbol.
column3: Tampaknya kamu layak untuk menjadi  official soldier karena kamu sudah mendapatkan simbol. Temui Raimondas dan tunjukkan simbolnya.

column2: Talk to Follower Vaidutis
column3: Bicara kepada Follower Vaidutis.

column2: Meet Follower Vaidutis in the Tenet Church 1F.
column3: Temui Follower Vaidutis di Tenet Church 1F.

column2: Collect the Power Crystals
column3: Kumpulkan Power Crystals.

column2: Vaidutis told you that in order to remove the barrier at the church's entrance, you need to collect the Power Crystals from Corylus to make a Light Crystal. Defeat Corylus at the Worship Anteroom and obtain the Crystals of Power.
column3: Vaidutis mengatakan untuk menghilangkan barrier di jalan masuk chapel, kamu harus mengumpulkan Power Crystals dari Corylus untuk membuat sebuah Light Crystal. Kalahkan Corylus di Worship Anteroom dan dapatkan Crystals of Power.

column2: As Vaidutis had planned, you have collected enough Power Crystals. Return to Vaidutis.
column3: Seperti yang direncanakan Vaidutis, kamu sudah mengumpulkan cukup Power Crystal. Kembali ke Vaidutis.

column2: Obtain %s by defeating Corylus
column3: Mendapatkan %s dengan mengalahkan Corylus.

column2: The Essence of Light is ready. Talk to Follower Vaidutis.
column3: Essence of Light sudah siap. Bicara dengan Follower Vaidutis.

column2: Open the church entrance
column3: Buka jalan masuk chapel.

column2: Vaidutis told you to use the Light Crystal to release the demonic barrier at the church's entrance. Powerful monsters will be attracted to the power of the Light Crystal and may attack you, so he told you to be careful.
column3: Vaidutis berkata menggunakan Light Crystal untuk melepas demonic barrier di chapel gates. Monster yang kuat akan tertarik dengan kekuatan Light Crystal dan mungkin akan menyerangmu, jadi kamu harus hati-hati.

column2: Defeat Mummyghast
column3: Kalahkan Mummyghast

column2: Move to Entrance of Kateen Forest
column3: Pindah ke Entrance of Kateen Forest.

column2: Goddess Gabija says that she must gather her strength a bit more at the Entrance of Kateen Forest. Go past Fallen Tree Garden to the Entrance of Kateen Forest.
column3: Goddess Gabija berkata harus mengembangkan sedikit lebih banyak lagi kekuatan pada pintu masuk Katyne Forest. Pergilah ke pintu masuk  Katyne Forest dengan melewati Descended Tree Garden.

column2: Entrance of Kateen Forest
column3: Entrance of Kateen Forest

column2: Vaidutis is looking for help from somebody in the Tenet Church 1F.
column3: Vaidutis mencari pertolongan seseorang di Tenet Church 1F.

column2: Defeat Pawndel and Pawnd
column3: Kalhkan Pawndel dan Pawnd

column2: Vaidutis asked you to defeat Pawndel and Pawnd that are roaming around at the Tenet Church 1F.
column3: Vaidutis memintamu untuk mengalahkan Pawndel dan Pawnd yang berkeliaran di Tenet Church 1F.

column2: You have defeated enough of Pawndel and Pawnd as Vaidutis requested. Return to Vaidutis.
column3: Kamu telah mengalahkan cukup Pawndel dan Pawnd seperti yang diminta Vaidutis. Kembali ke Vaidutis.

column2: Defeat Pawndel
column3: Kalahkan Pawndel

column2: Defeat Pawnd
column3: Kalahkan Pawnd

column2: Follower Donatas is seeking for your help
column3: Follower Donatas mencari pertolongan kamu.

column2: Collect the clothes of Pawndel and Pawnd
column3: Kumpulkan clothes dari Pawndel dan Pawnd.

column2: Follower Donatas is trying to disguise as a demon and create chaos. First, collect the clothes of Pawndel and Pawnd.
column3: Follower Donatas mencoba untuk menyamar sebagai demon dan membuat kekacauan. Pertama, kumpulkan clothes dari Pawndel dan Pawnd.

column2: You have collected all the clothes of Pawndel and Pawnd. Hand them over to Follower Donatas.
column3: Kamu telah mengumpulkan clothes dari Pawndel dan Pawnd. Serahkan ke Follower Donatas.

column2: Defeat demons
column3: Kalahkan demon

column2: Follower Donatas is waiting for the Revelator at the 1st floor of the church to hand over the scroll that turns oneself into a demon.
column3: Follower Donatas menunggu Savior di 1st floor of the chapel untuk menyerahkan scroll yang merubah diri sendiri menjadi demon.

column2: Lure Pawndel and Pawnd to the Apsauga Altar
column3: Pancing Pawndel dan Pawnd ke Apsauga Altar.

column2: Donatas told you to gain confidence by defeating Pawndels and Pawndus disguise yourself into a demon using the scroll. Disguise yourself into a demon and lure Pawndels and Pawndus to the Apsauga Altar and defeat them.
column3: Donatas mengatakan untuk mendapat kepercayaan diri dengan mengalahkan Pawndel dan Pawnd menyamarkan dirimu menjadi demon dengan scroll. Menyamarkan dirimu menjadi demon dan pancing Pawndel dan Pawnd ke Apsauga Altar dan kalahkan mereka.

column2: You defeated Pawndel and Pawnd after luring them to the altar. Talk to Follower Donatas.
column3: Kamu berhasil mengalahkan Pawndel and Pawnd setelah memancing mereka ke altar. Bicara kepada Follower Donatas.

column2: Grita seems to remembered something. Talk to Grita.
column3: Grita tampaknya ingat sesuatu. Bicara dengan Grita.

column2: Extract the core of the spelled doll
column3: Ekstrak core of the spelled doll.

column2: Grita suggests that you prepare a protection spell in case you get caught in the explosion from destroying the valve. Collect Fallenlem Cores that are ingredients for the protection spell.
column3: Grita mengajak untuk mempersiapkan Magic Defense untuk mencegah terlumatkan oleh ledakan ketika menghancurkan Valve . Kumpulkanlah material dari Magic Defense yaitu Fallenlem Nucleous.

column2: You've gathered Fallenlem Cores. Talk to Grita once more.
column3: Telah mengumpulkan dan memberikan Fallenlem Nucleous. Bicaralah lagi dengan Grita.

column2: You are now ready to transform those demons. Talk to Follower Donatas about the plan for the transformation.
column3: Kamu siap untuk merubah demon ini. Bicara dengan Follower Donatas tentang rencana ini.

column2: Convert demons at the Globejas Altar
column3: Ubah demon di Globejas Altar

column2: Follower Donatas told you that you are able to convert the demons using the power of the Globejas Altar. Activate the power of the altar, and if you attack those demons in an area where the influence of the altar's power reaches, you can convert those demons.
column3: Follower Donatas mengatakan kamu bisa merubah demon dengan kekuatan Globejas Altar. Aktifkan kekuatan altarnya, dan jika kamu menyerang demon itu di area yang dipengaruhi kekuatan altar, kamu dapat merubah demon itu.

column2: You have converted the demons. Return to Donatas.
column3: Kamu sudah merubah demon. Kembali ke Donatas.

column2: Check the Central Altar
column3: Periksa Central Altar

column2: Follower Donatas told you to check the central barrier that had stopped working.
column3: Follower Donatas memintamu untuk memeriksa central barrier yang berhenti bekerja.

column2: You defeated the Mallet Wyvern at the central altar. Talk to Follower Donatas.
column3: Kamu mengalahkan Mallet Wyvern di Central Altar. Bicara pada Follower Donatas.

column2: Defeat Mallet Wyvern
column3: Kalahkan Mallet Wyvern

column2: Talk to Follower Tomas
column3: Bicara pada Follower Tomas

column2: Follower Tomas wants help on the Tenet Church 1F.
column3: Follower Tomas butuh bantuan di Tenet Church 1F.

column2: Defeat Yognome
column3: Kalahkan Yonome

column2: Follower Tomas told you to defeat the Yognomes around here, since they are trying to eat the altar and he can't concentrate his work.
column3: Follower Tomas memintamu mengalahkan Yonome disekitar sini, mereka mencoba memakan altar dan dia tidak bisa konsentrasi bekerja.

column2: As Follower Tomas requested of you, you defeated all the Yognomes. Return to Follower Tomas.
column3: Seperti permintaan Follower Tomas, kamu sudah mengalahkan semua Yonome. Kembali ke Follower Tomas.

column2: Collect the Eyes of Madness
column3: Kumpulkan Eyes of Madness

column2: Follower Tomas told you to defeat Rodelins and retrieve their Eyes of Madness, which can be used to hide from demons.
column3: Follower Tomas memintamu mengalahkan Rodelins dan mendapatkan Eyes of Madness mereka, yang bisa digunakan untuk bersembunyi dari demon.

column2: You collected enough Eyes of Madness. Return to Follower Tomas.
column3: Kamu mengumpulkan cukup Eyes of Madness. Kembali ke Follower Tomas.

column2: Defeat Rodelins and obtain %s
column3: Kalahkan Rodelin dan mendapatkan %s

column2: Obtain the Eyes of Madness
column3: Dapatkan Eyes of Madness

column2: Follower Tomas wants help on the 1st floor of the Tenet Church.
column3: Follower Tomas butuh bantuan di lantai 1 Tenet Church.

column2: Follower Tomas told you that it is necessary to defeat the Unknocker that is guarding the altar in order to disable the barrier. Attack the Unknocker when Follower Tomas lures it.
column3: Follower Tomas mengatakan penting untuk mengalahkan Unknocker yang menjaga altar untuk mematikan barrier. Serang Unknocker ketika Follower Tomas memancingnya.

column2: You defeated the Unknocker that was guarding the altar. Talk to Follower Tomas again.
column3: Kamu berhasil mengalahkan Unknocker yang menjaga altar. Bicara lagi dengan Follower Tomas.

column2: Talk to Follower Tiberius
column3: Bicara dengan Follower Tiberius.

column2: Tiberius is waiting for someone's help in the Tenet Church 1F.
column3: Tiberius sedang menunggu bantuan seseorang di Tenet Church 1F.

column2: Obtained the Purified Essences.
column3: Dapatkan Purified Essences.

column2: Tiberius told you to obtain Vicious Essences by defeating demons, and then purify them into Purified Essences at the Altar of Purification, so he can complete his Holy Bomb.
column3: Tiberius memintamu untuk mendapatkan Vicious Essences dengan mengalahkan demon, dan murnikan dalam Purified Essences di Altar of Purification, jadi dia bisa menyelesaikan Holy Bomb.

column2: You have collected enough Purified Essences as Tiberius requested of you. Return to Tiberius.
column3: Kamu sudah cukup mengumpulkan Purified Essences seperti yang diminta Tiberius. Kembali ke Tiberius.

column2: Defeat Glizardon using the Holy Bomb
column3: Kalahkan Glizardon dengan Holy Bomb.

column2: Tiberius wants to test the Holy Bombs on Glizardon. Drink the Romuva Holy Water to hide yourself, and then put the Holy Bomb onto a Glizardon's back.
column3: Tiberius ingin menguji Holy Bomb di Glizardon. Minum Romuva Holy Water untuk menyembunyikan dirimu, dan taruh Holy Bomb di punggung Glizardon.

column2: Glizardon died right away after the Holy Bomb on it's back exploded. Return to Tiberius and tell him about it.
column3: Glizardon langsung mati setelah Holy Bomb di punggungnya meledak. Kembali ke Tiberius dan bilang tentang itu.

column2: Talk to Follower Vaidas
column3: Bicara dengan Follower Vaidas.

column2: Vaidas is waiting for help at the Tenet Church B1.
column3: Vaidas sedang menunggu bantuan di Tenet Church B1.

column2: Charge the Holy Stone
column3: Mengisi Holy Stone

column2: Vaidas told you to charge the empty Holy Stone with the lives of the demons. He told you that when you place the stone and lure demons near it, the stone will automatically absorb the lives of the demons.
column3: Vaidas memintamu untuk mengisi Holy Stone yang kosong dengan kehidupan demon. Dia berkata ketika kamu menaruh batu itu dan memancing demon mendekatinya, batu itu akan otomatis menghisap kehidupan demon.

column2: You successfully charged the Holy Stone as Vaidas requested of you. Return to Vaidas.
column3: Kamu berhasil mengisi Holy Stone seperti yang  Vaidas minta. Kembali ke Vaidas.

column2: Defeat Glizardon
column3: Kalahkan Glizardon

column2: Vaidas asked you to defeat the Glizardons that roam around the Tenet Church B1.
column3: Vaidas memintamu mengalahkan Glizardon yang berkeliaran di sekitar Tenet Church B1.

column2: You defeated the Glizardons as Vaidas requested. Return to Vaidas.
column3: Kamu berhasil mengalahkan Glizardons seperti yang diminta Vaidas. Kembali ke Vaidas.

column2: Follower Tomas asked you to find Vaidutis at the Tenet Church B1.
column3: Follower Tomas memintamu untuk menemukan Vaidutis di Tenet Church B1.

column2: Deactivate the barrier that Gesti created
column3: Matikan barrier yang dibuat Gesti.

column2: Vaidas told you that the demons have made a magic barrier at the basement's central altar. Destroy the barrier and continue looking for Follower Vaidutis.
column3: Vaidas berkata para demon membuat sebuah magic barrier di Basement Central Altar. Hancurkan barriernya dan lanjutkan mencari Follower Vaidutis.

column2: Find Follower Vaidutis
column3: Cari Follower Vaidutis

column2: Removed the barrier that was blocking the way to the 1st floor and defeated the Cyclops. Look for Vaidutis, who ran away to the 1st floor.
column3: Hilangkan barrier yang menghalangi jalan ke lantai 1 dan kalahkan Cyclop. Cari Vaidutis, yang lari ke lantai 1.

column2: Defeat Cyclops
column3: Kalahkan Cyclop

column2: Talk to Follower Algis
column3: Bicara dengan Follower Algis

column2: Follower Algis was waiting for you on the 2nd Floor. Talk to him and ask what to do.
column3: Follower Algis sedang menunggumu di lantai 2. Bicara dengannya dan tanyakan apa yang harus dilakukan.

column2: Go to the Bell Tower
column3: Pergi ke Bell Tower

column2: Saw Gesti scolding her subordinates
column3: Melihat Gesti memarahi anak buahnya.

column2: Almost got caught by Gesti, but you found out something good. Gesti hasn't found the revelation yet. Ask Follower Algis about what to do next.
column3: Hampir tertangkap oleh Gesti, tapi kamu mendapat sesuatu yang bagus. Gesti belum menemukan wahyunya. Tanya Follower Algis langkah selanjutnya.

column2: Gesti disappeared to the Central Hall. Talk to Follower Algis.
column3: Gesti menghilang ke Central Hall. Bicara dengan Follower Algis.

column2: Follower Algis says that in order to enter the hidden sanctuary, you need the Seal of Space, which is hidden in the Central Altar, but Gesti is roaming around the area and it is too dangerous. Occupy the Bell Tower, a good observation point.
column3: Follower Algis berkata untuk memasuki hidden sanctuary, kamu butuh Seal of Space, yang tersembunyi di Central Altar, tapi Gesti ada di sekitar area itu dan sangat berbahaya. Ambil posisi di Bell Tower, sebuah tempat pengamatan yang baik.

column2: Captured the Bell Tower. Talk to Follower Algis.
column3: Sudah berada di Bell Tower. Berbicara dengan Follower Algis.

column2: Captured the Bell Tower. Ask Follower Algis what to do next.
column3: Sudah berada di Bell Tower. Berbicara dengan Follower Algis apa langkah selanjutnya.

column2: Gesti destroyed the Sventove Central Altar!
column3: Gesti menghancurkan Sventove Central Altar!

column2: Gesti destroyed the Sventove Central Altar and has stolen the Seal of Space. You can't get the revelation at this rate and you'll be killed if you run into Gesti. Work with Follower Algis on finding a way to solve the situation.
column3: Gesti menghancurkan Sventove Central Altar! Dan mencuri Seal of Space. Kamu tidak bisa mendapatkan wahyu dengan cara ini dan kamu akan kalah jika kamu mengejar Gesti. Bicara dengan Follower Algis bagaimana menyelesaikannya.

column2: Make a trap at Sventove Central Hall
column3: Membuat perangkap di Sventove Central Hall.

column2: Follower Algis suggested using the pieces of the Altar that Gesti destroyed to immobilize her. Collect the altar pieces and place them on the eight pillars of Sventove Central Hall.
column3: Follower Algis menyarankan gunakan pieces of destroyed altar untuk menyegel Gesti. Kumpulkan pieces of altar dan taruh di delapan pilar dari Sventove Central Hall.

column2: Inserted the altar pieces on the eight pillars. Return to Follower Algis.
column3: Meletakkan altar piece di delapan pilar. Kembali ke Follower Algis.

column2: Follower Algis is waiting for the Revelator in the Tenet Church 2F.
column3: Follower Algis sedang menunggu Savior di Tenet Church 2F.

column2: Follower Algis says it'll be hard for him to secure the area alone so he asked you to activate the Malda Altar's powers to lure demons to their demise.
column3: Follower Algis berkata dia tidak bisa mengawasi tempat itu sendiri dan memintamu menggunakan kekuatan altar untuk membasmi para demon dengan kekuatannya dan mengalahkan mereka.

column2: Got rid of the demons and activated the altar. Return to Follower Algis.
column3: Menyingkirkan para demon dan mengaktifkan altar. Kembali ke Follower Algis.

column2: Charge the low level spirit crystal
column3: Mengisi Low Level Spirit Crystal.

column2: Follower Algis says you need to defeat any pursuing demons. Use the Auka Altar to defeat demons and keep them from chasing you.
column3: Follower Algis berkata kamu harus mengalahkan para demon yang mengikuti kita. Gunakan Auka Altar untuk mengalahkan para demon dan cegah mereka untuk mengejarmu.

column2: Activated the altar and shifted the demons' interest to the altar. Return to Follower Algis.
column3: Mengaktifkan altar dan beralih memancing para demon tertarik ke altar. Pergi ke Follower Algis.

column2: Defeat Egnome
column3: Kalahkan Egnome.

column2: Follower Algis asked you to defeat the Egnome wandering inside the church.
column3: Follower Algis memintamu mengalahkan Egnome yang berkeliaran di d alam Chapel.

column2: Defeated enough Egnome. Return to Follower Algis.
column3: Cukup mengalahkan Egnome. Kembali ke Follower Algis.

column2: Inserted the altar pieces on the eight pillars of Sventove Central Hall. Gesti hasn't realized yet. Proceed to the next plan with Follower Algis.
column3: Menempatkan barrier pieces di delapan pilar Sventove Central hall. Gesti belum menyadarinya. Lanjutkan ke rencana selanjutnya dengan Follower Algis.

column2: Fight with Gesti
column3: Bertarung dengan Gesti.

column2: Gesti was weakened with the power of the Central Altar and the eight pillars. Now you can fight equally against Gesti. Disable Gesti while Follower Algis prepares the Divine Sphere.
column3: Gesti melemah dengan kekuatan Central Altar dan delapan pilar. Sekarang kamu bisa bertarung setara dengan Gesti. Lumpuhkan Gesti sementara Follower Algis menyiapkan Divine Sphere.

column2: Failed to defeat Gesti as she escaped seriously injured. Talk to Follower Algis.
column3: Gagal mengalahkan Gesti tapi dia kabur dengan luka parah. Bicara dengan Follower Algis.

column2: Gesti escaped, but there are still more things left to do in the church. Talk to Follower Algis again.
column3: Gesti kabur, tapi masih ada beberapa yang harus dilakukan di Chapel. Bicara lagi dengan Follower Algis.

column2: Find the revelation in the hidden sanctuary
column3: Temukan wahyu di Hidden Sanctuary.

column2: Use the Seal of Space on the pillar to enter the sanctuary and find the revelation.
column3: Gunakan Seal of Space di pilar untuk masuk ke dalam sanctuary dan temukan wahyu.

column2: Tell the Paladin Master about the story so far
column3: Ceritakan kepada Paladin Master semuanya.

column2: The revelation has been successfully retrieved dispite losing Gesti again. Go to Emerald Bluffs to meet the Paladin Master.
column3: Jesty melewatkannya lagi, tetapi Cashy telah menemukannya aman. Pergilah ke Paladin Master yang ada di Emerald Surin Cliff.

column2: Talk to Watcher Allen
column3: Bicara dengan Watcher Allen.

column2: Watcher Allen at Emerald Bluffs is waiting for someone to help him
column3: Watcher Allen menunggu seseorang untuk menolongnya di Emerald Surin.

column2: Collect Destroyed Barrier Piece
column3: Kumpulkan pieces of the destroyed barrier.

column2: Watcher Allen asked you to collect the pieces of barrier the demons destroyed at Mazas Rest Place and take them to Follower Kayetonas.
column3: Watcher Allen memintamu mengumpulkan pieces of barrier yang demon hancurkan di Mazas Rest Place dan bawa ke Follower Kayetonas.

column2: Talk to Follower Kayetonas
column3: Bicara dengan Follower Kayetonas.

column2: Collected the pieces of the barrier. Give the pieces to Follower Kayetonas.
column3: Mengumpulkan cukup pieces of the barrier. Berikan ke Follower Kayetonas.

column2: Charge the Tree Guard Post Barrier
column3: Mengisi Tree Guard Post Barrier.

column2: Help Watcher Allen defeat the demons around the Tree Guard Post Barrier and charge the barrier with demon souls.
column3: Bantu Watcher Allen mengalahkan para demon di sekitar Tree Guard Post Barrier dan isi barrier dengan demon souls.

column2: The Tree Guard Post Barrier has been charged. Inform Follower Kayetonas about it.
column3: Tree Guard Post Barrier sudah terisi. Beritahu Follower Kayetonas tentang itu.

column2: Talk to Watcher Kenneth
column3: Bicara dengan Watcher Kenneth.

column2: Watcher Kenneth at Emerald Bluffs is waiting for someone to help him.
column3: Watcher Kenneth menunggu bantuan seseorang di Emerald Surin Cliff.

column2: Remove the Demon Summoning Circles
column3: Hapus demon summoning circles.

column2: Watcher Kenneth is worried about the Demon Summoning Circles in Mairunas Knoll. Defeat the demons nearby Mairunas Knoll and remove the summoning circles.
column3: Watcher Kenneth khawatir tentang demon summoning circles di Mairunas Knoll. Kalahkan para demon di sekitar Mairunas Knoll dan hapus summoning circles.

column2: Talk to Follower Kayetonas
column3: Bicara dengan Follower Kayetonas.

column2: Removed the Demon Summoning Circles as requested by Watcher Kenneth. Tell Follower Kayetonas at Flower Greeting Hill that there were Demon Summoning Circles.
column3: Menghapus demon summoning circles seperti yang diminta Watcher Kenneth. Bilang kepada Follower Kayetonas di Flower Greeting Hill bahwa di sana ada demon summoning circles.

column2: Defeat severed demons' souls
column3: Kalahkan severed demon soul.

column2: Watcher Kenneth told you to weaken the demons to less than half HP, then use the holy powers of the barrier to sever their souls and defeat them.
column3: Watcher Kenneth berkata untuk melemahkan demon sampai setengah HP, kemudian gunakan holy powers of the barrier untuk memisahkan jiwa mereka dan mengalahkan mereka.

column2: Defeated enough severed souls in Pumpura Hill. Report to Follower Kayetonas.
column3: Cukup mengalahkan severed souls di Pumpura Hill. Lapor ke Follower Kayetonas.

column2: Defeat the demon monsters nearby Kenneth
column3: Kalahkan demon monsters di sekitar Kenneth.

column2: Kenneth asked you to defeat the nearby monsters while he takes a rest.
column3: Kenneth meminta kamu untuk mengalahkan monsters di sekitar sementara dia beristirahat.

column2: Defeated the monsters while Kenneth rested. Tell Follower Kayetonas about it.
column3: Kalahkan monster ketika Kenneth beristirahat. Ceritakan Follower Kayetonas tentang itu.

column2: Follower Kayetonas at Emerald Bluff is looking for someone that will fight with him.
column3: Follower Kayetonas sedang mencari orang yang mau bertempur bersama di Jadefilled Cliff.

column2: Minotaur appeared from the sky like Follower Kayetonas said. Defeat Minotaur so that it won't get to the Paladin Master.
column3: Minotaur muncul dari langit seperti yang dikatakan Follower Kayetonas. Kalahkan Minotaur agar tidak sampai ke Paladin Master.

column2: Defeated Minotaur together with Follower Kayetonas. Talk to Follower Kayetonas.
column3: Mengalahkan Minotaur bersama dengan Follower Kayetonas. Bicara dengan Follower Kayetonas.

column2: The Paladin Master at Emerald Bluffs is waiting for you at Uzbaiga Hillside.
column3: Paladin Master dari Jadefilled Cliff. Sedang menunggu kamu pada Uzbaigi Hillside.

column2: Listen to Follower Algis' explanations
column3: Dengarkan penjelasan Follower Algis.

column2: The Paladin Master ask you to listen to Follower Algis about the Tenet Church, the first Paladin, and the Seal of Space. Listen to Follower Algis before he leaves.
column3: Paladin Master meminta kamu mendengarkan Follower Algis tentang Tenet Church, Paladin pertama, dan Seal of Space. Dengarkan Follower Algis sebelum dia pergi.

column2: Listened to Follower Algis' explanations. Report to the Paladin Master and follow the next orders.
column3: Mendengarkan penjelasan Follower Algis. Lapor ke Paladin Master dan ikuti perintah selanjutnya.

column2: The Paladin Master is looking for you
column3: Paladin Master sedang mencarimu.

column2: Help the Paladin Master
column3: aktifkan berrier dari Piliaroze Peak

column2: Gesti appeared. Help the Paladin Master!
column3: Gesti muncul. Tolong master Paladin!

column2: The Paladin Master hit Gesti spot on, but stopped short of wounding her. Talk to the Paladin Master.
column3: Master Paladin memukul Gesti, tapi berhenti sejenak untuk melukainya. Bicara dengan Master Paladin.

column2: The Paladin Master at Emerald Bluffs is waiting for you to help him.
column3: Paladin Master sedang menunggu bantuan kamu di Jadefilled Cliff.

column2: The Paladin Master asked you to clear the area while he focuses on the Divine Sphere. Defeat the Throneweaver coming to attack you.
column3: Paladin Master memintamu membersihkan area sementara dia fokus ke Divine Sphere. Kalahkan Throneweaver yang datang untuk menyerangmu.

column2: Defeat Throneweaver
column3: Kalahkan Throneweaver

column2: Defeat the corrupted Royal Mausoleum Guardians
column3: Kalahkan Corrupted Royal Tomb Guardians.

column2: The Guardian's Stone Statue said you can't change back corrupted Guardians. Defeat them instead.
column3: Guardian Stone Statue berkata kamu tidak bisa mengembalikan corrupted Guardian. Kalahkan mereka.

column2: Defeat the Royal Mausoleum Guardian
column3: Kalahkan Royal Tomb Guardian.

column2: Read the Royal Mausoleum gravestone
column3: Baca Royal Tomb gravestone.

column2: There is a Guardian's Stone Statue emitting strange energy. Check the statue.
column3: Di sana ada Guardian Stone Statue memancarkan energi aneh. Periksa statue itu.

column2: Defeat the corrupted Royal Mausoleum Guardians
column3: Kalahkan Corrupted Royal Tomb Guardians.

column2: The Stone Statue corrupted with evil energy is summoning Guardians. Defeat the corrupted Guardians.
column3: Stone Statue yang tercemar oleh energi jahat memanggil Guardian. Kalahkan corrupted Guardian.

column2: Find the hidden treasure
column3: Temukan hidden treasure

column2: There is a hidden treasure. Find it and get the treasure.
column3: Di sana ada sebuah hidden treasure. Temukan dan dapatkan treasure itu.

column2: It was a trap. Defeat the corrupted Guardian.
column3: Itu perangkap. Kalahkan corrupted Guardian.

column2: It was a warning on the corrupted Guardians. Defeat them.
column3: Itu peringatan pada corrupted Guardian. Kalahkan mereka.

column2: Defeat Rusrat
column3: Kalahkan Rusrat

column2: There is a Guardian's Stone Statue emitting strange energy. Check the statue.
column3: Di sana ada Guardian Stone Statue memancarkan energi aneh. Periksa statue itu.

column2: The corrupted Guardians wish to be destroyed rather than stay corrupted. Defeat those Guardians.
column3: Corrupted Guardian lebih baik dihancurkan daripada tetap seperti itu. Kalahkan para Guardian itu.

column2: Talk to Rolandas Jonas
column3: Bicara dengan Rolandas Jonas.

column2: Rolandas was waiting at the Stone Pole Platform just as Morcus Jonas told you. Talk to Rolandas in order to find the treasures of the Great King Zachariel.
column3: Seperti yang diberitahukan Markus Yonas, Rollandas sedang menunggu setibanya di Stone Pole Platform. Cobalah bicara dengan Rollandas untuk mencari warisan dari Raja Zakariel.

column2: Search for the map at Vienisa Highland
column3: Mencari map di Vienisa Highland.

column2: Rolandas says the map of the Great King Zachariel's inheritance is hidden where nobody knows. You have to check multiple areas to pinpoint its location. First, check the bottom area of Vienisa Highland.
column3: Rolandas berkata bahwa Map of the Great King Zachariel's inheritance tersembunyi dan tak satu pun yang tahu. Kamu harus cek banyak area untuk menandai lokasinya. Pertama, periksa area bawah Vienisa Highland.

column2: Talk to Rolandas
column3: Bicara dengan Rolandas.

column2: You were unsuccessful on your first try. Return to Rolandas and ask for the next area.
column3: Kamu tidak berhasil pada usaha pertama. Kembali ke Rolandas dan tanya area selanjutnya.

column2: Check the area Rolandas Jonas told you
column3: Periksa area yang Rolandas katakan.

column2: Check the area Rolandas told you
column3: Periksa area yang Rolandas katakan.

column2: Search for the map at Ratas Fork
column3: Cari map di Ratas Fork.

column2: Rolandas says the map of the Great King Zachariel's inheritance is hidden where nobody knows. You have to check multiple areas to pinpoint its location. {nl}Search for the map in Ratas Fork.
column3: Rolandas mengatakan Map of the Great King Zachariel's inheritance tersembunyi dan tak seorang pun tahu. Kamu harus memeriksa banyak area untuk menandai lokasinya. {nl}Cari map di Ratas Fork.

column2: Search for the map at Rodoma 1st Ruins
column3: Cari map di Rodoma 1st Ruins.

column2: Rolandas says the map of the Great King Zachariel's inheritance is hidden where nobody knows. You have to check multiple areas to pinpoint its location. Could it be found in Rodoma 1st Ruins?
column3: Rolandas mengatakan Map of the Great King Zachariel's inheritance tersembunyi dan tak seorang pun tahu. Kamu harus memeriksa banyak area untuk menandai lokasinya. Apakah bisa ditemukan di Rodoma 1st Ruins?

column2: Search the area Rolandas told you
column3: Cari di area yang dikatakan Rolandas.

column2: Search for the map nearby Tomb Guard's Cabin
column3: Cari map dekat Tomb Guard's Cabin.

column2: Rolandas says the map of the Great King Zachariel's inheritance is hidden where nobody knows. You have to check multiple areas to pinpoint its location. Check around the cabin of the grave manager.
column3: Rolandas mengatakan Map of the Great King Zachariel's inheritance tersembunyi dan tak seorang pun tahu. Kamu harus memeriksa banyak area untuk menandai lokasinya. Periksa di sekitar Cabin of The Grave Manager.

column2: Search for the map nearby Tomb Guard's Cabin
column3: Cari map di sekitar Tomb Guard's Cabin.

column2: Search for the map at Tomb Guard's Cabin
column3: Cari map di Tomb Guard's Cabin.

column2: Archaeologist Dezic appears to be poisoned by Scorpio's attacks. Talk to Assistant Airine.
column3: Archaeologist Dezic tampaknya terkena racun oleh serangan Scorpio. Bicara dengan Assistant Airine.

column2: Find an antidote for the archaeologist
column3: Cari antidote untuk archaeologist.

column2: Archaeologist Dezic's condition seems to be worsening. The cable car operators might have an antidote. Ask around to see if anyone at Stone Pole Platform has an antidote.
column3: Kondisi dari Arkeolog Dezek perlahan-lahan memburuk. Mungkin juga orang-orang yang menjaga Gondola memiliki antidote. Cobalah bertanya kepada orang-orang di Stone Pole Platform apakah mereka memiliki Antidote.

column2: Found the antidote. Give it to Airine quickly.
