column3: Cari halaman dari buku di Mage Tower 3rd Floor Laboratory.

column2: Simon Shaw offered bringing him a page of book instead of the quiz. Find the book in Mage Tower 3rd Flood Laboratory.
column3: Simon Shaw menawarkan bawakan dia sebuah halaman dari buku dan bukan kuis. Temukan bukunya di Mage Tower 3rd Flood Laboratory.

column2: Give it to Simon Shaw
column3: Berikan kepada Simon Shaw.

column2: Found all the pages. Talk to Simon Shaw.
column3: Menemukan semua halaman. Bicara dengan Simon Shaw.

column2: The Sadhu Master is looking at you with a grin. Talk to him,
column3: Sadhu Master melihat kamu dengan senyum. Bicara dengannya.

column2: Collect amber with lizard in it
column3: Kumpulkan amber dengan lizard di dalamnya.

column2: The Sadhu Master wants you to bring him something dearly. Get him the amber with lizard in it.
column3: Sadhu Master ingin kamu membawakannya sesuatu yang mahal. Bawakan dia amber dengan lizrad di dalamnya.

column2: Got the amber with lizard. Give it to the Sadhu Master.
column3: Mendapatkan amber dengan lizard. Berikan kepada Sadhu Master.

column2: Get %s
column3: Mendapatkan %s

column2: Talk to unknown being
column3: Berbicara dengan makhluk tak dikenal.

column2: You can hear a strange voice somewhere. Talk to the unknown being.
column3: Kamu bisa mendengar sebuah suara aneh di suatu tempat. Bicara dengan makhluk tak dikenal.

column2: Enter the clue
column3: Masukkan petunjuknya.

column2: The unknown being says you need to bring more clues for him to talk. Find and enter the five clues from Crustal Mines 1st Floor.
column3: Makhluk tak dikenal berkata kamu harus membawa petunjuk lebih banyak lagi untuk bicara dengannya. Temukan dan masukkan lima petunjuk dari Crystal Mines 1st Floor.

column2: Found the glues about the unknown being. Talk to the unknown being again.
column3: Menemukan petunjuk tentang makhluk tak dikenal. Bicara dengan makhluk tak dikenal lagi.

column2: Hunting.
column3: Perburuan.

column2: The unknown being gave you a riddle stating,
column3: Makhluk tak dikenal memberi Kamu sebuah teka-teki yang menyatakan

column2: the thing to do, thing that has been done, and will keep doing.
column3: hal yang harus dilakukan, hal yang telah dilakukan, dan yang akan terus dilakukan.

column2: Show your answer through action.
column3: Tunjukkan jawaban kamu dengan tindakan.

column2: Solved the riddle. Talk to the unknown being.
column3: Berhasil memecahkan teka-teki tersebut. Bicara dengan makhluk yang tak dikenal.

column2: Answer to the riddle
column3: Jawaban untuk teka-teki.

column2: Release the seal at Pasagos Cliff.
column3: Melepaskan seal di Pasaga Cliff.

column2: The Sanctum seals are in various locations in Broken Pillar Canyon. Find and break the Pasagos Cliff seal.
column3: Segel dari Sanctuary pada Broken Pillar Canyon ada di beberapa tempat. Lepaskan salah satu segel diantaranya di Pasaka Cliff.

column2: Monsters suddenly appeared as you tried to release the seal. Defeat them and protect yourself.
column3: Monster tiba-tiba muncul saat kamu mencoba untuk menghapus seal. Kalahkan mereka dan lindungi dirimu.

column2: Defeated all the monsters that were interfering. Try to release the seal again.
column3: Berhasil mengalahkan monster yang mengganggu. Coba lepaskan seal lagi.

column2: The Sanctum seals are in various locations in Broken Pillar Canyon. Find and break the seal on the way to the Collapsed Sanctum.
column3: Segel dari Sanctuary pada Broken Pillar Canyon ada di beberapa tempat. Tolong lepaskan segel yang ada di perjalanan menuju Collapsed Sanctum.

column2: Your attempt to release the seal summoned sentinels. Destroy all the sentinels.
column3: Usaha kamu untuk melepas seal memanggil para sentinel. Hancurkan semua sentinel.

column2: Destroy the sentinels
column3: Hancurkan sentinel.

column2: The Sanctum seals are in various locations in Broken Pillar Canyon. Find and break the seal on the left of the Collapsed Sanctum.
column3: Segel dari Sanctuary pada Broken Pillar Canyon ada di beberapa tempat. Tolong lepaskan segel yang ada di sebelah kiri dari Collapsed Sanctuary.

column2: Biteregina appeared when you removed the seal! Defeat it!
column3: Biteregina muncul ketika kamu menghapus seal! Kalahkan dia!

column2: Actual works become serious from now. Talk to Raudi again.
column3: Kerja yang sebenarnya menjadi serius mulai sekarang. Bicaralah dengan Raudi lagi.

column2: Check the stone pillars of Alkune Stairway
column3: Periksa stone pillars of Alkune Stairway.

column2: Now that you have taken care of the monsters, check the stone pillars around Alkune Stairway. You will be able to find traces of relics in the pillars.
column3: Sekarang kamu sudah mengurus monster, periksa stone pillar sekitar Alkune Stairway. Kamu akan bisa menemukan jejak relic di pillar.

column2: Retrieved all the relics of Raudi. Return and give the relics to Raune.
column3: Sudah mendapatkan semua relic of Raudi. Kembali dan berikan relic kepada Raune.

column2: Check the Epitaph
column3: Periksa Epitaph.

column2: There are epitaphs about the Royal Mausoleum in Shirnas Plateau. Check the epitaph of Serno Highland which is one of it.
column3: Ada epitaph tentang Royal Tomb di Shirnas Plateau. Periksa apakah epitaph of Shirnas salah satunya.

column2: Defeat the monsters nearby the epitaph
column3: Kalahkan monster di dekat Epitaph.

column2: Monsters appeared as if to protect the epitaph when you touched it! Defeat the monsters first then check the epitaph.
column3: Monster muncul untuk melindungi epitaph ketika kamu menyentuhnya! Pertama kalahkan monsternya kemudian periksa epitaph.

column2: Check the epitaph again
column3: Periksa epitaph kembali.

column2: Got rid of the monsters. Now, check the epitaph again.
column3: Berhasil mengalahkan monster. Sekarang, periksa epitaph lagi.

column2: Defeat the monsters near the epitaph
column3: Kalahkan monster didekat epitaph.

column2: There are many epitaphs that hold secrets in the Dense Mist Plateau Royal Mausoleum. Examine the one on the left of Dykyne Fork.
column3: Terdapat banyak Epitath yang menyimpan rahasia dari Royal Tomb pada Dense Mist Plateau. Diantaranya cobalah memeriksa Epitath di sebelah kiri Dykyne Fork.

column2: Defeat the monsters
column3: Kalahkan monsternya.

column2: Monsters sprouted out before you even got to check the epitaph! Defeat them first then check the epitaph again.
column3: Monster bermunculan bahkan sebelum kamu memeriksa epitaph! Kalahkan mereka dulu kemudian periksa epitaph kembali.

column2: Barely got rid of the monsters. Now check the epitaph thoroughly.
column3: Hampir saja tidak bisa mengalahkan monster. Sekarang periksa epitaph dengan teliti.

column2: Defeat Zinutekas
column3: Kalahkan Zinutekas.

column2: Body of the collapsed mercenary
column3: Body of the collapsed mercenary.

column2: There are many dead people around due to the monsters' raid. Approach and comfort them.
column3: Banyak orang meninggal disini karena serangan monster. Dekati dan hibur mereka.

column2: Ambush of Hogmas
column3: Penyergapan Hogmas.

column2: Hogmas hiding appeared when you touched the dead body. Defeat them.
column3: Hogmas yang bersembunyi, muncul saat Kamu menyentuh mayat. Kalahkan mereka.

column2: Confort the body to rest in peace
column3: Kuburkan mayatnya untuk beristirahat dalam damai.

column2: Defeated all the monsters nearby. Comfor the bodies to rest in peace.
column3: Berhasil mengalahkan semua monster di dekatnya. Kuburkan mayatnya untuk beristirahat dalam damai.

column2: Defeat the Hogmas ambushing
column3: Kalahkan Hogmas yang menyergap.

column2: Tzedej Altar
column3: Tzedej Altar

column2: There is a something sealed at the Tzedej Altar at King's Plateau. Approach and attempt to break it.
column3: Terdapat suatu segel pada Chedek Altar yang ada di King's Plateau. Hampirilah dan coba lepaskan segel itu.

column2: Monster Appeared
column3: Monster muncul.

column2: The altar suddenly broke and monster statues showed up! Defeat the Hogmas from the statues!
column3: Altar tiba-tiba pecah dan patung monster muncul! Bunuh Hogmas dari patung-patung itu!

column2: Defeat the Hogmas shown as stone statues
column3: Kalahkan Hogmas yang berwujud patung batu itu.

column2: Treasure Chest of Overlooking Crossroad
column3: Overlooking Crossroad Treasure Box

column2: Open the Treasure Chest of Overlooking Crossroad.
column3: Cobalah buka Overlooking Crossroad Treasure Box.

column2: Hogmas appeared when opening the Treasure Chest! Defeat them.
column3: Hogmas muncul ketika membuka Treasure Chest! Kalahkan mereka.

column2: Defeat the Hogmas Attacking
column3: Bunuh Hogmas yang menyerang.

column2: Talk to the Security Guard
column3: Bicara dengan Security Guard.

column2: The Security Guard seems to be in trouble. Talk to her.
column3: Security Guard tampaknya berada dalam kesulitan. Bicara kepadanya.

column2: Finding Treasure Chest from the ruins
column3: Temukan Treasure Chest dari reruntuhan.

column2: The Security Guard seems to have been chased by the monsters until here. Find the treasure chest that the Security Guard was protecting in the Traceless Ruins.
column3: Security Guard sepertinya dikejar oleh monster sampai sini. Temukan treasure chest yang dijaga oleh Security Guard di Traceless Ruins.

column2: Found the Treasure Chest but it is empty and you just met a lot of Hogmas. Tell about it to the Security Guard.
column3: Menemukan Treasure Chest tetapi kosong dan kamu hanya bertemu banyak Hogmas. Beritahu itu kepada Security Guard.

column2: Look for the Security Guard
column3: Apa yang guard sedang cari.

column2: Told her that the treasure chest was empty. But the Security Guard still seems like she needs more help. Talk to her.
column3: Katakan kepadanya bahwa treasure chest kosong. Tapi Security Guard tampaknya butuh bantuan. Bicara dengannya.

column2: Find the necklace from the Hogmas
column3: Temukan kalung dari Hogmas.

column2: When you use the V key, the body of the Hogma Captain with the necklace will shine. Find the necklace and give it to the Security Guard.
column3: Ketika kamu menggunakan tombol V, tubuh Hogma Captain dengan kalung itu akan bersinar. Temukan kalung dan berikan kepada Security Guard.

column2: Bring the necklace
column3: Bawa kalung itu.

column2: Found the necklace the Security Guard was looking for. Bring it to the Security Guard.
column3: Menemukan kalung yang dicari oleh Security Guard. Bawa ke Security Guard.

column2: Examine the Tree Root Crystal
column3: memeriksa Tree Root Crystal

column2: There is a mutated Tree Root Crystal north of the Posukis Path plaza. You may be able to find what to do if you go and examine it.
column3: Terdapat Tree Root Crystal yang berada di bagian atas Pasukti Path Plaza. Cobalah datang mendekat dan amatilah, sepertinya ada caranya.

column2: Separating monster souls
column3: Memisahkan roh para Monster

column2: The curse cast on the Tree Root Crystal will transfer to the monsters if you lure them near and strike the Tree Root Crystal after wearing the monsters down. Defeat the monsters after the curse has been transfered to slowly destroy the Tree Root Crystal.
column3: Setelah membuat HP habis, dengan membawa para monster ke sekitar Tree Root Crystal, jika menyerang Tree Root Crystal maka Tree Root Crystal Cursed berubah menjadi monster. Coba hancurkan crystal perlahan dengan membunuh monster yang berubah.

column2: Talk to Pilgrim Witas
column3: Bicara dengan Pilgrim Witas.

column2: Witas might regain sanity if one for the objects you have gathered is his. Let's show him the objects.
column3: Diantara Benda-benda yang didapat selama itu, entah apakah ia bisa tersadarkan kembali jika terdapat milik Witas Maricoba perlihatkan.

column2: Stop Witas, who turned into a monster
column3: Hentikan Witas, yang berubah menjadi monster.

column2: Witas turned into a monster after seeing the objects instead of calming down. Defeat him first before attempting to talk to him again.
column3: Setelah memperlihatkan barang-barang, ia menjerit menakutkan dan berubah menjadi monster. Pertama-tama cobalah bicara sekali lagi setelah membunuhnya.

column2: You have thankfully defeated the boss. Talk to Witas.
column3: Untungnya berhasil mengalahkan Boss. Bicaralah dengan Witas.

column2: Defeat Witas who has turned into Velorchard
column3: Bunuh Witas yang berubah menjadi Velochard

column2: Witas has fallen. Try to talk to him.
column3: Witas terkapar. Cobalah bicara kepadanya.

column2: Make a grave for Witas
column3: Buat sebuah makam untuk Witas.

column2: Witas has passed away. Make him a grave.
column3: Witas telah meninggal. Buatlah pemakaman untuknya.

column2: Pilgrim Theophilus is suddenly looking for you.
column3: Mendadak Pilgrim Theopillis sedang mencari anda.

column2: Necklace of Greed
column3: Necklace of Greed

column2: It seems as Theophilus is making something for you.{nl}Talk to him to recieve it.
column3: Theopillis sepertinya akan membuatkan sesuatu.{nl} Dapatkanlah setelah bicara dengannya.

column2: Check the Crystal Pillar in the Closed Area
column3: Periksa Crystal Pillar di Closed Area.

column2: There is a huge Crystal Pillar in the closed area. Check out the Crystal Pillar.
column3: Ada Crystal Pillar yang sangat besar di closed area. Periksa Crystal Pillar itu.

column2: Get the Slate
column3: Dapatkan Slate.

column2: The girl who was with the villagers appeared, took the slate in the seal and disappeared. Can't tell what that is but let's bring the slate.
column3: Gadis yang bersama dengan villager muncul, mengambil slate di dalam seal dan menghilang. Tidak bisa menjelaskan apa itu tapi mari bawa slate nya.

column2: Talk to Knight Commander Uska
column3: Bicara dengan Knight Commander Uska.

column2: You went to Crystal Mines to find the evidence of salvation but all you found was a mysterious slate. Talk to Klaipeda Knight Commander Uska about the slate.
column3: Kamu pergi ke Crystal Mines untuk menemukan evidence of salvation tapi yang kamu temukan hanya mysterious slate. Bicara dengan Klaipeda Knight Commander Uska tentang slate itu.

column2: You followed the revelation of the goddess that the bishop saw in this dreams and obtained the Mysterious Slate. Talk to Knight Commander Uska about the Mysterious Slate.
column3: Kamu mengikuti petunjuk dari Goddess bahwa bishop terlihat dalam mimpinya dan mendapatkan Mysterious Slate. Bicara dengan Knight Commander Uska tenatang Mysterious Slate.

column2: Ask the Bokor Master for interpretation of the revelation
column3: Bertanya pada Bokor Master tentang tafsir dari petunjuk itu.

column2: Ask Bokor Mama about this slate. She lives in the left end of Klaipeda residential area.
column3: Bertanya pada Bokor Mama tentang slate. Dia tinggal di ujung kiri Klaipeda residential area.

column2: The slate found in the Crystal Mines is both the revelation and Goddess Laima herself. It contains a message about finding the next revelation in a holy church. Return to Sir Uska as the Bokor Master says.
column3: Slate yang ditemukan di  Crystal Mines adalah antara petunjuk dan Goddess Laima sendiri. Itu mengandung sebuah pesan tentang menemukan petunjuk berikutnya di sebuah holy chapel. Kembali ke Sir Uska seperti yang dikatakan Bokor Master.

column2: The Slate discovered at Crystal Mine was a revelation from the goddesses warning about a threat in the Leav Veil Plateau region. Report back to Knight Commander Uska.
column3: Identitas dari Tablet yang ditemukan di Crystal Mine, berisikan perintah untuk mencegah bahaya dari seluruh Leaf Veil Plateau melalui Goddess Revelation. Laporkanlah kepada Knight Captain Uska.

column2: Knight Commander Uska thinks the high gardens in the revelation refers to an area in Leaf Veil Plateau and told you to go the Paladin Master. Drop by the Mayor of Miner's Village and ask for directions to Leaf Veil Plateau.
column3: Knight Commander Uska berpikir bahwa high garden di dalam petunjuk itu adalah sebuah area di Leaf Veil Plateau dan mengatakan padamu untuk pergi ke Paladin Master. Mampirlah ke Mayor of Miner's Village dan tanyakan arah ke Leaf Veil Plateau.

column2: Interferance of Lepus blocking the way
column3: Interferance of Lepus menghalangi jalan.

column2: Defeat Lepus that is blocking the way
column3: Kalahkan Lepus yang menghalangi jalan.

column2: Talk to Soldier Moody
column3: Bicara dengan Soldier Moody.

column2: Officer Liudas is asking Moody to bring the report on Sparnas. Find Soldier Moody at the Amzina Curved Path.
column3: Commander Liudas meminta Moody membawa laporan Sparnas. Temukan Soldier Moody di Amzina Curved Path.

column2: Retrieve the report that Siaulambs took away
column3: Mengambil laporan yang diambil oleh Siaulambs.

column2: Moody says he lost the report while fighting against the Siaulambs. Find the report for him.
column3: Moody mengatakan ia kehilangan laporan itu saat melawan Siaulambs. Cari laporan itu untuknya.

column2: Give it to Officer Liudas
column3: Berikan ke Officer Liudas

column2: Moody found the lost report. Give the report to Officer Liudas.
column3: Moody menemukan laporan yang hilang. Berikan laporan ke Officer Liudas.

column2: Defeat Siaulago and get %s
column3: Kalahkan Siaulago dan mendapat %s

column2: Siaulago
column3: Siaulago

column2: Talk to Adjudant Volda
column3: Bicara dengan Adjudant Volda.

column2: Volda got back the stolen supplies and is enraged for revenge. Talk to Volda again.
column3: Volda mendapatkan kembali suplai yang dicuri dan marah untuk membalas dendam. Bicara dengan Volda lagi.

column2: Stealing the Trophy box
column3: Mencuri Trophy box.

column2: Volda says revenge must be made by stealing the Siaulamb's trophy box. Steal the pile of Siaulamb's trphy boxes in Ziedo pond.
column3: Volda berkata balas dendam harus dilakukan dengan mencuri Siaulamb trophy box. Curi setumpuk Siaulamb trophy box di Ziedo pond.

column2: Stole all of Siaulamb's trophies. Give it to Volda.
column3: Berhasil mencuri semua Siaulamb trophy. Berikan ke Volda.

column2: Defeat the monster guarding the box
column3: Kalahkan monster yang menjaga kotak.

column2: Volda know a sure way to defeat the Siaulambs. Talk to Volda.
column3: Volda tahu cara pasti untuk mengalahkan Siaulambs. Bicaralah dengan Volda.

column2: Check inside the shabby box
column3: Periksalah isi shabby box.

column2: Volda says we should defeat the brush trap balls that the Siaulambs eat. Find the brush trap balls inside the shabby box in the 4th Supplies Warehouse.
column3: Volda mengatakan kita harus mengalahkan brush trap ball yang Siaulambs makan. Temukan brush trap ball dalam e shabby box di 4th Supplies Warehouse.

column2: Burn the brush trap balls
column3: Bakar brush trap balls.

column2: Found the brush trap balls in the shabby box. Burn all of it in the fire beside it.
column3: Menemukan brush trap balls di shabby box. Bakar semuanya dengan api di sampingnya.

column2: Report to Volda
column3: Lapor kepada Volda.

column2: Burned all the brush trap balls in the box. Return to volda and report.
column3: Berhasil membakar semua brush trap balls di dalam kotak. Kembali ke volda dan lapor.

column2: Defeat the Siaulambs that ambushed
column3: Kalahkan Siaulambs yang menyerang tiba-tiba.

column2: Examine the shabby box
column3: Periksa shabby box.

column2: Volda says we should defeat the brush trap balls that the Siaulambs eat. Find the brush trap balls inside the shabby box in the 2nd Supplies Warehouse.
column3: Volda berkata kita harus mengalahkan brush trap balls yang Siaulambs makan. Temukan brush trap balls di dalam shabby box di 2nd Supplies Warehouse.

column2: Defeat the remnants of Siaulambs
column3: Kalahkan sisa-sisa Siaulambs.

column2: Found the pouch full of brush trap balls and the Siaulambs went mad and start to attack. Defeat all the Siaulambs.
column3: Menemukan kantong penuh brush trap balls dan siaulambs menjadi gila dan mulai menyerang. Kalahkan semua Siaulambs.

column2: Defeated all remnanats of Siaulambds but there is no place to burn the brash trap balls. Give it to Volda.
column3: Mengalahkan semua sisa-sisa Siaulambds tetapi tidak ada tempat untuk membakar brush trap balls. Berikan kepada Volda.

column2: You must give Moody's report to Officer Liudas. Return to Liudas in Central Supplies Camp and talk to him.
column3: Kamu harus memberikan laporan Moody kepada Officer Liudas. Kembali ke Liudas di Central Supplies Camp dan bicara dengannya.

column2: Check the monster in Amzina Curved Path
column3: Periksa monster di Amzina Curved Path.

column2: Liudas says he got a report about a large monster showing up. Check the monster in Amzina Curved Path.
column3: Liudas mengatakan ia mendapat laporan tentang monster besar muncul. Periksa monster di Amzina Curved Path.

column2: The large monster in A,zina rooked Road was Tutu, not Sparnas. Report about it to Liudas.
column3: Monster besar di Amzina Crooked Road adalah Tutu, bukan Sparnas. Laporkan tentang hal pada Liudas.

column2: Lure and defeat Tutu
column3: Pancing dan kalahkan Tutu.

column2: Officer Liudas is frustated at the current situation. Talk to him again.
column3: Officer Liudas frustrasi saat ini. Bicara padanya lagi.

column2: Talk to Liudas in Malkos Felled Area
column3: Bicara dengan Liudas di Malkos Felled Area.

column2: Liudas says he has to take care of things himself. Follow Liudas to Malkos Felled Area.
column3: Liudas mengatakan dia harus mengurus hal-hal sendiri. Ikuti Liudas ke Malkos Felled Area.

column2: Defeat the monsters attacking Liudas
column3: Kalahkan monster yang menyerang Liudas

column2: Talk to the Scout.
column3: Bicara pada scout.

column2: Talk to the Scout to learn about Status Points.
column3: Bicara pada scout.

column2: - use this key to open your Character Information then use Status Points
column3: Gunakan tombol ini untuk membuka Informasi Karakter dan menggunakan Status Poin.

column2: Listen to the Scout and try using a Status.
column3: Dengarkan scout dan coba gunakan Status.

column2: Talk to the Scout
column3: Bicara pada Scout.

column2: Talk to the Scout again
column3: Bicara pada scout lagi.

column2: On the road back
column3: Perjalanan kembali.

column2: You feel something suspicious when worshiping the Goddess Statue. Talk to the Statue again.
column3: Kamu merasakan sesuatu yang mencurigakan ketika menghormati Statue of Goddess. Berbicara dengan Statue lagi

column2: Mushcaria has appeared! Defeat it.
column3: Mushcaria muncul! Kalahkan dia.

column2: Defeated Mushcaria!
column3: Berhasil mengalahkan Mushcaria!

column2: You have completed retrieving the supplies. Talk to the Supply Officer again.
column3: Kamu telah menyelesaikan mengambil suplai. Bicara dengan Supply Officer lagi.

column2: Defeat Tutu
column3: Kalahkan Tutu.

column2: Tutu made a surprise ambush. Defeat Tutu.
column3: Tutu membuat serangan kejutan. Kalahkan Tutu.

column2: You defeated Tutu. Talk to the Supply Officer.
column3: Kamu telah mengalahkan Tutu. Bicara dengan Supply Officer.

column2: Gustas Jonas seems to welcome you. Ask him about the location of Great King Zachariel's legacy.
column3: Gustas Jonas tampaknya menyambut Anda. Tanyakan padanya tentang lokasi King Zachariel legacy.

column2: Release the seal located on the left of the Collapsed Sanctum.
column3: Lepaskan seal yang terletak di sebelah kiri dari Collapsed Sanctum.

column2: Gustas says there is one seal left but he sensed a dangerous energy. Release the on the left of the crumbled sanctuary. You also need to be careful of the monsters' attacks.
column3: Gustas mengatakan ada satu seal tertinggal tapi dia merasakan energi berbahaya. Lepaskan di sebelah kiri dari crumbled sanctuary. Kamu juga perlu berhati-hati dari serangan monster.

column2: Released the last seal. Return to Gustas Jonas.
column3: Segel terakhir terlepas. Kembali ke Gustas Jonas.

column2: Talk to Liaison Officer Nian
column3: Bicara dengan Liaison Officer Nian.

column2: Nian is informing you about the mysterious stone
column3: Nian memberitahukan Kamu tentang batu misterius.

column2: Defeat the monsters attacking Liaison Officer Nian
column3: Membunuh monster yang menyerang Liaison Officer Nian.

column2: Touched the mysterious stone to take a closer look but then monsters appeared! Better defeat the monsters first.
column3: Menyentuh batu misterius untuk melihat lebih dekat tapi kemudian muncul monster! Lebih baik singkirkan monster itu dulu.

column2: Defeated the monsters. Talk to Nian about what happened.
column3: Mengalahkan monster. Bicaralah dengan Nian tentang apa yang terjadi.

column2: Talk to Historian Adelle
column3: Bicara dengan Historian Adele.

column2: Historian Adelle know it was someone Nian sent. Ask why she is not withdrawing.
column3: Historian Adele tahu itu seseorang yang dikirim Nian. Bertanya mengapa dia tidak tertarik.

column2: Collect stones with mysterious patterns
column3: Kumpulkan batu dengan pola misterius.

column2: Historian Adelle is also curious about the mysterious stones. She says something is going on and wants to study more stones. Collect the stones with mysterious patterns from the Hogmas for Adelle.
column3: Historian Adele juga ingin tahu tentang batu misterius. Dia mengatakan sesuatu yang terjadi dan ingin mempelajari lebih banyak batu. Kumpulkan batu dengan pola misterius dari Hogmas untuk Adele.

column2: Give it to Adelle
column3: Berikan ke Adele.

column2: Gathered enough stones with patterns. Give it to Adelle.
column3: Mengumpulkan batu  secukupnya dengan pola. Berikan ke Adele.

column2: Defeat Hogma Archers and gather %s
column3: Kalahkan Hogma Archers dan dapatkan %s

column2: Defeat Hogma Archers and gather Stones with a strange engraving
column3: Bunuh Hogma Archer dan dapatkan batu dengan ukiran aneh.

column2: Talk to Archaeologist Friedka
column3: Bicara dengan Archaeologist Friedka.

column2: Archaeologist Friedka is looking for someone to do a great mission with him. Talk to him.
column3: Archaeologist Friedka mencari seseorang untuk melakukan misi besar dengan dia. Bicara dengannya.

column2: Get the monster's amulet
column3: Dapatkan monster amulet.

column2: Archaeologist Friedka is looking for someone who can help him. First, get the amulets from the Hogmas.
column3: Archaeologist Friedka mencari seseorang yang bisa membantunya. Pertama, dapatkan jimat dari Hogmas.

column2: Archaeologist Friedka is carefully looking at the map from the stone pillars. Talk to him.
column3: Archaeologist Friedka sangat teliti melihat peta dari stone pillars. Bicara kepadanya.

column2: Gather the rubbings from Stone Pillar Hill
column3: Dapatkan cetakan dari Stone Pillar Hill.

column2: Seems like Friedka found something from the map. Get him the rubbings from Stone Pillar Hill as he requested.
column3: Sepertinya Friedka menemukan sesuatu dari peta. Dapatkan cetakan dari Stone Pillar Hill seperti yang dia minta.

column2: Got the rubbings that Archaeologist Friedka wanted. Return to Archaeologist Friedka.
column3: Berhasil mendapatkan cetakan yang Archaeologist Friedka inginkan. Kembali ke Archaeologist Friedka.

column2: Defeat the Bebraspion that is interfering the rubbing
column3: Mengalahkan Bebraspion yang merusak cetakan.

column2: You got Adelle the stones she want so try to persuade her to withdraw.
column3: Kamu punya stone yang Adele inginkan coba membujuknya untuk menariknya.

column2: Defeat the monsters
column3: Kalahkan monster.

column2: Could it be because of the stones? Monsters are attacking. Protect yourself from the attacks.
column3: Mungkinkah karena batu? Monster menyerang. Lindungi diri dari serangan.

column2: Defeated all the monsters that attacked. Persuade Adelle quickly to withdraw.
column3: Berhasil mengalahkan semua monster yang menyerang. Cepat bujuk Adele untuk menariknya.

column2: Kolin says he doesn't know Rexipher. Ask another historian about Rexipher.
column3: Kolin mengatakan dia tidak tahu Rexipher. Tanyakan historian lain tentang Rexipher.

column2: Gorath seems to be in trouble. Talk to him.
column3: Gorath tampaknya berada dalam kesulitan. Bicara kepadanya

column2: Talk to Historian Badat
column3: Bicara dengan Historian Badat.

column2: Gorath is asking you to find his lost friends. His friend's name is Badat so look around for him.
column3: Gorath meminta kamu untuk menemukan temannya yang hilang. Nama temannya adalah Badat, jadi carilah dia.

column2: Found Badat. Talk to him so that he can return safely.
column3: Menemukan Badat. Bicara padanya sehingga ia bisa kembali dengan selamat.

column2: Historian Badat seems to be looking for something. Talk to him.
column3: Historian Badat tampaknya mencari sesuatu. Bicara kepadanya.

column2: Finding Historian Badat's research.
column3: Menemukan penelitian Historian Badat.

column2: Historian Badat says he'll return to the Excavation Camp when he finds his research materials. Hunt Tontus and get back the research materials for Badat.
column3: Historian Badat mengatakan dia akan kembali ke Research Camp ketika ia menemukan bahan penelitiannya. Berburu Tontus dan dapatkan kembali bahan penelitian untuk Badat.

column2: Give the research materials quickly so that Badat can return to camp/
column3: Cepat berikan bahan penelitian sehingga Badat dapat kembali ke camp.

column2: Obtain %s by defeating Tontus
column3: Dapatkan %s dengan mengalahkan Tontus.

column2: Defeat Tontus and retrieve the research material
column3: Kalahkan Tontus dan mengambil bahan penelitian.

column2: Talk to Kevin
column3: Bicara dengan Kevin.

column2: There's a suspicious person looking like a forger. Talk to Kevin.
column3: Ada orang yang mencurigakan tampak seperti pemalsu. Bicara dengan Kevin.

column2: Gathering firewood
column3: Mengumpulkan kayu bakar.

column2: Kevin says he is going to make counterfeits and asks you to gather firewood. First, bring him what he wants for definite evidence.
column3: Kevin mengatakan ia akan membuat tiruan dan meminta Kamu untuk mengumpulkan kayu bakar. Pertama bawakan apa yang dia inginkan untuk melihat buktinya.

column2: Gathered all the firewood needed. Talk to Kevin again.
column3: Mengumpulkan semua kayu bakar yang dibutuhkan. Bicara dengan Kevin lagi.

column2: Looks like the preparations are complete. Wonder how Kevin makes counterfeits. Talk to him again.
column3: Sepertinya persiapan sudah selesai. Bertanya-tanya bagaimana Kevin membuat tiruan. Bicara padanya lagi.

column2: Collect hard lime from monsters
column3: Kumpulkan hard lime dari monster.

column2: Kevin says he can never show you how he works and asks you to get hard lime from monsters nearby. Get him the lime first.
column3: Kevin mengatakan dia tidak akan menunjukkan bagaimana dia bekerja dan memintamu mendapatkan hard lime dari monster di sekitar. Pertama bawakan dia lime.

column2: Gathered enough lime. Return to Kevin.
column3: Mengumpulkan cukup lime. Kembali ke Kevin.

column2: Defeat nearby monsters and acquire %s
column3: Kalahkan monster terdekat dan mendapatkan %s.

column2: Desert Chupacabra/Zinute
column3: Desert Chupacabra/Zinute

column2: Vincent looks somewhat tiresome. Talk to him.
column3: Vincent terlihat agak lelah. Bicara kepadanya.

column2: Making Counterfeits
column3: Membuat tiruan.

column2: Vincent is lazy and asked you to do his work for him. Finish the forgeries as he told you to. Blue smoke will appear when the forgery is complete in the mold.
column3: Vincent malas dan memintamu membuatnya. Selesaikan tiruan seperti yang dia katakan. Asap biru akan muncul ketika tiruannya sudah selesai dalam cetakan.

column2: Give the forgeries to Vincent
column3: Berikan tiruan ke Vincent.

column2: Took out the conterfeit. Give it to Vincent to finish.
column3: Mengambil tiruan. Berikan ke Vincent untuk diselesaikan.

column2: Talk to Sculptor Hilda
column3: Bicara dengan Sculptor Hilda.

column2: Sculptor Hilda seems to be looking around. Talk to her and find out what is going on.
column3: Sculptor Hilda tampaknya sedang melihat sekeliling. Bicara dengannya dan cari tahu apa yang terjadi.

column2: Find the cool pillar Hilda talked about
column3: Temukan cool pillar yang Hilda ceritakan.

column2: Hilda wants to see a unique and cool pillar. If you find a cool pillar among the ancient pillars, pick up its debris and show it to Hilda.
column3: Hilda ingin melihat sebuah benda unik dan cool pillar. Jika kamu menemukan sebuah cool pillar diantara ancient pillar, ambil debrisnya dan tunjukkan ke Hilda.

column2: You found some pillars that Hilda would like. Show Hilda the debris that you picked up.
column3: Kamu menemukan beberapa pillar yang Hilda inginkan. Tunjukkan kepada Hilda debris yang kamu ambil.

column2: Seems like Hilda needs help. Talk to her.
column3: Sepertinya Hilda butuh bantuan. Bicara dengannya.

column2: Protect Sculptor Hilda
column3: Lindungi Sculptor Hilda.

column2: Hilda asked you to guard her while she observes the pillars. Please respond to her passion for pillars.
column3: Hilda memintamu untuk menjaganya ketika dia observasi pillar. Tolong respon keinginannya kepada pillar.

column2: Hilda is done observing the pillars. Talk to her again.
column3: Hilda telah selesai observasi pillar. Bicara dengannya lagi.

column2: Talk to Hilda who has sparkling eyes looking  at the pillars.
column3: Bicara dengan Hilda yang matanya berbinar ketika melihat pillar.

column2: Protect Sculptor Hilda
column3: Lindungi Sculptor Hilda.

column2: Hilda want to observe the pillar longer. Protect her from the monsters while she observes the pillars.
column3: Hilda ingin observasi pillar lebih lama. Lindungi dia dari monster selama dia observasi pillar.

column2: Seem like Hilda is done checking the pillars. Talk to her.
column3: Sepertinya Hilda sudah selesai memeriksa pillar. Bicara dengannya.

column2: You have to stop the demons attacking the Royal Mausoleum, while chasing Rexipher. Talk to the Guardian's Stone Statue.
column3: Kamu harus menghentikan demon yang menyerang mausoleum ketika mengejar Rexipher. Bicara dengan Statue of guardian.

column2: Get the pieces of the Royal Slate.
column3: Dapatkan piece of Royal Slate.

column2: Mausoleum Guardians are hoarding the pieces of the Royal Slate that Rexipher destroyed. Collect the pieces of the slate from the Royal Mausoleum Guardians.
column3: Mausoleum Guardian menjaga pieces of the Royal Slate yang dihancurkan Rexipher. Kumpulkan pieces of slate dari Mausoleum Guardian.

column2: Collected all pieces of the slate. Talk to the Guardian's Stone Statue.
column3: Telah mengumpulkan semua pieces of the slate. Bicara dengan statue of guardian.

column2: Defeat Guardian and get %s
column3: Kalahkan guardian dan mendapatkan %s

column2: Retrieve Pieces of Royal Slate
column3: Mengambil Pieces of Royal Slate.

column2: Liaison Officer Niels say Jonas' family is looking for you. Talk to Ahylas in the Excavation Camp.
column3: Liaison Officer Niels berkata keluarganya Jonas sedang mencarimu. Bicara dengan Ahilas di Search Camp.

column2: Collect the Shiny Tree Sap.
column3: Kumpulkan Precious Tree Sap.

column2: Ahylas needs to prepare the legacy of Great King Zachariel for the chosen one. He needs the Shiny Tree Sap which is called the tears of Goddess Zemyna. Go to Zeme Highland to obtain the sap.
column3: Ahilas harus mempersiapkan legacy of Zachariel untuk seseorang yang terpilih. Dia butuh Precious Tree Sap yang disebut Tears of Goddess Zemyna. Pergi ke Zeme Plateau dan dapatkan sap.

column2: Talk to Ahylas
column3: Bicara dengan Ahilas.

column2: Got enough tree sap. Bring it to Ahylas.
column3: Mendapatkan cukup tree sap. Berikan ke Ahilas.

column2: Seems like Ahylas is matching a crystal to release the seal so that you can approach Great King Zachariel's legacy.
column3: Sepertinya Ahilas membawa sebuah crystal untuk melepaskan seal sehingga kamu bisa mendekati King Zachariel's legacy.

column2: Collect Canyon Amalas
column3: Kumpulkan Canyon Amalas.

column2: Ahylas says he needs Amalas to make the crystal for unsealing. Get Amalas from Pamirstas Highland. Amalas is difficult to collect so be careful.
column3: Ahilas berkata dia butuh Amalas untuk membuat crystal melepas seal. Dapatkan Amalas dari Pamirsit Plateau. Amalas sulit untuk didapatkan jadi berhati-hatilah.

column2: Give it to Ahylas
column3: Berikan ke Ahilas.

column2: Got enough Amalas. Give it to Ahylas.
column3: Mendapatkan cukup Amalas. Berikan ke Ahilas.

column2: Treasure Hunter Eden at High Winding Road is waiting for someone's help.
column3: Treasure Hunter Edang dari High Crooked Road, sedang menunggu bantuan dari seseorang.

column2: Defeat Tama
column3: Kalahkan Tama.

column2: Treasure Hunter Eden asked you to defeat Tamas in the northern area if you want to help his search for treasure.
column3: Treasure Hunter Eden memintamu mengalahkan Tama di area utara jika kamu ingin membantu pencarian harta karun.

column2: Defeated enough Tamas as Treasure Hunter Eden requested. Return to Treasure Hunter Eden.
column3: Berhasil mengalahkan cukup Tama seperti yang diminta Treasure Hunter Eden. Kembali ke Treasure Hunter Eden.

column2: Find the Fourth Piece of Gravestone
column3: Temukan bagian keempat dari Gravestone.

column2: Treasure Hunter says he's sure that Tama swallowed the relics. Defeat Tama and get the relics.
column3: Treasure Hunter berkata dia yakin bahwa Tama menelan relic. Kalahkan Tama dan dapatkan relicnya.

column2: Tama has the fourth gravestone piece as the treasure hunter said. Give it to Treasure Hunter Eden.
column3: Tama mempunyai bagian keempat dari gravestone seperti yang dikatakan treasure hunter. Berikan ke Treasure Hunter Eden.

column2: Defeat Tama and get %s
column3: Kalahkan Tama dan dapatkan %s

column2: Collect Stumpy Tree Sap
column3: Kumpulkan sap of Mondane Tree.

column2: Treasure Hunter Eden asked you to collect the sap of Stumpy Tree for its worth. Attach sap collectors to Stumpy Trees and defeat them afterwards to get their sap.
column3: Treasure Hunter Eden memintamu mengumpulkan sap of Mondane Tree sebagai gantinya. Tempelkan sap collector di mondane tree dan dapatkan sap setelah beberapa saat.

column2: Collected enough Stumpy Tree Sap. Return to Treasure Hunter Eden.
column3: Cukup mengumpulkan mondane tree sap. Kembali ke Treasure Hunter Eden.

column2: Finding fragments of ruins
column3: Menemukan fragment of ruin.

column2: Treasure Hunter Eden asked you to get the fragments of ruins buried in the Crossroad Vacant Lot.
column3: Treasure Hunter Eden memintamu mendapatkan fragment of ruin yang dikuburkan di Crossroad Vacant Lot.

column2: Found the fragments of ruins asked by Treasure Hunter Eden. Return and give it to him.
column3: Menemukan fragment of ruin yang diminta oleh Treasure Hunter Eden. Kembali dan berikan kepadanya.

column2: Get the first rubbing at Virdului Mountain Cabin
column3: Dapatkan cetakan pertama di Virdului Mountain Cabin.

column2: Hunter Talus asked you to get a rubbing of Lydia Schaffen's Gravestone at Virdului Mountain Cabin.
column3: Hunter Tallus memintamu mendapatkan sebuah cetakan dari Lydia Schaffen Gravestone di Villurie Cabin.

column2: The Second Rubbing
column3: Cetakan kedua

column2: You need to find the gravestone of Lydia Schaffen that is left here as Hunter Talus says. Find the second gravestone and get its rubbings.
column3: Kamu harus menemukan gravestone of Lydia Schaffen yang tersisa di sini seperti yang dikatakan Hunter Tallus. Temukan gravestone kedua dan dapatkan cetakannya.

column2: Made the rubbings of Lydia Schaffens' first and second gravestones. Return to Talus.
column3: Telah membuat cetakan pertama dan kedua dari Lydia Schaffens gravestone. Kembali ke Tallus.

column2: Get charcoal and work on the third rubbings in Kriakul Brook.
column3: Dapatkan charcoal dan buat cetakan ketiga di Kriakul Stream.

column2: Hunter Talus used up all his charcoal. Use bombs on Long-Branched Trees to defeat it for more charcoal. Then get the third gravestone rubbings in Kriakul Brook.
column3: Tallus telah menggunakan semua charcoal. Gunakan bom ke Long-Branched Trees untuk mendapatkan lebih banyak charcoal. Kemudian dapatkan cetakan ketiga gravestone di Kriakul Stream.

column2: Made the rubbings of the gravestone like Hunter Talus said. Return to Hunter Talus.
column3: Telah membuat cetakan gravestone seperti yang dikatakan Tallus. Kembali ke Tallus.

column2: Check the fourth gravestone at the Shiluma Altar Site
column3: Periksa gravestone keempat di Shiluma Altar Site.

column2: Hunter Talus said let's part ways here and told you the last gravestone's location. Check the gravestone at the Shiluma Altar Site.
column3: Hunter Tallus berkata mari berpisah di sini dan mengatakan kepadamu lokasi gravestone terkahir. Periksa gravestone di Shiluma Altar Site.

column2: Finding the Last Gravestone
column3: Menemukan Gravestone terakhir.

column2: Find the last gravestone of Lydia Schaffen over the Griuve Highway and be enlightened.
column3: Temukan gravestone terakhir dari Lydia Schaffen over the Griuve Trail dan akan tercerahkan.

column2: Find the Last Gravestone at Griuve Highway
column3: Temukan Gravestone terakhir di Griuve Trail.

column2: Find Agailla Flurry's gravestones
column3: Temukan Agailla Flurry gravetones.

column2: I found a gravestone dedicated to Agailla Flurry, the wizard who built the Mage Tower. To learn more of Agailla Flurry's secrets, find all of her gravestones.
column3: Aku menemukan sebuah gravestone untuk Agailla Flurry, penyihir yang membangun Mage Tower. Untuk mempelajari rahasia lain Agailla Flurry, temukan semua gravestonenya.

column2: Read the inscription on Agailla Flurry's gravestone
column3: Baca prasasti di Agailla Flurry gravestone.

column2: Restore the damaged gravestone of Agailla Flurry
column3: Memperbaiki prasasti Agailla Flurry yang rusak.

column2: I couldn't read the rest of the writings due to the damage from Old Hooks. Find the gravestone pieces broken by the Old Hooks and restore it.
column3: Aku tidak bisa membaca sisa tulisan karena dirusak oleh Old Hook. Temukan potongan gravestone yang dirusak oleh Old Hook dan perbaiki.

column2: Gravestone restored and legible. Read the rest of Agailla Flurry's epitaph.
column3: Gravestone sudah diperbaiki dan bisa dibaca. Baca sisa tulisan dari Agaila Flurry epitaph.

column2: Defeat Old Hooks
column3: Kalahkan Old Hook.

column2: Do Villager's Favor
column3: Lakukan kemauan Villager.

column2: Epitaph of Agailla Flurry is destroyed but someone knows what was written there. A Villager said he'll tell you if you get him his stolen bag from the Zolem.
column3: Epitaph of Agaila Flurry sudah dihancurkan tapi seseorang tahu apa yang tertulis di sana. Seorang villager berkata dia akan memberitahumu jika kamu membawakan tasnya yang dicuri Zolem.

column2: Give the Bag to the Villager
column3: Berikan tas kepada Villager.

column2: Got the Villager's bag from the Zolem. Give it to him and ask for the writings on the epitaph.
column3: Mendapatkan tas Villager dari Zolem. Berikan kepadanya dan tanyakan tentang tulisan di epitaph.

column2: Obtain %s from Zolem
column3: Mendapatkan %s dari Zolem.

column2: Find the Villager's Bag
column3: Temukan tas Villager.

column2: Talk to the Villager
column3: Bicara dengan Villager

column2: The Villager said he'll also teach you where the next gravestone is.
column3: Villager berkata dia juga akan mengajarkan kamu dimana gravestone berikutnya.

column2: Found the last epitaph but a Reaverpede is guarding it. Defeat the Reaverpede and read the epitaph.
column3: Menemukan epitaph terakhir tetapi seekor Reaverpede menjaganya. Kalahkan Reaverpede dan baca epitaphnya.

column2: Read the last epitaph of Agailla Flurry and get her Divination.
column3: Baca epitaph terakhir dari Agaila Flurry dan dapatkan ramalannya.

column2: Defeat the monsters nearby Ruklys' memorial stone
column3: Kalahkan monster disekitar Rukly Memorial Stone.

column2: Epigraphist Schmid asked you to defeat the monsters near the memorial stone while he prepares to restore the stone.
column3: Epigraphist Schmid meminta kamu mengalahkan monster didekat memorial stone saat dia bersiap untuk memperbaiki batu.

column2: Defeated the monsters as Schmid asked you. Go to him and help him restore.
column3: Berhasil mengalahkan monster seperti yang diminta Schmid. Pergi ke arahnya dan bantu dia memperbaiki.

column2: Check the strange sack
column3: Periksa karung yang aneh.

column2: There is a strange sack in front. Looks like it's empty.
column3: Ada sebuah karung yang aneh di depan. Sepertinya kosong.

column2: Collect experiment materials
column3: Kumpulkan experiment material.

column2: Found the belongings of Necromancer Drasius near Virdului Mountain Cabin. There is a memo in the bag listing out what it contains, but they aren't in the bag. Let's defeat the Long-Branched Trees and retrieve Experimental Materials for Drasius.
column3: Menemukan barang-barang dari Necromancer Drasius dekat Virdului Mountain Cabin. Ada sebuah memo di dalam tas yang berisi daftar komposisi, tapi itu tidak ada. Mari kalahkan Long-Branched Trees dan mengambil Experimental Material untuk Drasius.

column2: Collected all the lost experiment materials. Give it to Drasius.
column3: Berhasil mengumpulkan semua experiment material yang hilang. Berikan ke Drasius.

column2: Defeat Long-Branched Trees and get %s
column3: Kalahkan Long-Branched Trees dan mendapat %s

column2: Defeat Long-Branched Trees
column3: Kalahkan Long-Branched Trees.

column2: Necromancer Drasius in Goddess' Ancient Garden is waiting for someone to help him.
column3: Drasius sedang menunggu bantuan seseorang di Old Yard of Goddess.

column2: Collect Waterweed
column3: Kumpulkan Water Plant.

column2: Necromancer Drasius asked you to collect Waterweed needed for the experiment. Get the Waterweed at Kriakul Brook.
column3: Drasius meminta kamu mengumpulkan water plant yang dibutuhkan untuk experiment. Dapatkan water plant Kriakil Stream.

column2: Collected enough Waterweed. Return to Drasius.
column3: Mengumpulkan cukup water plant. Kembali ke Drasius.

column2: Lizardman Mind-Control
column3: Lizardman Mind-Control

column2: Mind-controlled Lizardmen
column3: Mind-controlled Lizardman

column2: Drasius needs Lizardmen for necromancy. Use the mind-control stone on Lizardmen near the Dumbliu Pond and attack to brainwash it.
column3: Drasius butuh lizardman untuk necromancy. Gunakan mind-control stone pada Lizardman dekat Dumbla Pond dan serang untuk mencuci otaknya.

column2: Gathered enough Lizardman. Return to Drasius.
column3: Mengumpulkan cukup Lizardman. Kembali ke Drasius.

column2: Mind-controlled Infroburk
column3: Mind-controlled Infroburk

column2: Drasius needs Infroburk for necromancy. Use the mind-control stone on Infroburks near the Nardyma Twin Waterfall and attack to brainwash it.
column3: Drasius butuh Infroburk untuk necromancy. Gunakan mind-control stone pada Infroburk dekat Nardyma Twin Waterfalls dan serang untuk mencuci otaknya.

column2: Gathered enough from Infroburk. Return to Drasius.
column3: Cukup mengumpulkan Infroburk. Kembali ke Drasius.

column2: Worship the statue and talk to Tools merchant
column3: Menghormati statue dan bicara dengan Tools merchant.

column2: Prepare to leave for the East Forest by worshiping the Goddess Statue in Central Plaza.
column3: Bersiaplah untuk berangkat ke East Forest dengan menghormati Statue of Goddess di Central Plaza.

column2: Talk to the Item Merchant
column3: Bicara dengan item merchant.

column2: Knight Commander Uska has left warp scrolls for you to use. Talk to the Item Merchant and receive the warp scrolls.
column3: Knight commander Uska meninggalkan warp scroll untuk kamu gunakan. Bicara dengan item merchant dan menerima warp scroll.

column2: Talk to the wandering soldier at Remaining Tree Dale.
column3: Cobalah bicara dengan prajurit yang berkelana di Remaining Tree Dale.

column2: Check the Military Backpack
column3: Periksa Military Backpack.

column2: The Ghost disappeared when you approached it and only the pouch is left. Check what's inside the pouch.
column3: Hantu menghilang ketika kamu mendekatinya dan hanya kantong yang tersisa. Periksa apa yang ada di dalam kantong.

column2: You've found orders underneath the soldiers diary while checking the military backpack of the Wandering Spirit at Remaining Tree Dale. Check the orders in the backpack.
column3: Sedang memeriksa backpack milik prajurit dari roh yang berkelanan di Remaining Tree Dale, dan telah menemukan surat perintah yang tertinggal di bawah Diary of a Soldier. Mari coba cek surat perintah di backpack.

column2: Commence Operation Wooden Village
column3: Memulai Operasi Wooden Village

column2: Found the plan for Operation Wooden Village in the backpack. The plan was to defeat the Zolems around Neryshkus Sanctum Ruins, then using Zolem Magic Stones to summon Unicorn, and then defeating it. The Wandering Spirit seems to have been in an accident while carrying out the plan. Continue the plan to comfort the spirit.
column3: Menemukan rencana Operasi Wooden Village di backpack. Rencananya untuk mengalahkan Zolem disekitar Neryshkus Sanctum Ruins, kemudian menggunakan Zolem Magic Stone untuk memanggil Unicorn, dan mengalahkannya. Wandering Spirit sepertinya mendapat kecelakaan ketika melakukan rencana tersebut. Lanjutkan rencana itu untuk menghiburnya.

column2: Prepare to lure Unicorn
column3: Persiapan untuk memancing Unicorn.

column2: Collected enough Zolem Stones. Put the stone in the abandoned bag written in the command and lure the unicorn.
column3: Cukup mengumpulkan Zolem stone. Letakkan stone di dalam tas seperti yang ditulis pada rencana dan pancing unicorn.

column2: Defeat Zolems and acquire %s
column3: Kalahkan Zolem dan mengumpulkan %s

column2: Defeat Zolems
column3: Kalahkan Zolem.

column2: Carry out Operation Tree Dale
column3: Menjalankan Operasi Wooden Village.

column2: Carry out Operation Tree Dale for the Wandering Spirit at Remaining Tree Dale.
column3: Mari selesaikan operasi Tree Dale untuk jiwa yang menjaga Remaining Tree Dale.

column2: Defeat Unicorn
column3: Kalahkan Unicorn.

column2: Unicorn appeared when the Zolem Magic Stones were put in the bag. Defeat Unicorn.
column3: Unicorn muncul ketika Zolem Magic Stone di masukkan ke dalam tas. Kalahkan Unicorn.

column2: Report to the Wandering Spirit
column3: Lapor ke Wandering Spirit.

column2: Completed Operation Wooden Village. Let the Wandering Spirit know about it.
column3: Berhasil menyelesaikan Operasi Wooden Village. Beritahu Wandering Spirit.

column2: Defeat Unicorn and acquire %s
column3: Kalahkan Unicorn dan memperoleh %s

column2: Talk to Villager Cahill
column3: Bicara dengan Villager Cahill.

column2: Villager Cahill is grumbling about something. Talk to him.
column3: Villager Cahill menggerutu tentang sesuatu. Bicara dengannya.

column2: Talk to Old Man Moses
column3: Bicara dengan Moses the Old Man.

column2: Villager Cahill is complaining about Moses who is bugging him. Tell Old Man Moses how Villager Cahill feels.
column3: Villager Cahill mengeluh tentang Moses yang menggangunya. Beritahu Moses the Old Man bagaimana perasaan Villager Cahill.

column2: Give lumber to Old Man Moses
column3: Berikan kayu ke Moses the Old Man.

column2: Old Man Moses is not interested in Villager Cahill and tells you to just do him a favor. Help him fetch some good lumber beside his house.
column3: Moses the Old Man tidak tertarik dengan Villager Cahill dan mengatakan padamu untuk membantunya. Bantu dia mengambil beberapa kayu bagus di samping rumahnya.

column2: Looks like you've chosen good lumber. Give them to Old Man Moses.
column3: Sepertinya kamu telah memilih kayu yang bagus. Berikan ke Moses the Old Man.

column2: Talk to Moses Diesel
column3: Bicara dengan Moses Diesel.

column2: You thought you chose pretty good lumber, but Moses is not satisfied. Talk to him.
column3: Kamu kira kamu sudah memilih kayu yang bagus, tapi Moses tidak puas. Bicara dengannya.

column2: Get Strong Flying Frog Leather
column3: Dapatkan Strong Flying Frog Leather.

column2: Moses is still looking to use you some more. Get Strong Flying Frog Leather from Flying Frogs near the campsite.
column3: Moses masih ingin menggunakan kamu. Dapatkan Strong Flying Frog Leather dari Flying Frog dekat perkemahan.

column2: Give them to Old Man Moses
column3: Berikan ke Moses the Old Man.

column2: Collected enough Strong Flying Frog Leather. Moses better be pleased. Return to him.
column3: Cukup mengumpulkan Strong Flying Frog Leather. Moses pasti senang. Kembali kepadanya.

column2: Moses is dissatisfied even with the leather. Control your anger and talk to him again.
column3: Moses masih tidak puas dengan kulit itu. Kendalikan kemarahanmu dan bicara lagi dengannya.

column2: Give crutches to Villager Cahill
column3: Berikan crutch ke Villager Cahill.

column2: Old Man Moses was actually making crutches for Villager Cahill. Give Old Man Moses' wooden crutches to Villager Cahill.
column3: Moses the Old Man sungguh-sungguh membuat crutch untuk Villager Cahill. Berikan crutch Moses the Old Man kepada Villager Cahill.

column2: Talk to Believer Domas
column3: Bicara dengan Follower Domas.

column2: Goddess Saule's Believer Domas needs help in Gate Route.
column3: Goddess Saule Follower Domas butuh bantuan Gate Route.

column2: Defeat Thornball and get its remains.
column3: Kalahkan Thornball dan dapatkan sisa-sisanya.

column2: Domas who is a believer of Goddess Saule is planning on burning the thorny vines. Get Thornball Remains from Geisma Access Road.
column3: Domas yang merupakan pengikut dari Syaulle Goddess berpikir untuk membakar habis Bramble Bush yang berlebihan. Dapatkanlah Wreck of Dunball pada Rustybe Dead Tree Area.

column2: Give them to Believer Domas
column3: Berikan ke Follower Domas.

column2: Got the Thornball Remains to use for burning the forest. But won't the whole forest burn like this? Anyway, give them to Believer Domas.
column3: Mendapatkan sisa Thornball untuk membakar hutan. Tapi tidak membakar hutan seluruhnya seperti ini? Bagaimanapun, berikan ke Domas.

column2: Defeat Thornball and get %s
column3: Kalahkan Thornball dan mendapatkan %s

column2: Defeat Coliflowers and get their sap.
column3: Kalahkan Coliflower dan dapatkan sap nya.

column2: Believer Domas says that he requires Coliflower sap because of the rain. Obtain sap from Coliflowers by defeating them at Rajuma Curved Path.
column3: Pengikut Domas berkata ia membutuhkan Sap dari Cauliflower karena hujan. Dapatkanlah Sap dengan menangkap Cauliflower yang ada di Rajuma Curved Path.

column2: I collected all the Coliflower Sap. I should give them to Believer Domas.
column3: Cukup mengumpulkan Coliflower Sap. Berikan ke Follower Domas.

column2: Defeat Coliflower and fill the Thornball Pouch with Coliflower Sap
column3: Kalahkan Coliflower dan isi Thornball Pouch dengan Coliflower Sap.

column2: Burn the thorny vines covering the gate.
column3: Bakar Thorn Vines yang menutupi gerbang.

column2: Everything is finally ready. Burn the thorny vines covering the gate.
column3: Semua sudah siap. Bakar Thorn Vines yang menutupi gerbang.

column2: Burning the thorny vines covering the gate.
column3: Bakar Thorn Vines yang menutupi gerbang.

column2: Talk to Goddess Saule Believer Adele
column3: Bicara dengan Goddess Saule Follower Adele.

column2: Goddess Saule's Believer Adele needs your help in Gate Route.
column3: Goddess Saule Follower Adele butuh bantuanmu di Gate Route.

column2: Collect the Velwriggler Claws.
column3: Kumpulkan Velwriggler Claw.

column2: Believer Adele wants to melt the thorny vines with an acid solution. First, gather Velwriggler's Claws at Rajuma Curved Path in order to make the acid solution.
column3: Adele ingin mencairkan Thorn vines dengan acid solution. Pertama, kumpulkan Velwriggler claw yang dibutuhkan untuk membuat acid solution di Rajuma Path.

column2: Give the claws to Believer Adele
column3: Berikan claw ke Adele.

column2: Collected all the Velwriggler claws needed. Give them to Believer Adele.
column3: Mengumpulkan semua Velwriggler claw yang dibutuhkan. Berikan ke Adele.

column2: Talk to Believer Adele
column3: Bicara dengan Adele.

column2: Goddess Saule Believer Adele needs help.
column3: Goddess Saule Follower Adele butuh bantuan.

column2: Find Believer Adele's ring
column3: Temukan cincin Adele.

column2: Believer Adele lost her precious ring along with her leather pouch. Find the ring for her.
column3: Adele kehilangan cincinnya yang berharga dengan kantongnya. Temukan cincinnya.

column2: Give the ring to Believer Adele
column3: Berikan cincin ke Adele.

column2: The ring's holiness prevented it from being swallowed by the monster. Return the ring to Believer Adele.
column3: Rin Holiness melindunginya dari ditelan oleh monster. Kembalikan cincin itu ke Adele.

column2: Defeat Chafer and get %s
column3: Kalahkan Chafer dan mendapatkan %s

column2: Goddess Saule's Believer Adele needs your help.
column3: Goddess Saule Follower Adele butuh bantuanmu.

column2: Collect Truffle's Poisonous Mushrooms.
column3: Kumpulkan Truffle Poisonous Mushrooms.

column2: Believer Adele says she needs poisonous mushrooms of Truffles for the acid solution. Defeat the Truffles in Isdidu Fork and gather the mushrooms.
column3: Adele berkata dia butuh poisonous mushroom of Truffles untuk acid solution. Kalahkan Truffles di Isdidu Fork dan kumpulkan mushroom.

column2: Give Truffle's Poisonous Mushrooms to Believer Adele
column3: Berikan Truffle Poisonous Mushroom ke Adele.

column2: Gathered enough of Truffle's Poisonous Mushrooms. Give them to Believer Adele so that she can make the acid solution.
column3: Cukup mengumpulkan Truffle Poisonous Mushroom. Berikan ke Adele jadi dia bisa membuat acid solution.

column2: Combine the mixed solution at the Altar of Harmony
column3: Menggabungkan campuran larutan di Altar of Harmony.

column2: Gathered all the materials. Approach the Altar of Harmony in Isdidu Fork, then combine Truffle's Poisonous Mushrooms and the Velwriggler's Claws to make a mixed solution.
column3: Mengumpulkan semua material. Dekati Altar of Harmony di Isdidu Fork, kemudian gabungkan Truffle Poisonous Mushroom dan Velwriggler Claw untuk membuat sebuah campuran larutan.

column2: Give the mixed solution to Believer Adele
column3: Berikan campuran larutan ke Adele.

column2: You have successfully made the mixed solution at the Altar of Harmony. Give it to Believer Adele.
column3: Berhasil membuat campuran larutan di Altar of Harmony. Berikan ke Adele.

column2: Melt the thorny vines using the Acid Solution
column3: Cairkan Thorn vines dengan acid solution.

column2: Believer Adele made acid solution with the mix solution you brought. Bring the solution to Gate Route and melt the thorny vines.
column3: Adele membuat acid solution dengan campuran larutan yang kamu bawa. Bawa larutan ke Gate Route dan cairkan Thorn vines.

column2: Talk to Believer Virgis
column3: Bicara dengan Follower Virgis.

column2: Virgis wants your help.
column3: Virgis butuh bantuanmu.

column2: Charge the Magic Crystal in the condensed magic spots
column3: Mengisi spell crystal di condensed spell area.

column2: Virgis' Memo: To start, charge the magic crystals I gave you. Look for the condensed magic spots in Pavydo Woodland.
column3: Memo of Virgis: Pertama, mengisi spell crystal yang aku berikan. Carilah condensed spell area di Pavydo Woodland.

column2: Collect Operor stingers to refine the magic crystal with.
column3: Kumpulkan Operor stinger untuk memperbaiki spell crystal.

column2: Virgis' Memo: Great. But we can't use the crystal right away because it accumulated foul energy. So collect stingers from Operors for their purifying capabilities.
column3: Memo of Vargis: Bagus. Tapi kamu tidak bisa menggunakan spell crystal segera karena menyerap energi jahat. Jadi kumpulkan Operor stinger yang mempunyai efek menyucikan.

column2: Defeat Operor and get %s
column3: Kalahkan Operor dan mendapat %s

column2: Refine the magic in the Magic Crystals
column3: Memperbaiki spell of spell crystal.

column2: Virgis' Memo: Did you collect all the stingers? The Altar of Purification is in Lenistwo Wasteland. Go there and use the Operor's Stingers to refine the Magic Crystal.
column3: Memo of Vargis: Apakah kamu mengumpulkan semua stinger? Purifying Altar di Lenistwo Wasteland. Pergi ke sana dan gunakan Operor stinger untuk memperbaiki spell crystal.

column2: Get the refined Magic Crystal
column3: Berhasil memperbaiki spell crystal.\

column2: Use the refined Magic Crystal to remove the thorny vines
column3: Gunakan spell crystal untuk menghilangkan Thorn vines.

column2: Virgis' Memo: Very good. Now use the refined Magic Crystal and show those thorny vines the power of Goddess Saule's Believers.
column3: Memo of Vargis: Bagus sekali. Sekarang gunakan clean spell crystal dan tunjukkan pada Thorn vines kekuatan dari Goddess Saule Follower.

column2: Virgis' Memo: Very good. Now use the refined Magic Crystal and show those thorny vines the power of Goddess Saule's Believers.
column3: Memo of Vargis: Bagus sekali. Sekarang gunakan clean spell crystal dan tunjukkan pada Thorn vines kekuatan dari Goddess Saule Follower.

column2: Talk to Believer Nojus
column3: Bicara dengan Follower Nojus.

column2: Goddess Saule Believer Nojus is anxiously waiting for you.
column3: Goddess Saule Follower Nojus menunggu kamu dengan cemas.

column2: Find the 'ominous voice'
column3: Lacak omnious voice.

column2: Believer Nojus told you where the ominous voice is coming from. Go and find it.
column3: Nojus mengatakan kepadamu darimana omnious voice berasal. Pergi dan temukan.

column2: Go to Fallen Worry Forest
column3: Pergilah ke Camel Forest.

column2: Defeated the Poata summoned by the Beholder. Go deep into the Thorn Forest to find Bramble.
column3: Mengalahkan Poata yang di summon oleh watcher. Jelajahi Thorn Forest untuk mencari Bramble.

column2: Defeat the summoned Poata
column3: Kalahkan Poata yang muncul.

column2: Talk to Believer Alvydas
column3: Bicara dengan Follower Alvydas.

column2: Goddess Saule Believer Alvydas is watching you.
column3: Saule Goddess Follower Alvydas sedang mengawasi kamu.

column2: Look for Goddess Saule Believers
column3: Carilah Goddess Saule Followers.

column2: Find and help Goddess Saule Believers at Spineheart Dale.
column3: Carilah para pengikut dari Syaulle Goddess yang ada di Thorn Village, tolonglah mereka.

column2: Helped every Believer of Goddess Saule. Talk to Believer Alvydas.
column3: Menolong semua follower dari Goddess Saule. Bicara dengan Alvydas.

column2: Talk to Believer Raminta
column3: Bicara dengan Follower Raminta.

column2: Goddess Saule Believer Raminta needs your help.
column3: Saule Goddess Follower Raminta butuh bantuanmu.

column2: Defeat the source of the evil energy
column3: Kalahkan sumber dari energi jahat.

column2: Believer Raminta says she found the demon spreading an evil energy. Defeat Rikaus for her.
column3: Raminta berkata dia menemukan demon yang menyebarkan energi jahat. Kalahkan Rikaus untuknya.

column2: Report to Believer Raminta
column3: Lapor ke Raminta.

column2: Defeated Rikaus that was spreading evil energy. Report to Believer Raminta.
column3: Mengalahkan Rikaus yang menyebarkan energi jahat. Lapor ke Raminta.

column2: Defeat Rikaus
column3: Kalahkan Rikaus.

column2: Talk to Believer Evaldas
column3: Bicara dengan Follower Evaldas.

column2: Goddess Saule Believer Evaldas needs your help.
column3: Goddess Saule Follower Evaldas butuh bantuanmu.

column2: Defeat the Merog Shamans
column3: Kalahkan Merog Shaman.

column2: Believer Evaldas asked you to defeat the Shamans. Stop their rituals and defeat them.
column3: Evaldas meminta kamu mengalahkan Shaman. Hentikan ritual mereka dan kalahkan mereka.

column2: Report to Evaldas
column3: Lapor ke Evaldas

column2: Defeat the Merog Shamans. Tell Believer Evaldas about it.
column3: Kalahkan Merog Shaman. Bilang ke Evaldas tentang itu.

column2: Defeat the Merog Shaman performing a ritual
column3: Kalahkan Merog Shaman yang sedang ritual.

column2: Talk to Believer Zaneta
column3: Bicara dengan Follower Zaneta.

column2: Goddess Saule Believer Zaneta needs your help.
column3: Goddess Saule Follower Zaneta butuh bantuanmu.

column2: Destroy the demon summoning crystal
column3: Hancurkan demon summoning crystal.

column2: Those Merogs prepared a Demon Summoning Circle{nl}that summons demons in Goddess Saule's Altar. {nl}Destroy the summoning crystal in the center and stop the demons.
column3: Merog membuat sebuah demon summoning crystal yang memanggil demon di Goddess Saule Altar. Hancurkan summoning crystal di tengah dan hentikan demon.

column2: Report to Believer Zaneta
column3: Lapor ke Zaneta.

column2: Destroyed all the summoning crystals. Go and comfort Zaneta.
column3: Menghancurkan semua summon crystal. Pergi dan hibur Zaneta.

column2: Talk to Believer Simas
column3: Bicara dengan Follower Simas.

column2: Goddess Saule Believer Simas needs your help.
column3: Goddess Saule Follower Simas butuh bantuanmu.

column2: Destroy the Demon Summoning Circle that is exuding evil energy.
column3: Hancurkan Demon Summon Circle yang memancarkan energi jahat.

column2: Believer Simas says the Demon Summoning Circle is exuding evil energy along with demons and it is worth researching. Destroy the summoning circle.
column3: Simas berkata demon summoning circle memancarkan energi jahat bersama dengan demon dan sangat berharga untuk penelitian. Hancurkan demon summoning circle.

column2: Report to Believer Simas
column3: Lapor ke Simas.

column2: The summoning circle does not seem to work anymore. Tell Simas that he can study it.
column3: Summoning circle sepertinya sudah tidak bekerja lagi. Beritahu Simas dia bisa mempelajarinya.

column2: Destroy the Summoning Crystal
column3: Hancurkan Summoning Crystal.

column2: Talk to Believer Onute
column3: Bicara dengan Follower Onute.

column2: Goddess Saule Believer Onute needs your help.
column3: Goddess Saule Follower Onute butuh bantuanmu.

column2: Defeat Archon and the Demon Summoning Circle.
column3: Kalahkan Archon dan demon summoning circle.

column2: Believer Onute is angry that the altar turned into a Demon Summoning Circle. Defeat Archon and destroy the Demon Summoning Circle to teach them a lesson about the goddess' powers.
column3: Onute marah altar berubah menjadi Demon Summoning Circle. Kalahkan Archon dan hancurkan demon summoning circle untuk mengajarkan sebuah pelajaran tentang Kekuatan Goddess.

column2: Report to Believer Onute
column3: Lapor ke Onute.

column2: Got rid of all the ominous things Onute mentioned. Report to Believer Onute.
column3: Mengalahkan semua hal yang disebutkan Onute. Lapor ke Onute.

column2: Talk to Believer Bronius
column3: Bicara dengan Follower Bronius.

column2: Goddess Saule Believer Bronius is hiding and waiting anxiously for your help.
column3: Goddess Saule Follower Bronius sedang bersembunyi dan cemas sedang menunggu bantuanmu.

column2: Defeat the Merogs
column3: Kalahkan Merog.

column2: Believer Bronius says the monsters are after him. Defeat the monsters.
column3: Bronius berkata monster sedang mengincarnya. Kalahkan monster.

column2: Defeated the monsters. Talk to Believer Bronius.
column3: Mengalahkan monster. Bicara dengan Bronius.

column2: Defeat the monsters trying to kill the Believer
column3: Kalahkan monster yang mencoba menangkap follower.

column2: Talk to Believer Samantha
column3: Bicara dengan Follower Samantha.

column2: Goddess Saule Believer Samantha at Fallen Worry Forest is waiting for your help.
column3: Samantha yang merupakan pengikut dari Syaulle Goddess di Fallen Worry Forest, sedang menunggu akan bantuan anda.

column2: Protect the altar from the monsters
column3: Lindungi altar dari monster.

column2: Believer Samantha is troubled because the monsters attack whenever she tries to purify Thornbush Rest Place. Protect the Altar of Purification at Thornbush Rest Place from the monsters.
column3: Follower Samantha khawatir karena monster menyerang setiap kali dia mencoba menyucikan Thornbush Rest Place. Lindungi Altar of Purification di Thornbush Rest Place dari monster.

column2: Protected the altar from the monsters. Return to Believer Samantha.
column3: Berhasil melindungi altar dari monster. Kembali ke Samantha.

column2: Check Sviesa Hill Areas
column3: Periksa Sviesa Hill.

column2: Believer Jurga says one of Bramble's roots is in Sviesa Hill Areas. Check Sviesa Hill Areas.
column3: Jurga berkata salah satu Bramble root ada di Sviesa Hill. Periksa Sviesa Hill.

column2: Cut Bramble's Root.
column3: Potong Bramble Root.

column2: Approached the Bramble's roots but Gaigalas appeared. You must defeat Gaigalas before destroying Bramble's roots.
column3: Mendekati Bramble root tapi Gaigalas muncul. Kamu harus mengalahkan Gaigalas sebelum menghancurkan Bramble root.

column2: Talk to Believer Jurga
column3: Bicara dengan Jurga.

column2: You cut off Bramble's roots. Return and talk to Believer Jurga.
column3: Kamu telah memotong Bramble root. Kembali dan bicara dengan Jurga.

column2: Defeat Gaigalas
column3: Kalahkan Gaigalas.

column2: Destroy Bramble's Root
column3: Hancurkan Bramble root.

column2: Believer Jurga is following the goddess in watching over Bramble and is waiting for you.
column3: Jurga mengikuti Goddess mengawasi Bramble dan sedang menunggu kamu.

column2: Get Merog's stinger and make Thorn Flower stimulant
column3: Dapatkan Merog stinger dan buat Thorn Flower stimulant.

column2: Bramble says he needs to make medication for withstanding the evil energy before getting into the battle. Go to Kruva swell and get Merog's stingers.
column3: Bramble dia perlu untuk membuat obat untuk menahan aura jahat sebelum masuk ke pertempuran. Pergi ke Kruva swell dan dapatkan Merog stinger.

column2: Collect all of Merog's stingers needed. Return to Jurga.
column3: Mengumpulkan cukup semua Merog stinger yang dibutuhkan. Kembali ke Jurga.

column2: Check Tankinta Vacant Lot
column3: Periksa Tankinta Vacant Lot.

column2: Believer Jurga says one of Bramble's roots is in Tankinta Vacant Lot. Check out Tankinta Vacant Lot.
column3: Jurga berkata salah satu Bramble root ada di Tankinta Vacant Lot. Periksa Tankinta Vacant Lot.

column2: Defeat Molich guarding the roots of Bramble.
column3: Kalahkan Molich yang menjaga Bramble root.

column2: Defeat Molich
column3: Kalahkan Molich.

column2: Talk to Believer Kazis
column3: Bicara dengan Follower Kazis.

column2: Goddess Saule Believer Kazis needs your help.
column3: Goddess Saule Follower Kazis butuh bantuanmu.

column2: Purify Karadas Path
column3: Menyucikan Karadas Path.

column2: Believer Kazis says the Honeypin is making it difficult to do purifying work. Activate the altar for Believer Kazis.
column3: Kazis berkata Honeypin membuat sulit pekerjaan ini. Aktifkan altar untuk Kazis.

column2: Defeated the Honeypin. Return to Believer Kazis.
column3: Berhasil mengalahkan Honeypin. Kembali ke Kazis.

column2: You agreed to meet Believer Jurga in Giliaii Courtyard to plan a fight against Bramble.
column3: Kamu setuju bertemu Jurga di Giliaii Courtyard untuk merencanakan melawan Bramble.

column2: Defeat Bramble and retrieve the revelation
column3: Kalahkan Bramble dan mengambil Petunjuk.

column2: Arrived at Giliaii Courtyard, where Bramble is. Defeat it and retrieve the revelation!
column3: Tiba di Giliaii Courtyard dimana Bramble berada. Kalahkan dia dan dapatkan Petunjuk!

column2: Obtain the revelation
column3: Mendapatkan Petunjuk.

column2: Successfully defeated Bramble! Get the goddess' revelation.
column3: Sukses mengalahkan Bramble! Dapatkan petunjuk Goddess.

column2: Defeat Bramble
column3: Kalahkan Bramble.

column2: Ask Goddess Saule about the revelation
column3: Tanyakan Goddess Saule apa maksud petunjuk itu.

column2: You need to go back to Goddess Saule to ask for the meanings
column3: Kamu harus kembali ke Goddess Saule untuk bertanya maksudnya.

column2: Talk to the Old Man of Andale Village
column3: Bicara dengan Old Man of Andale Village.

column2: The villager told you to go to the Andale Village Elder. Go to the Andale Village Elder at Rhombuspaving Dale.
column3: Penduduk desa menyuruh untuk mencoba pergi mencari Andeil Village Elder. Pergilah mencari Andeil Village Elder yang ada di Rhombuspaving Dale.

column2: Collect Black Maize Venom.
column3: Kumpulkan Black Maize Venom.

column2: Collect some Black Maize Venom as a gift to the Village Priest. You can only obtain Black Maize Venom by using Paralysis Powder on a Black Maize while its HP is below half.
column3: Kumpulkan Black Maize Venom sebagai hadiah untuk Village Priest. Hanya bisa mendapatkan Black Maize Venom dengan menggunakan paralysis powder saat HP Black Maize dibawah setengah.

column2: Go to the Andale Village Priest
column3: Pergi ke Andale Village Priest.

column2: Collected enough Black Maize Venom. Go to the Andale Village Priest at Cerpe Crossroads.
column3: Mengumpulkan cukup Black Maize Venom. Pergi ke Andale Priest di Cerpe Crossroad.

column2: Defeat Black Maize to obtain %s
column3: Mengalahkan Black Maize untuk mendapatkan %s

column2: Talk to the Village Priest
column3: Bicara dengan Village Priest.

column2: The Village Priest says you can activate the Obelisk if you follow his instructions. Talk to him again.
column3: Village Priest berkata kamu bisa mengaktifkan Obelisk jika kamu mengikuti instruksinya. Bicara dengannya lagi.

column2: Collect tree sap from White Oak Forest
column3: Kumpulkan getah pohon dari White Oak Forest.

column2: Tree sap is needed to make the dye for restoring the Obelisk. Collect tree sap at White Oak Forest.
column3: Getah pohon dibutuhkan membuat  pewarna untuk memperbaiki Obelisk. Kumpulkan getah pohon dari White Oak Forest.

column2: Obtain %s from the tree sap collection containers
column3: Mendapatkan %s dari kontainer getah pohon.

column2: Go to the Thorn Tree Altar
column3: Pergi ke Thorn Tree Altar

column2: You've gathered all the materials required to restore the Obelisk. Go to the Thorn Tree Altar to compose the gathered materials.
column3: Telah mendapatkan semua material untuk memulihkan Obelix. Untuk menggabungkan material yang dikumpulkan, pergilah ke Thorn Tree Altar.

column2: Retrieve Dye from Thorn Tree Altar
column3: Mengambil Dye pada Thorn Tree Altar

column2: Made the dye for restoring the Obelisk. Get the dye from the altar.
column3: Telah membuat pewarna untuk memulihkan Obelisk. Dapatkan pewarna dari altar.

column2: Got the dye for restoring the Obelisk. Return and talk to the Priest again for what to do next.
column3: Mendapatkan pewarna untuk memulihkan Obelisk. Kembali dan bicara dengan Priest lagi apa yang dilakukan selanjutnya.

column2: Restore the Obelisk
column3: Memulihkan Obelisk.

column2: Seems like the Obelisk can now be restored. Write back the erased letters on the Obelisk at Slepingas Stream.
column3: Sepertinya Obelisk sekarang sudah bisa dipulihkan. Tulis kembali surat yang terhapus pada Obelisk di Slepingas Stream.

column2: Go to the village at Indigo Tree Plateau
column3: Berpindah ke Desa Indigo Tree Plateau

column2: Successfully restored the Obelisk. Return to Village Priest.
column3: Sukses memulihkan Obelisk. Kembali ke Village Priest.

column2: Go to Nefrito Valley
column3: Pergi ke Nefrito Valley.

column2: A strong energy is felt in the swift currents of Nefrito Valley. Find out what it is.
column3: Sebuah energi kuat dirasakan di derasnya arus di Nefrito Valley. Cari tahu apa itu.

column2: Defeat Moldihorn
column3: Kalahkan Moldihorn.

column2: Check the Thorn Tree Altar
column3: memeriksa Thorn Tree Altar

column2: You sense an ominous aura from the Thorn Tree Altar. Check what is happening.
column3: Terasa kekuatan yang tidak enak di sekitar Thorn Tree Altar. Cobalah cek apa yang terjadi.

column2: Defeat the monsters that reacted to the ominous energy
column3: Kalahkan monster yang bereaksi terhadap energi menakutkan itu.

column2: The surrounding monsters turned aggressive when an ominous energy fumed from the Ershike Altar. Defeat those monsters.
column3: Monster berubah agresif ketika energi menakutkan keluar dari Ershike Altar. Kalahkan monster-monster itu.

column2: Check the Obelisk
column3: Periksa Obelisk.

column2: Check the Obelisk in Slepingas Stream..
column3: Periksa Obelisk di Slepingas Stream.

column2: Defeat Blue Woodspirit
column3: Kalahkan Blue Woorspirit.

column2: Find the Andale Village Priest
column3: Temukan Andale Village Priest.

column2: The Rhombuspaving Dale Priest told you to go to the Andale Village Priest. Go to Andale Village at Indigo Tree Plateau.
column3: Priest dari Rhombuspaving Dale menyuruh untuk mencari Priest yang ada di Andeil Village. Cobalah pergi ke Andeil Village di Indigo Tree Plateau.

column2: Collect the Languid Herbs.
column3: Kumpulkan Languid Flower.

column2: Let's create a Languid Bomb to defeat monsters threatening Andale Village. Collect Languid Herbs needed to make the bomb.
column3: Mari membuat Languid Bomb untuk mengalahkan monster yang membahayakan Andale Village. Kumpulkan Languid Flower yang dibutuhkan untuk membuat bom.

column2: Talk to the Andale Village Priest
column3: Bicara dengan Andale Village Priest.

column2: Gathered enough Languid Herbs. Talk to the Andale Village Priest in Andale Village.
column3: Cukup mengumpulkan Languid Flower. Bicara dengan Andale Village Priest 'Andale Village.

column2: Ask the Andale Village Priest what else is needed to make the Languid Bomb.
column3: Bertanya ke Andale Village Priest apalagi yang dibutuhkan untuk membuat Languid bomb.

column2: Collect the Strongly Scented Soul Flower.
column3: Kumpulkan Strongly Scented Soul Flower.

column2: Strongly scented soul flowers are needed to make strong bombs. Look for the flowers with a strong scent.
column3: Strongly Scented Soul Flower dibutuhkan untuk membuat bom yang kuat. Carilah bungan yang mempunyai aroma kuat.

column2: Collected the flowers. Ask the Andale Village Priest what to do.
column3: Berhasil mengumpulkan flower. Bertanya pada Andale Village Priest apa yang harus dilakukan.

column2: Talk to Andale Village Headman
column3: Bicara dengan Andale Village Mayor.

column2: He says the bomb used before must be somewhere. Talk to the Headman who knows where the bomb is.
column3: Dia mengatakan bom yang dulu digunakan ada di suatu tempat. Bicara dengan Mayor yang tahu dimana bom itu.

column2: Find a Useful Bomb
column3: Temukan Bom itu.

column2: The Headman says that the bombs are in the northern warehouse. Look for a Useful Bomb.
column3: Mayor berkata bom ada di Northern Warehouse. Pergi dan cari bom itu.

column2: Unlike what the Headman said, the bombs were in a small container. Ask the Headman what happened.
column3: Berbeda dengan yang Mayor katakan, bom berada di wadah kecil. Tanya ke Mayor apa yang terjadi.

column2: Made the Languid Bomb. Now ask the Headman what to do next.
column3: Telah membuat Languid Bomb. Sekarang tanyakan Mayor apa selanjutnya.

column2: Use the Languid Bomb on the sleeping Upents
column3: Gunakan Languid bomb pada sleeping Upent.

column2: The Headman says to use the bomb on the Upents in Melagingas Hill. Take it to Melagingas Hill.
column3: Mayor berkata gunakan pada Upent di Melagingas Hill. Bawa bom ke Melagingas Hill.

column2: Check the portal at Grassy Brookside
column3: memeriksa Portal Grass Brook Side

column2: The residents were demons in disguise. Run to the portal at Grassy Brookside.
column3: Identitas dari para penduduk desa adalah Demon. Kaburlah ke Portal Grass Brook Side.

column2: Defeat Demon Resident
column3: Kalahkan Demon Resident.
