column2: Go to the old well
column3: Pergi ke sumur tua.

column2: Check the old well at Indigo Tree Plateau.
column3: Cobalah periksa Sumur tua di Indigo Tree Plateau.

column2: Look for something to put in the old well
column3: Cari sesuatu untuk dimasukkan dalam sumur tua.

column2: There is something in the old well but you can't see it clearly. Look for something that you can use to get the thing out of the well.
column3: Ada sesuatu di dalam sumur tua tapi kamu tidak bisa melihatnya dengan jelas. Cari sesuatu yang bisa kamu gunakan untuk mengeluarkan benda itu dari sumur.

column2: Use the long rope and bucket to get the thing out of the well.
column3: Gunakan tali panjang dan ember untuk mengeluarkan benda itu dari sumur.

column2: Go to Dvyni Wetland
column3: Pergi ke Dvyni Swamp.

column2: Look for the Strongly Scented Soul Flower in Dvyni Wetland.
column3: Carilah  Strongly Scented Soul Flower di Dvyni Swamp.

column2: Go to Saknele Cliff
column3: Pergi ke Saknele Cliff

column2: Examine the Suspicious Greenery at Saknele Cliff.
column3: Cobalah periksa tumpukan rumput yang mencurigakan di Saknele Cliff.

column2: Defeat the Iltiswort that was disguised as Greenery.
column3: Bunuhlah Iltiswort yang sedang menyamar menggunakan tumpukan rumput.

column2: Beholder's Careful Trick
column3: Hati-hati dengan trik dari watcher.

column2: The mysterious Beholder appeared to try and shake your belief in the goddess.
column3: Seorang Mysterious Watcher muncul untuk berbagi cerita tentang Goddess. Mari kita dengar apa yang dikatakannya.

column2: Believer Jurga says there are more things to do other than making the stimulant. Talk to Believer Jurga.
column3: Jurga berkata ada beberapa hal harus dilakukan selain membuat stimulan. Bicara dengan Jurga.

column2: Destroy Bramble's roots.
column3: Hancurkan Bramble Root.

column2: Jurga says we must destroy the roots placed to heal Bramble's wound. The roots are in Sviesa Hill Areas and Tankinta Vacant Lot.
column3: Jurga berkata kita harus menghancurkan root placed untuk menyembuhkan luka Bramble. Root berada di Sviesa Hill dan Tankinta Vancant Lot.

column2: Removed all of Bramble's roots. Talk to Believer Jurga.
column3: Sudah menghancurkan semua Bramble root. Bicara dengan Jurga.

column2: Seems like the Item Merchant has something left to say. Talk to the Item Merchant.
column3: Sepertinya Merchant ada sesuatu untuk dikatakan. Bicara dengan Item Merchant.

column2: Talk to the Accessory Merchant
column3: Bicara dengan Accessory Merchant.

column2: The Accessory Merchant has given the Revelator an accessory gift. Please accept it graciously.
column3: Accessory Merchant telah memberikan Savior sebuah aksesoris hadiah. Mohon menerimanya dengan murah hati.

column2: Listen to Gustas Jonas for the next step.
column3: Dengarkan Gustas Jonas tentang langkah selanjutnya.

column2: Meet Morkus Jonas in Overlong Bridge Valley
column3: Temui Morkus Jonas di Long Bridge Valley.

column2: You'll know what to do next when you meet Morkus Jonas in Overlong Bridge Valley.
column3: Kamu akan tahu apa yang harus dilakukan selanjtunya ketika kamu bertemu Morkus Jonas di Long Bridge Valley.

column2: Goddess Saule says that Bramble stole the revelation in the Thorn Forest. Move to the Thorn Forest.
column3: Goddess Saule berkata Bramble mencuri Petunjuk di Thorn Forest. Pergi ke Thorn Forest.

column2: Goddess Saule says that the revelation has been stolen by Bramble in Fallen Worry Forest. Go find the revelation at the Fallen Worry Forest past Gate Route and Spineheart Dale.
column3: Syaulle Goddess berkata telah merebut revelation dari Bramble yang ada di Fallen Worry Forest dari Thorn Forest. Pergilah mencari Revelation ke Fallen Worry Forrest dengan melewati Thorn Village dan Gate Route.

column2: Fallen Worry Forest
column3: Fallen Worry Forest

column2: Talk to Soldier Jace
column3: Bicara dengan Soldier Jays.

column2: Talk to Soldier Jace.
column3: Bicara dengan Soldier Jays.

column2: Retrieving Soldiers' Mementos
column3: Mengambil Soldier Mementos.

column2: The Vubbes stole the deceased soldiers' mementos. Get them back from the Vubbes so that the soldiers can rest in peace.
column3: Vubbe mencuri soldier mementos yang meninggal. Dapatkan kembali dari Vubbe sehingga soldier bisa beristirahat dengan tenang.

column2: Collected all the mementos. Bring them to Soldier Jace.
column3: Mengumpulkan semua mementos. Berikan ke Soldier Jay.

column2: Defeat Vubbe and get %s
column3: Kalahkan Vubbe dan dapatkan %s

column2: Defeat Vubbe Thief
column3: Kalahkan Vubbe Thief.

column2: Talk to Soldier Edgar
column3: Bicara dengan Soldier Edgar.

column2: Edgar seems to be in trouble. Talk to him.
column3: Edgar sepertinya dalam masalah. Bicara dengannya.

column2: Retrieve the stolen food supplies from the Vubbes
column3: Mengambil suplai makanan yang dicuri oleh Vubbe.

column2: Edgar says the Vubbes stole all the food supplies. Go and get it back from the Vubbes.
column3: Edgar berkata Vubbe mencuri semua suplai makanan. Pergi dan dapatkan kembali dari Vubbe.

column2: This much food seems enough. Bring it back to Soldier Edgar.
column3: Jumlah makanan ini sepertinya cukup. Bawa kembali ke Soldier Edgar.

column2: Defeat Vubbes and retrieve %s
column3: Kalahkan Vubbe dan mengambil %s

column2: Talk to the Miners' Village mayor.
column3: Bicara dengan Miner Village Mayor.

column2: Go do Leaf Veil Plateau
column3: Berpindah ke Leaf Veil Plateau

column2: Miners' Village
column3: Miner Village

column2: is found at the further right of the
column3: Ditemukan di sebelah kanan dari

column2: Silverstream Gorge
column3: Silver Stream Gorge

column2: which is located below the twin bridge of
column3: yang berada di bawah twin bridge of

column2: Leaf Veil Plateau
column3: Leaf Veil Plateau

column2: is able go to there.
column3: Bisa pergi ke sana.

column2: Leaf Veil Plateau
column3: Leaf Veil Plateau

column2: Go to Fedimian
column3: Pergi ke Fedimian.

column2: Please go to the Fedimian.
column3: Tolong pergi ke Fedimian.

column2: Along the clearly, I think be prepared depending on the Fedimian before going to the Mage Tower.
column3: Selama menunggu kejelasan, sebaiknya kita bersiap di Fedimian sebelum pergi ke Mage Tower.

column2: Fedimian
column3: Fedimian

column2: Go to Stone Pole Platform
column3: Berpindah ke Stone Pole Platform

column2: Morcus Jonas says that you can hear what happens next from Rolandas Jonas at Stone Pole Platform.
column3: Markus Yonas berkata dapat mendengarkan cerita selanjutnya jika pergi kepada Rollandas Yonas dari Stone Pole Platform.

column2: Meet Rolandas Jonas
column3: Bertemu dengan Rolandas Jonas.

column2: Meet Rolandas Jonas as Morcus Jonas suggested.
column3: Temuilah Rollandas Yonas dari Stone Pole Platform sesuai dengan perkataan Markus Yonas.

column2: Talk to the Pharmacist Lady
column3: Bicara dengan Pharmacist Lady.

column2: Looks like healer lady has something to say. Talk to her.
column3: Sepertinya Healer Lady ada sesuatu yang ingin dikatakan. Bicara dengannya.

column2: Give medicinal ingredients to Pharmacist Lady
column3: Berikan medicinal herb ke Pharmacist Lady.

column2: The Pharmacist Lady needs Yukopus leaves and Kepa stem to use as treatment for injured people.
column3: Pharmacist membutuhkan Yukopus leave dan Kepa stem untuk digunakan sebagai treatment bagi orang yang terluka.

column2: Pharmacist's Favor
column3: Pharmacist's Favor

column2: Give the Yukopus leaves and Kepa Stems that the Pharmacist Lady requested.
column3: Berikan Yukopus Leaves and Kepa Stem yang diminta oleh Pharmacist.

column2: Ask the Pharmacist Lady if she needs anything else.
column3: Tanya kepada pharmacist jika dia butuh yang lainnya.

column2: Get medicinal ingredients
column3: Dapatkan Medicine ingredient.

column2: She needs more Yukopus leaves and Kepa Stem to make more medicine.
column3: Dia butuh lebih banyak Yukopus leaves dan Kepa Stem untuk membuat lebih banyak obat.

column2: Give Yukopus leaves and Kepa stem to the Pharmacist Lady.
column3: Berikan Yukopus leaves dan Kepa stem ke pharmacist.

column2: Talk to Mr. Juan in Mine Entrance
column3: Bicara dengan Mr. Juan di Mine Entrance.

column2: Seems like Mr. Juan has something to say. Talk to him.
column3: Sepertinya Mr. Juan ada sesuatu untuk dikatakan. Bicara dengannya.

column2: Mr. Juan say he'll help you make armors. Gather the materials he asked for.
column3: Mr. Juan berkata dia akan membantu kamu membuat armor. Kumpulkan material yang dia minta.

column2: Receive gift from Mr. Juan
column3: Menerima hadiah dari Mr. Juan

column2: Gathered the materials for Mr. Juna. Bring it to him.
column3: Mengumpulkan material untuk Mr. Juan. Bawa kepadanya.

column2: Get armor parts
column3: Dapatkan armor part.

column2: Get materials
column3: Dapatkan material.

column2: Mr. Juan asked you to bring Tough Toots of Large Red Kepa for the armor.
column3: Mr. Juan memintamu membawa Tough Toot of Large Red Kepa untuk armor.

column2: Bring the materials
column3: Bawa material

column2: Acquired Tough Roots of Large Red Kepa. Bring it to Mr. Juan.
column3: Memperoleh Tough Toot of Large Red Kepa. Bawa ke Mr. Juan.

column2: Get %s from Large Red Kepa
column3: Mendapatkan %s dari Large Red Kepa.

column2: Mr. Juan asked you to bring him Kepa's Teeth to make the armor.
column3: Mr. Juan memintamu untuk membawakannya Kepa Teeth untuk membuat armor.

column2: Acquired enough Kepa's Teeth! Bring it to Mr. Juan.
column3: Mendapatkan cukup Kepa Teeth! Bawa ke Mr. Juan.

column2: Get %s from Kepa
column3: Mendapatkan %s dari Kepa.

column2: Mr. Juan asked you to bring him Yukopus Leather to make the armor.
column3: Mr. Juan memintamu membawakannya Yukopus Leather untuk membuat armor.

column2: Acquired Yukopus Leather! Bring it to Mr. Juan.
column3: Memperoleh Yukopus Leather! Bawa ke Mr. Juan.

column2: Mr. Juan asked you to bring him Vubbe Thief's Leather to make the armor.
column3: Mr. Juan memintamu membawa Vubbe Theif Leather untuk membuat armor.

column2: Acquired Vubbe Thief's Leather! Bring it to Mr. Juan.
column3: Memperoleh Vubbe Thief Leather! Bawa ke Mr. Juan.

column2: Now take the Seal Release Crystal and go to Ramstis Ridge. {nl}The Disciples of Gustas will teach you how to release the seals there.
column3: Sekarang ambil unsealing stone dan pergi ke Ramstis Ridge. {nl}Student of Gustas akan mengajarimu bagaimana melepas seal di sana.

column2: Still lost in direction?{nl}Go to the Disciples of Gustas in Ramstis Ridge.{nl}The crystal is made for the chosen one.
column3: Apakah kamu belum diajarkan?{nl}itu Student of Gustas di Ramstis Ridge.{nl}Itu dibuat agar hanya orang yang terpilih yang bisa masuk.

column2: Ask the mayor of the Miners' Village for directions to Gele Plateau. {nl}I will send the message to the Paladin Master first. {nl}May the blessings of the goddess be with you.
column3: Tanya Mayor mengenai arah ke Gele Plateau. {nl}Aku akan mengirim pesan dulu ke Paladin Master. {nl}Semoga blessing of Goddess bersamamu.

column2: The high gardens mentioned by the goddess may be a place in Gele Plateau. {nl}I heard the Paladin Master is there, upholding a long term promise.
column3: High garden yang Goddess maksud pasti adalah Gele Plateau. {nl}Aku mendengar Paladin Master di sana untuk menjaga janjinya.

column2: Gele Plateau.{nl}You can get to Silverstream Gorge by going down at the middle of Twin Bridge.{nl}If you go further right at Silverstream Gorge, you'll reach Gele Plateau.
column3: Galley Plateau.{nl}Jika turun di arah bawah pada pertengahan Twin Bridge, maka akan tiba di Silver Stream Gorge.{nl}Jika masuk dari arah kanan pada Silver Stream Gorge, maka dapat pergi ke Galley Plateau.

column2: You have to go further in from Silverstream Gorge in order to get to Gele Plateau.{nl}Go down from the middle of Twin Bridge and you'll be able to go to Silverstream Gorge.
column3: Galley Plateau yang kamu cari bisa ditemukan dengan memasuki Silver Stream Gorge lebih dalam.{nl}Jika turun di arah bawah pada pertengahan Twin Bridge, maka akan tiba di Silver Stream Gorge.

column2: If you ever fight against us Rodeleros, better be careful of your legs. {nl}Swords pop out from below the shield. {nl}
column3: Jika kamu pernah melawan kami Rodeleros, sebaiknya jaga kakimu. {nl}Pedang muncul dari bawah perisai. {nl}

column2: The simplest forms are the strongest ways. {nl}If you want to study the roots of everything, take the path of Elementalist.
column3: Yang paling sederhana adalah yang terkuat. {nl}Jika kamu ingin belajar akar segala sesuatu, ambillah jalan Elementalist.

column2: Go straight down from the Twin Bridge and you'll arrive at Srautas Gorge.{nl}Go further right through Srautas Gorge and you'll be able to get to Gele Plateau.
column3: Turun ke Twin Bridge dan kamu akan tiba di Srautas Gorge.{nl}Terus ke arah kanan dari Srautas Gorge dan kamu akan sampai ke Gele Plateau.

column2: The Paladin Master is at Gele Plateau.{nl}You can get there by riding the cable car.
column3: Paladin Master ada di Gele Plateau.{nl}Kamu bisa ke sana dengan gondola.

column2: This is one of the devices the first Paladin set in preparation for the demon invasion. {nl}Nefritas Cliff is covered with several of these devices.{nl}
column3: Itu adalah sebuah device yang First Paladin siapkan untuk invasi dari demon. {nl}Itu banyak diletakkan untuk menyembunyikan seluruh Nefritas Cliff. {nl}

column2: You must find Goddess Saule...{nl}The colorful stream mentioned in the revelation may refer to the upper region of Veja Ravine. {nl}Well then, may the blessings of Goddess be with you.
column3: Kamu harus menemukan Goddess Saule..{nl}Colorful stream dimaksudkan Petunjuk harus berdasarkan pada stream yang dimulai di Veja Ravine. {nl}Baiklah, semoga blessing dari Goddess bersamamu.

column2: This Divine Sphere is a holy weapon that will be used to fight against Gesti in Nefritas Cliff. {nl}It has been handed down since the times of the first Paladin.
column3: Ini adalah senjata suci yang digunakan untuk melawan Gesti di Nefritas Cliff. {nl}Telah diturunkan sejak First Paladin.

column2: Go. the Tenet Church is located in Tenet Garden.{nl}You must prevent the revelation from falling into the hands of Gesti.
column3: Pergi. Tenet Cathedral ada di Tenet Garden.{nl}Kamu harus menghentikan Petunjuk jatuh ke tangan Gesti.

column2: Find Gesti. {nl}The Tenet Church is located within the Tenet Garden.
column3: Pergi temukan Gesti. {nl}Tenet Cathedral ada di Tenet Garden.

column2: There is a way to stop it but only you can do it. {nl}Please, come to Karsta battlefield in Fedimian outskirt.
column3: Ada satu cara untuk menghentikannya tapi hanya kamu yang bisa. {nl}Tolong, datang ke Karsta battlefield di Fedimian outskirt.

column2: You need to use the cable car to go from Srautas Gorge to Gele Plateau. {nl}I heard people used to hang baskets on ropes in the past, and use those to traverse the gorge. {nl}Well the cable car is scary enough for me.
column3: Kamu harus menggunakan gondola untuk pergi dari Srautas Gorge ke Gele Plateau. {nl}Aku mendengar orang-orang menggunakan keranjang yang digantung ke tali pada masa lalu. {nl}Baiklah gondola cukup menakutkan bagiku.

column2: I came to protect this divine land from the demons. {nl}I heard that the Paladin Master is also in Gele Plateau. It must surely be a big problem. {nl}
column3: Aku datang untuk melindungi divine land dari demon. {nl}Aku mendengar Paladin Master juga ada di Gele Plateau. Ini pasti ada masalah besar. {nl}

column2: I'm worried for my brother at Nefritas Cliff. {nl}I hope nothing happens to him.{nl}
column3: Aku khawatir dengan saudara laki-lakiku di Nefritas Cliff. {nl}Semoga tidak ada sesuatu yang terjadi dengannya.{nl}

column2: We'll have to make do with the remaining dolls. {nl}Everyone's lives are at stake at Nefritas Cliff so we can't complain about this, right?
column3: Kita harus mengaturnya dengan doll yang tersisa. {nl}Kehidupan setiap orang dipertaruhkan di Nefritas Cliff dan kita tidak boleh mengeluh tentang ini, benar kan?

column2: And if you're talking about Rukas Plateau, it's been a while since we pulled out of that place as it {nl}wasn't worthy of research anymore.
column3: Dan jika kamu berbicara tentang Rukas Plateau, tempat itu tidak layak untuk penelitian sudah beberapa waktu sejak kami pergi dari sana.

column2: Understanding the root of everything becomes the power of Elementalist. {nl}Wind, Water, Fire, Earth. We pull the strongest powers from the simplest forms.
column3: Memahami akar dari segala sesuatu akan menjadi kekuatan dari Elementalist. {nl}Angin, Air, Api, Bumi. Kami menarik kekuatan terkuat dari bentuk yang paling sederhana.

column2: Bring the Seal Release Crystal and find Disciple of Gustas in Ramstis Ridge. {nl}He will teach you about the seal.
column3: Bawa Crystal dan temukan murid dari Gustas di Ramstis Ridge. {nl}Dia akan mengajarimu tentang seal.

column2: The Netherbovines are becoming violent again? {nl}As long as us Rodeleros are standing ground, no monsters shall pass.{nl}
column3: Netherbovines menyebabkan masalah lagi? {nl}Selama Rodelero ada di sini, tidak ada monster yang dapat menginjakkan kaki di sini.{nl}

column2: I used to live in the woods, but I came out here to do what I can. {nl}I will do anything that I can help with.
column3: Aku dulu tinggal di hutan, tapi aku datang ke sini untuk melakukan apa yang bisa kulakukan. {nl}Aku akan melakukan apapun yang bisa membantu.

column2: Physical enhancing magic is a profound and mysterious field. {nl}If you make good use of it, you can easily distinguish friends from foes.
column3: Physical enhancing magic adalah bidang yang mendalam dan misterius. {nl}Jika kamu bisa menggunakannya dengan baik, kamu bisa dengan mudah mengidentifikasi teman atau musuh.

column2: When a seal is released, you must advance to the next seal in Ramstis Ridge.
column3: Jika seal dilepaskan, kamu harus pergi ke seal selanjutnya di Ramstis Ridge.

column2: Death may be the price that I pay for the sin I committed. {nl}Even if it is the curse of the demons, it is still for a sin I made.
column3: Kematian mungkin harga yang aku bayar untuk dosa-dosaku. {nl}Bahkan jika itu adalah kutukan demon, itu juga dosa yang aku buat.

column2: I don't want to... die like this... {nl}Mother...
column3: Aku tidak ingin... Mati seperti ini.. {nl}Ibu..

column2: Wait. Aren't those Succubus Eyes? {nl}Wow. How did you get them... Can I take a look?
column3: Tunggu. Bukankan ini eye of Succubus? {nl}Wow. Bagaimana kamu mendapatkannya.. Bisakah aku melihatnya?

column2: I've heard about those eyes. {nl}A greedy Succubus tried to take one of the Great Cathedral's blessed necklaces, but ended up{nl}putting her own eyes into this one. {nl}
column3: Aku mendengar tentang mata itu. {nl}Succubus menginginkan blessing dari Great Cathedral yang tersimpan di sebuah kalung, jadi dia menaruh di matanya. {nl}

column2: Did you know I used to be an aspiring alchemist? {nl}I can turn that back into a normal necklace. {nl}
column3: Seperti yang kamu tahu, aku bisa digunakan sebagai seorang aspiring Elementalist? {nl}Aku dapat mengembalikannya ke sebuah kalung. {nl}

column2: Done. {nl}I suppose you know about Maven's five necklaces?{nl}
column3: Selesai. {nl}Apakah kamu tahu tentang lima kalung dari Maven?{nl}

column2: They were created to remind people of the five sins. {nl}Naktis caused them to look like curses on the Pilgrim's Way.{nl}
column3: Itu dibuat untuk mengingatkan orang-orang dari 5 dosa. {nl}Meskipun Naktis membuatnya seperti sebuah kutukan di Pilgrim Way.{nl}

column2: Looks like the necklace belongs to you. {nl}If it wasn't for you, the teachings of Maven would have been left as a curse.
column3: Sepertinya kalung itu milikmu. {nl}Jika bukan untukmu, ajaran Maven akan ditinggal sebagai sebuah kutukan.

column2: To be honest, I'd like go to Kvailas Forest rather than staying here. {nl}I want to see the source of evil with my own two eyes.
column3: Sebenarnya, Aku ingin pergi ke Kvailas Forest. {nl}Aku ingin melihat sumber kejahatan dengan mataku.

column2: Thank you. The tools are sold by the blacksmith in Klaipeda. {nl}But before that, there are stones in Stele Road that are known for their quality. Please retrieve {nl}some for me.
column3: Terima kasih. Blacksmith di Klaipeda menjual berbagai peralatan. {nl}Tapi sebelumnya, batu-batu di Stele Road dikenal dengan kualitas yang bagus. Tolong ambil beberapa untukku.

column2: Here you are. Please place this at the entrance of the Royal Mausoleum at Zachariel Crossroads. {nl}This should bring comfort to their souls.
column3: Selesai. Tolong simpan ini di jalan masuk dari Royal Tomb di Zachariel Crossroad. {nl}Ini akan membuat nyaman jiwa mereka.

column2: Hmm. You're really as good as they say. {nl}Rolandas is waiting for you in Akmens Ridge.
column3: Hmm. Kamu bagus seperti yang mereka katakan. {nl}Rolandas sedang menunggumu di Akmens Ridge.

column2: Please be careful. {nl}A dark energy similar to the voice a while ago is covering the Thorn Forest. {nl}Especially the Kvailas Forest.. I have sharp ears for things like this..
column3: Berhati-hatilah. {nl}Sebuah aura jahat sama seperti suara yang dulu menyelimuti Thron Forest. {nl}Terutama Kvailas Forest.. Aku punya telinga tajam untuk hal-hal seperti ini..

column2: The Necroventer that occupied Kule Peak is gone. {nl}Kule Peak should become peaceful again.
column3: Necroventer yang menguasai Kule Peak telah hilang. {nl}Kule Peak akan damai kembali.

column2: This was prepared for releasing the seals in Tiltas Valley. {nl}The sap was collected little by little over centuries. {nl}So please handle it with care.
column3: Ini persiapan untuk melepas seal di Tiltas Valley. {nl}Getah dikumpulkan sedikit demi sedikit selama berabad-abad. {nl}Tolong hati-hati.

column2: This is it. {nl}Bring the Seal Release Crystal to Ramstis Ridge. {nl}The Disciples of Gustas will welcome you there.
column3: Ini dia. {nl}Bawa Seal Release Crystal ke Ramstis Ridge. {nl}Murid-murid Ramstis akan menyambutmu di sana.

column2: The day of discovering the true owner of the Great King's inheritance has finally come. {nl}Hurry, meet the Disciples of Gustas in Ramstis Ridge.
column3: Hari dimana ditemukannya Great King Legacy telah tiba. {nl}Cepat, pergi murid dari Gustas di Ramstis Ridge.

column2: My teacher is poisoned and cannot breathe. {nl}Please hurry and borrow an antidote from someone in Akmens Ridge.
column3: Guru itu diracuni dan tidak bisa bernapas. {nl}Cepat pinjam antidote dari yang lain di Akmens Ridge.

column2: I had no idea it came from Rukas Plateau. {nl}What is he trying to do by releasing the seal? {nl}
column3: Aku tidak tahu tentang Rukas Plateau. {nl}Apa yang mereka coba lakukan dengan melepaskan seal? {nl}

column2: Follow the road on the right to go to Cobalt Forest. {nl}Our village priest there is waiting for you.
column3: Ikuti jalan di sebelah kanan dan pergi ke Cobalt Forest. {nl}Town priest kami sedang menunggumu.

column2: When you have all materials ready, combine them at the Ershike Altar.
column3: Saat kamu sudah menyiapkan semua materialnya, kombinasikan di Ershike altar.

column2: The evil energy was first felt in Kvailas Forest. {nl}The force was very strong so it will remain this way for a while even if you defeat Bramble.
column3: Kekuatan jahat pertama kali dirasakan di Kvailas Forest. {nl}Kekuatan itu sangat kuat sehingga akan seperti ini sementara waktu bahkan jika kamu mengalahkan Bramble.

column2: The evil energy of Kvailas Forest is becoming stronger and our followers are becoming weak. {nl}I hope you can help us. {nl}
column3: Kekuatan jahat dari Kvailas Forest menjadi lebih kuat tapi follower kami semakin lemah. {nl}Aku harap kamu bisa membantu kami. {nl}

column2: Perhaps the source of evil in Kvailas Forest has become the forest itself? {nl}I only hope this is just an ill-founded worry.
column3: Mungkin sumber kejahatan dari Kavilas Forest adalah forest itu sendiri. {nl}Meskipun aku berharap ini hanya ketakutan saja.

column2: Everything will be resolved when the evil energy deep inside Kvailas Forest is dealt with. {nl}It's a pity that everyone is only after what's right in front of them.
column3: Itu akan berakhir ketika kekuatan jahat dalam Kavailas Forest sudah hilang. {nl}Sayang sekali setiap orang hanya mengejar apa yang benar dihadapan mereka.

column2: Kvailas Forest is the worst. {nl}The evil energy is unquestionably concentrated that even your lives are at stake.
column3: Kvailas Forest adalah yang terburuk. {nl}Kekuatan jahat terkonsentrasi dan bahkan hidupmu dipertaruhkan.

column2: I miss my family in Cobalt Forest. {nl}And... I want to apologize to my brother for the fight we had.
column3: Aku rindu keluargaku di Cobalt Forest. {nl}Dan.. Aku ingin meminta maaf pada saudaraku karena bertengkar.

column2: I remember singing and soaking my feet in the stream waters with my older brother in {nl}Cobalt Forest.
column3: Aku ingat bernyanyi dan bermain di aliran sungai Cobalt Forest.

column2: Can you inform the elderly in Vieta Gorge about this for me? {nl}If you veer left and move up from here, you'll quickly arrive there.
column3: Bisakah kamu mengatakannya kepada orang tua di Vieta Gorge? {nl}Hanya pergi sedikit ke atas lalu ke kiri.

column2: The most important root must be somewhere in Kvailas Forest. {nl}Cutting off the head root should reduce the evil energy in this forest.
column3: Akar yang paling penting pasti berada di suatu tempat di Kvailas Forest. {nl}Mungkin kita terlalu banyak berkeliling. {nl}Memotong akar itu akan mengurangi kekuatan dari hutan ini.

column2: I knew it was Evoniphon's poison. {nl}No one else would use a poison this strong.
column3: Aku tahu itu adalah racun dari Evonipon. {nl}Hanya itu racun yang begitu kuat.

column2: Don't worry. I'll give you the recipe. {nl}Ridimed leaves from there will be enough to make it.
column3: Jangan khawatir. Aku akan memberikan kamu resepnya. {nl}Ridimed leaves dari sana cukup untuk membuatnya.

column2: Is the antidote ready yet? {nl}The situation's grave. He's gradually getting worse.
column3: Apakah antidote sudah siap? {nl}Itu mengerikan. Dia semakin memburuk.

column2: Evoniphon sure employed a vicious poison. {nl}We need to hunt him down before he causes more damage...
column3: Pasti Evonipon menggunakan racun ganas. {nl}Kita harus memburunya sebelum menimbulkan banyak kerusakan.

column2: Oh, is this the antidote? {nl}Thank you very much. I will let them take it right away. {nl}
column3: Oh apakah ini antidote? {nl}Terima kasih banyak. Aku akan memberikan kepadanya segera. {nl}

column2: If it wasn't for you, many workers would have lost their lives for nothing. {nl}I will report about this to Sir Uska. {nl}No doubt about it... you were sent by the goddess!{nl}
column3: Jika bukan karenamu, banyak pekerja yang akan kehilangan nyawanya sia-sia. {nl}Aku akan lapor kepada Sir Uska. {nl}Sungguh.. Kamu dikirim oleh Goddess!{nl}

column2: The monsters in the Owl Burial Ground should be a fair bet for you. Right?
column3: Seekor monster di Owl Grave taruhan yang adil untukmu. {nl}Bukan ?

column2: The Chaparition in Escanciu Village took a lot of lives. {nl}Please defeat that monster in the name of the Goddess.
column3: Chaparition di Escanciu Village mengambil banyak kehidupan. {nl}Tolong kalahkan Monster dengan nama Goddess.

column2: I'm sorry but can you burn this oration in front of the epitaph in Rukas Plateau? {nl}You have explored different areas of the valley. {nl}I think you are more than qualified to comfort their souls.
column3: Aku minta maaf tapi kamu bisa membakar orasi ini di depan epitaph di Rukas Plateau? {nl}Kamu sudah mengeksplorasi area berbeda dari valley. {nl}Aku pikir kamu lebih pantas untuk menghibur jiwa mereka.

column2: Try and perform a killing spree of the monsters in the Owl Burial Ground. {nl}Around 40 of them? I bet you can't do it.
column3: Terjadi pembantaian monster di Owl Grave. {nl}Sekitar 40 jumlahnya? Aku bertaruh kamu tidak bisa melakukannya.

column2: I'll go to Ramstis Ridge and release the seals
column3: Aku akan pergi ke Ramstis Ridge dan melepas seal.

column2: Let's go help Grita at Fedimian Suburbs
column3: Mari kita bantu Grita di Fedimian Outskirts.

column2: Breaking Seal/MAKING/20/TRACK_BEFORE/None/F_smoke011_blue/2.5/BOT
column3: Menghancurkan Segel/MAKING/20/TRACK_BEFORE/None/F_smoke011_blue/2.5/BOT

column2: About the barriers in Nefritas Cliff
column3: Tentang barrier di Nefritas Cliff.

column2: Owl Burial Ground Test
column3: Owl Grave Test

column2: Tyrant of the Srautas Gorge
column3: Tyrant of the Srautas Gorge

column2: Notice/Find the elderly in Vieta Gorge!#5
column3: Notice/Temukan tetua di Vieta Gorge!#5

column2: Curse of Laziness - Soul Attack
column3: Curse of Laziness - Attack of Soul

column2: Notice/!/A piece of paper fell#3
column3: Notice/!/Sepotong kertas yang jatuh#3

column2: Notice/Mutated Tree Root Crystal is disappeared!#5
column3: Notice/Mutated Tree Root Crystal menghilang!#5

column2: Give the portrait and handkerchief
column3: Memberikan potret dan sapu tangan.

column2: It's frightening. Make a run for it!
column3: Itu menakutkan. Lari.

column2: Leave your spot
column3: Tinggalkan.

column2: Notice/Witas is dead??{nl}Make him a grave#5
column3: Notice/Witas sudah kalah??{nl}Buatkan dia sebuah makam.#5

column2: Show the Succubus Eyes
column3: Menunjukkan Succubus Eyes.

column2: I can't lose this precious thing so I refuse.
column3: Aku tidak bisa kehilangan sesuatu yang berharga ini. Menolak.

column2: About the reason of concern
column3: Tentang reason of interest.

column2: Kvailas Forest is more urgent
column3: Kvailas Forest lebih penting.

column2: Purify Kvailas Forest (1)
column3: Purify Kvailas Forest (1)

column2: Purify Kvailas Forest (2)
column3: Purify Kvailas Forest (2)

column2: Notice/Collected all the tree sap.{nl}Go to Ershike Altar and combine the materials!#5
column3: Notice/Mengumpulkan semua tree sap.{nl}Pergi ke Ershike Altar dan menggabungkan material!#5

column2: Combining materials/FLASK/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None
column3: Menggabungkan material/FLASK/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None

column2: Notice/Go to Priest Andale in Cobalt Forest!#5
column3: Notice/Pergi ke Priest Andale di Cobalt Forest!#5

column2: Ominous Energy at Ershike Altar
column3: Ershike Altar dengan energi menakutkan.

column2: Taking out things/DRAW/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None
column3: Mengambil sesuatu/DRAW/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None

column2: Rolandas Jonas of Akmens Ridge
column3: Rolandas Jonas of Akmens Ridge

column2: To Kvailas Forest
column3: Ke Kvailas Forest

column2: To Gele Plateau
column3: Ke Gele Plateau

column2: The Suspicious Dagger (3)
column3: Pedang yang mencurigakan (3)

column2: Do you know someone who is familiar with poison?
column3: Apakah kamu kenal seseorang yang tidak asing dengan racun ini?

column2: OK. (Stop the pursuit)
column3: OK. (Menghentikan pengejaran)

column2: Ask about the antidote
column3: Tanya tentang antidote.

column2: Defeat Gazing Golem
column3: Bunuh Gorgon Golem

column2: Collect stones from Stele Road
column3: Kumpulkan batu dari Stele Road.

column2: Stonemason Pipoti want to set up a memorial stone for his colleague and other explorers who lost their lives here. Bring him the stones from Stele Road.
column3: Stonemason Pipoti ingin membuat sebuah memorial stone untuk temannya dan penjelajah lain yang meninggal di sini. Bawakan dia batu dari Stele Road.

column2: Install the Memorial Stone at the entrance of the Royal Mausoleum at Zachariel Crossroads.
column3: Bangun memorial stone di pintu masuk Royal Tomb di Zachariel Crossroads.

column2: The entrance to the Royal Mausoleum is just the right place to commemorate the lives lost in this area. Install the memorial stone at the Royal Mausoleum entrance in Zachariel Crossroads.
column3: Pintu masuk Mausoluem adalah tempat yang cocok untuk mengenang kehidupan yang hilang di daerah ini. Install the memorial stone at the Mausoleum entrance in Zachariel Corssroad.

column2: Pick up and retrieve the purifier tube on the way to district 7.
column3: Angkat dan ambil purifier tube di perjalanan ke district 7.

column2: Arrive at the Miners' Village
column3: Tiba di Miner Village.

column2: You must enter the Crystal Mines but the Miners' Village, where the Crystal Mine is located, in under attack by the Vubbes. Go to the Miners' Village quickly!
column3: Kamu harus masuk ke dalam Crystal Mines tapi Miner Village dimana Crystal Mine berada sedang diserang oleh Vubbes. Pergi ke Miner Village secepatnya!

column2: Treasure Hunter Eden of Stele Road is looking for someone who can deliver stones.
column3: Treasure Hunter Edang of Stele Road sedang mencari seseorang yang bisa mengirimkan batu-batu ini.

column2: Talk to Grita at Fedimian Suburbs
column3: Bicara dengan Grita di Fedimian Outskirts.

column2: Grita is waiting at the Karsta Hall Site of the Fedimian Suburbs. Talk to Grita.
column3: Grita sedang menunggu di Karsta Battlefiield of Fedimian Outskirts. Pergi dan bicara dengan Grita.

column2: Came to Karsta Hall Site and Grita is waiting for you. Talk to Grita.
column3: Datang ke Karsta Battlefiield dan Grita sedang menunggu kamu. Pergi dan bicara dengan Grita.

column2: Goddess Gabija says you need to strengthen your powers at the Entrance of Kateen Forest. Pass through Tenet Garden and go to the Entrance of Kateen Forest.
column3: Goddess Gabija berkata kamu harus menambah kekuatanmu di Kateen Forest Entrance. Lewati Tenet Garden dan pergi ke Kateen Forest Entrance.

column2: Missed Gesti again but got back the revelation safely. Go to the Paladin Master in Nefritas Cliff.
column3: Kehilangan Gesti lagi tapi mendapatkan kembali Petunjuk dengan aman. Pergi ke Paladin Master di Nefritas Cliff.

column2: Watcher Allen is waiting for someone's help at Nefritas Cliff.
column3: Guard Alen sedang menunggu bantuan seseorang di Nefritas Cliff.

column2: Watcher Kenneth is waiting for someone's help at Nefritas Cliff.
column3: Guard Kenneth sedang menunggu bantuan seseorang di Nefritas Cliff.

column2: Follower Kayetonas at Nefritas Cliff is looking for someone who can fight with him.
column3: Follower Kayetonas di Nefritas Cliff sedang mencari seseorang yang ingin bertarung dengannya.

column2: The Paladin Master is waiting for you at Uzbaiga Hillside in Nefritas Cliff.
column3: Paladin Master sedang menunggu kamu di Uzbaiga Highland di Nefritas Cliff

column2: The Paladin Master is waiting for your help at Nefritas Cliff.
column3: Paladin Master sedang menunggu bantuanmu di Nefritas Cliff.

column2: Arrived at Akmens Ridge and Rolanda is waiting for you. Talk to Rolanda to find the legacy of the Great King Zachariel.
column3: Tiba di Akmens Ridge dan Rolanda sedang menunggumu. Bicara dengan Rolanda untuk menemukan Legacy of King Zachariel.

column2: Archaeologist Dezek's status is getting worse. Cable car managers might have the antidote. Ask if others in Akmens Ridge have the antidote.
column3: Keadaan Archaeologist Dezek semakin memburuk. Gondola manager mungkin punya antidote. Tanyakan apakah orang lain di Akmens Ridge punya antidote.

column2: Release all seals of Tiltas Valley
column3: Melepas semua seal dari Tiltas Valley.

column2: Take the key from Overlong Bridge Valley and use the map from Akmens Ridge to release all seals of Awaiting Stone Bridge.
column3: Mengambil kunci dari Overlong Bridge Valley dan gunakan peta dari Akmens Ridge untuk melepas semua seal dari Awaiting Stone Bridge.

column2: Enter the entrance to Royal Mausoleum in Zachariel Crossroads
column3: Masuk ke Royal Tomb di Zachariel Crossroad.

column2: All seals are released. Enter the Royal Mausoleum to protect the legacy of Great King Zachariel that has been guarded by the Jonas' people.
column3: Melepaskan semua seal. Pergi ke Royal Tomb untuk melindungi Legacy of King Zachariel that has been guarded by the Jonas's people.

column2: Historian Rexipher is waiting for you along the path to the Royal Mausoleum. Talk to Rexipher in Rukas Plateau.
column3: Historian Rexipher sedang menunggu kamu di sepanjang jalan menuju Royal Tomb. Bicara dengan Rexipher di Rukas Plateau.

column2: Thankfully, it seems as if you've protected the Sviesa Altar Seal. Go back to Cyrenia Odell.
column3: Untungnya segel Viesha Altar sepertinya dijagai. Kembalilah kepada Cyrenia Odell.

column2: Break the Sviesa Altar Seal
column3: Melepaskan segel Viesha Altar

column2: Epigraphist Raymond of Stele Road is waiting for someone's help.
column3: Epigraphist Raymond of Stele Road sedang menunggu bantuan seseorang.

column2: Watcher Rikke of Tenet Garden is waiting for someone's help.
column3: Guard Rikke of Tenet Gardensedang menunggu bantuan seseorang.

column2: Watcher Erra in Tenet Garden is waiting for someone's help.
column3: Guard Erra of Tenet Garden sedang menunggu bantuan seseorang.

column2: Follower Alfonsas of Tenet Garden is waiting for someone's help.
column3: Follower Alfonsas of Tenet Garden sedang menunggu bantuan seseorang.

column2: Follower Algis is waiting for you at Tenet Garden.
column3: Follower Algis of Tenet Garden sedang menunggu bantuan seseorang.

column2: Rexipher kidnapped Cyrenia Odell. Follow Rexipher to the Zachariel Crossroads.
column3: Rexipher menculik Cyrenia Odelle. Ikuti Rexipher ke Zachariel Crossroad.

column2: Epigraphist Schmid of Stele Road is waiting for someone's help.
column3: Epigraphist Schmid of Stele Road sedang menunggu bantuan seseorang.

column2: Completed the Tree Dale mission for the souls wandering Escanciu Village. But the wandering soul needs something more. Find the wandering soul.
column3: Menyelesaikan misi Tree Dale untuk jiwa-jiwa yang berkeliaran di Escanciu Village. Tapi jiwa-jiwa itu butuh sesuatu yang lain. Temukan wandering soul.

column2: The Highlander Master tells you to repair the wooden seal that you destroyed. To repair the seal, get woods from the Pyrent and ropes from the Red Panto Thrower in Nefritas Cliff.
column3: Highlander Master mengatakan kepadamu untuk memperbaiki wooden seal yang kamu hancurkan. Untuk memperbaiki seal, dapatkan kayu dari Pyrent dan tali dari Red Panto Thrower di Nefritas Cliff.

column2: Neritas Cliff/Tenet Garden
column3: Neritas Cliff/Tenet Garden

column2: The Highlander Master tells you to repair the wooden seal that you destroyed. To repair the seal, get woods from the Pyrent and ropes from the Red Panto Thrower in Nefritas Cliff.
column3: Highlander Master mengatakan kepadamu untuk memperbaiki wooden seal yang kamu hancurkan. Untuk memperbaiki seal, dapatkan kayu dari Pyrent dan tali dari Red Panto Thrower di Nefritas Cliff.

column2: Defeat the monsters roaming around the Owl Burial Ground.
column3: Kalahkan monster yang berkeliaran di sekitar Owl Grave.

column2: James suggested a bet. Defeat the monsters in Owl Burial Ground.
column3: James mengajak bertaruh. Kalahkan monster di Owl Grave.

column2: Defeat the monsters in Owl Burial Ground
column3: Kalahkan monster di Owl Grave.

column2: Defeat the monsters in Lemprasa Pond
column3: Kalahkan monster di Lemprasa Pond.

column2: Officer Liudas say he'll give you an accessory if you defeat the monsters around. Defeat the monsters around Lemprasa Pond.
column3: Officer Ludas berkata dia akan memberikanmu sebuah aksesoris jika kamu mengalahkan monster di sekitar. Kalahkan monster di sekitar Lamprasa Pond.

column2: Defeated a lot of monsters in Lemprasa Pond. Report to Offier Liudas.
column3: Mengalahkan banyak monster di Lamprasa Pond. Lapor ke Offier Ludas.

column2: Historian Collin wants to honor the explorers who died while exploring this area. Burn the oration in their honor in front of the epitaph at Rukas Plateau.
column3: Historian Collin ingin menghormati penjelajah yang meninggal saat menjelajahi area ini. Bakar orasi dalam menghormati mereka di depan epitaph di Rukas Plateau.

column2: Burned the oration in fron of the epitaph in Rukas Plateau. Report to Historian Collin.
column3: Membakar orasi di depan epitaph di Rukas Plateau. Lapor ke Historian Collin.

column2: Guards in Strautas are waiting for someone's help.
column3: Para Guard di Strautas sedang menuggu bantuan seseorang.

column2: Unlike Molly's expectations, Capria is even angrier after seeing its babies and even attacked them. Tell Molly that peace in Srautas does not seem possible.
column3: Tak seperti yang Molly harapkan, Capria bahkan lebih marah setelah melihat bayinya dan bahkan menyerang Capria. Katakan kepada Molly perdamaian di Srautas tampaknya tidak mungkin.

column2: Knight Commander Uska thinks the high gardens in the revelation refers to an area in Gele Plateau and told you to meet the Paladin Master.
column3: Knight Commander Uska berpikir high garden di Petunjuk itu adalah Gele Plateau dan mengatakan padamu pergi ke Paladin Master.

column2: Watcher Basil in Gele Plateau is waiting for someone's help.
column3: Guard Basil di Gele Plateau sedang menunggu bantuan seseorang.

column2: Watcher Molly in Gele Plateau is waiting for someone's help.
column3: Guard Moria di Gele Plateau sedang menunggu bantuan seseorang.

column2: Search the portal in Veja Ravine
column3: Cari portal di Veja Ravine.

column2: The Paladin Master thinks that the colorful stream in the revelation refers to Veja Ravine. Follow the revelation and head to Folgaram Site.
column3: Paladin Master berpikir colorful stream di Petunjuk itu adalah Veja Ravine. Ikuti Petunjuk dan mengarah ke Folgaram Site.

column2: The villagers suddenly turned into demons and attacked. Run away to Nugria Sanctum in Veja Ravine where the portal is located.
column3: Villager akhirnya berubah menjadi demon dan menyerang. Lari ke Nugria sanctuary di Veja Ravine dimana portal berada.

column2: There are many seals of sanctuary in Ramstis Ridge. Release the seal of Pasagos Cliff.
column3: Ada banyak seal of sanctuary di Ramstis Ridge. Lepaskan seal of Pasaga Cliff.

column2: There are many seals of sanctuary in Ramstis Ridge. Release the seal along the path to collased sanctuary.
column3: Ada banyak seal of sanctuary di Ramstis Ridge. Lepaskan seal sepanjang perjalanan ke collased sanctuary.

column2: There are many seals of sanctuary in Ramstis Ridge. Release the seal at the left of collased sanctuary.
column3: Ada banyak seal of sanctuary di Ramstis Ridge. Lepaskan seal di sebelah kiri collased sanctuary.

column2: There are many epitaphs with the secret of the Royal Mausoleum in Rukas Plateau. Check the Epitaph at the left side of Dykyne Fork.
column3: Ada banyak epitaph dengan rahasia dari Royal Tomb di Rukas Plateau. Periksa Epitaph di sebelah kiri Dykyne Crossroad.

column2: Treasure Chest of Zachariel Crossroads
column3: Peti harta karun dari Zachariel Crossroad

column2: Open the treasure chest of Zachariel Crossroads.
column3: Buka Peti harta karun dari Zachariel Crossroad.

column2: Tree Root Crystal of Laziness in the upper area of Posukis Path Plaza
column3: Tree Root Crystal of Laziness di area atas Paskuti Trail Plaza.

column2: Tree Root Crystals of Laziness are in the upper area of Posukis Path Plaza. Take a closer look at it to find out what to do with it.
column3: Tree Root Crystals of Laziness ada di area atas Paskuti Trail Plaza. Lihat lebih dekat untuk mengetahui apa yang bisa dilakukan dengan itu.

column2: Separate the soul of pilgrim
column3: Pisahkan Soul of Pilgrim.

column2: Reduce the monster's HP near the Tree Root Crystal of Laziness and release the entrapped soul of pilgrim. Then break the soul to destroy the Tree Root Crystal.
column3: Kurangi monster HP dekat dengan Tree Root Crystal of Laziness dan lepaskan soul of pilgrim yang terperangkap. Kemudian pecahkan soul untuk menghancurkan Tree Root Crystal.

column2: It might get its mind back if Witas' belongings is among the things you found. Talk to Pilgrim Witas.
column3: Mungkin ingatannya bisa pulih jika ada barang-barang Witas pada benda-benda yang kamu temukan. Bicara dengan Pilgrim Witas.

column2: When you showed him his things, he became enraged and turned into a monster. Hold him back and try to talk to him again.
column3: Ketika kamu menunjukkan barang-barang itu, dia mengamuk dan berubah menjadi seekor monster. Tahan dia dan coba lagi bicara dengannya.

column2: Successfully stopped Witas, who had turned into a monster. Talk to Pilgrim Witas again.
column3: Sukses menghentikan Witas berubah menjadi seekor monster. Bicara dengan Pilgrim Witas lagi.

column2: Defeat King Liverwort that Witas transformed into
column3: Kalahkan King Liverwort yang berasal dari Witas.

column2: Pilgrim Witas collapsed helplessly. Talk to him.
column3: Pilgrim Witas kalah tak berdaya. Bicara dengannya.

column2: Pilgrim Witas died. Make a grave for him.
column3: Pilgrim Witas kalah. Buat sebuah makam untuknya.

column2: Pilgrim Theophilis is suddenly looking for you. Talk to him.
column3: Pilgrim Theophilis tiba-tiba mencarimu. Bicara dengannya.

column2: Theophilis took out the Necklace of Envy from Succubus eyes. Talk to him again.
column3: Theophilis mengeluarkan Necklace of Envy dari Succubus eyes. Bicara lagi dengannya.

column2: The details of slate found in Crystal Mines mentions revelation of the goddess about blocking the threats to Gele Plateau. Report about it to Commander Uska.
column3: Detail dari slate yang ditemukan di Crystal Mines menyebutkan Petunjuk dari Goddess tentang memblokir ancaman untuk Gele Plateau. Lapor tentang hal itu ke Commander Uska.

column2: Knight Commander Uska thinks the high gardens in the revelation refers to an area in Gele Plateau and told you to go to the Paladin Master. Drop by the Mayor of the Miners' Village and ask for directions to Gele Plateau.
column3: Knight Commander Uska berpikir high garden di Petunjuk adalah Gele Plateau dan mengatakan kepadamu pergi ke Paladin Master. Mampir ke Mayor of Miner Village dan tanya arah ke Gele Plateau.

column2: Treasure Hunter of Stele Road is waiting for someone's help.
column3: Treasure Hunter of Stele Road sedang menunggu bantuan seseorang.

column2: Talk to the Wandering Spirit of Escanciu Village.
column3: Bicara dengan wandering soldier of Escanciu Village.

column2: I found a written order while checking the military backpack of the Wandering Spirit in Escanciu Village. Check the details of the order.
column3: Menemukan sebuah perintah tertulis ketika memeriksa military bag of wandering soul di Escanciu Village. Periksa detail dari perintah itu.

column2: Complete Operation Wooden Village for the Wandering Spirit of Escanciu Village.
column3: Menyelesaikan Misi Tree Dale untuk wandering soul of Escanciu.

column2: Move to Kvailas Forest
column3: Pindah ke Kvailas Forest.

column2: Find the Believers of Goddess Saule in Sirdgela Forest and help them.
column3: Temukan Follower Goddess Saule di Sirdgela Forest dan tolong mereka.

column2: Goddess Saule's Believer Samantha is waiting for your help in Kvailas Forest.
column3: Goddess Saule follower Samantha sedang menunggu bantuan kamu di Kvailas Forest.

column2: Villagers told you to go to the elderly of Andale Village. Go to the elderly of Andale Village in Vieta Gorge.
column3: Villager berkata agar kamu pergi ke elderly of Andale Village. Pergi ke elderly of Andale Village di Vieta Gorge.

column2: Go to the Ershike Altar
column3: Pergi ke Ershike Altar.

column2: Collected all the materials needed to restore the Obelisk. Go to the Ershike Altar to combine them.
column3: Mengumpulkan semua material yang dibutuhkan untuk memperbaiki obelisk. Pergi ke Ershike altar untuk menggabungkannya.

column2: Retrieve dye from the Ershike Altar
column3: Mengambil pewarna dari Ershike Altar.

column2: Move to Cobalt Forest
column3: Pindah ke Cobalt Forest.

column2: Check the Ershike Altar
column3: Periksa Ershike Altar.

column2: An ominous energy is felt from the Ershike altar. Find out what is happening.
column3: Kekuatan aneh dirasakan dari Ershike altar. Periksa apa yang terjadi.

column2: The Priest in Vieta Gorge told you to go to the Priest in Andale Village. Go meet the Andale Village Priest in Cobalt Forest.
column3: Priest of Vieta Gorge mengatakan kamu harus pergi ke priest di Andale Village. Pergi ke Andale Village Priest di Cobalt Forest.

column2: Check the portal of Veja Ravine
column3: Periksa portal dari Veja Ravine.

column2: The villagers were demons in disguise. Make an escape to the portal in Veja Ravine.
column3: Villager menyamar sebagai Demon. Lari ke portal di Veja Ravine.

column2: Check the old well in Cobalt Forest.
column3: Periksa sumur tua di Cobalt Forest.

column2: Move to Akmens Ridge
column3: Pindah ke Akmens Ridge.

column2: Morkus Jonas says you can listen to the next story from Rolandas Jonas in Akmens Ridge.
column3: Morkus Jonas berkata kamu mendengar cerita selanjutnya dari Rolandas Jonas di Akmens Ridge.

column2: Go and meet Rolandas Jonas in Akmens Ridge.
column3: Pergi dan temui Rolandas Jonas di Akmens Ridge.

column2: Goddess Saule says Bramble of Kvailas Forest is in the Thorn Forest. Pass through Gate Route and Spine Heart Dale to Kvailas Forest to find the revelation.
column3: Goddess Saule berkata Bramble of Kvailas Forest ada di Thorn Forest. Lewati Gate Route dan Spine Heart Dale ke Kvailas Forest untuk menemukan Petunjuk.

column2: Kvailas Forest
column3: Kvailas Forest

column2: Travel to Gele Plateau
column3: Pindah ke Gele Plateau.

column2: Gele Plateau
column3: Gele Plateau

column2: The Ranger Master seems to know about the sword. Go and talk to them.
column3: Ranger Master sepertinya tahu tentang pedang. Bicara dengan Ranger Master.

column2: The Ranger Master says this sword is Evoniphon's and tells you to ask the Hunter Master about the poison.
column3: Ranger Master berkata pedang ini adalah Evoniphon dan berkata kepadamu untuk bertanya kepada Hunter Master tentang racun.

column2: The Hunter Master seems to know the poison well. Go and talk with them.
column3: Hunter Master sepertinya tahu tentang racun dengan baik. Bicara dengan Hunter Master.

column2: Craft an antidote by mixing Ridimed Leaves and potions
column3: Membuat Antidote dengan mencampurkan obat dengan daun Ridimed.

column2: Get Ridimed leaves in pioneering area and the antidote.
column3: Dapatkan Ridimed leaves di pioneering area dan antidote.

column2: key to enter Rest Mode and press the
column3: Kunci untuk rest mode dan tekan

column2: key to create the antidote.
column3: Kunci untuk membuat antidote.

column2: Give antidote to Gytis
column3: Berikan antidote ke Gitis.

column2: Made the antidote to cure the poisoned workers. Give the antidote to Gytis.
column3: Membuat antidote untuk menyembuhkan pekerja yang keracunan. Berikan antidote ke Giti.

column2: Make %s
column3: Membuat %s

column2: Releasing barrier/SITGROPE/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None
column3: Melepaskan barrier/SITGROPE/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

column2: Notice/!/Did not find anything!#5
column3: Notice/!/Tidak menemukan apapun!#5

column2: NPCChat/SIAULIAI_50_1_SQ_MAN03/I feel better now.
column3: NPCChat/SIAULIAI_50_1_SQ_MAN03/Aku merasa lebih baik sekarang.

column2: Take the key from Overlong Bridge Valley and use the map from Akmens Ridge to release all seals of Tiltas Valley.
column3: Ambil key dari Overlong Bridge Valley dan gunakan peta dari Akmens Ridge untuk melepas semua seal dari Tiltas Valley.

column2: If you are talking about the Rukas Plateau, that place isn't worthy of research.{nl}It's been a while since we pulled out.
column3: Dan jika kamu berbicara tentang Rukas Plateau, tempat itu tidak layak untuk penelitian, Sudah beberapa waktu sejak kami meninggalkannya.

column2: Looking for information on Varkis/SITGROPE_LOOP/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None
column3: Mencari informasi di Varkis/SITGROPE_LOOP/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None

column2: Notice/!/Can't find research data and Unknocker suddenly appreared!{nl}Unknocker might have the research data! Defeat Unknocker!#7
column3: Notice/!/Tidak menemukan data penelitian dan Unknocker tiba-tiba muncul!{nl}Unknocker mungkin punya data penelitiannya! Kalahkan Unknocker!#7

column2: Defeat Lithorex
column3: Kalahkan Lithorex

column2: Defeat Unknocker and get %s
column3: Kalahkan Unknocker dan mendapatkan %s

column2: They are already gone from this world. {nl}They are repeating what happened back then because of their anger towards Gaigalas.
column3: Mereka sudah pergi dari dunia ini. {nl}Mereka mengulangi apa yang terjadi saat itu karena kemarahan mereka kepada Gaigalas.

column2: This cable car works. {nl}But the monsters around make it such a hassle to maintain it.
column3: Gondola ini masih berfungsi. {nl}Tapi monster di 'sekitar membuat sulit untuk merawatnya.

column2: Could you take care of them?
column3: Dapatkan kamu mengurusnya?

column2: It's better to use the cable car rather than fight your way past the monsters.
column3: Lebih baik menggunakan gondola daripada melawan monster-monster itu.

column2: I think there are monsters crawling out of the mysterious barrier at Nutoles  Cliff.{nl}Is it possible for you to get rid of that barrier?
column3: Sepertinya monster merangkak keluar dari barrier misterius di Nuotori Cliff. {nl}Dapatkan kamu menghancurkan barrier itu?

column2: With that barrier gone, maintenance will be a lot easier now.
column3: Perawatan akan lebih mudah sekarang karena barrier sudah hilang.

column2: Go down from the middle of the Twin Bridge and you'll arrive at Srautas Gorge. {nl}Go further right through the Gorge and you'll reach to Gele Plateau.
column3: Turun dari tengah Twin Bridge dan kamu akan tiba di Srautas Gorge. {nl}Pergi lebih jauh ke arah kiri dari sana dan kamu akan sampai ke Gele Plateau.

column2: Go on ahead and defeat the Hanamings around here. {nl}Then gather Hanaming Petals while you're at it.
column3: Pertama, kalahkan Hanaming di sekitar. {nl}Dan kumpulkan Hanaming flower dari mereka.

column2: Miners' Village is a problem but we also haven't gotten any rest from this endless skirmish. {nl}Defeating those Chupacabras would make it a lot better.
column3: Miners Village sedang dalam masalah dan kami pun belum sempat istirahat setelah pertarungan panjang. {nl}Mengalahkan Chupacabra mungkin dapat membantu.

column2: Defeat the Vubbe Fighter. {nl}Search Scouts are on stand by in Nudeges Felled Area.
column3: Kalahkan Vubbe Fighter. {nl}Cari Scout yang berjaga Nudegi Felled Area.

column2: You'll need to cross Srautas Gorge to get to Gele Plateau. {nl}Go down from the Twin Bridge and you'll arrive at Srautas Gorge.
column3: Kamu harus pergi lebih jauh dari Srautas Gorge untuk mencapai Gele Plateau. {nl}Pergi menuruni Twin Bridge dan kamu akan tiba di Srautas Gorge.

column2: You have came all the way here, just for a mere meddlesome woman? {nl}Do you honestly want to save this woman that much?
column3: Kamu jauh-jauh datang ke sini untuk wanita yang mengganggu pekerjaanku itu? {nl}Apakah kamu sangat ingin menolongnya?

column2: We're looking for a stone with strange engraving like this. {nl}If you see a stone like this, please don't touch it and just let us know about it.
column3: Kami sedang mencari sebuah batu dengan ukiran aneh seperti ini. {nl}Jika kamu melihat batu seperti ini, jangan disentuh dan beritahu kami.

column2: The Magic Regulator of the Royal Mausoleum can be destroyed with the power of the{nl}Activation Stones. Details can be found in the Magic Regulator Manual.
column3: Magic Suppressor dari Royal Tomb dapat dihancurkan dengan kekuatan dari activation stone. {nl}Ketika kekuatannya hilang, kamu bisa mengaktifkannya lagi dengan Magic Suppressor Manual.

column2: As you can see, Fedimian is right under our noses but we can't get to it with the Cockatrices {nl}around. Can you teach them a lesson on how scary humans are?
column3: Fedimian hanya di sekikar sudut sana tapi kita tidak bisa ke sana karena Cockatrice. {nl}Dapatkan kamu mengajari mereka bahwa orang-orang takut dengannya?

column2: Denoptic is trying to control the corrupted Guardians. {nl}Annihilate it so that the Guardians will not fall into its hands.
column3: Denoptic mencoba untuk mengendalikan contaminated guardian. {nl}Kalahkan mereka sehingga guardians tidak mereka kuasai.

column2: Thank you in the name of the Goddes! {nl}Please defeat the filthy Cockatrice first that are spreading diseases.
column3: Terima kasih atas nama Goddes! {nl}Tolong kalahkan filthy Cockatrice dulu yang menyebarkan penyakit ini.

column2: First, cripple the demons by fighting them, then use the power of the barrier to sever their souls. {nl}After that, defeat their severed souls. Can you give it a try?
column3: Sentuh demon dengan tanganmu kemudian gunakan kekuatan barrier untuk mengekstrak soul. {nl}Kemudian, setelah terpisah kamu bisa mengalahkan soulnya. Maukah kamu mencobanya?

column2: Our squad was given the order of hunting down the Unicorn. {nl}The details should be in the operation order...
column3: Tim kami diberi perintah untuk memburu Unicorn. {nl}Detailnya ada di command plan..

column2: My plan is to let you disguise as a demon. {nl}Please collect Pawndel and Pawnd's clothing first.
column3: Rencananya adalah untuk menyamar menjadi demon dan membingungkan mereka. {nl} Tolong kumpulkan pakaian Pawndel and Pond dulu.

column2: Activate Malda Altar and the demons nearby it will be sealed. {nl}You must defeat those demons.
column3: Aktifkan Malda Altar dan demon didekatnya akan terkena seal. {nl}Kamu harus mengalahkan demon itu.

column2: I'm exhausted and would like to rest for a bit.{nl}I just need some time, so do you mind taking care of the demons around here?
column3: Aku lelah. Aku ingin beristirahat. {nl}Aku hanya butuh sedikit waktu lagi jadi bisakah kamu mengalahkan demon di sekitarku?

column2: Defeat whatever demons you see.{nl}Only then can our brothers can feel safe while protecting the church.
column3: Kalahkan demon apapun yang kamu lihat. {nl}Dengan itu saudara-saudara kami merasa aman untuk melindungi Church.

column2: I think I can find a way if I have the core of Red Infrorocktor. {nl}I can't use magic but that doesn't mean I lost my knowledge.
column3: Aku pikir aku bisa menemukan sebuah cara jika aku punya Core of Red Infro Rocktor. {nl}Aku tidak bisa menggunakan magic tapi itu bukan berarti aku kehilangan pengetahuanku.

column2: My sould is shredded and trapped in the seal. {nl}Defeat the Experimental Slime that's guarding it and help me get released.
column3: Jiwaku robek dan terjebak di dalam seal. {nl}Kalahkan Experimental Slime yang menjaganya dan bantu membebaskanku.

column2: I am here and all over the world. {nl}I am collecting fragments of my soul which was torn into pieces long ago.
column3: Aku di sini dan di seluruh dunia. {nl}Aku mengumpulkan fragmen dari jiwaku yang robek menjadi serpihan dahulu kala.

column2: Where are my other pieces..
column3: Dimana potongan aku yang lainnya..

column2: I am Hauberk, a Demon Lord. {nl}Helgasercle tore up my soul. A part of me is within the barrier of this tower, {nl}and the rest of me were scattered throughout the world.
column3: Aku adalah Demon Lord Hauberk. {nl}Helgasercle merobek jiwaku dan sebagian diriku ada di dalam barrier dari tower ini, {nl}dan sisanya tersebar di seluruh dunia.

column2: You still have business here?
column3: Apakah kamu masih ada urusan lain di sini?

column2: The altars here are one of the Royal Mausoleum's various defenses built to ward off intruders.{nl}They should've been reactivated, but since they were built from such a long time ago,{nl}no one knows how.
column3: Altar di sini adalah defensive devices terhadap penyusup Mausoleum. {nl}Itu dibuat sudah lama sekali jadi harus diaktifkan kembali {nl}tapi tak ada yang tahu caranya. {nl}

column2: However, the seal at Rukas Plateau is the answer.{nl}The altar won't function if it gets destroyed, but if we can activate it before that...
column3: Tapi seal di Rukas Plateau adalah jawabannya. {nl}Altar tidak akan berfungsi jika hancur {nl}tapi jika kita bisa mengaktifkannya sebelum itu terjadi..

column2: I don't know what Rexipher is trying to do, but it sure can prevent him from doing it.
column3: Aku tidak tahu apa yang Rexipher ingin lakukan {nl}tapi itu bisa mencegah dia untuk melakukannya.

column2: It's either Rexipher destroying the seal, or us activating the altar. {nl}Run and don't look back!
column3: Itu antara Rexipher menghancurkan seal, atau kita mengaktifkan altar. {nl}Lari dan jangan melihat ke belakang!

column2: Aren't you hurt? {nl}Oh, that is the seconds hint of the King.
column3: Apakah kamu tidak terluka? {nl}Oh, itu adalah petunjuk kedua dari King.

column2: The next epitaph is at the left side of Dykyne Fork. {nl}It'll be the third epitaph, right? I am looking forward to it.
column3: {nl}Epitaph selanjutnya di sebelah kiri Road of Dykine Crossroad. {nl}Ini yang ketiga kan? Aku menantikannya.

column2: Finally, we've gathered all clues. {nl}Now we must interpret it.
column3: Akhirnya, kita telah mengumpulkan semua petunjuk. {nl}Sekarang kita harus mengartikannya.

column2: Then destroy the Royal Mausoleum Guarding device of Sesija Parvise.
column3: Kemudian hancurkan Royal Tomb Guarding device of Sesija Parvise.

column2: This time I'll need you to get Coliflower Sap from Coliflowers at Rustybe Dead Tree Area. {nl}The sap should burn easily.
column3: Kali ini, dapatkan Coliflower Sap dari Coliflowers di Rustybe Dead Tree Area. {nl}Getah itu akan terbakar sempurna.

column2: I will now focus on finding Clymen. {nl}Please remove any nearby demons in order to moderate their evil energies.
column3: Kita akan fokus menemukan Clymen mulai sekarang. {nl}Kalahkan demon di sekitar dan menekan kekuatan jahat.

column2: I can feel Clymen in Ishpirki Entrance. {nl}Hurry and defeat it.
column3: Aku bisa merasakan Clymen di Ishpirki Entrance. {nl}Cepat dan kalahkan dia.

column2: Please read the epitaph.
column3: Baca epitaph.

column2: This is it, we've come to the last epitaph.
column3: Ini adalah epitaph terakhir.

column2: Allow me to introduce. This here is my buddy Rith.{nl}Do you like birds? If not, you can never become a Falconer.
column3: Izinkan aku memperkenalkan diri. Temanku ini adalah Wreath. {nl}Apakah kamu suka dengan burung? Jika kamu tidak suka, kamu tidak akan bisa menjadi seorang Falconer.

column2: Recording/ABSORB/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None
column3: Recording/ABSORB/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

column2: Notice/!/Ginklas appeared after you recorded!{nl}Defeat Ginklas!#5
column3: Notice/!/Ginklas muncul setelah kamu merekam!{nl}Kalahkan Ginklas!#5

column2: Collecting stones from the pillar/#SITGROPESET2/0/TRACK_AFTER/None
column3: Mengumpulkan stone dari pillar/#SITGROPESET2/0/TRACK_AFTER/None

column2: Installing stone/BURY/2/TRACK_BEFORE/SSN_HATE_AROUND
column3: Memasang stone/BURY/2/TRACK_BEFORE/SSN_HATE_AROUND

column2: Luring/BURY/3/TRACK_BEFORE/SSN_HATE_AROUND
column3: Memancing/BURY/3/TRACK_BEFORE/SSN_HATE_AROUND

column2: Explain about the Rexipher and the clues
column3: Jelaskan tentang Rexipher dan petunjuknya.

column2: About the Altar here
column3: Tentang Altar di sini.

column2: Activate the Tzedej Altar
column3: Aktifkan Tzedej Altar.

column2: Grita wants to prepare defensive magic that protects against explosions that will come from destroying the valves. Bring the cores of Red Infrorocktor that is used for this defensive magic.
column3: Grita ingin mempersiapkan defensive magic yang melindungi dari ledakan yang akan muncul dari penghancuran valve. Bawa Core of Red Infrorocktor yang digunakan untuk defensive magic.

column2: Collected the cores of Red Infrorocktor. Talk to Grita again.
column3: Mengumpulkan Core of Red Infro Rockor. Bicara dengan Grita lagi.

column2: Barely got rid of the guardians of the epitaph, but Rexipher did not show up. {nl}Read the epitaph again.
column3: Hampir mengalahkan guardian dari epitaph tapi Rexipher tidak muncul. {nl}Baca kembali epitaph.

column2: Talk to Rexipher about the location of third epitaph.
column3: Bicara dengan Rexipher mengenai lokasi dari epitaph ketiga.

column2: It's the third clue prepared by King Zachariel. {nl}Read the epitaph on the left of Dikyne Crossroad and find the fourth clue.
column3: Itu adalah petunjuk ketiga yang disiapkan oleh King Zachariel. {nl}Baca epitaph di sebelah kiri Dikyne Crossroad dan temukan petunjuk keempat.

column2: Trace Rexipher
column3: Trace Rexipher

column2: Rexipher is trying to destroy all the altars at King's Plateau. Follow him and stop him.
column3: Rexipher mencoba untuk menghancurkan semua altar di King's Plateau. Ikuti dan hentikan dia.

column2: Activate the Gedulah Altar{nl} before Rexipher does
column3: Aktifkan Gedulah Altar sebelum Rexipher melakukannya.

column2: The Chesed Altar has been destroyed! The remaining altars are in danger. Get to the Gedulah Altar before Rexipher and activate it.
column3: Chesed Altar sudah dihancurkan! Altar yang tersisa dalam bahaya. Pergilah ke Gedulah altar sebelum Rexipher dan mengaktifkannya.

column2: Activate the Tzedej Altar{nl} before Rexipher does
column3: Aktifkan Chesed Altar sebelum Rexipher.

column2: Better do something before Rexipher does. First, go to the Tzedej Altar nearby and activate it.
column3: Sebaiknya lakukan sesuatu sebelum Rexipher melakukannya. Pertama, pergi ke Chesed Altar dan mengaktifkannya.

column2: Tzedej's seal has been activated. Tell Cyrenia Odell about it.
column3: Mengaktifkan seal dari Ceshed. Beritahu Cyrenia Odell tentang itu.

column2: Talk to Cyrenia Odell and ask about the location of other altars.
column3: Bicara dengan Cyrenia Odell dan tanya lokasi altar yang lain.

column2: Activate Sevisa altar before Rexipher
column3: Aktifkan Sveisa Altar sebelum Rexipher.

column2: Go to Sviesa altar before Rexipher to stop Rexipher's plan.
column3: Pergi ke Sveisa Altar sebelum Rexipher untuk menghentikan rencana Rexipher.

column2: Fortunately, saved the Sevisa altar. Return to Cyrenia Odell.
column3: Untungnya, berhasil menyelamatkan Sveisa Altar. Kembali ke Cyrenia Odell.

column2: Activate the Sviesa Altar
column3: Aktifkan Sveisa altar.

column2: Cetek altar was destroyed but Sevia altar was successfully activate. Talk to Cyrenia Odell.
column3: Chesed Altar Sudah dihancurkan tetapi Svesia Altar berhasil diaktifkan. Bicara dengan Cyrenia Odell.

column2: Defeat Experimental Slime
column3: Kalahkan Experimental Slime.

column2: There are more seal stones. Defeat the Experimental Slime that is guarding it to find other seal stones by talking to it.
column3: Ada banyak lagi seal stone. Kalahkan Experimental Slime yang menjaganya temukan seal stone dan and bicara dengannya.

column2: The Tzedej Altar in King's Plateau is not yet activated. Activate it.
column3: Tzedej Altar di King's Plateau belum diaktifkan. Pergi dan aktifkan.

column2: Domas, a Believer of Goddess Saule, is planning to burn the thorny vines. Get the Thornball Remains at Geisma Access Road.
column3: Domas, follower dari Goddess Saule, merencanakan untuk membakar Thorn bush. Ambil sisa-sisa Thorn bush dari Geisma Entrance.

column2: Believer Domas says he needs Coliflower Sap because of the rain. Get the sap from Coliflowers at Rustybe Dead Tree Area.
column3: Domas berkata dia butuh Cauliflower Sap karena hujan. Dapatkan getah dari Cauliflower di Rustybe Dead Tree Area.

column2: Combine Ridimed leaf and detox solvent to make antidote.
column3: Gabungkan Ridimed leaf dan detox solvent untuk membuat antidote.

column2: I heard the sound of fighting so I came here in a hurry... So you really defeated  it?{nl}I only spotted Siaulambs at my location.{nl}Well done. You have done a meritorious deed.
column3: Aku mendengar suara perkelahian jadi aku ke sini secepatnya..Apakah kamu sudah mengalahkannya?{nl}Aku hanya melihat Siaulamb.{nl}Bagus sekali. Kamu telah berjasa.

column2: I feel queasy.
column3: Aku merasa sesak.

column2: If you have time, please tell our troops to assemble. {nl}If you're not interested, then I'll leave you on your way to Klaipeda.
column3: )}Jika kamu ada waktu tolong beritahukan para prajurit untuk berkumpul.{nl}Tapi jika kami tidak mau, kamu bisa langsung ke Klaipeda.

column2: Thank you so much for your support.{nl}Turn left at the crossroads ahead and follow the road. {-scp SCR_DIALOG_NPC_ANIM(
column3: Terima kasih atas bantuanmu.{nl}Belok kiri lalu ikuti jalan itu. {-scp SCR_DIALOG_NPC_ANIM(

column2: Vubbe Fighter is hiding deep in the Nudeges Felled Area. {nl} We got the orders to kill but it may be safer to wait for additional troops.
column3: Vubbe Figther bersembunyi jauh di Nudegi Felled Area. {nl} Kami mendapat perintah untuk mengalahkannya tapi lebih aman untuk menunggu bantuan.

column2: For the next one, we will need to apply Hallowventer Charcoal in order to read it.{nl}The next monument is at the right side of Negyvas Field.
column3: Kita harus memeriksanya dengan menggosok Hallowventer Charcoal.{nl}Epitaph berikutnya di sisi kanan dari Negyvas Field.

column2: We can suppress the evil presence if the magic of the Royal Mausoleum is released.{nl}This requires a number of activation stones located inside active Guardians.
column3: Kita dapat menekan kekuatan jahat jika magic of the Royal Tomb dilepaskan.{nl} Ini membutuhkan sejumlah aktivasi stone yang ada di active Guardian.

column2: It seems that there are more monsters here now compared to the number monsters that were present before I lost my consciousness.{nl}Did something happen to Gabija?
column3: Tampaknya di sini ada lebih banyak monster dibandingkan dengan jumlah monster yang ada sebelum aku kehilangan kesadaranku.{nl}Apakah terjadi sesuatu kepada Gabija?

column2: It may be a good idea to let Gabija know that we are coming to help her.{nl}There's a place where we can ignite a signal light. Let's hurry.
column3: Mungkin lebih baik Gabija tahu kita berada di sini.{nl}Ada tempat dimana kita bisa menyalakan lampu sinyal. Ayo pergi.

column2: Splendid. Since she knows that we have came, she can probably start recovering her health.{nl}Let's go up and see Gabija.{nl}
column3: Bagus. Sejak dia tahu kita datang, dia akan memulihkan kesehatannya.{nl}Mari kita pergi untuk bertemu Gabija.{nl{nl}

column2: I could handle it myself. {nl}Those weaklings would probably come trembling on their knees when bringing the parts back.{nl}But what if more thieves come while I'm carrying them back?
column3: Aku dapat mengatasinya. {nl}Mereka lemah dan akan gemetaran untuk mengembalikan part. {nl} Tapi bagaimana jika lebih banyak pencuri datang ketika aku sedang melakukannya?

column2: Welcome, I'm glad to see that you've had a safe journey here. {nl}Before anything else, there are a few things about this place that the Revelator should know. {nl}
column3: Selamat Datang, Aku senang kamu tiba dengan selamat. {nl}Sebelum melanjutkan, ada sesuatu tentang tempat ini yang perlu diketahui Savior seperti dirimu. {nl}

column2: That's why I am thinking about setting it on fire.{nl}Please hunt some Mallardu and collect their fat.
column3: Itulah mengapa aku berpikir tentang menyalakan api.{nl}Aku harap kamu mengumpulkan fat dengan mengalahkan Malidus.

column2: I leave Ruklys on this land with my regrets and tears.{nl}If there is someone who wishes to continue his will, I will leave my secret on this gravestone.{nl}I will lay out my long story here.
column3: Aku meninggalkan Ruklys di tanah ini dengan penyesalan dan air mata.{nl}Jika ada seseorang yang ingin melanjutkan keinginannya, aku ingin meninggalkan rahasia di batu nisan ini.{nl}Aku akan merangkum tulisan panjang di sini.

column2: Even if a person is in danger, if he knows that someone will come to help him, he will have the extra energy to endure longer.
column3: Bahkan jika seseorang dalam bahaya, jika dia tahu seseorang akan datang untuk menolongnya, dia akan memiliki ekstra energi untuk bertahan lebih lama.

column2: If you are truly the Revelator, then you must be able to attain the divine secrets at the end of {nl}this revelation.
column3: Jika kamu adalah Savior sejati, kamu dapat menemukan rahasia suci di akhir tulisan ini.

column2: The Transport Magic Circle will take you to a floor of your choosing in the tower.{nl}I don't know if we can use the magic circle anymore. Let's go and find out.
column3: Transport Magic Circle akan membawamu ke ke lantai yang kamu pilih di tower.{nl}Aku tidak tahu jika kita dapat menggunakannya lagi. Ayo pergi dan cari tahu.

column2: Darn.{nl}They broke it. It is beyond repair.
column3: Huh.{nl}Mereka merusaknya. Tidak bisa diperbaiki.

column2: When you activate the Tower's Barrier Device, monsters won't be able to enter anymore.{nl}The magic power supply is currently broken, but we can input power to it through other means.
column3: Ketika kamu mengaktifkan Tower Barrier Device, monster tidak akan bisa masuk.{nl}Magic power supply sedang rusak, tapi kita bisa memasukkan tenaga dengan cara lain.

column2: We have to be careful here.{nl}This is the place where Antares, a dangerous magician, was imprisoned.{nl}We should hurry up to the next floor as soon as possible.
column3: Kita harus hati-hati dari sini.{nl}Ini adalah tempat dimana Antares, seorang penyihir yang berbahaya, dipenjara.{nl}Kita harus cepat bergerak ke lantai selanjutnya.

column2: He was a great magician before.{nl}But his ideology was too dangerous.
column3: Dulunya dia adalah penyihir yang hebat.{nl}Tapi, pemikirannya terlalu berbahaya.

column2: He was locked up because he was obsessed with studying condensed magic on the 3rd floor.{nl}What would happen to the tower if hundreds of years of condensed magic exploded all at once?
column3: Alasan kenapa dia dipenjara di sini karena dia ingin memusatkan kekuatan demon di sini.{nl}Bayangkan apa yang akan terjadi jika kekuatan selama ratusan tahun meledak?

column2: Goddess Gabija is important, but the tower is in more trouble now.{nl}Antares may already be up to something.
column3: Goddess Gabija penting, tapi tower lebih berbahaya.{nl}Antares mungkin terlibat sesuatu sekarang.

column2: There are two valves here that control the Magic Power Device.{nl}The first valve is at the Laboratory, so let's go and destroy it now.
column3: Ada dua valve yang mengendalikan power device.{nl}Valve pertama di lab ayo pergi ke sana dan menghancurkannya.

column2: Explosion, that was too dangerous.{nl}Let's find a safer way to destroy it.
column3: Ledakan, itu terlalu berbahaya.{nl}Mari cari tempat yang lebih aman untuk menghancurkannya.

column2: Antares came here to do extensive research on the flow of magic.{nl}If his research materials are still present, they may help us with destroying those valves.{nl}They should be here somewhere...
column3: Antares meneliti sekian lama mengenai aliran kekuatan demon.{nl}Jika material penelitiannya masih ada, itu akan menolong kita untuk menghancurkan valve itu.{nl}Pasti ada di suatu tempat di sini.

column2: This is it. I think I know how to break those valves now.
column3: Ini dia. Sekarang aku tahu bagaimana menghancurkan valve ini.

column2: Please set this gem and defeat the monsters around it.{nl}We can collect their energy to use it to recharge the Barrier Device.
column3: Tolong atur stone dan kalahkan monster di sekitar.{nl}Kita dapat mengumpulkan energi untuk mengisi barrier device.

column2: A suitable end for a crazy magician.{nl}It could have been dangerous without defensive magics.{nl}We may have touched it without knowing the first valve was destroyed..{nl}
column3: Sebuah akhir yang cocok untuk penyihir gila.{nl}Itu bisa berbahaya tanpa defensive magic.{nl}Kita mungkin telah menyentuhnya tanpa tahu valve pertama sudah hancur..{nl}

column2: Anyways, that's good.{nl}The tower is now safe, so let's go up.
column3: Ngomong-ngomong, itu bagus.{nl}Tower sudah aman, ayo kita pergi.

column2: Oh, I thought of something. Just a hunch I have, but let's also prepare some defensive magic. {nl}There is a spell we can use to protect ourselves against explosions from any of Anteres' {nl}experiments
column3: Ah, benar. Mari kita persiapkan defensive magic jika sesuatu terjadi.{nl}Ada mantra yang tertulis di Antares material yang dapat kita gunakan jika ada ledakan.

column2: I think I can find a way if I have the core of Red Infrorocktor. {nl}I can't use magic but that doesn't mean I lost my knowledge.
column3: Aku kira aku bisa menemukan jalan jika aku punya Core of Red Infrorocktor. {nl}Aku tidak bisa menggunakan magic tapi tidak berarti aku kehilangan pengetahuanku.

column2: Alright. We will be able to use the magic once without problems.{nl}
column3: Bagus. Kita menggunakannya satu kali lagi.{nl}

column2: Let's go find the second valve in the Central Control Room.{nl}If we can destroy it, we will be safe no matter what Antares does.
column3: Ayo temukan valve kedua di Central Control Room.{nl}Jika kita bisa menghancurkannya, kita akan aman dengan apa pun yang dibuat Antares.

column2: The Jewel of Prominence is acting a bit strange.{nl}Something must have went wrong during the explosion that killed Antares.
column3: Jewel of Prominence menjadi aneh.{nl}Pasti terjadi sesuatu ketika Antares kalah karena ledakan itu.

column2: Let's check the status while we defeat the monsters with the Jewel of Prominence.
column3: Mari periksa status ketika kita mengalahkan monster dengan Jewel of Prominence.

column2: What is happening to the Jewel of Prominence?{nl}It is very unstable.
column3: Apa yang terjadi dengan Jewel of Prominence?{nl}Sangat tidak stabil.

column2: Did you just see that monster exploding?{nl}It's definitely strange. it seems as if the power of essence is going crazy.
column3: Apakah kamu hanya melihat monster itu meledak?{nl}Itu aneh sekali. Sepertinya power of essence menjadi gila.

column2: And me.. I feel dizzy..
column3: Dan aku.. Aku merasa pusing..

column2: If it stays like this, the Jewel of Prominence may break.{nl}There must be a stabilizing device somewhere here. Let's go.
column3: Jika kita tetap seperti ini, Jewel of Prominence akan rusak.{nl}Pasti ada sebuah stabilizing device di sini. Ayo pergi.

column2: Ah, the stabilization has come to an end.{nl}I am okay. It's nothing. Just old memory coming back.
column3: Ah, stabilisasi telah berakhir.{nl}Aku baik-baik saja. Tidak apa-apa. Hanya kenangan lama datang kembali.

column2: The Jewel of Prominence has stopped behaving erratically.{nl}Still, we will need Flame Crystals from the tower's Large Central Brazier in order to {nl}completely stabilize it.
column3: Jewel of Prominence berhenti menggila.{nl}Tapi, untuk menstabilkan sepenuhnya, kita butuh Essence of Flame dari perapian di tengah tower.

column2: You gathered everything.{nl}Give them to me. Including the Jewel.{nl}I know the way to stabilize it fully so let's go to Laboratory.
column3: Kamu telah mengumpulkan semuanya.{nl}Berikan kepadaku. Termasuk Jewel.{nl}Aku tahu cara menstabilkan sampai penuh ayo perhi ke lab.

column2: Good! Now we can activate the device.
column3: Bagus! Kita bisa mengkatifkan device sekarang.

column2: You..are the Revelator who helped the Paladin Master right?{nl}My name is Grita. I came from the Mage Tower.
column3: Kamu..adalah Savior yang menolong Paladin Master kan?{nl}Namaku Grita. I datang dari Mage Tower.

column2: Help me. Gabija is in danger.{nl}We are gonna lose the tower to the demons if we don't receive help.
column3: Tolong aku. Gabija dalam bahaya.{nl}Kami akan kehilangan tower dan jatuh ke tangan demon jika kami tidak menerima pertolongan.

column2: You may be the only one who can stop all of this. {nl}Please, come to the Karsta Hall Site at the Fedimian Suburbs.
column3: Ada satu cara untuk menghentikannya tapi hanya kamu yang dapat melakukannya. {nl}Tolong, datanglah ke Karsta battlefield di Fedimian Outskirt.
