column2: If you really don't mind, please deal with the monster on Bonan Forest Road.{nl}There's nothing good that could come from leaving monsters there anyways.
column3: Jika kamu berkenan, tolong bereskan monster-monster di Bonan Forest Road.{nl}Akan sangat tidak bagus jika mereka tetap dibiarkan di sana.

column2: I would have tried to do something myself if it was just a few monsters, {nl}but something of that size...{nl}Just run if you think it's too much for you.
column3: Jika hanya beberapa saja aku bisa mencobanya, {nl}tapi dengan jumlah sebanyak itu...{nl}Kabur saja jika kamu merasa mereka terlalu banyak.

column2: You burned the nest to the ground? {nl}A wise decision!{nl}
column3: Kamu telah membakar sarangnya? {nl}Keputusan yang bijak!{nl}

column2: The reason monsters kept pouring out from Bonan Forest Road is probably because of that one.{nl}There are even monsters I'm seeing for the first time since the surrounding areas are all forests.
column3: Mungkin itulah sebabnya para monster terus berkembang biak di Bonan Forest Road.{nl}Bahkan ada lebih banyak monster lagi saat pertama kali aku melihatnya di sekitar hutan.

column2: You've found the journals of Priest Irma and the bishop?{nl}Hm... There are too many parts that I can't get my head around.{nl}
column3: Kamu telah menemukan Diary Priest Irma dan Bishop?{nl}Hm... Terlalu banyak bagian yang tidak dapat aku temukan.{nl}

column2: If they were merely being pursued, they could have just escaped to Orsha.{nl}Yet they went through the trouble of leaving behind pieces of their journals while disappearing somewhere else.{nl}
column3: Jika mereka sedang diburu, mereka bisa saja melarikan diri ke Orsha.{nl}Namun mereka pergi melewati kesulitan dengan meninggalkan potongan-potongan Diary mereka ketika bersembunyi disuatu tempat yang tidak diketahui.

column2: It could be... That they were threatened...{nl}Or they had a mission that they had to complete even though they were being pursued?{nl}
column3: Ini bisa saja terjadi...Keadaan mereka terancam...{nl}atau mereka memiliki sebuah tugas yang harus diselesaikan meskipun mereka sedang diburu?{nl}

column2: A mission... I've been looking for traces of Priest Gelija.{nl}I cannot make out exactly what is written in the notes left by Gelija either{nl}since they are only partially recognizable due to the monsters.{nl}
column3: Sebuah tugas.... Aku telah mencari jejak dari Priest Gelija.{nl}Aku tidak mengetahui secara pasti apa yang tertulis di dalam catatan yang ditinggalkan oleh Gelija sebelumnya.{nl}Selama mereka masih terpisah dikarenakan para monster.{nl}

column2: Priest Pranas said that finding traces of Priest Gelija is {nl}very important because of the priest's thorough nature.{nl}I also think that we'll be able to narrow down our search {nl}if we can find all of the clues left by Gelija.{nl}
column3: Priest Pranas berkata bahwa menemukan jejak Priest Gelija {nl}cukup penting demi kebaikan para Priest.{nl} Aku juga merasa kita akan mempersempit pencarian kami, {nl} Jika kita menemukan semua petunjuk yang ditinggalkan oleh Gelija.

column2: I'll look over here. {nl}How about you look for clues that the monsters may have?
column3: Aku akan memeriksanya. {nl}Bagaimana kamu mencari petunjuk yang mungkin dimiliki oleh para monster?

column2: I'm sure that there is some crucial evidence in those notes.{nl}It is common for people on the run to leave clues behind so that others will find them.
column3: Aku yakin terdapat beberapa bukti penting didalam catatan mereka.{nl}Sangat umum bagi seorang yang melarikan diri  meninggalkan petunjuk dibelakangnya sehingga orang lain dapat menemukan mereka.

column2: I was trying to not care too much for Orsha as long as I got paid properly.{nl}But seeing the demons made me think about my{nl}hometown and how it was razed to the ground...
column3: Aku berusaha untuk tidak peduli dengan Orsha selama masih dibayar dengan layak.{nl}Tapi melihat para monster itu membuatku memikirkan kota asalku{nl}dan bagaimana jika diratakan dengan tanah...

column2: Thank you.{nl}It's not all recognizable since they're all ripped apart, but I can sort of make sense of it.{nl}
column3: Terima kasih.{nl}Ini tidak bisa dikenali sejak semuanya terpisah, tapi aku akan terus mencobanya.{nl}

column2: Demons are hiding in the forest waiting to attack us.{nl}A few of us were separated while running away. We... decided to group up.{nl}
column3: Sepertinya Demon telah siap menyerang kita dari hutan.{nl}Beberapa dari kita terpisah saat sedang melarikan diri. Kita memutuskan untuk berkumpul kembali.{nl}

column2: Oh my, there should be a location of where they were going to group up...{nl}But that part is completely missing.
column3: Seharusnya disanalah tempat mereka berkumpul kembali...{nl}Tapi seluruh bagian itu benar-benar telah menghilang.

column2: It seems certain that the priests decided to group up somewhere.{nl}Letting Priest Pranas know immediately is fine, {nl}but acquiring more definite information would be better.{nl}
column3: Sepertinya beberapa Priest telah berkumpul. Harus segera dilaporkan pada Priest Pranas, {nl}tapi mengumpulkan informasi lain jauh lebih penting.{nl}

column2: I'll keep looking for clues here, you go on to Paslaptis Hideout.{nl}It's only recently been found, and there are reports that the campfires are still warm.{nl}
column3: Aku akan terus mencari petunjuk disini, Pergilah ke Paslab Hideout.{nl} Ini baru saja ditemukan, dan disana terdapat banyak laporan api unggun yang masih hangat.{nl}

column2: Even a small clue will be a big help in the search.
column3: Meskipun bukti kecil akan sangat berguna.

column2: Report to Larena under the watchtower when you've finished your investigation.{nl}She's second to none when it comes to finding people, {nl}so I'm sure she will manage to find some definitive evidence.
column3: Setelah selesai pemeriksaan, laporkan kepada Larena di bawah Watchtower.{nl}Dia orang kedua yang mungkin dapat membantumu. {nl}Aku yakin dia bisa memberikan informasi yang sangat dibutuhkan.

column2: It was the demons that destroyed my hometown, not monsters.{nl}Their brutality... Geez, I don't even want to think of it again.{nl}
column3: Para Demonlah yang telah menghancurkan kotaku, bukan monster.{nl}Mereka sangat brutal dan mengerikan, aku tidak mau mengalaminya kembali.{nl}

column2: If the whereabouts of the priests really has to do with demons...{nl}I'm sorry, but I don't think that we'll be able to see them ever again.
column3: Jika keberadaan para Priest ada hubungannya dengan Demon...{nl}Maaf, kukira tidak ada harapan bisa bertemu dengan mereka lagi.

column2: It must be you. {nl}The person the lord sent.{nl}
column3: Pasti kamulah. {nl}Orang yang dikirim oleh Goddess.{nl}

column2: You said that there are only traces of hurried movements in Paslaptis Hideout, correct?{nl}That there was a note saying that they decided to group up somewhere.{nl}
column3: Kamu bilang ada jejak gerakan-gerakan yang cepat di Paslab Hideout, ya kan?{nl}Bahwa ada catatan yang mengatakan mereka berkumpul di suatu tempat.{nl}

column2: I think that the reason they couldn't return to Orsha at once... Hm...{nl}I think it was because they had a mission more than merely being pursued or threatened.{nl}
column3: Mungkin itulah kenapa mereka tidak dapat kembali ke Orsha...{nl}Kupikir karena mereka memiliki misi tertentu, bukan karena tekanan atau paksaan.{nl}

column2: Maybe that's why Jolly is so excited...
column3: Itulah kenapa Jolly sangat bersemangat...

column2: Oh, this is Jolly by the way. {nl}He's Bishop Urbonas' dog.{nl}
column3: Oh, ini Jolly.{nl}Dia seekor anjing bishop Urbonas.{nl}

column2: I thought that Jolly would be able to find the priests fast since he was adored by all of them.{nl}But it's hard for him to find a scent with all this rain pouring down.{nl}
column3: Kupikir Jolly bisa menemukan para Priest lebih cepat selama dia masih disukai oleh yang lainnya.{nl}Namun sulit jika dalam kondisi hujan seperti ini.{nl}

column2: I have to go back Orsha to report to the lord after meeting with a messenger.{nl}Why don't you take Jolly out for a walk?
column3: Aku harus kembali ke Orsha untuk melaporkan hasil pertemuan dengan pengirim pesan.{nl}Kenapa kamu tidak membawa Jolly pergi?

column2: I wish we had such a friend to work with.{nl}Cute, loving... and best of all, a great tracker.
column3: Aku berharap kita punya teman untuk bekerjasama.{nl}Cute, loving... Dan terbaik dari semuanya, tracker yang hebat.

column2: Did Jolly find something?{nl}It seems as if the bishop's group was near here after all.
column3: Apa Jolly menemukan sesuatu?{nl}Sepertinya kelompok Bishop berada di sekitar sini.

column2: Wait a second.{nl}I thought I heard a faint scream from up there...{nl}
column3: Tunggu.{nl}Aku seperti mendengar teriakan di atas sini...{nl}

column2: This doesn't feel right.{nl}You see, Priest Pranas' group went towards Gatves Highway.{nl}
column3: Rasanya ini pertanda tidak baik.{nl}Kamu lihat, kelompok Priest Pranas pergi menuju Gatves Highway.{nl}

column2: They're all more than capable of looking after themselves, but still...{nl}Would you mind going to Gatves Highway just in case?
column3: Mereka mampu menjaga diri mereka sendiri...{nl}Tapi dapatkah kamu pergi ke Gatves Highway?

column2: We are saved! Are you our backup?{nl}About Priest Pranas... He hasn't been able to make it out of Groundsle Hill!
column3: Kita aman! Apakah kamu penyelamat kami?{nl}Tentang Priest Pranas... Dia belum berhasil keluar dari Groundsle Hill!

column2: I'm not a fighter, so I'll only be more of a burden if I tag along.{nl}Go after him quickly, please.
column3: Aku bukan seorang petarung, jadi aku mungkin akan menyusahkan jika jalan sendiri.{nl}Pergilah setelahnya.

column2: We should have increased the number of guards.{nl}I swear that this is the strongest demon I've seen since Medzio Diena!{nl}
column3: Kita harus menambah jumlah penjaga.{nl}Aku bersumpah ini Demon paling berbahaya setelah peristiwa Medzio Diena!{nl}

column2: All we could do once we made eye contact was to run.{nl}Priest Pranas will be in a lot of danger at this rate!
column3: Yang harus kita lakukan saat pertama kali melihatnya adalaha Lari.{nl}Priest Pranas akan mengalami banyak masalah dalam kondisi seperti ini!

column2: There was nothing we could do.{nl}Please save Priest Pranas before it is too late!
column3: Tidak ada yang bisa kita lakukan.{nl}Tolong selamatkan Priest Pranas sebelum terlambat!

column2: Whoever you are... I thank you for saving me from the bottom of my heart.{nl}Could I perhaps know how you came here, or at least know your name?{nl}
column3: Siapapun yang menyelamatkanku... Aku sangat berterima kasih.{nl}Bolehkah aku mengetahui siapa namamu?{nl}

column2: Oh, you've been sent by the lord.{nl}Then you must already know that the bishop is missing...{nl}
column3: Ohh, kamu telah dikirim oleh Pemimpin Orsha.{nl}Jadi mestinya kamu telah mengetahuinya bahwa Bishop menghilang...{nl}

column2: I was trying to deal quickly with a few demons roaming about and investigate the campsite...{nl}But then, we suddenly found their leader...
column3: Aku selalu mencoba untuk menangai para monster dengan cepat ...{nl}Namun secara tiba-tiba Demon muncul...

column2: I... I can't keep holding on.{nl}Please... Search the campsite...{nl}
column3: Aku tidak bisa bertahan.{nl}Tolong cari disekitar Camp...{nl}

column2: I'm sure we'll clear things out...
column3: Aku yakin kita akan dapat menyelesaikannya...

column2: Come to Orsha if you find something.{nl}I'll leave the rest up to you...
column3: Kembalilah ke Orsha jika kamu menemukan sesuatu.{nl}Aku serahkan semuanya padamu…

column2: There is just too much that I cannot comprehend.{nl}I'm just a hired hand trying not to care about Orsha... {nl}But it feels like my loss.{nl}
column3: Banyak yang tidak dapat aku mengerti.{nl}Aku hanya orang bayaran yang mencoba tidak peduli dengan Orsha... {nl}Tapi aku merasa ini suatu kehilangan.{nl}

column2: I brought Jolly because I thought he may be able to find clues without trouble...{nl}But the rain doesn't seem like it's going to end any time soon.
column3: Aku bawa Jolly karena mungkin dia bisa membantu ...{nl}Tapi sepertinya hujan belum akan berhenti.

column2: A demon that powerful... I've never seen anything like it.{nl}It almost makes me want to quit my job.
column3: Demon ini sangat kuat, baru kali ini aku melihat yang seperti itu.{nl}Aku hampir menyerah.

column2: Thank you for saving my life back there.{nl}My wounds seem to be a bit more bearable since I've rested a little.{nl}
column3: Terima kasih telah menyelamatkan nyawaku.{nl}Sepertinya lukaku sedikit lebih baik sejak aku beristirahat.

column2: By the way, have you managed to find something?
column3: Ngomong-ngomong, Apakah kamu berhasil menemukan sesuatu?

column2: Must be filled
column3: Harus diisi

column2: There are a lot of disgusting monsters around here.{nl}No wonder nothing can be achieved in this state.{nl}
column3: Banyak monster menyebalkan di sekitar sini.{nl}Ga ada harapan, ga ada yang bisa didapatkan di bagian sini.{nl}

column2: If you have some spare time, could you deal with some of the monsters around here?{nl}
column3: Jika kamu ada waktu luang, bisakah kamu bereskan monster-monster di sekitar sini?{nl}

column2: It wasn't going great even before the monsters started interrupting my work.{nl}It was such a wonderful day until it began raining...
column3: Bukan masalah besar, selama para monster itu tidak menggangguku.{nl}Awalnya ini hari yang indah sebelum akhirnya hujan turun...

column2: You've taken care of that?{nl}I envy your skills. {nl}
column3: Kamu sudah  menjaganya?{nl}Aku ragu dengan kemampuanmu. {nl}

column2: There, now I'll get to get back to my work.{nl}Thanks a lot.
column3: Di sana, sekarang aku akan kembali kerja.{nl}Terima kasih.

column2: I've never heard of demons being spotted anywhere near Orsha before...{nl}All of a sudden, demons appear and they're poking around this place.{nl}
column3: Aku belum pernah mendengar ada monster berkumpul di sekitar Orsha...{nl}Semua serba tiba-tiba, demon muncul dan mengacau di sini.{nl}

column2: They've made a bunch of magic circles near Naudingas Felled Area.{nl}I don't know why they've done that but it can't be a good thing.{nl}
column3: Mereka telah membuat sebuah lingkaran magis di Naudingas Felled Area.{nl}entah apa maksudnya, tapi ini bukan hal yang baik.{nl}

column2: It's not my responsibility, but I do think that it is better to be safe than sorry.{nl}Could you take care of the magic circles at Naudingas Felled Area?
column3: Ini bukan tanggung jawabku, tapi lebih baik mengamankan daripada meminta maaf.{nl}Bisakah kamu membereskan lingkaran magis di Naudingas Felled Area itu?

column2: I've been here to survey the land because of the refugee problem.{nl}I don't remember seeing any demons back then... What is going on?
column3: Aku pernah ke sini karena masalah pengungsi.{nl}Aku tidak ingat ada demon saat itu ... Apa yang terjadi?

column2: What purpose do the magic circles serve?{nl}I don't think there have been any incident reports yet...{nl}We'll have to wait and see.
column3: Apa yang dikhawatirkan dari lingkaran magis itu?{nl}Belum ada laporan akibat dari hal itu...{nl}Kita harus tetap menunggu.

column2: There is a lot of nonsense going on because all reports of the area are labeled as classified.{nl}I mean, they're planning on making a refugee camp near Deer Hooves Lot.{nl}
column3: Ada banyak omong kosong terjadi karena semua laporan dari daerah dicap sebagai pengelompokkan.{nl}Maksudku, mereka sedang membuat camp pengungsian di Deer Hooves Lot.{nl}

column2: Even if the refugees coming here are supposed to be from a village famed for mercenaries.{nl}What are they thinking? Saying that they'll be able to fend for themselves{nl}if we give them houses... There are demons everywhere...{nl}
column3: Bahkan para pengungsi yang datang kemari berasal dari daerah yang memiliki banyak mercenerienya{nl}Apa yang mereka pikirkan? Bilang bahwa mereka bisa menjaga mereka sendiri{nl}Jika kita memberi mereka tempat tinggal …ingatlah akan demon dimana mana{nl}

column2: They want a report on whether the monsters here {nl}are weak enough for the mercenaries to handle or not.{nl}I used to be a paper pusher, what am I supposed to do?{nl}
column3: Mereka ingin laporan tentang keberadaan para monster di sini{nl}mercenaries masih belum mampu menanganinya.{nl}Apa yang harus aku lakukan?{nl}

column2: I've heard that you're quite skilled.{nl}I can't fake a report, so how about checking Deer Hooves Lot for me?
column3: Kudengar kamu cukup hebat.{nl}Bagaimana jika kamu periksa Deer Hooves Lot untukku?

column2: If they're going to keep the investigations a secret, they should at least write a line and keep to it.{nl}How much more unlucky can I get? I haven't held a sword since training camp...
column3: Jika mereka tetap menjaga penelitian ini sebagai rahasia, mereka seharusnya memberi catatan dan menjaganya.{nl}Berapa banyak kira-kira yang bisa kudapatkan? Aku belum pernah memegang pedang sejak training camp...

column2: You're saying that there was an enormous monster at the camp?{nl}I haven't seen it myself, but we can't make people stay in places like that.{nl}
column3: Kamu bilang ada monster jahat di camp?{nl}Aku belum melihatnya sendiri, tapi aku tidak bisa membiarkan orang tinggal di tempat seperti itu.{nl}

column2: Right?{nl}I'll take your word for it and put it in my report.
column3: Benarkah?{nl}Aku catat kata-katamu untuk laporan.

column2: This is just wrong.{nl}I came here as a surveyor, not to fight monsters like the trackers. {nl}That's too much for me.{nl}
column3: Ini tidak benar.{nl}Aku datang kemari sebagai seorang surveyor, bukan untuk bertarung dengan monster seperti seorang tracker. {nl}Terlalu beresiko buatku.{nl}

column2: The monsters may have become more violent because of the demons, so gather some monster blood.{nl}...Are you kidding me?{nl}Could you help me out? You'd literally be saving my life.{nl}{nl}
column3: Karena ulah demon, para monster semakin beringas {nl}mengambil beberapa monster blood ... Kamu bercanda?{nl}Maukah kamu menolongku? Kamu akan menyelamatkan hidupku.{nl}{nl}

column2: By the goddesses, thank you so much.{nl}Just gather some blood from the monsters at Rohonsa Cliff.
column3: Terima kasih banyak.{nl}Ambillah beberapa blood dari para monster di Rohonsa Cliff.

column2: I'm not a coward.{nl}I just know what I can and can't do.{nl}
column3: Bukan aku keras kepala.{nl}Aku hanya tahu apa yang bisa dan tidak bisa dilakukan.{nl}

column2: My skills aren't with a sword or spear, they're honed with a pen and stamps...
column3: Kemampuanku bukan dengan pedang atau tombak, tapi dengan pena dan tinta...

column2: What is this disgusting stench?{nl}I don't know how they could have ordered me to collect this stuff.{nl}They know very well that it would have been impossible...
column3: Bau apa ini?{nl}Aku heran kenapa bisa mereka memintaku mengumpulkan benda macam ini.{nl}Mereka sangat tahu kalau ini hal yang tidak mungkin...

column2: Thankfully, Priest Pranas is safe... Now we can afford to worry about ourselves.{nl}Having ten lives wouldn't be enough if we stay around here for too long.{nl}
column3: Terima kasih banyak, Priest Pranas sudah selamat ... Sekarang kita hanya perlu mengkhawatirkan diri kita sendiri.{nl}Punya sepuluh nyawa pun belum cukup untuk tinggal lama-lama di sini.{nl}

column2: Sendal and I have hurt our legs and there's no telling {nl}when monsters or demons will come after us...{nl}There's nobody but you to ask for help around here.{nl}
column3: Kaki kami merasa sakit {nl}ketika banyak monster berdatangan kepada kami...{nl}Takada orang lain lagi selain kamu yang bisa membantu di sini.{nl}

column2: Could you deal with the monsters around here until we gain our strength again?{nl}
column3: Dapatkah kamu membantu kami sampai kondisi kami kembali pulih?{nl}

column2: I should have known there was a reason to pay so much.{nl}I would have turned down the offer if I knew it was that dangerous.
column3: Seharusnya aku sudah tahu alasannya kenapa harus dibayar lebih.{nl}Aku mungkin akan menolaknya jika ternyata bahayanya terlalu besar.

column2: If you hadn't help out, I would have been limping along until they got me.{nl}Thank you so much.
column3: Jika kamu tidak menolongku, mungkin aku mereka sudah membunuhku.{nl}Terima kasih banyak.

column2: Oh... Whoops.{nl}By any chance have you seen some bags or packages around here?{nl}
column3: Oh... Whoops.{nl}Pernahkah kamu melihat bags atau packages di sekitar sini?{nl}

column2: I had all of my potions and food in there...{nl}With my legs in my current state, you're the only person I can ask for help.{nl}
column3: Aku sudah punya banyak obat-obatan dan makanan di sini...{nl}Dengan kondisi kakiku yang seperti ini, hanya kamulah yang bisa menolong.{nl}

column2: They shouldn't be far since they weight quite a bit.{nl}I know it may be a bit rude, but could you look for our luggage?
column3: Selama beban yang mereka bawa masih berlebih, mereka tidak bisa pergi terlalu jauh.{nl}Mungkin ini agak merepotkan, tapi tolonglah ambilkan kembali barang-barang kami?

column2: Maybe some monsters have gotten hold of it. This just keeps getting worse.{nl}They're quite heavy so they shouldn't be too far away.{nl}
column3: Mungkin beberapa monster akan menggangu. Nambah kerjaan saja.{nl}Mereka tidak akan pergi terlalu jauh.{nl}

column2: Thank you so much! {nl}They're not in perfect shape, but I'm just glad to have at least some of them back.
column3: Terima kasih! {nl}Meskipun bentuknya tidak sebagus dulu, tapi setidaknya barang-barangku telah kembali.

column2: This seems to be... a chest.{nl}There's a seal, but it's familiar to priests. Let's open it.{nl}
column3: Itu seperti… sebuah Chest.{nl}Ada segelnya, tapi para priest mudah mengenalinya. Ayo kita buka.{nl}

column2: It contains a journal and a map of Ashaq Underground Prison 1F.{nl}I do hope that he's not at Ashaq Underground Prison...{nl}There's something marked on it.{nl}
column3: Isinya sebuah Diary dan peta Ashaq Underground Prison 1F.{nl}Aku berharap dia tidak berada di Ashaq Underground Prison...{nl}Ada sesuatu yang ditandai di sini.{nl}

column2: The handwriting on this map is most definitely of the bishop.{nl}Even though it is written in a language that ordinary people can't read.{nl}
column3: Tulisan tangan di peta ini sepertinya milik Bishop.{nl} Meskipun ditulis dengan menggunakan bahasa yang tidak dapat dibaca oleh seseorang.

column2: I can only translate a part of it right away, would you like to hear it?
column3: Beberapa bagian bisa aku terjemahkan, Apakah kamu ingin mendengarnya?

column2: ...Once the waves of disaster wash across...{nl}The stranger arranged by the goddess shall seek Orsha dreaming of the catastrophe.{nl}
column3: … Setelah gelombang besar datang....{nl} Stranger diutus Goddess untuk mencari Orsha dreaming of the catastrophe.{nl}

column2: Only one of the countless strangers...{nl}To find the one and lead them is our mission.{nl}
column3: Hanya satu dari para stranger...{nl}Misi kita adalah untuk menemukan dan mengarahkan mereka.

column2: I shall go to the Ashaq Underground Prison with my priests.{nl}There, I shall await the one and only stranger arranged by the goddess...{nl}
column3: Aku harus pergi ke Ashaq Underground Prison dengan para Priest. {nl}Disana, aku harus menunggu salah satu stranger yang diutus oleh Goddess...{nl}

column2: We started being chased by demons even before we were ready.{nl}There is no time to contact the disciples that aren't nearby Inesa.{nl}
column3: Kita telah diburu oleh para Demon sebelum kami siap memulainya.{nl}Tidak ada waktu untuk meminta bantuan para murid yang berada tidak jauh dengan Inesa.{nl}

column2: If someone finds this diary, I beg of you to pass it on to Inesa Hamondale, the lord of Orsha...{nl}
column3: Jika seseorang menemukan diary ini, kumohon untuk memberikannya pada Inesa Hamondale, [Pemimpin Orsha]...{nl}

column2: ...That's all it says...{nl}I expected them to be chased by demons, but I didn't know that there was so much more to it.{nl}
column3: …jadi itulah isinya...{nl}Kupikir mereka diserang demon, tapi aku tak tahu jika ada hal yang lain lagi.{nl}

column2: As the journal says, report the contents of the journal to the lord.{nl}We'll also be preparing to go directly to the Ashaq Underground Prison.
column3: Sesuai isi diary, sampaikan kepada Inesa Hamondale (Pemimpin Orsha).{nl}Kita akan bersiap menuju Ashaq Underground Prison.

column2: There probably won't be a anything more important to Orsha than what we are doing now.{nl}This is worrying. No matter how hard I look, there is one piece of information that is missing...
column3: Mungkin disana tidak terlalu penting untuk Orsha{nl}dibandingkan dengan apa yang telah kita lakukan sekarang.{nl}Ada satu potongan yang hilang, ini yang dikhawatirkan bagaimanapun juga kondisi kita saat ini...

column2: If only I had a bit more time... I think I can find it.{nl}I'm not in the intelligence business for nothing you know.
column3: Jika aku punya sedikit waktu lagi … mungkin aku akan menemukannya.{nl}Aku tidak cukup pintar untuk sesuatu yang kamu ketahui.

column2: It seems that...{nl}I am not the only one that feels something is wrong.
column3: Sepertinya...{nl}Bukan aku saja yang merasa ada sesuatu yang salah.

column2: You mean to say that Bishop Urbonas... is being chased by demons?{nl}The Ashaq Underground Prison has been closed off many years ago.{nl}
column3: Maksudmu Bishop Urbonas... Diserang para Demon?{nl}Ashaq Underground Prison telah ditutup bertahun-tahun yang lalu.{nl}

column2: I don't know what he's trying to achieve by hiding there.{nl}I... I don't know what to do...
column3: Aku tidak tahu apa yang dia ingin temukan dengan bersembunyi disana.{nl}Aku... Aku tidak tahu apa yang harus dilakukan…

column2: I'll get ready to go to the Ashaq Underground Prison.{nl}You should hurry and inform the lord of this information!
column3: Aku akan bersiap pergi ke Ashaq Underground Prison.{nl}Cepatlah laporkan pada Inesa Hamondale (Pemimpin Orsha) tentang hal ini!

column2: It will take too long to gather troops to go there.{nl}They may not be of much help with demons since{nl}they only have experience against monsters.{nl}
column3: Ini akan memakan waktu yang cukup lama untuk mengumpulkan pasukan menuju kesana.{nl} Mereka mungkin tidak banyak membantu berhadapan dengan para demon.{nl] Mereka hanya memiliki keahlian melawan para monster.{nl}

column2: I'm sorry, but could you go to the Ashaq Underground Prison with Priest Pranas?{nl}You're the only one left that I can rely on in this situation...{nl}
column3: Maafkan aku, tapi dapatkan kamu pergi ke Ashaq Underground Prison bersama Priest Pranas? {nl}Kamulah satu-satunya tersisa yang dapat saya andalkan dalam situasi ini...{nl}

column2: Whatever it takes, please save Bishop Urbonas.{nl}I, Inesa Hamondale, the lord of Orsha, plead for your assistance.
column3: Apapun resikonya, tolong selamatkan bishop Urbonas.{nl}Aku, Inesa Hamondale, [Pemimpin Orsha] memohon padamu.

column2: Bishop Urbonas always preached about the importance of the ties brought by coincidence.{nl}He always said that Goddess Laima would send a Revelator.{nl}
column3: Bishop Urbonas selalu mengingatkan tentang pentingnya hubungan dari sesuatu yang datang dan tidak direncanakan.{nl}Dia selalu bilang bahwa Goddess Laima akan mengirim seorang Savior.{nl}

column2: Yes. Maybe you...{nl}Maybe you are the Revelator that is mentioned in the {nl}legends passed down among the bishops of Orsha.{nl}
column3: Ya. Bisa jadi kamu...{nl}Mungkin kamulah Revelator itu {nl}legenda telah hadir bersama Bishops Urbonas.{nl}

column2: The church... Bishop Urbonas has been waiting for a Revelator his whole life.{nl}I will tell you more in detail once you have saved the bishop.{nl}
column3: Curch ... Sepanjang hidupnya Bishop Urbonas menunggu seorang Revelator.{nl}Aku akan ceritakan semuanya saat kamu bisa menyelamatkan Bishop.{nl}

column2: But you must prepare thoroughly no matter how much of a rush you are in, {nl}so please stop by at the Item Merchant.{nl}I have prepared some handy supplies for you.{nl}
column3: Kamu harus mempersiapkan segalanya apapun kondisimu. Jadi singgahlah di Item Merchant.{nl}Aku sudah mempersiapkan beberapa perlengkapan untukmu.

column2: Please forgive me for the fact that I can only help you {nl}in such a fashion even though I am a lord of a terrority.{nl}I shall pray... that the goddesses bless you and Bishop Urbonas.
column3: Aku mohon maafkan aku dari kenyataan itu. Aku hanya dapat memberikan bantuan kepadamu meskipun aku seorang pemimpin kota.{nl}Aku akan berdoa... semoga para Goddess memberkati kamu dan Bishop Urbonas.

column2: I've quickly prepared a few things since the lord sent someone over.{nl}This anvil will allow you to enhance your equipment so that they become more effective.{nl}
column3: Aku harus segera menyiapkan hal lain.{nl}Anvil ini dapat meningkatkan kekuatan senjata dan armor kamu.{nl}

column2: I'd like to give you something more, but this is all I can offer.{nl}I don't know what is happening, but I'm sure you'll pull through.
column3: Aku ingin memberikanmu sesuatu, hanya ini yang bisa aku berikan.{nl}Aku tidak tahu apa yang terjadi, tapi aku yakin kamu bisa melewatinya.

column2: It is so frustrating. {nl}The fact I'm restricted so much even though I am the lord of Orsha...{nl}
column3: Aku sangat kecewa. {nl}Aku tidak bisa berbuat apapun, meskipun aku seorang Pemimpin Orsha...{nl}

column2: Are you coming with us?{nl}Having you with us makes us feel as safe as having a whole army with us.{nl}
column3: Apakah kamu ingin bergabung?{nl}Memiliki pasukan sepertimu membuat kami merasa aman.{nl}

column2: According to the bishop's journal, the demons must be {nl}after the bishop since he's searching for the Revelator.{nl}It would be easier for them to go after the bishop instead {nl}of trying to find the Revelator who might be anybody.{nl}
column3: Menurut Diary Bishop, Para demon datang setelah bishop mencari seorang Revelator.{nl}ini memudahkan mereka untuk pergi setelah Bishop mencoba untuk mencari Revelator yang mungkin bisa siapapun.

column2: Let's go to the Ashaq Underground Prison whenever you're ready.{nl}Bishop... I pray that the goddesses are giving their blessings...
column3: Ayo berangkat ke Ashaq Underground Prison jika kamu telah siap.{nl}Bishop... Aku berdoa semoga para Goddess melindungimu..

column2: I'll be right behind you with the trackers.{nl}
column3: Aku akan terus dibelakangmu bersama para trackers.{nl}

column2: Let's meet up at Gebene Cliff at Paupys Crossing.{nl}The Ashaq Underground Prison is just ahead of that point.
column3: Kita akan bertemu di Gebene Cliff di Paupys Crossing.{nl}Ashaq Underground Prison tepat di depan sana.

column2: You're here.{nl}I've gathered the best of the best, but this aura... {nl}It is sinister beyond my knowledge.
column3: Kamu telah berada disini.{nl}Aku telah mengumpulkan semua yang terbaik, tapi aura ini... {nl}Menurutku ini sesuatu yang menyeramkan.

column2: Torvana seems to be confident but... This strange aura... {nl}I feel goosebumps all over my body for some reason.
column3: Torvana terlihat percaya diri … Tapi aura aneh ini ... {nl}Seluruh tubuhku merinding.

column2: You can place your trust in me, Chaser Torvana!{nl}I'll take care of the demons in one strike, don't you worry.
column3: Percaya padaku, Chaser Torvana!{nl}Akan kubereskan para monster hanya dengan satu serangan, tidak usah takut.

column2: I can sense the ominous aura streaming out from the direction of the Underground Prison.{nl}We may not be able to make it back out of there once we enter.{nl}
column3: Aku bisa merasakan aura yang menyeramkan datang dari arah Underground Prison.{nl}Saat kita masuk ke sana, kita tidak akan bisa kembali lagi.{nl}

column2: But we must save the bishop!{nl}Let's enter the Ashaq Underground Prison if you've finished your preparations.
column3: Tapi kita harus menyelamatkan Bishop!{nl}Ayo masuk ke Ashaq Underground Prison jika persiapan kalian telah selesai.

column2: It feels as if something I can't see is bound to me tightly...{nl}I'm finding it hard... to even breathe.{nl}
column3: Sesuatu yang tidak bisa kulihat seperti sedang mengikatku...{nl}Aku bahkan sulit bernafas.{nl}

column2: How are you so unaffected by all this?{nl}Maybe the goddesses are looking after you seeing how indifferent you seem to be to all this...
column3: Bagaimana bisa kamu tidak terpengaruh hal ini?{nl}Mungkin Goddess sedang menguji sejauh mana perbedaan yang dirasakan olehmu dari hal ini...

column2: I've come here a few times when I was an apprentice a very long time ago, {nl}but I've never felt so weighed down like this before.{nl}
column3: Aku pernah ke tempat ini beberapa kali, dulu aku seorang murid.{nl}Tapi aku tidak pernah merasakan hal seperti ini.{nl}

column2: Let's see... I sense a very strong evil presence towards the Torture Material Room.{nl}I haven't seen that ominous looking fog here before either.{nl}
column3: Mari kita lihat … aku merasakan kehadiran energi jahat yang sangat kuat di Torture Material Room. Aku belum pernah melihat kabut yang menyeramkan seperti ini sebelumnya.{nl}

column2: You seem to be in a good condition... {nl}Could you go and check what's happening over at the Torture Material Room for us?
column3: Kamu sepertinya dalam kondisi baik... {nl}Bisakah kamu memeriksa apa yang terjadi di Torture Material Room?

column2: This feels... exactly like a curse.{nl}I've never felt anything quite as vicious before.
column3: Rasa ini … sebuh kutukan.{nl}Sebelumnya aku belum pernah merasakan keheningan yang mencekam seperti ini.

column2: What a strange idol.{nl}I've never seen anything like it even in any of the books before.{nl}
column3: Cursed Idol yang aneh.{nl} Aku tidak pernah melihat sebelumnya, bahkan dalam buku manapun.{nl}

column2: I am certain that the demons are behind all of this...{nl}But there does not seem to be a way for us to become free of this curse.
column3: Aku yakin para demon berada dibelakang semua ini...{nl}Sepertinya sulit untuk kita keluar dari kutukan ini.

column2: Don't worry about me.{nl}I'm second to none when it comes to stamina in the church.
column3: Jangan khawatirkan aku.{nl}Aku akan bertahan seperti ini.

column2: Only you can stand up to Demon Lord Marnox now.{nl}According to the goddesses, only you... the Revelator, can save this world.
column3: Saat ini hanya kamu yang bisa melawan Demon Lord Marnox.{nl}Menurut Goddess e, Cuma kamu... Savior, dapat menyelamatkan dunia ini.

column2: I never thought there would be a Cursed Idol here as well...{nl}This aura simply is... unadaptable.
column3: Tak pernah kubayangkan kutukan gila seperti ini ...{nl}Aura ini tidak bisa diterima dengan akal sehat.

column2: My body... seems to become heavier and heavier.{nl}It's the same with the Chasers as well.{nl}
column3: Tubuhku semakin berat dan merasakan hal yang sama .{nl}Seperti para Chaser.{nl}

column2: There's something I want you to do since you seem to be the most uneffected out of all of us.{nl}Do you remember the map of Ashaq Underground Prison 1F {nl}that was in the chest along with his journal?{nl}
column3: Ada sesuatu yang harus kamu lakukan karena hanya kamulah efek tersebut tidak bekerja.{nl}Apakah kamu mengingat peta Ashaq Underground Prison 1F yang tergambar pada diary itu dengan baik?

column2: All we have to rely on now are the points marked on the map.{nl}I don't know what you'll find there, but this is the best we can do.{nl}
column3: Sekarang kita semua mengandalkan titik yang ditandai pada peta. {nl} Aku tidak tahu apa yang bisa kamu temukan disana, tapi inilah terbaik yang kita bisa lakukan.{nl}

column2: Take the map.{nl}The bishop has definitely left some clues... at the marked locations.
column3: Bawalah peta ini. {nl}Bishop telah memberikan petunjuknya melalui tanda di lokasi peta tersebut.

column2: Oh yes, in order to reach those locations, you'll have to take {nl}the rail system meant to transport prisoners.{nl}There's one at the bottom of the stairs just right of here, {nl}but I don't know if it is still functioning.
column3: Untuk mencapai tempat itu {nl}kamu harus menggunakan rail system yang biasa digunakan untuk transport prisoners.{nl}Ada satu di bawah tangga, tepat sebelah kanan dari sini, {nl}tapi aku tak tahu masih berfungsi atau tidak.

column2: I shudder to think that I was almost captured by demons.{nl}You... Does the curse not affect you at all?{nl}
column3: Mengerikan jika membayangkan waktu itu aku hampir dimangsa oleh demon.{nl}Kutukan ini tidak begitu mempengaruhimu kan?{nl}

column2: I wonder what happened to the other priests that ran away from Marnox...{nl}It weighs heavily on my mind.
column3: Aku penasaran dengan apa yang terjadi pada para priest saat lari dari Marnox..{nl}Tak bisa kubayangkan.

column2: I will become a more devout priest when we leave this place...{nl}I pray that we will make it out alive...
column3: Aku berjanji akan menjadi seorang Priest yang baik setelah kembali dari sini...{nl}Aku berdoa kita akan keluar dari sini dengan selamat...

column2: You... Oh, thank the goddesses! {nl}Does this mean that I may finally accomplish my mission...?{nl}
column3: Kamu! Terima kasih Goddess ... {nl}Apakah ini berarti aku bisa menyelesaikan tugas ini ...{nl}

column2: Yes. I am the bishop of Orsha, Urbonas.{nl}Who are you... may I perhaps hear your name?{nl}
column3: Ya. Akulah Bishop of Orsha, Urbonas.{nl}Tapi siapakah kamu ... Boleh tahu siapa namamu?{nl}

column2: Of course. Priest Pranas and the lord... {nl}This old man seems to have caused concern for a lot of people.{nl}Could I perhaps interest you into listening to me for a little bit?{nl}
column3: Tentu saja. Priest Pranas dan Pemimpin Orsha... Keduanya sangat memperhatikan keselamatan rakyatnya.{nl}Maukah kamu mendengarkanku sebentar?{nl}

column2: Not long ago, Irma discovered strange orders on a demon while up north.{nl}The orders contained terrible plans that would destroy the entire region of Orsha.{nl}
column3: Belum lama ini, ketika Irma pergi ke utara, dia menemukan catatan aneh para demon.{nl}Catatan ini memerintahkan para demon untuk menghancurkan sebuah wilayah di Orsha.{nl}

column2: But that was not all.{nl}It also contained orders from the Demon Goddess Giltine to get rid of all Revelators.{nl}
column3: Bukan Cuma itu saja.{nl}Berisi juga perintah dari Demon Goddess Giltine untuk menyingkirkan semua Revelator.{nl}

column2: A Revelator is...{nl}...someone chosen by the goddesses to save this world from the catastrophes to come.{nl}
column3: Seorang Relevator adalah...{nl}Seseorang yang dipilih Goddess untuk menyelamatkan dunia ini dari bencana yang akan datang.{nl}

column2: I wanted to give this information to the lord, {nl}but the demons had already started to chase after me.{nl}I had no choice but to hide in the Ashaq Underground Prison, {nl}a hidout that I had been preparing for a while.{nl}
column3: Aku ingin sampaikan informasi ini kepada Pemimpin Orsha, {nl}Namun para demon telah menyerangku.{nl}Tidak ada pilihan lain selain bersembunyi di Ashaq Underground Prison, {nl}tempat persembunyian ini telah aku persiapkan.{nl}

column2: I could have ran to Orsha, but if I did that, the demons would have followed me there.{nl}Unfortunately, the demon that was after us was not an ordinary demon, but a Demon Lord.{nl}
column3: Aku bisa melarikan diri ke Orsha, akan tetapi jika aku melakukannya, para demon ini akan mengikutiku.{nl}Sayangnya, para demon ini bukan demon biasa, tapi Demon Lord.{nl}

column2: Demon Lord Marnox cursed the entire prison with his idols so that we could not escape.{nl}He also let loose his servants to search for us.{nl}
column3: Demon Lord Marnox telah mengutuk semua prison dengan kekuatannya sehingga kita tidak bisa melarikan diri. Dia juga melepaskan anak buahnya untuk mencari kami.{nl}

column2: We had to make a decision.{nl}First, I hid the Demon Orders in the Penitence Room on the 3rd floor,{nl}so that it would be safe even if I fall.{nl}
column3: Kita harus mengambil keputusan.{nl}Pertama, Aku akan menyembunyikan Demon Warrant di Penitence Room on the 3rd floor {nl}Jadi meskipun aku gagal, benda itu akan tetap aman.{nl}

column2: Then I faced off against Marnox to the best of my abilities, but it was simply not enough.{nl}In the end, Irma was captured by Marnox...{nl}While the other priests were all scattered.{nl}
column3: Lalu aku coba melawan Marnox dengan segala kemampuanku, tapi ternyata tidak cukup.{nl}Akhirnya, Irma ditangkap oleh Marnox...{nl}Sementara Priest lainnya berlarian.{nl}

column2: This is the story of what happened up to now.{nl}Until you showed up, I was thinking that I would return to the{nl}arms of the goddess without being able to complete my mission.{nl}
column3: Itulah yang terjadi hingga saat ini, sampai akhirnya kamu muncul.{nl} Aku pikir, aku akan kembali pada Goddess tanpa menyelesaikan tugas ini.{nl}

column2: But my faith in hope has restored since you've arrived here.
column3: Tapi harapanku kembali bersinar sejak kedatanganmu kemari.

column2: Torvana was confident a few minutes ago...{nl}We were chosen because we were supposed to be the best, but look at us now.
column3: Beberapa menit yang lalu Torvana masih percaya diri...{nl}Kita dipilih karena kita harus menjadi yang terbaik, tapi lihat kita sekarang.

column2: Being so confident was a mistake.{nl}My body feels as if it is very heavy... What's happening?
column3: Terlalu percaya diri itu suatu kesalahan.{nl}Tubuhku terasa semakin berat … apa yang terjadi?

column2: Dispatched officers used to irk us by poking around before the kingdom fell...{nl}I miss those days now.
column3: Sebelum kerajaan hancur, para officer itu mengganggu kita dengan berputar-putar di sekeliling kita...{nl}Aku merindukan masa-masa itu.

column2: I feel as if I am experiencing every type of pain I could ever experience in here.{nl}At least I'll have plenty of tales to tell my children when I return.
column3: Rasanya seperti merasakan bermacam rasa sakit berada di sini.{nl}Setidaknya aku punya cerita bagus buat anak-anakku saat aku kembali nanti.

column2: I remember back home when they were first looking for Chaser volunteers.{nl}I joined up because I trusted Germeja, but the job is more demanding than I thought it would be.{nl}
column3: Aku ingat pertama kali kembali ke rumah sepulang mencari Chaser volunteers.{nl}Aku bergabung karena aku percaya pada Germeja, tapi pekerjaan itu lebih berat dari apa yang kubayangkan.{nl}

column2: Not to mention extremely dangerous as well.
column3: Enggak bilang terlalu bahaya juga sih.

column2: You've kept dreaming of the Demon Goddess Giltine?{nl}Hmm... Perhaps...{nl}
column3: Masih terus memikirkan Demon Goddess Giltine?{nl}Hmm... Boleh jadi...{nl}

column2: Goddess Laima is responsible for fate and foresight.{nl}You finding me may seem like a sequence of coincidences, {nl}but I am certain that the goddess has led you here.{nl}
column3: Goddess Laima bertanggung jawab atas nasib dan masa depan pengikutnya. {nl}Pertemuan ini sepertinya telah direncanakan, {nl}tapi aku yakin bahwa Goddess telah memberikan petunjuk ke tempat ini.{nl}

column2: There were orders from Giltine to get rid of 'the Revelator' as well.{nl}I wish to see if perhaps you... since you have been having those dreams... may be 'the Revelator'.
column3: Ada perintah dari Giltine untuk memburu sang revelator.{nl} Aku pikir kamu ... Selama kamu masih bermimpi seperti itu... Mungkin kamulah sang revelator.

column2: I didn't hear anything about there being demons here.{nl}I didn't think too much of the job since I was told it was an escort mission...
column3: Aku tidak mengetahui apapun tentang para Demon disekitar sini.{nl}Aku tidak memikirkannya karena terlalu banyak pekerjaan semenjak aku diperintahkan untuk menjalankan tugas pengawalan.....

column2: I can't handle things like this, but I'd become a deserter if I run off...{nl}I'm going to seriously consider resigning after this is over.{nl}I don't know what I'd do to make a living though.
column3: Aku mungkin disebut pembelot jika tidak berhasil menyelesaikan hal semacam ini...{nl}Aku mulai berpikir untuk resign setelah ini.{nl}Aku tidak tahu harus berbuat apa untuk bertahan hidup.

column2: All I'm going to do after this is take a break and sleep all day while wrapped in my warm blanket.
column3: Setelah semua ini selesai aku akan cuti dan menikmati hidup dengan tidur seharian dalam selimut yang hangat.

column2: I'm certain that the goddess led you here.{nl}All these coincidences are pointing towards you.
column3: Aku yakin Goddess mengirimmu kemari.{nl}Semua kejadian mengarah padamu.

column2: My goddess, your Revelator is finally here...{nl}The efforts of our church are not in vain...{nl}
column3: Goddess, akhirnya Revelator yang diutus telah sampai disini...{nl}Usaha yang dilakukan tidak sia-sia...{nl}

column2: Only you can stand up to the Demon Lord Marnox now.{nl}According to the goddesses, only you... the Revelator, can save this world.
column3: Saat ini hanya kamu yang mampu menangani Demon Lord Marnox.{nl}Menurut Goddess, hanya kamulah... Savior, yang bisa menyelamatkan dunia ini.

column2: Please save the priests and Orsha.
column3: Tolong selamatkan para priest dan Orsha.

column2: The most important part is the invasion plans for Orsha.{nl}I didn't have enough time to fully analyze the orders while on the run from Marnox...{nl}
column3: Yang paling penting adalah rencana penyerangan Orsha.{nl}Aku tidak memiliki waktu lebih banyak lagi untuk meneliti warrant karena harus terus lari dari Marnox...{nl}

column2: I hid the orders in the Penitence Room on the 3rd floor...{nl}I sealed it as well, but there is no guarantee that Marnox will not be able to break the seal.{nl}
column3: Aku menyembunyikan Warrant dan segelnya di Penitence Room 3rd floor...{nl}Tapi bukan berarti Marnox tidak dapat menghancurkan segelnya.{nl}

column2: Not only that, but even though you are free of the idol's curse, {nl}you will not be able to reach the room if the priests are unable to move.{nl}
column3: Bukan cuma itu, tapi kamu juga tidak dapat masuk ke sana jika para priest masih belum bisa bergerak. Meskipun kamu terbebas dari kutukan ini.

column2: I wish I could show you the way myself but...{nl}I think that would be a strech due to the wounds I've suffered from Marnox...{nl}
column3: Seandainya aku bisa menunjukkan tempat tersebut secara langsung kepadamu...{nl}Tapi sepertinya ini akan menambah parah lukaku karena serangan dari Marnox...{nl}

column2: This Orb of Return may be able to help us.{nl}We can destroy the idols with it and free the priests from the curse.{nl}
column3: Orb of Return ini mungkin bisa menolong kita.{nl}Kita dapat membebaskan para priest dari kutukan dengan menggunakan alat ini.{nl}

column2: Deal with nearby demons to collect evil energy in the orb and destroy the cursed idols!
column3: kalahkan demon di sekitar sini untuk mengumpulkan energi jahat ke dalam orb dan hancurkan Cursed Idols!

column2: I will be of no help to you in my current state...{nl}If you destroy all of the idols, please pass on my story to Pranas.
column3: Dalam keadaan seperti ini aku tidak dapat menolongmu...{nl}Jika kamu berhasil melepas kutukan ini, tolong sampaikan pesanku pada Pranas.

column2: Don't worry about me and look for the Demon Orders first.{nl}We must interpret the rest and find out the exact plans for the invasion of Orsha.
column3: Tak perlu mengkhawatirkan aku, carilah dulu Demon Warrant.{nl}Kita harus segera menerjemahkan sisa keterangan dari invasion of Orsha.

column2: Has the curse been lifted?{nl}I suddenly feel a bit lighter now... How did you do that?{nl}
column3: Kutukan ini telah hilang?{nl}Aku merasa lebih ringan sekarang... Bagaimana kamu melakukannya?{nl}

column2: What? The bishop... is alive?{nl}Let us not further delay ourselves and save him!
column3: Apa? Bishop... masih hidup?{nl}tak perlu berlama-lama lagi, ayo selamatkan dia!

column2: I can barely move in this chilly aura...{nl}You, are you really okay?{nl}
column3: Aku hampir tidak bisa bergerak dalam aura dingin ini...{nl}Apa kamu baik-baik saja?{nl}

column2: You seem to be the only person able to move, so I hope you don't mind me asking a favor.{nl}We'd be in trouble if the demons suddenly attack us, so I want to threaten them a bit.{nl}
column3: Sepertinya hanya kamu yang bisa bergerak, mudah-mudahan kamu mau membantu.{nl}Kami dalam masalah, apalagi jika tiba-tiba para demon menyerang, jadi aku ingin sedikit menakut-nakuti mereka.{nl}

column2: Gather some red crystals from Blue Dumaro and Wendigo near the Torture Chamber.{nl}It's similar to war trophies so they will be hesitant to attack us if we have a lot of them.
column3: Kumpulkan beberapa red crystals dari Blue Dumaro dan Wendigo di sekitar Torture Chamber.{nl}Seperti merebutkan sebuah piala, mereka akan ragu jika jumlah kita lebih banyak dari mereka.

column2: You seem to be fine unlike the rest of us...{nl}What did you do?
column3: Kamu terlihat lebih sehat daripada kami...{nl}Apa yang kamu lakukan?

column2: There was no curse when I came here before on other business.{nl}There were also only petty demons back then.{nl}
column3: Saat aku datang kemari tidak pernah ada kutukan sampai saat ada urusan yang lain.{nl}Dulu juga hanya ada demon-demon yang lucu saja.{nl}

column2: I'm only sticking around since I've been paid and bound to a contract.{nl}At least I'll be able to scare the few demons trying to get out with this.
column3: Aku hanya berkeliling saja karena aku sudah dibayar dan terikat kontrak.{nl}Setidaknya aku telah menakut-nakuti para demon yang hendak keluar dari sini.

column2: I'm having a hard time even talking.{nl}Priest Pranas seems better off, maybe it's the priest powers?{nl}
column3: Aku telah mengalami masa-masa sulit.{nl}Priest Pranas terlihat lebih baik, mungkin inilah kekuatan priest?{nl}

column2: They say that it's an eye for an eye, and a tooth for a tooth.{nl}Maybe we can destroy the cursed idols with the evil energy from demons?{nl}
column3: Mereka bilang ini adalah mata untuk mata, dan gigi untuk gigi.{nl}Mungkin kita bisa menghancurkan kutukan ini menggunakan kekuatan jahat para demon?{nl}

column2: Mind if I ask you to gather some Black Wooden Pieces from demons in the Punishment Room?{nl}I know it sounds strange, but it's better than doing nothing.
column3: Boleh kan jika aku memintamu membawakan beberapa Black Wooden Piece dari para demon di Punishment Room?{nl}Memang kedengaran aneh, tapi ini cukup penting daripada tidak melakukan apa-apa.

column2: The petty demons are here just like they were last time.{nl}I would have been leading you if I felt okay but...
column3: Demon-demon lucu di sini masih seperti yang dulu.{nl}Aku mungkin bisa mengantarmu jika aku sedang OK, tapi...

column2: What is this? Why did it suddenly turn into a normal piece of wood?{nl}Oh... Could it be the energy from the Goddess Statue?{nl}
column3: Apa ini. Mengapa tiba-tiba berubah menjadi potongan kayu biasa?{nl}Bisa jadi ini adalah kekuatan dari Goddess Statue?{nl}

column2: At least I got to know that I'll be returning to the goddesses {nl}the instant I step away from this Goddess Statue.{nl}
column3: Setidaknya aku tahu bahwa aku akan kembali pada Goddess {nl}seketika aku menjauh dari Goddess Statue ini.{nl}

column2: Torvana says that the Blue Dumaro and Wendigo are carrying around strange packages.{nl}
column3: Torvana bilang bahwa Blue Dumaro dan Wendigo membawa packages aneh.{nl}

column2: The reason that they're able to move around in such an environment...{nl}Perhaps they have something in those packages?{nl}
column3: Alasan bahwa mereka mampu untuk bergerak di lingkungan seperti itu...{nl}Mungkin mereka mempunyai sesuatu pada packages itu?{nl}

column2: If you ever find a reason to go to the prison, why don't you try gathering a few and use them?{nl}Maybe they'll be useful to you as well.
column3: Jika kamu memang harus pergi ke prison itu, cobalah kumpulkan beberapa dan menggunakannya?{nl}Mungkin mereka bisa membantumu.

column2: I came because they said they'll pay me ten times the normal rate, and I'm paying dearly for it.{nl}I should stop trusting those priests outside of church.
column3: Aku datang karena mereka bilang akan membayar 10 kali dari biasanya, dan aku membayar mahal untuk itu.{nl}Aku harus tidak boleh percaya lagi pada priest di luar curch.

column2: It's not the effect I was hoping for, but this is quite handy.{nl}I'll have to show it to my colleagues later.
column3: Bukan seperti ini harapanku, tapi ini cukup bisa ditangani.{nl}Aku akan menunjukkan ini pada kawan-kawanku nanti.

column2: I cannot believe that you are the Revelator who will save this world...{nl}I knew it was strange that you were the only one unaffected by the curse.{nl}
column3: Tak bisa kupercaya bahwa kamulah Savior yang akan menyelamatkan dunia ini...{nl}Awalanya kupikir kamu dapat terbebas dari kutukan itu dengan mudah.{nl}

column2: Unfortunately I don't have the time to revel in the fact that I'm in the presence of the Revelator.{nl}Like the bishop said: Time is of the utmost importance.{nl}
column3: Sayangnya aku tidak punya waktu untuk bersenang-senang, karena di hadapan aku saat ini adalah seorang Savior.{nl}Seperti yang dikatakan bishop, Waktu adalah hal yang sangat penting.{nl}

column2: Fortunately, the bishop seems to be safe for now...{nl}We don't know what's happened to the rest of the priests {nl}and we might be caught by Marnox at any moment.{nl}
column3: Untungnya, sampai saat ini bishop masih aman...{nl}Tapi entah apa yang terjadi dengan priest lainnya, {nl}Kemungkinan kita bisa tertangkap setiap saat dengan  Marnox.{nl}

column2: Those Chasers are holding us back.{nl}I can move immediately since I am a priest, but they look like they could use a bit more time.{nl}
column3: Para chaser menghadang kembali.{nl}Aku adalah seorang Priest, bisa berpindah secara cepat, tapi sepertinya mereka terlihat memerlukan waktu yang lama.{nl}

column2: Oh well. I shall go first and see what's going on.{nl}Don't be too far behind!
column3: Baiklah. Aku pergi dulu dan memeriksa apa yang sedang terjadi.{nl}Jangan terlalu jauh di belakang!

column2: I'm sorry. I know we don't have time to waste...{nl}I think there's a cursed idol here as well...{nl}
column3: Aku minta maaf. Aku tahu kita tidak mempunyai banyak waktu... {nl}aku pikir Cursed idol berada disekitar sini...{nl}

column2: Fortunately, Draznie and Auranas seem to be fine.{nl}Let's just hope that the rest of the priests are okay as well.{nl}
column3: Beruntunglah, Draznie dan Auranas baik-baik saja.{nl}Mari berdoa agar para priest lainnya juga dalam keadaan baik.{nl}

column2: This curse... I really can't get used to it at all.{nl}I think we'll need more Orbs of Return.{nl}
column3: Kutukan ini…{nl}Sepertinya kita membutuhkan lebih banyak Orbs of Return.{nl}

column2: No matter how powerful the cursed idol is, the idol itself is merely a piece of wood.{nl}We'll have to aim for the instant it is full of evil energy.{nl}
column3: Tak peduli sebesar apa kekuatan kutukan itu.{nl}Kita harus segera mengisi penuh energi jahat ke dalamnya.{nl}

column2: You saw the cursed idol on the way here right?{nl}How about filling it with evil energy by dealing with demons near it.{nl}
column3: Kamu liat kutukan itu sedang mengarah kemari?{nl}Segera isi dengan monster-monster di sekitar sini.{nl}

column2: Use the orb when the idol is full to the limit with evil energy.{nl}It will be destroyed as the divine and evil energies collide.{nl}
column3: Gunakan orb saat terisi penuh dengan energi tersebut.{nl}Akan hancur bersamaan dengan penuhnya energi jahat ini.{nl}

column2: I thought it was all over when I was locked in the Solitary Confinement District.{nl}But seeing you... I feel as if the efforts of the church were not in vain.
column3: Kupikir semua telah berakhir saat aku terjebak di Solitary Cofinement District.{nl}Tapi setelah melihatmu, sepertinya usaha para priest membuahkan hasil.

column2: The best part is...{nl}According to Auranas it seems that Irma, who was captured by Marnox, is still alive.{nl}
column3: Aku bersyukur mendengar keberadaan Irma...{nl}Menurut Auranas, Irma yang ditangkap Marnox ternyata masih hidup.{nl}

column2: I also heard that Irma has a Orb of Return as well.{nl}We should hurry and rescue her before something bad happens to her.{nl}
column3: Kudengar Irma juga memiliki sebuah Orb of Return .{nl}Kita harus segera menyelamatkannya.{nl}

column2: Irma is currently being held in the Solitary Confinement District...{nl}Marnox is sure to be nearby, so make sure you're prepared.
column3: Irma saat ini ditahan di Solitary Cofinement District...{nl}Marnox pasti berada didekatnya, pastikan kamu telah siap menghadapinya.

column2: I can't imagine what Irma is going through right now.{nl}I just hope that she'll be okay until you can get to her.{nl}
column3: Aku tidak bisa membayangkan apa yang sedang dialami irma saat ini.{nl}Hanya bisa berharap dia baik-baik saja sampai saat kamu mendapatkannya.{nl}

column2: I thought it was all over when I was captured by the Demon Lord...{nl}Thank you so much for rescuing me!{nl}
column3: Aku kira semua telah berakhir saat aku ditangkap Demon Lord...{nl}Terima kasih telah menyelamatkanku!{nl}

column2: But... I think I heard Marnox call you the Revelator...{nl}
column3: Tapi... Aku mendengar Marnox memanggilmu Savior...{nl}

column2: Ah... the bishop...{nl}So the bishop is safe as well. {nl}Oh... that's... a relief...{nl}
column3: Ah... Bishop...{nl}Ternyata bishop juga telah aman. {nl}Oh... itu... Sebuah relief...{nl}

column2: The Orb of Return? Of course I have one.{nl}Here you... Huh?
column3: Orb of Return? Tentu aku punya satu.{nl}ini... Huh?

column2: Oh dear... It seems as if I've used the orb too much.{nl}It seems like it will break at any moment.{nl}
column3: Oh Goddess.. Apabila aku menggunakannya Orb terlalu sering.{nl} Benda ini akan hancur kapanpun.{nl}

column2: I've used it numerous times against that uncouth and arrogant Marnox.{nl}
column3: Aku berkali-kali menggunakannya untuk melawan Marnox.{nl}

column2: It's too early to give up. There's a way to restore it.{nl}This orb is an instrument that turns powerful evil energy and turns it into divine power...{nl}
column3: Terlalu terlambat untuk menyerah. Ada satu cara untuk mengembalikannya.{nl}Orb ini adalah alat untuk mengumpulkan energi jahat menjadi divine power...{nl}

column2: There's more than enough evil energy around. {nl}The Wendigo Escapees.{nl}
column3: Banyak terdapat energi jahat di sekitar sini. {nl}Wendigo Escapees.{nl}

column2: You can find the Wendigo Escapees near the Central Passage.{nl}You'll be able to restore the orb by absorbing their life and evil energy.{nl}
column3: Temukan Wendigo Escapees dekat Central Corridor.{nl}Kamu dapat menyerap energi jahat dari mereka.{nl}

column2: Please hurry.{nl}I think Marnox found out where we've hid the Demon Orders.{nl}
column3: Cepatlah.{nl}Kayanya Marnox telah menemukan tempat dimana kita menyembunyikan Demon Warrant.{nl}

column2: The seal that protects the orders can't be broken by a demon but...{nl}There is no telling what dirty tricks Marnox may play to break it.
column3: Seal yang disembunyikan tidak akan dapat dirusak oleh demon...{nl}Tapi siapa yang tahu siasat licik Marnox untuk menghancurkannya.

column2: I still don't believe I'm alive.{nl}I'm so glad that the bishop and all the other priests are okay too...
column3: Aku masih tidak percaya masih hidup.{nl}Aku juga senang semua priest dan bishop baik-baik saja...

column2: You've done well.{nl}Just a little divine power and it will be almost as good as new.
column3: Kamu melakukannya dengan baik.{nl}Sedikit lagi divine power dan ini akan berfungsi seperti baru lagi.

column2: There's a crystal that Draznie prepared for such an occasion.{nl}I think... it should be in the Bird Room and the Supply Room. {nl}
column3: Ada sebuah crystal yang disiapkan Draznie untuk keadaan tertentu.{nl}Kayanya ada di Bird Room dan di Supply Room. {nl}

column2: The power of light should transfer to the orb from the crystal if you take it there.{nl}Return to me after the orb has absorbed enough of the power.
column3: Power of light mesti ditransfer pada orb dari crystal jika kamu membawanya ke sana.{nl}Kembalilah padaku jika Orb telah terisi penuh.

column2: I don't know how many more cursed idols are in this Underground Prison...{nl}But the only orb we have left is the one I just gave you.{nl}
column3: Aku tidak tahu seberapa banyak kutukan-kutukan berada di Underground Prison...{nl}Tapi Orb yang kuberikan padamu itu yang terakhir.{nl}

column2: I don't know whether to call the bishop meticulous...{nl}Or whether to call him worrisome...{nl}
column3: Aku tidak tahu apakah memanggil Bishop secara hati-hati...{nl}Atau apakah memanggilnya dengan mencemaskannya... {nl}

column2: He ordered us priests to prepare things near Orsha.{nl}Of course we never knew why we were preparing things back then.{nl}
column3: Dia memerintahkan kita para priest untuk menyiapkan sesuati di dekat Orsha.{nl}Tentu saja kita tidak tahu kenapa kita disiapkan kembali.{nl}

column2: Then this all happened.{nl}If I could, I want to go back in time and kneel in front of the bishop in gratitude.
column3: Kemudian beginilah akhirnya.{nl}Jika bisa aku ingin mengembalikan waktu.

column2: During Medzio Diena, it was a nightmare because of the earthquake.{nl}It was still easier to get by back then than it is now...{nl}
column3: Saat Medzio Diena, Ini merupakan mimpi buruk yang menyebabkan gempa bumi terdahsyat.{nl}Ini masih mudah untuk bertahan daripada kondisi sekarang ini...{nl}

column2: The fact that there are suddenly so many monsters is a bigger catastrophe.{nl}Of course, it's still better than at the capital. {nl}I've heard that it was completely destroyed during Medzio Diena.
column3: Ternyata banyak sekali monster yang bisa menyebabkan bencana besar.{nl}Tentu saja, keadaannya lebih baik daripada di pusat kota.{nl}Aku mendengar semuanya hancur saat Medzio Diena terjadi.

column2: I think this will be enough to destroy the idol.{nl}I'm grateful that we could get enough energy.{nl}
column3: Sepertinya ini sudah cukup.{nl}Aku bersyukur bisa mendapat cukup energi ini.{nl}

column2: It's our only orb and it barely has enough power...{nl}We should try to think of a way to make sure we destroy the idol.{nl}
column3: Hanya tinggal ini Orb satu-satunya...{nl}Kita harus cari jalan lain untuk benar-benar bisa menghancurkannya.{nl}

column2: You've succeeded!{nl}The force that was weighing down my body is gone.{nl}
column3: Kamu berhasil!{nl}Kekuatan yang membelenggu ini telah hilang.{nl}

column2: Now let's go find the orders we've hidden away.{nl}I know the way there, of course. That's why Marnox captured me...{nl}
column3: Sekarang mari kita cari warrant yang kita sembunyikan.{nl}Aku tahu jalannya. Karena itulah kenapa Marnox menangkapku...{nl}

column2: I'll head down to the 3rd floor first.{nl}I think Gelija is there somewhere... I do hope that he is okay.{nl}
column3: Aku akan turun ke Ashag Undergound Prison 3F.{nl}Kupikir Gelija berada di suatu tempat di sana... Mudah-mudahan dia dalam keadaan baik.{nl}

column2: Priest Gelija is safe!{nl}Now I should focus on finding the Demon Orders.{nl}
column3: Priest Gelija selamat!{nl}Sekarang aku harus fokus mendapatkan Demon Warrant.{nl}

column2: But...{nl}Oh, I forgot that you probably won't be able to sense it.{nl}
column3: Tapi...{nl}Oh, Aku lupa kamu mungkin tidak dapat melakukannya.{nl}

column2: I think there's a cursed idol here as well.{nl}The problem is that we don't have any Orbs of Return left.{nl}
column3: Sepertinya masih ada kutukan di sekitar sini.{nl}Masalahnya kita sudah tidak memiliki Orbs of Return.{nl}

column2: Feeling as if my body is becoming heavier is one thing...{nl}But we cannot open the portal to the Penitence Room {nl}where the Demon Orders is because of the cursed idol.
column3: Merasakan tubuh ini terasa sangat berat itu adalah sesuatu banget...{nl}Kita tidak dapat membuka pintu menuju Penitence Room {nl}tempat dimana Demon Warrant berada disebabkan kutukan itu.

column2: We've prepared to greet the Revelator on the bishop's orders...{nl}But it looks like we'll be done for if we don't use it now.{nl}
column3: Kita sudah siap memperkenalkan Savior pada bishop's orders...{nl}Tapi kayanya kita akan selesai jika tidak menggunakannya.{nl}

column2: We've hidden a sack of Pearl Powder in the watchtower.{nl}Do you think you could gather it?
column3: Kita menyembunyikan sack of Pearl Powder di dalam watchtower.{nl}Apa kamu bisa memperolehnya?

column2: Are you talking about the legends?{nl}Oh, you may not know since you're not from Orsha.{nl}
column3: Apakah kamu sedang membicarakan sebuah legenda?{nl}Oh, mungkin kamu tidak tahu karena bukan orang Orsha.{nl}

column2: A long time ago...{nl}It is said that a young shepherd boy met a girl that {nl}he had never seen before while tending his sheep.{nl}
column3: Konon jaman dahulu kala...{nl}Dikisahkan seorang gembala muda bertemu seorang gadis {nl}Selama dia mengembala belum pernah melihatnya.{nl}

column2: The girl barely talked, but everything she said happened.{nl}The shepherd boy was fascinated and took the girl to his uncle.{nl}
column3: Gadis itu jarang bicara, tapi sekalinya bicara adalah sebuah kenyataan.{nl}Si gembala itu penasaran, dan membawa gadis itu pada pamannya.{nl}

column2: The uncle is said to have shown his respect as soon as he saw the girl.{nl}The girl prophesied of numerous catastrophes to the uncle before disappearing.{nl}
column3: Sang paman bilang bahwa dia harus menghormati gadis itu.{nl}Sebelum pergi, gadis itu memperlihatkan bermacam bencana pada pamannya.{nl}

column2: Medzio Diena and the catastrophe involving Orsha have already occurred...{nl}There is one more prophecy that has only been passed on by the bishops of Orsha.{nl}
column3: Medzio Diena dan bencana Orsha telah terjadi...{nl}Tinggal 1 lagi prophecy yang hanya bisa dialami oleh para bishop Orsha.{nl}

column2: You can hear the story in more detail from any of the residents of Orsha, {nl}so why don't you ask around?
column3: Kamu bisa mendengar cerita lebih lengkapnya dari penduduk Orsha, {nl}Tanyakanlah?

column2: It's an honor to meet the Revelator that I've only heard of through the legends. {nl}You really do seem to be indifferent to the curse as Priest Pranas said...{nl}
column3: Suatu kebanggaan dapat bertemu langsung seorang Savior yang hanya kudengar dari sebuah legenda saja. {nl}Kamu memang terlihat berbeda menerima kutukan itu, seperti yang dikatakan Priest Pranas...{nl}

column2: The bishop is meticulous... to the point of being overly cautious.{nl}He had prepared to meet the Revelator in a few more places other than here as well.{nl}
column3: Bishop masih terus bergerak dengan hati-hati.{nl}Dia bersiap bertemu dengan Savior di beberapa tempat.{nl}

column2: Among those numerous places, Ashaq Underground Prison was prepared by myself and Draznie.{nl}
column3: Karena banyaknya tempat, Ashaq Underground Prison disiapkan olehku dan Draznie.{nl}

column2: I was planning on hiding here for a long time but...{nl}Since you're here, I think using the prepared items is a better idea.{nl}
column3: Aku berencana bersembunyi terlebih dulu di sini...{nl}Tapi setelah kamu di sini, sebaiknya kita persiapkan alat-alatnya.{nl}

column2: First of all, I've hidden a sack of Pearl Powder in the watchtower.{nl}We can use that against demons to great effect.{nl}
column3: Pertama aku telah menyembunyikan Sack of Pearl Powder di dalam watchtower.{nl}Lumayan membantu menyerang para monster.{nl}

column2: I'll explain the details once you get back with the Pearl Powder.
column3: Akan kujelaskan nanti setelah kau bawa itu Pearl Powder.

column2: It seems that I still have much to learn...{nl}I can't do anything because of the curse...
column3: keknya banyak yang harus dipelajari lagi...{nl}Gara-gara kutukan itu aku jadi ga bisa ngapa-ngapain...

column2: Thank the goddesses, Irma is safe!{nl}Now all we have to do is push the demons out of the Ashaq Underground Prison.
column3: Syukurlah, Irma selamat!{nl}Sekarang kita harus mengusir para demon dari Ashaq Underground Prison.

column2: Once again, the bishop has impressed me with his wisdom.{nl}If such preparations hadn't been in place, {nl}we wouldn't have been able to deal with the demons at all.{nl}
column3: Sekali lagi, bishop telah menunjukkan padaku kebijaksanaannya.{nl}Jika persiapannya masih belum kelar, {nl}kita belum bisa menyerang para demon.{nl}

column2: I'd say that my brothers are also in similar hideouts.
column3: Boleh dibilang priest yang lain pun punya tempat bersembunyi yang sama.

column2: I feel so relieved that we've recovered the Demon Orders.{nl}But this is only the beginning. We don't know the contents about it.
column3: Aku begitu semangat bisa memperoleh kembali Demon Warrant.{nl}tapi ini baru permulaan. Kita belum tahu benar isinya.

column2: The pearl powder was scattered all over the floor?{nl}It seems as if the demons had torn into it.{nl}
column3: Pearl Powder berserakan di lantai?{nl}Sepertinya para monster berubah wujud menjadi ini.{nl}

column2: Thankfully, this is more than enough to use.{nl}Good job on getting it here.
column3: Terima kasih sekali, ini lebih dari cukup.{nl}Sampai saat ini semua berjalan dengan baik.

column2: The demons also have a chain of command like we do,{nl}so I think that the other demons will fall if we take out their leaders.{nl}
column3: Para demon juga punya chain of command seperti kita.{nl}Jadi jika kita mengalahkan pemimpinnya, maka anak buahnya akan hancur juga.{nl}

column2: I've crafted an orb from the pearl powder you brought me.{nl}Try using it when you find a demon far away.{nl}
column3: Aku telah membuat Orb yang dibuat dari Pearl Powder .{nl}Coba pake nih buat hadapin monster lainnya.{nl}

column2: I've empowered it with holy power so it will tell you which demons you need to deal with.
column3: Aku telah menambahkannya dengan holy power jadi kamu bisa menentukan demon mana yang akan kamu hadapi.

column2: You mustn't... think of the demons as monsters.{nl}I've heard that some Demon Lords are as powerful as Goddess Gabija.
column3: kamu tidak perlu memikirkan kalau demon itu adalah monster.{nl}Kudengar beberapa Demon Lords sekuat Goddess Gabija.

column2: Good job.{nl}The demons will be less aggressive for a while since their chain of command is ruined.
column3: Bagus.{nl}demon akan sedikit menurun kekuatannya jika chain of command telah hancur.

column2: I feel awful because of the cursed idols.{nl}I think I need to rest a little at the safer Special Prison District for a while.{nl}
column3: Aku merasa muak dengan kutukan ini.{nl}Aku butuh istirahat sedikit di tempat aman di Special Prison District.{nl}

column2: We can also react to threats more easily thanks to its height.{nl}The only problem is that the demons are in control of it.{nl}
column3: Dari posisi ini kita bisa lebih mudah melakukan tekanan.{nl}Masalahnya para demon ini ada yang mengendalikan.{nl}

column2: I feel guilty for asking for more help...{nl}But could you clear out the Special Prison District for us?
column3: Aku merasa bersalah telah  meminta pertolongan...{nl}Dapatkan kamu bereskan Special Prison District?

column2: Priest Pranas, Auranas and myself...{nl}We are too weak from the cursed idols to be of any help.{nl}
column3: Priest Pranas, Auranas dan aku...{nl}Kami terlalu lemah dengan kutukan ini.{nl}

column2: I think we need to rest a bit more in the Special Prison District since it's safer than it is here.{nl}It's higher up so that reacting to threats will also be easier.{nl}
column3: Kita harus beristirahat sejenak di Special Prison District.{nl}Tempat ini cukup tinggi, jadi lebih mudah mengontrolnya.{nl}

column2: The problem is that the demons are in control of it.{nl}I know it's a lot to ask, but could you clear it out for us?
column3: Masalahnya demon-demon itu dikendalikan.{nl}Maukah kamu membereskannya?

column2: Especially Priest Pranas is in a bad state.{nl}Even though he's pretending to be fine just to make us less worried...{nl}
column3: Terutama Priest Pranas dalam kondisi paling parah.{nl}Meskipun dia tetap bersikap seperti tidak kenapa napa agar kami tidak khawatir...{nl}

column2: I ask of you to hurry since we can't be sure that this place will be safe despite the Goddess Statue.
column3: Cepatlah, kami tidak tahu sampai kapan tempat ini akan aman.

column2: Thank you.{nl}I'll have to lead the others to the Special Prison District when I see an opportunity.
column3: Terima kasih.{nl}Aku akan menunjukkan jalan ke lainnya menuju Special Prison District jika waktunya tepat.

column2: I thought that I would be able to do anything once I got away from Marnox...{nl}But this curse is preventing me from doing anything.{nl}
column3: Aku mungkin bisa melakukan apapun jika berhasil kabur dari Marnox...{nl}Tapi kutukkan itu menyebabkanku tidak bisa berbuat apa-apa.{nl}

column2: I can finally be at ease thanks to you.{nl}It seems as if the Revelator sent by the goddesses is different after all...
column3: Akhirnya , Terima kasih ya.{nl}Sepertinya Savior yang diutus Goddess berbeda dari semuanya...

column2: You are an extraordinarily being to the priests of Orsha.{nl}We've prepared to meet you a long time only relying on legends.
column3: Kamu luar biasa menjadi priests of Orsha.{nl}Kami sudah siap bertemu denganmu dalam waktu yang lama seperti sebuah legenda.

column2: Auranas is in a really bad state.{nl}Pretending to be okay in order so we can worry less isn't doing any good...{nl}
column3: Auranas dalam kondisi yang sangat tidak baik.{nl}Pura-pura tidak apa-apa agar kami tidak khawatir...{nl}

column2: Since safety isn't guaranteed here despite the Goddess Statue, I must beg you to hurry.{nl}
column3: Meskipun ada Goddess Statue tapi masih belum aman, Aku mohon padamu cepatlah.{nl}

column2: Oh, thank you for helping out back then.{nl}You saved me from Marnox and even managed to retrieve the Demon Orders...{nl}
column3: Terima kasih telah menolongku.{nl}Kamu menyelamatkanmu dari Marnox dan bahkan membantu mendapatkan Demon Warrant...{nl}

column2: I feel much better now.{nl}I'm thinking of staying at the Ashaq Underground Prison {nl}for a while and driving the demons out of it.{nl}
column3: Aku merasa baik-baik saja sekarang.{nl}Aku merasa harus bertahan di Ashaq Underground Prison untuk sementara waktu{nl}dan mengusir demon-demon di sini.{nl}

column2: I hope we get a chance to meet again.{nl}May the goddesses bless the path you choose...
column3: Semoga kita bisa dipertemukan kembali.{nl}Goddess memberkati jalan yang akan kamu tempuh...

column2: Thank you.{nl}I'll have to wait for a chance to take them to the Special Prison District.
column3: Terima kasih.{nl}Aku menunggu waktu yang tepat untuk membawa mereka ke Special Prison District.

column2: I'm so relieved that Irma is safe and sound.{nl}I'm sure she'll dust it off since she's so easygoing.{nl}
column3: Aku yakin irma masih hidup.{nl}dia dapat mengatasi apapun.{nl}

column2: Oh, yes. {nl}We've made a bunch of traps in the Solitary Confinement District{nl}on the orders of the bishop quite some time ago.{nl}I learned this back when I was an apprentice... {nl}It's a trap to lure monsters to a apparition that looks like me.{nl}
column3: Oh, ya. {nl}Kita telah membuat jebakan di Solitary Cofinement District{nl}atas perintah bishop beberapa waktu lalu.{nl}Aku mempelajarinya saat aku menjadi seorang apprentice... {nl}Trap ini berguna untuk memancing monster muncul.{nl}

column2: I didn't say anything about them because I feared Irma {nl}might have gotten caught, but I think it's safe now.{nl}If you happen to go there, please be my guest and use the traps.{nl}
column3: Aku mengkhawatirkan Irma {nl}kemungkinan dia tertangkap, tapi saat ini dia sudah aman.{nl}Jika kamu mau pergi ke sana, mari kita pergi dan gunakan trap.{nl}

column2: There are other places where we've prepared hideouts out of the prison as well.{nl}To exaggerate a little, we made so many that we could evacuate the population of Orsha.
column3: Ada beberapa tempat persembunyian yang telah kita siapkan.{nl}Sebagai persiapan apabila diperlukan untuk evakuasi para penduduk Orsha.

column2: Did the demons fall for the traps?{nl}I'd never used them on demons before, so I was a little worried.{nl}
column3: Apakah para demon berhasil dijebak?{nl}Aku belum pernah mencoba sebelumnya, jadi merasa khawatir juga.{nl}

column2: I'm so glad that they worked as intended.{nl}
column3: Aku senang mereka bekerja seperti biasanya.{nl}

column2: Do you... by any chance remember?{nl}I'm sure that the bishop would have mentioned it.{nl}
column3: Apa kamu masih mengingatnya?{nl}Aku yakin bishop pernah menyebutkan hal ini.{nl}

column2: If you really are the Revelator, you will be able to stand against Demon Lords with your strength.{nl}
column3: Jika kamu benar-benar Savior, kamu akan mampu menghadapi Demon Lords dengan kekuatanmu.{nl}

column2: The reason we chose this place to hide the Demon Orders is because of the Confession Altar.{nl}It's the altar that the goddess gave her final blessing to the inmates that made their confessions.{nl}
column3: Alasan kenapa menyembunyikan Demon Warrant di sana karena itu adalah Confession Altar.{nl}Altar yang diberikan Goddess  sebagai berkah terakhirnya untuk para tahanan sebagai bentuk pengampunan.{nl}

column2: It's been a while since the prison was shut down, but the effects from the blessings are still there.{nl}Your powers as Revelator should be enough to liberate that energy.
column3: Telah lama sekali prison ini ditutup, tapi efek blessingnya masih terasa.{nl}Kekuatanmu sebagai Savior cukup bisa membebaskan energi tersebut.

column2: The cursed idols must be destroyed in order for me to open the portal to the Penitence Room.{nl}I can't do a thing because of this heavy and blasphemous energy.{nl}
column3: Untuk dapat membuka Penitence Room kita harus menghancurkan kutukan itu terlebih dahulu.{nl}Aku tidak bisa apa-apa akibat dari kutukan ini.{nl}

column2: There are two Confession Altars...{nl}But let's try the one on the left since it is closer.
column3: Ada dua Confession Altar...{nl}Mari kita coba yang terdekat dulu.

column2: The demons seemed to have noticed something is happening.{nl}But the cursed idol still stands...
column3: Tampaknya para demon telah menyadari hal ini.{nl}Kutukan ini masih terasa...

column2: I am grateful that everything seems to be going well ever since I've met you...{nl}But I am also nervous at the same time. {nl}Especially about the fact that Marnox is so quiet.
column3: Sejak bertemu denganmu, semua berjalan dengan baik...{nl}Tapi aku sedikit gugup juga. {nl}Terutama mendengar jika Marnox terlihat tenang-tenang saja.

column2: I told you there were two altars.{nl}Now all we can do is hope that the one in the oratory will do it's job.{nl}
column3: Aku sudah bilang ada 2 Altar.{nl}Kita berharap salah satu di Orotarium itu bisa berfungsi dengan baik.{nl}

column2: I pray that the goddess look over us and grant us with success...
column3: Semoga Goddess e melindungi dan melancarkan segala usaha kita ini...

column2: Please be careful that Marnox doesn't notice you.{nl}That arrogant Demon Lord will not look on as he lost me.
column3: Berhati-hatilah agar Marnox tidak melihatmu.{nl}Demon Lord jahat itu tidak akan tahu.

column2: You've succeeded!{nl}I feel the curse being lifted.{nl}
