column3: Kamu teah cukup mendapatkan gun powder. Kembali ke Sapper Submaster.

column2: Defeat monsters to obtain %s
column3: Kalahkan monster untuk mendapatkan %s

column2: The Hunter Submaster has prepared a Hunter test for you. Go to Delmore Hamlet, Delmore Manor and Delmore Outskirts and find a box containing a Hunter's Pass in each location.
column3: Hunter Submaster telah mempersiapkan test Hunter untuk mu. Pergi ke Delmore Hamlet, Delmore Manor dan Delmore Outskirts cari box yang berisi Hunter's Pass di tiap lokasi.

column2: You have found all Hunter Passes. Return to the Hunter Submaster.
column3: Kamu telah menemukan semua Hunter Passes. Kembali ke Hunter Submaster.

column2: Collect poison from monsters in the Poison Bottle
column3: Kumpulkan racun dari monster pada Poison Bottle

column2: The Wugushi Master believes the first thing to learn is the proper way to collect poison. Use the Wugushi Poison Bottle to collect poison from monsters at Carlyle's Mausoleum.
column3: Wugushi Master percaya hal pertama yang harus dipelajari adalah cara mengumpulkan racun dengan tepat. Gunakan Wugushi Poison Bottle untuk mengumpulkan dari monster di Carlyle's Mausoleum.

column2: The poison bottle is full. Go back to the Wugushi Master.
column3: Poison bottle penuh. Kembali ke Wugushi Master.

column2: The Scout Submaster demands most of all speed and agility from any hopeful Scout. Try attacking some monsters without receiving any damage. If you receive damage from a monster, the test will start all over again.
column3: Scout Submaster menuntut semua Scout untuk mengedepankan speed dan agility. Coba serang monster tanpa menerima damage. Jika kamu terkena damage dari monster, test akan dimulai dari awal.

column2: You seem to have proved your skills now. Go back to the Scout Submaster.
column3: Tampak nya kamu telah membuktikan skill mu. Kembali ke Scout Submaster.

column2: Talk to the Swordsman Submaster in Orsha
column3: Bicara ke Swordsman Submaster di Orsha

column2: Learn the attributes and talk to the Swordsman Submaster
column3: Belajar attribute dan bicara ke Swordsman Submaster

column2: Talk to the Wizard Submaster in Orsha
column3: Bicara ke Wizard Submaster di Orsha

column2: Learn the attributes and talk to the Wizard Submaster
column3: Belajar attribute dan bicara ke Wizard Submaster

column2: Talk to the Archer Submaster in Orsha
column3: Bicara ke Archer Submaster di Orsha

column2: Learn the attributes and talk to the Archer Submaster
column3: Belajar attribute dan bicara ke Archer Submaster

column2: Talk to the Cleric Submaster in Orsha
column3: Bicara ke Cleric Submaster di Orsha

column2: Learn the attributes and talk to the Cleric Submaster
column3: Belajar attribute dan bicara ke Cleric Submaster

column2: Defeat monsters to obtain the key
column3: Kalahkan monster untuk mendapatkan key

column2: The box is locked and cannot be opened. Defeat nearby monsters to find the key.
column3: Box terkunci dan tidak bisa dibuka. Kalahkan monster sekitar untuk mendapatkan key.

column2: You have obtained the key from the monsters. Try and open the locked box again.
column3: Kamu mendapatkan key dari monster. Coba lagi buka box yang terkunci.

column2: Defeat nearby monsters to obtain %s
column3: Kalahkan monster sekitar untuk mendapatkan %s

column2: Put down Horacius' poison pot and collect some poison. The pot can only collect poison when there are monsters around.
column3: Taruh Horacius' poison pot dan kumpulkan beberapa racun. Pot hanya dapat mengumpulkan racun ketika ada monster disekitar.

column2: The pillar collapsed without even having been touched. It needs to be repaired; collect some viscous liquid from nearby Desert Chupacabras.
column3: Pillar runtuh tanpa ada yang menyentuh nya. Butuh diperbaiki; kumpulkan beberapa viscous liquid dari Desert Chupacabras terdekat.

column2: Obtain %s from Desert Chupacabras
column3: Dapatkan %s dari Desert Chupacabras

column2: Helping Gedas seems bound to get you some information on Albinas. Retrieve Gedas' research materials from nearby Ticens. If a Ticen can be checked using the Space Bar, it is probably carrying a lot more materials.
column3: Membantu Gedas tampak nya bisa membuatmu mendapatkan informasi pada Albinas. Dapatkan kembali Gedas' research material dari Ticens. Jika Ticen bisa di periksa menggunakan Space Bar, kemungkinan membawa lebih banyak materials.

column2: Collect Flammable Powder
column3: Kumpulkan Flammable Powder

column2: Gedas says he will have his allies investigate Albinas. They want to make flares, in case any of the allies is in danger, and they asked you to gather the materials. Obtain some flammable powder from monsters in order to make the flares.
column3: Gedas mengatakan akan meminta sekutunya menyelidiki Albinas. Mereka ingin membuat flares, seandai nya mereka dalam bahaya, dan mereka memintamu untuk mengumpulkan materials. Kumpulkan beberapa flammable powder dari monsters untuk membuat flares.

column2: You have collected enough flammable powder. Return to Gedas.
column3: Kamu telah cukup mengumpulkan flammable powder. Kembali ke Gedas.

column2: Obtain Flammable Powder
column3: Dapatkan Flammable Powder

column2: Ask Gedas about the flares and his research.
column3: Tanya Gedas mengenai flares dan penelitian nya.

column2: Find Merrisa
column3: Cari Merrisa

column2: Go find Merrisa.
column3: Pergi cari Merrisa.

column2: Merrisa requested you recover the lost holy relics in Goanar Path. Clear out some monsters on your way there.
column3: Merrisa memintamu memulihkan lost holy relics di Goanar Path. Kalahkan beberapa monster dalah perjalanan kesana.

column2: Deliver to Merrisa
column3: Antarkan ke Merrisa

column2: You have cleared out the monsters and recovered the holy relics. Take them to Merrisa.
column3: Kamu telah mengalahkan monsters dan memulihkan holy relics. Bawa ke Merrisa.

column2: Talk to Merrisa
column3: Bicara dengan Merrisa

column2: Ask Merrisa if you can help with anything else.
column3: Meminta Merrisa apakah ada yang bisa dibantu lagi.

column2: You have recovered the Merchant Alliance's objects. Go and ask Merrisa what they are.
column3: Kamu telah memulihkan Merchant Alliance's objects. Pergi dan tanyakan Merrisa mengenai itu.

column2: Defeat Infroburks to retrieve %s
column3: Kalahkan Infroburks untuk mendapatkan %s

column2: Defeat Infroburks and retrieve the Damp Pieces of Paper
column3: Kalahkan Infroburks dan dapatkan Damp Pieces of Paper

column2: Use Merrisa's detector to investigate the Juikas Field area. Use the detector on the areas shown on the map to check your direction.
column3: Gunakan Merrisa detektor untuk investigasi Juikas Field area. Guanakn detektor di area yang ditunjukan dalam map untuk memeriksa arah mu.

column2: Report to Merrisa
column3: Lapor ke Merrisa

column2: You have found the Merchant Alliance's objects using the detector. Bring them to Merrisa.
column3: Kamu telah menemukan Merchant Alliance objects mengunakan detektor . Bawa ke Merrisa.

column2: Obtain Infroburk Body Fluid
column3: Mendapatkan Infroburk Body Fluid

column2: A special ink is needed to make the educational materials. Set up Margellius' trap at the Drose Empty Lot and collect the body fluid of trapped Infroburks.
column3: Special ink dibutuhkan untuk membuat educational materials. Siapkan Marcelijus' trap di Drose Empty Lot dan kumpulkan body fluid dari Infroburks yang terjebak.

column2: Defeat those trying to attack the spirits of the Klaipeda Market
column3: Kalahkan sesuatu yang mau menyerang  spirits dari Klaipeda Market

column2: Go to the Herb Gatherers' Cabin to save the merchants
column3: Pergi ke Herb Gatherer Cabin untuk menolong merchants

column2: Varas says his colleagues are hidden somewhere around the Herb Gatherers' Cabin. Save Varas' friends before the demons get to them.
column3: Varas berkata teman nya bersembunyi di sekitar Herb Gatherer Cabin. Tolong teman Varas sebelum ditangkap demon.

column2: Talk to Traveling Merchant Rose
column3: Bicara ke Traveling Merchant Rose

column2: You have found Rose, one of Varas' colleagues. Ask her what happened.
column3: kamu menemukan Rose, salah satu teman dari Varas. Tanyakan dia apa yang terjadi.

column2: Defeat the demons threatening the merchants
column3: Kalahkan demon yang mengancam merchants

column2: Rose's Colleagues
column3: Teman Rose

column2: Traveling Merchant Rose thanks you for saving her. Keep talking to her.
column3: Traveling Merchant Rose bertrimakasih karena kamu menyelamatkan nya. Terus bicara pada nya.

column2: Give Laswi a Stamina Pill
column3: Berikan Rashi Stamina Pill

column2: Rose wants to go find her friends who are still scattered around the area, but Laswi is too tired to help. Give Laswi a Stamina pill.
column3: Rose ingin mencari teman nya yang masih tersebar di area sekitar, tapi Rashi terlalu lelah untuk membantu. Berikan Rashi Stamina pill.

column2: You gave the Stamina pill to Rose. Will Laswi be okay now?
column3: Kamu memberikan Stamina pill ke Rose. Apakah Rashi akan baik-baik saja sekarang?

column2: Laswi took the Stamina pill and seems to be feeling energized. Talk to Rose again to start finding her colleagues.
column3: Rashi meminum Stamina pill dan tampak nya menjadi bertenaga . Bicara pada Rose lagi untuk mulai mencari teman-teman nya.

column2: Find the merchants with Laswi
column3: Mencari merchants dengan Rashi

column2: Have Laswi smell the merchants' clothes and follow their scent to find each one. When you find them, tell them of Rose's whereabouts.
column3: Biarkan Rashi mencium baju merchant dan ikuti baunya untuk mencari mereka. Jika kamu menemukan nya, beritahu mereka mengenai keberadaan Rose.

column2: Find the last Traveling Merchant
column3: Cari Traveling Merchant terakhir

column2: You have found 3 traveling merchants. Find the last missing merchant with Laswi.
column3: Kamu telah menemukan 3 traveling merchant. Temukan merchant terakhir yang hilang dengan Rashi .

column2: Talk to Traveling Merchant Cassias
column3: Bicara dengan Traveling Merchant Cassias

column2: You have found all of Rose's merchant colleagues. Keep talking to Traveling Merchant Cassias.
column3: Kamu telah menemukan semua teman Rose merchant. Tetap bicara dengan Traveling Merchant Cassias.

column2: Defeat the attacking demons
column3: Kalahkan demon yang menyerang

column2: Traveling Merchant Cassias was about to go back when the demons started attacking. Defeat all of the attacking demons.
column3: Traveling Merchant Cassias diserang demon ketika akan pulang. Kalahkan semua demon yang menyerang.

column2: Report to Traveling Merchant Rose
column3: Lapor ke Traveling Merchant Rose

column2: You have defeated all attacking demons and Cassias will be safe back at the Herb Gatherers' Cabin. Return to the Herb Gatherers' Cabin and talk to Traveling Merchant Rose.
column3: Kamu telah mengalahkan semua demon yang menyerang dan Cassias akan aman di Herb Gatherers' Cabin. Kembali ke Herb Gatherers' Cabin dan bicara dengan Traveling Merchant Rose.

column2: Talk to Traveling Merchant Andres
column3: Bicara dengan Traveling Merchant Andres

column2: Traveling Merchant Andres looks extremely restless. Talk to Traveling Merchant Andres.
column3: Traveling Merchant Andres terlihat sangat gelisah. Bicara dengan Traveling Merchant Andres.

column2: Look for the Lost Package
column3: Mencari paket yang hilang

column2: Andres says he invested everything in his goods, but now they are lost. Look for Andres' goods at the Doholle Rest Place.
column3: Andres berkata telah menginvestasikan semua nya pada barang-barangnya, tapi sekarang semua menghilang. Cari Andres' goods di Doholle Rest Place.

column2: Deliver to Traveling Merchant Andres
column3: Antarkan kepada Traveling Merchant Andres

column2: You have found Traveling Merchant Andres' objects. Bring them back to Andres.
column3: Kamu telah menemukan Traveling Merchant Andres' objects. Bawa kembali ke Andres.

column2: Talk to Traveling Merchant Gomez
column3: Bicara kepada Traveling Merchant Gomez

column2: Traveling Merchant Gomez seems anxious. Go and talk to him.
column3: Traveling Merchant Gomez tampaknya cemas. Pergi dan bicara pada nya.

column2: Defeat the monsters nearby Herb Gatherers' Cabin
column3: Kalahkan monster disekitar Herb Gatherers' Cabin

column2: Traveling Merchant Gomez is frightened by all the demons and monsters running wild. Defeat some monsters around the Herb Gatherers' Cabin to ease Gomez' anxiety.
column3: Traveling Merchant Gomez ketakutan dengan ada nya demon dan monster yang berlarian. Kalahkan beberapa monster disekitar Herb Gatherers' Cabin untuk mengurangi kecemasan Gomez.

column2: Report to Traveling Merchant Gomez
column3: Lapor ke  Traveling Merchant Gomez

column2: The area around the Herb Gatherers' Cabin is safer now. Go and reassure Traveling Merchant Gomez.
column3: Area disekitar Herb Gatherers' Cabin sudah aman. Pergi dan yakinkan Traveling Merchant Gomez.

column2: Defeat the monsters nearby Herb Gatherers' Cabin
column3: Kalahkan monster di sekitar Herb Gatherers' Cabin

column2: Injured Herbalist
column3: Herbalist yang terluka

column2: Herbalist Tales is injured and collapsed onto the ground. Ask him if he is alright.
column3: Herbalist Tales terluka dan jatuh ke tanah. Tanyakan apakah dia baik-baik saja.

column2: Collect Ronjia Grass at Nevaginga Hillside
column3: Kumpulkan Ronjia Grass di Nevaginga Hillside

column2: Herbalist Tales requested you get some Ronjia Grass to use as a painkiller. Go to Nevaginga Hillside and collect Ronjia Grass.
column3: Herbalist Tales memintamu mencari Ronjia Grass untuk digunakan sebagai pereda rasa sakit. Pergi ke Nevaginga Hillside dan kumpulkan collect Ronjia Grass.

column2: Deliver to Herbalist Tales
column3: Antarkan ke Herbalist Tales

column2: You have collected enough Ronjia Grass. Deliver it to Herbalist Tales.
column3: Kamu telah cukup mengumpulkan Ronjia Grass. Antarkan ke Herbalist Tales.

column2: Herbalist Tales' injury doesn't seem to have gotten any better with just the Ronjia Grass. Talk to Tales again.
column3: Luka Herbalist Tales tampaknya tidak membaik hanya dengan Ronjia Grass. Bicara dengan Tales kembali.

column2: Tell the Cleric Master in Orsha about Herbalist Tales' symptoms
column3: Beritahu Cleric Master di Orsha mengenai gejala Herbalist Tales

column2: Herbalist Tales thinks the Cleric Submaster might know of a way to heal their injuries. Go see the Cleric Submaster in Orsha and tell them about Herbalist Tales' symptoms.
column3: Herbalist Tales berpikir bahwa Cleric Submaster mungkin tahu caranya menyembuhkan luka-luka mereka. Pergi temui Cleric Submaster di Orsha dan katakana pada mereka tentang gejala Herbalist Tales.

column2: The Cleric Submaster believes Herbalist Tales might have been taken by evil energy. Ask the Cleric Submaster about what to do.
column3: Cleric Submaster percaya bahwa Herbalist Tales mungkin telah dibawa pergi oleh Evil Energy. Tanyakan kepada Cleric Submaster tentang apa yang harus dilakukan.

column2: Deliver the medicine to Herbalist Tales
column3: Antarkan obat ini kepada Herbalist Tales

column2: The Cleric Submaster gave you a medicine that can purify evil energy. Deliver the medicine to Herbalist Tales.
column3: Cleric Submaster memberimu obat yang dapat memurnikan Evil Energy. Antarkan obat ini kepada Herbalist Tales.

column2: Where Did Everybody Go?
column3: Kemana para warga desa?

column2: Follow Traveling Merchant Rose to Knidos Jungle
column3: Ikuti Traveling Merchant Rose ke Knidos Jungle

column2: Rose wants to find the people of her village even if she has to do it alone, so she ran to Knidos Jungle. It's dangerous for her to go alone; follow her into the jungle.
column3: Rose ingin menemukan orang-orang dari desanya bahkan jika dia harus melakukannya sendiri, jadi dia berlari ke Knidos Jungle. Berbaya untuk nya pergi sendiri ; Ikuti dia ke jungle.

column2: Search in Croa Village to find out what happened
column3: Selidiki ke Croa Village untuk mencaritau apa yang terjadi

column2: Like Rose said, the residents of the Croa Village are nowhere to be seen. Search the village and find out what happened.
column3: Sperti yang dikatakan Rose, warga Croa Village tidak terlihat. Cari penduduk desa dan temukan apa yang terjadi.

column2: They can't have moved, or there wouldn't be any household items left behind, and it wasn't an attack as there aren't any sings of struggle, only traces of something being dragged. Tell Rose.
column3: Mereka tidak pindah, tidak ada barang yang tertinggal, dan ini bukan penyerangan karena tidak ada tanda-tanda perlawanan, hanya jejak sesuatu yang diseret. Beritahu Rose.

column2: Rose looks discouraged, but she seems to have found something. Talk to Traveling Merchant Rose again.
column3: Rose tampak kecewa, tapi tampak nya menemukan sesuatu. Bicara kepada Traveling Merchant Rose.

column2: Follow the beads on the ground
column3: Ikuti beads di tanah

column2: Rose says the beads belong to someone in the village called Anne, and that she would never leave them behind. It could be a lead; follow the trail beads on the ground.
column3: Rose berkata beads itu milik seseorang di desa bernama Anne, dan karena itu dia tidak ingin meningglkan nya. Itu mungkin petunjuk; ikuti jejak beads di tanah.

column2: The trail of beads ends here. Ask Traveling Merchant Rose what to do next.
column3: Jejak beads berakhir disini. Tanyakan Traveling Merchant Rose apa selanjut nya.

column2: Look for more beads or other clues
column3: Coba cari beads atau petunjuk lain nya

column2: Traveling Merchant Rose believes there might be other beads nearby. Look around and search for more beads or other clues.
column3: Traveling Merchant Rose percaya mungkin ada beberapa beads disekitar. Lihat sekeliling dan cari beads atau petunjuk lain.

column2: Talk to the person who is hiding
column3: Bicara dengan seseorang yang sedang bersembunyi

column2: You have found someone hiding. They could be a village resident; try and talk to them.
column3: Kamu menemukan seseorang yang bersembunyi. Mungkin mereka warga desa; coba bicara pada nya.

column2: Talk to Tess
column3: Bicara dengan Tess

column2: Tess is terrified because of the demons. Try and talk to her first.
column3: Tess ketakutan karena demon. Coba berbicara dengan nya dahulu.

column2: Tess was being chased by demons. Defeat the demons that chased her.
column3: Tess sedang dikejar oleh demon. Kalahkan demon yang mengejar nya.

column2: Return to to Tess and talk to her
column3: Kembali ke Tess dan bicara dengan nya

column2: You have defeated the demons that chased Tess. Go tell Rose and Tess that they are safe now.
column3: Kamu telah mengalahkan demon yang mengejar Tess. Pergi beritahu Rose dan Tess bahwa mereka sudah aman sekarang.

column2: Defeat the demons chasing Tess
column3: Kalahkan demon yang mengejar Tess

column2: Tess seems to be a resident of the Croa Village. Talk to her to find out what happened back at the village.
column3: Tampak nya Tess merupakan penduduk dari Croa Village. Bicara padanya untuk mencari tau apa yang terjadi di desa.

column2: It seems the people of the Croa Village were taken by demons and dragged to the Novaha Monastery. Rose's brother was apparently taken to a different location. Talk to Rose.
column3: Tampak nya penduduk Croa Village telah di culik oleh demon dan diseret ke Novaha Monastery. Tampak nya saudara dari Rose dibawa ke lokasi yang berbeda . Bicara dengan Rose.

column2: Herbalist Ash is panting hard, talk to him
column3: Herbalist Ash terengah-engah, bicara pada nya

column2: Defeat nearby demons
column3: Kalahkan demon disekitar

column2: Herbalist Ash wants to go back to Orsha but is scared of all the demons around. Defeat some demons nearby for Herbalist Ash.
column3: Herbalist Ash ingin kembali ke Orsha tetapi takut dengan demon disekitar. Kalahkan demon disekitar untuk Herbalist Ash.

column2: You have defeated some demons nearby. Return to Herbalist Ash.
column3: Kamu telah mengalahkan beberapa demon disekitar. Kembali ke Herbalist Ash.

column2: Demon Herbalist
column3: Demon Herbalist

column2: Herbalist Ash seems to be worried about something. Ask him what is wrong.
column3: Tampak nya Herbalist Ash sedang cemas mengenai sesuatu. Tanyakan dia apa yang salah.

column2: Collect the same herbs as the demon
column3: Kumpulkan herbs yang sama dengan dikumpulkan demon

column2: Herbalist Ash says they saw an unusual sight: a demon collecting herbs. They want to know what those herbs were. Go to Neneva Yard and collect a type of herb with small, thin leaves.
column3: Herbalist Ash berkata dia melihat tanda yang tidak biasa: demon mengumpulkan herbs. Mereka ingin tau herbs apa yang dikumpulkan. Pergi ke Neneva Yard dan kumpulkan herb dengan spek kecil serta daun yang tipis.

column2: Deliver to Herbalist Ash
column3: Antarkan ke Herbalist Ash

column2: You have found the herbs collected by the demon. Show them to Herbalist Ash.
column3: Kamu telah menemukan herbs yang dikumpulkan olej demon. Tunjukan ke Herbalist Ash.

column2: Herbalist Ash's face froze after realizing the herbs collected by the demon were Aconite, a deadly poisonous type of herb. Talk to Herbalist Ash again.
column3: Herbalist Ash terkejut setelah sadar bahwa herbs yang dikumpulkan demon adalah Aconite, herb yang beracun. Bicara dengan Herbalist Ash lagi.

column2: Collect Loktanun Fluid
column3: Kumpulkan Loktanun Fluid

column2: Herbalist Ash wants to dry out all the Aconite to prevent the demons from using it. First, catch some Loktanuns and collect their acidic fluid.
column3: Herbalist Ash ingin mengeringkan semua Aconite untuk mencegah demon untuk menggunakan nya. Pertama, tangkap Loktanuns dan kumpulkan acidic fluid dari nya.

column2: You have collected enough Loktanun Fluid. Return to Herbalist Ash.
column3: Kamu telah cukup mengumpulkan Luktanun Fluid. Kembali ke Herbalist Ash.

column2: You have collected enough Loktanun Fluid to dry out the Aconite. Talk to Herbalist Ash again.
column3: Kamu telah cukup mengumpulkan Luktanun Fluid untuk mengeringkan Aconite. Bicara dengan Herbalist Ash lagi.

column2: Spray the Loktanun Fluid on the Aconite
column3: Semprotkan Luktanun Fluid ke Aconite

column2: Spraying the Loktanun Fluid on the Aconite should dry it out. Go to Neneva Yard and spray the Aconite with the collected Loktanun fluid.
column3: Menyemprot Luktanun Fluid pada Aconite akan membuat nya mengering. Pergi ke Neneva Yard dan semprotkan Aconite dengan Luktanun fluid yang telah dikumpulkan.

column2: All the Aconite in sight seems to have been sprayed. Report to Herbalist Ash.
column3: Semua Aconite terlihat telah di semprot. Laporkan ke Herbalist Ash.

column2: Giant Bracken
column3: Giant Bracken

column2: Follow Traveling Merchant Rose to Dadan Jungle
column3: Ikuti Traveling Merchant Rose ke Dadan Jungle

column2: Rose ran off to save the people of the Croa Village. Follow her into Dadan Jungle.
column3: Rose berlari menyelamatkan orang-orang dari Croa Village. Ikuti dia ke Dadan Jungle.

column2: Find the demon laboratory and defeat the demons there
column3: Cari demon laboratory dan kalahkan mereka disana

column2: Traveling Merchant Rose saw a giant bracken attached to a device and thinks there might be a laboratory nearby. Find the demon laboratory and defeat the demons there.
column3: Traveling Merchant Rose melihat giant bracken terlampir kedalam alat dan berpikir mungkin ada laboratorium di dekat sana. Temukan demon laboratory dan kalahkan para demon disana.

column2: Search for materials on the Giant Bracken
column3: Carilah material pada Giant Bracken

column2: This laboratory seems to be related to the giant bracken. Look around and try to find any materials that might be related to it.
column3: Laboratorium ini tampaknya berhubungan dengan Giant Bracken. Lihat sekitar dan cobalah temukan material apapun yang mungkin berhubungan dengan ini.

column2: Deliver the diary to Traveling Merchant Rose
column3: Antarkan the diary kepada Traveling Merchant Rose

column2: You have found a diary related to the giant bracken experiment. Give it to Rose.
column3: Kamu telah menemukan diary yang berhubungan dengan Giant Bracken Experiment. Berikan itu kepada Rose.

column2: Return to Rose and deliver the diary
column3: Kembali kepada Rose and antarkan the diary

column2: Rescue Traveling Merchant Rose
column3: Selamatkan Traveling Merchant Rose

column2: Rose was captured by demons and an unknown wizard. Rescue Traveling Merchant Rose.
column3: Rose telah tertangkap oleh para demon dan Unknown Wizard. Selamatkan Traveling Merchant Rose.

column2: You have rescued Rose. Talk to her and see if she is alright.
column3: Kamu telah menyelamatkan Rose. Bicara padanya dan lihat apakah dia baik-baik saja.

column2: Defeat the demons that tried to kidnap Rose
column3: Kalahkan para demon yang mencoba menculik Rose

column2: Traveling Merchant Rose seems to be alright now. Talk to her and figure out what to do next.
column3: Traveling Merchant Rose tampaknya baik-baik saja sekarang. Bicara padanya dan cari tahu apa yang harus dilanjutkan selanjutnya.

column2: Find the Power Supply Device and remove the power source
column3: Temukan Power Supply Device dan lepaskan power source

column2: In order to turn off the giant bracken device it's power source needs to be removed. Use the monsters to stop the freezing magic circles and remove the power source.
column3: Untuk mematikan giant bracken device, power source nya perlu untuk di lepaskan. Gunakan para monster untuk menghentikan freezing magic circles dan lepaskan power source.

column2: You have removed the power source of the experiment device. Tell Rose about it.
column3: Kamu telah melepaskan power source dari experiment device. Beritahu Rose tentang ini.

column2: Follow Traveling Merchant Rose to the entrance of the Novaha Monastery
column3: Ikuti Traveling Merchant Rose ke pintu masuk Novaha Monastery

column2: The device attached to the giant bracken seems to be out of the way now. Meet Rose at the Novaha Monastery Entrance.
column3: Device yang melekat pada Giant Bracken tampaknya telah keluar dari jalur sekarang. Temui Rose di Novaha Monastery Entrance.

column2: Defeat the sentinel demons
column3: Kalahkan sentinel demon

column2: Traveling Merchant Rose says there are demons guarding the entrance to the Novaha Monastery. Defeat the sentinel demons.
column3: Traveling Merchant Rose mengatakan ada para demon yang menjaga pintu masuk Novaha Monastery. Kalahkan the sentinel demon.

column2: You have defeated all the demons at the entrance to the monastery. Talk to Rose.
column3: Kamu telah mengalahkan semua demon di pintu masuk Monastery. Bicara dengan Rose.

column2: Defeat the Gremlin guarding the monastery entrance
column3: Kalahkan Gremlin yang menjaga pintu masuk Monastery

column2: Talk to Herbalist Talas
column3: Bicara kepada Herbalist Talas

column2: Herbalist Talas is caught in a trap! Go talk to Herbalist Talas immediately.
column3: Herbalist Talas terjebak dalam perangkap! Pergi bicara kepada Herbalist Talas segera.

column2: Free Herbalist Talas from the trap
column3: Bebaskan Herbalist Talas dari perangkap

column2: Herbalist Talas seems to have gotten caught in the trap while running away from demons. Release Talas from the trap.
column3: Herbalist Talas tampaknya telah terjebak dalam perangkap ketika melarikan diri dari para demon. Bebaskan Talas dari perangkap.

column2: You have removed the trap. Ask Herbalist Talas if he is alright.
column3: Kamu telah melepaskan perangkap. Tanyakan Herbalist Talas apakah dia baik-baik saja.

column2: Demon Cauldron
column3: Demon Cauldrons

column2: Herbalist Talas seems to be fine, fortunately. Ask Talas exactly what happened to him.
column3: Herbalist Talas tampaknya baik-baik saja, untungnya. Tanyakan Talas dengan pasti apa yang terjadi padanya.

column2: Remove the Protective Barrier around the Demon Cauldrons
column3: Lepaskan Protective Barrier di sekitar Demon Cauldrons

column2: Herbalist Talas saw the demons add a type of a poisonous plant to the cauldrons and tried to destroy them. Go to Ruivara Field and remove the demon cauldrons' protective barrier.
column3: Herbalist Talas melihat para demon menambahkan tipe tanaman beracun ke Cauldrons dan mencoba untuk menghancurkan mereka. Pergi ke Ruivara Field dan lepaskan Demon Cauldrons' Protective Barrier.

column2: Destroy the Demon Cauldrons
column3: Habcurkan Demon Cauldrons

column2: You have turned off all the protection shield creation devices. Destroy the cauldrons.
column3: Kamu telah mematikan Protection Shield Creation Devices. Hancurkan Cauldrons.

column2: You have destroyed all the cauldrons. Go back to Herbalist Talas.
column3: Kamu telah menghancurkan semua Cauldrons. Kembali kepada Herbalist Talas.

column2: It looks like Herbalist Talas still has something to say. Keep talking to Talas.
column3: Sepertinya Herbalist Talas masih memiliki sesuatu untuk dikatakan. Terus bicara kepada Talas.

column2: Set the boxes on fire with the Poisonous Herbs
column3: Letakkan kotak diatas api dengan daun beracun.

column2: Herbalist Talas wants to burn the demons' materials to prevent them from restarting their operation. Go to the Saloto Lowland and burn down the demons' boxes of poisonous herbs.
column3: Herbalist Talas ingin membakar material para demon untuk mencegah mereka memulai ulang operasi mereka. Pergi ke Saloto Lowland dan bakar semua boxes of poisonous herbs milik para demon

column2: Report to Herbalist Talas
column3: Laporkan ke Herbalist Talas

column2: You have burned down all the boxes with poisonous herbs. Return to Talas.
column3: Kamu telah membakar semua box dengan poisonous herbs. Kembali ke Talas.

column2: The Rescue
column3: Selamatkan

column2: Follow Rose into the Novaha Monastery
column3: Ikuti Rose ke Novaha Monastery

column2: The demons guarding the entrance to the monastery have been defeated. Follow Rose inside the Novaha Monastery.
column3: Demon yang menjaga pintu masuk monastery telah dikalahkan. Ikuti Rose ke dalam Novaha Monastery.

column2: Talk to the people of the Croa Village
column3: Bicara dengan penduduk Croa Village

column2: The residents of the Croa Village seem to be locked inside the Special Reading Room. Ask the residents if they know a solution.
column3: Penduduk Croa Village tampaknya terkunci dalam Special Reading Room. Tanya penduduk apakah mereka punya solusi.

column2: The village residents say the Novaha Monastery monks might know a way, but they saw one of them being dragged by demons earlier. Relay this information to Rose.
column3: Para penduduk Novaha Monastery berkata mungkin monks mengetahui jalannya, namun penduduk melihat salah satu dari mereka di tarik oleh demon sebelum nya. Sampaikan informasi ini kepada Rose.

column2: Rescue Monk Goss at the Ankel Small Corridor
column3: Selamatkan Monk Goss di Ankel Small Corridor

column2: Traveling Merchant Rose thinks it's best to rescue Monk Goss as the residents suggested. Head to the Ankel Small Corridor and rescue Monk Goss!
column3: Traveling Merchant Rose berpikir sebaiknya menyelamatkan Monk Goss seperti yang disarankan oleh penduduk. Pergi ke Ankel Small Corridor dan selamatkan Monk Goss!

column2: You have rescued Monk Goss. Check whether he is alright and ask him if he knows of a way to open the door to the Special Reading Room.
column3: Kamu telah menyelematkan Monk Goss. Periksa apakah dia baik-baik saja dan tanya apakah dia tau cara membuka pintu ke Special Reading Room.

column2: Monk Goss seems to have found a way to open the door. Talk to Monk Goss.
column3: Tampak nya Monk Goss telah menemukan cara untuk membuka pintu. Bicara dengan Monk Goss.

column2: Obtain Green Apparition Essence
column3: Dapatkan Green Apparition Essence

column2: Monk Goss says the demons have created a magic circle which can only be opened by proving that you are a demon. This should be possible with some Green Apparition Essence.
column3: Monk Goss berkata demon telah membuat magic circle yang bisa dibuka jika kamu bisa membuktikan bahwa kamu adalah demon. Ini bisa dilakukan dengan Green Apparition Essence.

column2: Deliver to Monk Goss
column3: Berikan ke Monk Goss

column2: You have collected enough Green Apparition Essences to use on the magic circle. Give it to Monk Goss.
column3: Kamu telah mengumpulkan cukup Green Apparition Essences untuk digunakan pada Magic Circle. Berikan kepada Monk Goss.

column2: Collect %s to prove that you are a demon
column3: Kumpulkan %s untuk membuktikan bahwa kamu adalah demon.

column2: You have collected some Green Apparition Essences to prove that you are a demon. Ask Monk Goss about what to do next.
column3: Kamu telah mengumpulkan sejumlah Green Apparition Essences untuk membuktikan bahwa kamu adalah demon. Tanyakan Monk Goss tentang apa yang harus dilakukan selanjutnya.

column2: Protect Monk Goss until the door to the Special Reading Room is open
column3: Lindungi Monk Goss sampai pintu menuju Special Reading Room terbuka.

column2: Monk Goss says opening the door is easy, although it does take some time. Protect Monk Goss while he opens the door to the Special Reading Room.
column3: Monk Goss bilang membuka pintu adalah hal yang mudah, walaupun membutuhkan sedikit waktu. Lindungi Monk Goss ketika dia membuka pintu menuju Special Reading Room.

column2: The door to the Special Reading Room is open! Talk to Monk Goss.
column3: Pintu menuju Special Reading Room telah terbuka! Bicara kepada Monk Goss.

column2: The door to the Special Reading Room is finally open. Talk to Traveling Merchant Rose.
column3: Pintu menuju Special Reading Room akhirnya terbuka. Bicara dengan Traveling Merchant Rose.

column2: Traveling Merchant Rose thinks it's best for the village residents to run away immediately. Help the people escape to safety.
column3: Traveling Merchant Rose menganggap yang terbaik bagi penduduk desa adalah melarikan diri segera. Bantu orang-orang untuk melarikan diri dengan aman.

column2: Talk to Rose at the Novaha Monastery entrance
column3: Bicara kepada Rose di Novaha Monastery entrance

column2: Traveling Merchant Rose successfully helped the people of the Croa Village escape to safety. Talk to Traveling Merchant Rose.
column3: Traveling Merchant Rose berhasil membantu orang-orang dari Croa Village melarikan diri dengan aman. Bicara kepada Traveling Merchant Rose.

column2: Defeat the attacking Mummyghast
column3: Kalahkan Mummyghast yang menyerang

column2: Exhausted
column3: Exhausted

column2: Talk to Experiment Victim Tilis
column3: Bicara kepada Experiment Victim Tilis

column2: Experiment Victim Tilis seems to be in terrible condition. Ask Tilis if there is anything you can help with.
column3: Experiment Victim Tilis tampak nya dalam keadaan buruk. Tanyakan Tilis apakah ada hal yang bisa kamu bantu.

column2: Give a Stamina Recovery Potion
column3: Berikan Stamina Recovery Potion

column2: Tilis was a victim of terrible experiments and their body is in poor condition. Give a stamina recovery potion to Experiment Victim Tilis.
column3: Tilis merupakan korban dari experimen yang menakutkan dan kondisi badan nya memprihatinkan. Berikan stamina recovery potion ke Experiment Victim Tilis.

column2: Experiment Victim Tilis seems to have recovered a little. Talk to Experiment Victim Tilis.
column3: Experiment Victim Tilis nampaknya telah sedikit membaik. Bicara kepada Experiment Victim Tilis.

column2: Talk to Experiment Victim Tilis
column3: Bicara dengan Experiment Victim Tilis

column2: Experiment Victim Tilis seems to feel a little better after taking the potion. Talk to Experiment Victim Tilis.
column3: Experiment Victim Tilis tampak nya sedikit membaik setelah meminum potion. Bicara dengan Experiment Victim Tilis.

column2: Experiment Victim Tilis wants you to help them escape the monastery. Defeat any demons nearby.
column3: Experiment Victim Tilis memintamu membantu mereka untuk melarikan diri dari monastery. Kalahkan monster sekitar.

column2: Report to Experiment Victim Tilis
column3: Lapor ke Experiment Victim Tilis

column2: The surrounding areas seem safer now. Go and tell Experiment Victim Tilis about it.
column3: Area sekitar tampak lebih aman sekarang. Pergi dan beritahu Experiment Victim Tilis mengenai ini.

column2: Defeat the demons nearby
column3: Kalahkan demon disekitar

column2: Talk to Experiment Victim Fils
column3: Bicara dengan Experiment Victim Fils

column2: Experiment Victim Fils has collapsed on the ground inside the monastery. Ask Fils if he is alright and talk to him.
column3: Experiment Victim Fils telah runtuh di tanah dalam monastery. Tanyakan Fils apakah dia baik-baik saja dan bicara padanya.

column2: Collect Experiment Victims' Relic
column3: Kumpulkan Experiment Victims' Relic

column2: Experiment Victim Fils wants you to find the relics that belonged to the experiment victims who died. Go to the Raundona Circle Hall and collect the people's relics.
column3: Experiment Victim Fils ingin kamu menemukan peninggalan milik korban eksperiment yang mati. Pergi ke Raundona Circle Hall dan kumpulkan peninggalan orang-orang.

column2: Deliver to Experiment Victim Fils
column3: Antarkan ke Experiment Victim Fils

column2: You seem to have found all of the people's relics. Bring them to Fils.
column3: Kamu tampaknya telah menemukan semua peninggalan orang-orang. Bawakan itu kepada Fils.

column2: Rescue Edmundas
column3: Selamatkan Edmundas

column2: Follow Traveling Merchant Rose to the Novaha Annex
column3: Ikuti Traveling Merchant Rose ke Novaha Annex

column2: Now that the people of the Croa Village are safe, go and rescue Rose's brother. Follow Rose into the Novaha Annex and talk to her.
column3: Sekarang orang-orang dari Croa Village telah aman, pergi dan selamatkan saudara laki-laki Rose. Ikuti Rose kedalam Novaha Annex dan bicara padanya.

column2: Search for Rose's brother, Edmundas
column3: Cari saudara dari Rose, Edmundas

column2: Traveling Merchant Rose went into hiding as the demons are after her. Search for the place where her brother Edmundas is being held captive in the Novaha Annex.
column3: Traveling Merchant Rose bersembunyi karena para demon mengejarnya. Carilah tempat dimana saudaranya Edmundas ditahan di Novaha Annex.

column2: Rose's brother Edmundas is being held captive in the Apega State Chamber. Go back to Traveling Merchant Rose and tell her.
column3: Saudara Rose Edmundas sedang ditahan di Apega State Chamber. Kembali kepada Traveling Merchant Rose dan katakan padanya.

column2: Follow Rose into the Apega State Chamber
column3: Ikuti Rose ke Apega State Chamber

column2: Traveling Merchant Rose ran into the Apega State Chamber where her brother is being held captive. Talk to her inside the chamber.
column3: Traveling Merchant Rose berlari ke Apega State Chamber dimana saudaranya sedang ditahan. Bicara kepadanya didalam the chamber.

column2: Eliminate the cause of Edmundas' pain
column3: Hilangkan penyebab sakit nya Edmundas

column2: Edmundas says a wizard came into the room, causing him to feel pain all of a sudden. Go to the inner section of the Apega State Chamber and destroy the thing that's hurting Edmundas.
column3: Edmundas mengatakan wizard datang kedalam ruangan, menyebabkannya merasa kesakitan secara tiba-tiba. Pergi ke bagian dalam Apega State Chamber dan hancurkan sesuatu yang menyakiti Edmundas.

column2: You have destroyed all crystal pillars. Go back to Traveling Merchant Rose.
column3: Kamu telah menghancurkan semua crystal pillars. Kembali ke Traveling Merchant Rose.

column2: Edmundas is going to be fine now. Go and talk to Traveling Merchant Rose again.
column3: Edmundas berangsur membaik. Pergi dan bicara pada Traveling Merchant Rose lagi.

column2: Destroy the Mysterious Wizard's Magic Stone of Pain
column3: Hancurkan Mysterious Wizard's Magic Stone of Pain

column2: As you were about to destroy the protective barrier around Edmundas, a mysterious wizard appeared and kidnapped Rose! Hurry and destroy the wizard's Magic Stone of Pain!
column3: Ketika kamu hendak menghancurkan protective barrier disekitar Edmundas, wizard misterius muncul dan menculik Rose! Cepat hancurkan Wizard's Magic Stone of Pain!

column2: You have managed to rescue Edmundas, but Rose was taken away by the mysterious wizard. Talk to Edmundas to figure out what to do next.
column3: Kamu telah berhasil menyelamatkan Edmundas, tetapi Rose telah dibawa pergi oleh Mysterious Wizard. Bicara kepada Edmundas untuk mencari tahu apa yang harus dilakukan selanjutnya.

column2: Losing Rose has Edmundas devastated. Talk to him and find out a way to rescue Rose.
column3: Kehilangan Rose telah membuat Edmundas hancur. Bicara padanya dan cari tahu cara untuk menyelamatkan Rose.

column2: Find a way to release Edmundas from the shackles
column3: Temukan cara untuk melepaskan Edmundas dari belenggu.

column2: Find a way to release Edmundas from the shackles in the State Chamber.
column3: Temukan cara untuk melepaskan Edmundas dari belenggu di dalam State Chamber.

column2: Edmundas is free from the shackles now. Go back to Edmundas.
column3: Edmundas telah bebas dari belenggu sekarang. Kembali kepada Edmundas.

column2: The Experiment
column3: Experiment

column2: Talk to Experiment Victim Hilbeth
column3: Bicara dengan Experiment Victim Hilbeth

column2: Experiment Victim Hilbeth is asking for help. Ask him what is wrong.
column3: Experiment Victim Hilbeth meminta bantuan. Tanyapan apa yang terjadi.

column2: Search for Hilbeth's Backpack
column3: Cari Hilbeth's Backpack

column2: Experiment Victim Hilbeth wants you to find his backpack of herbs. Go to the Tebeti Small Corridor and look for Hilbeth's backpack.
column3: Experiment Victim Hilbeth memintamu mencarikan backpack of herbs milik nya. Pergi ke Tebeti Small Corridor dan cari Hilbeth's backpack.

column2: Deliver to Experiment Victim Hilbeth
column3: Antarkan ke Experiment Victim Hilbeth

column2: You have found Hilbeth's Backpack. Give it back to Experiment Victim Hilbeth.
column3: Kamu telah menemukan Hilbeth's Backpack. Berikan ke Experiment Victim Hilbeth.

column2: Experiment Victim Hilbeth took the herbs in the backpack and seems to be feeling better now. Talk to Experiment Victim Hilbeth.
column3: Experiment Victim Hilbeth mengambil herbs dalam backpack dan tampaknya semakin membaik. Bicara dengan Experiment Victim Hilbeth.

column2: Search the Collapsed Grand Corridor
column3: Cari Collapsed Grand Corridor

column2: Hilbeth's family are being victims of demon experiments at the Collapsed Grand Corridor and need to be rescued. Go there and investigate.
column3: Hilbeth's family merupakan korban dari demon experiments di Collapsed Grand Corridor dan harus di selamatkan. Pergi kesana untuk investigasi.

column2: All you could gather were some objects found in a strange pile of bracken. Relay this to Experiment Victim Hilbeth.
column3: Semua yang kamu bisa kumpulkan adalah beberapa objek yang ditemukan di dalam Strange Pile of Bracken. Sampaikan kepada Experiment Victim Hilbeth.

column2: The objects you found at the Collapsed Grand Corridor were Hilbeth's family's belongings. Offer Hilbeth some words of comfort.
column3: Objek yang kamu temuka di Collapsed Grand Corridor adalah barang-barang milik keluarga Hillbeth. Berikan beberapa kata untuk menghibur Hillbeth.

column2: Destroy the remaining experiment facilities at the Errzze Oratorium
column3: Hancurkan fasilitas experimen yang tersisa di Errzze Oratorium

column2: Experiment Victim Hilbeth wants to stop any kind of experiment from happening again. As requested, destroy the remaining demon experiment facilities at the Errzze Oratorium.
column3: Experiment Victim Hillbeth ingin menghentikan segala jenis experiment terjadi kembali. Seperti yang diminta, hancurkan demon experiment facilities yang tersisa di Errzze Oratorium.

column2: You have destroyed all experiment facilities. Go and talk to Experiment Victim Hilbeth.
column3: kamu telah menghancurkan semua fasilitas experimen. Pergi dan bicara dengan Experiment Victim Hilbeth.

column2: A Monk's Last Mission
column3: The Monk's Last Mission

column2: Talk to Monk Abels
column3: Bicara dengan Monk Abels

column2: Monk Abels' condition is visibly deteriorated. Talk to Monk Abels.
column3: Kondisi Monk Abels tampak memburuk. Bicara kepada Monk Abels.

column2: Retrieve Holy Relic Fragments at Gaile Chapel
column3: Ambil Holy Relic Fragments di Gaile Chapel

column2: Monk Abels cannot turn a blind eye to the damage the demons have done. Go to Gaile Chapel and retrieve the holy relic fragments needed to purify the monastery.
column3: Monk Abels tidak dapat menutup mata terhadap kerusakan yang telah diperbuat oleh para demon. Pergi ke Gaile Chapel dan ambil Holy Relic Fragments yang dibutuhkan untuk memurnikan monastery.

column2: Deliver to Monk Abels
column3: Antarkan kepada Monk Abels

column2: You have collected as many holy relic fragments as possible. Bring them to Monk Abels.
column3: Kamu telah mengumpulkan Holy Relic Fragments sebanyak yang kamu bisa. Bawakan itu kepada Monk Abels.

column2: Monk Abels' condition is worsening. Listen to what Abels has to say.
column3: Kondisi Monk Abels memburuk. Dengarkan apa yang dikatakan oleh Abels.

column2: Prepare the relic for purifying the monastery
column3: Siapkan the relic untuk memurnikan Monastery

column2: Monk Abels put his last efforts into restoring the holy relic. Use the relic to purify different locations in the monastery.
column3: Monk Abels mengeluarkan upaya terakhirnya untuk memulihkan Holy Relic. Gunakan the relic untuk memurnikan tempat yang berbeda di dalam Monastery.

column2: Report to Monk Abels
column3: Laporkan kepada Monk Abels

column2: You have completed the purifying process. Go and look after Monk Abels in his last moments.
column3: Kamu telah selesai dalam proses pemurnian. Pergi dan lihat Monk Abels di saat-saat terakhirnya.

column2: Rescue Rose
column3: Selamatkan Rose

column2: Follow Edmundas Into the Novaha Institute to rescue Rose
column3: Ikuti Edmundas kedalam Novaha Institute untuk menyelamatkan Rose

column2: Edmundas ran inside the Novaha Institute to save Rose, asking you to help rescue her. To help Edmundas save Rose, follow him inside the institute and talk to him.
column3: Edmundas berlari kedalam Novaha Institute untuk menyelamatkan Rose, memintamu untuk membantu menyelamatkannya. Untuk membantu Edmundas menyelamatkan Rose, ikuti dia masuk ke institute dan bicara padanya.

column2: Find Black Materials to overload the device
column3: Temukan Black Objects untuk melewati batas kekuatan device

column2: Edmundas wants to try and overload the device, but he is not sure what to use for that. For now, try and defeat Brown Hummingbirds and collect any black objects you can obtain, then bring them to Edmundas.
column3: Edmundas ingin mencoba dan melebihi batas the device, tetapi dia tidak yakin apa yang harus digunakan untuk itu. Untuk sekarang, coba kalahkan Brown Hummingbirds dan kumpulkan Black Objects yang dapat kamu peroleh, lalu bawakan itu kepada Edmundas.

column2: The black substance the wizard used on the device was Brown Hummingbird mucus. Talk to Edmundas again.
column3: Black Substance yang digunakan wizard pada the device adalah Brown Hummingbird mucus. Bicara kembali kepada Edmundas.

column2: Collect Brown Hummingbird Mucus
column3: Kumpulkan Brown Hummingbird Mucus

column2: To bring Rose back to safety you need to overload the device and destroy it. Collect as much Brown Hummingbird mucus as you can.
column3: Untuk membawa Rose kembali aman kamu perlu untuk melebihi batas kekuatan device dan menghancurkannya. Kumpulkan Brown Hummingbirds Mucus sebanyak yang kamu bisa.

column2: Deliver to Edmundas
column3: Antarkan ke Edmundas

column2: You have collected enough Brown Hummingbird Mucus. Bring it back to Edmundas.
column3: Kamu telah cekup mengumpulkan Brown Hummingbird mucus. Bawa ke Edmundas.

column2: Defeat Brown Hummingbirds to acquire mucus
column3: Kalahkan Brown Hummingbirds untuk mendapatkan mucus

column2: Talk to Edmundas in the Main Hall Atrium
column3: Bicara dengan Edmundas di Main Hall Atrium

column2: Edmundas says the next device is in the Main Hall Atrium. Follow Edmundas into the Main Hall Atrium.
column3: Edmundas berkata device selanjutnya ada di Main Hall Atrium. Ikuti Edmundas ke dalam Main Hall Atrium.

column2: Destroy the Mind Control Crystals
column3: Hancurkan Mind Control Crystals

column2: Rose could be under the influence of the Mind Control Crystals. Obtain the protective barrier from the device inside the Main Hall Atrium and destroy the crystal.
column3: Rose dapat berada dibawah pengaruh dari Mind Control Crystals. Dapatkan Protective Barrier dari device di dalam Main Hall Atrium dan hancurkan Crystal.

column2: You have destroyed all Mind Control Crystals. Talk to Edmundas.
column3: Kamu dapat menghancurkan semua Mind Control Crystals. Bicara kepada Edmundas.

column2: Talk to Edmundas nearby the Medie State Apartments
column3: Bicara kepada Edmundas di dekat Medie State Apartments

column2: Edmundas took a lift to the Medie State Apartments. Follow Edmundas.
column3: Edmundas mengambil tumpangan ke Medie State Apartments. Ikuti Edmundas.

column2: Rescue Rose at the Kilnuma Oratorium
column3: Selamatkan Rose di Kilnuma Oratorium

column2: The wizard wants to use Rose to spread out the giant bracken spores. Thwart the wizard's plans and rescue Rose at the Kilnuma Oratorium!
column3: The Wizard ingin menggunakan Rose untuk menyebarkan Giant Bracken Spores. Menggagalkan rencana wizard dan menyelamatkan Rose di Kilnuma Oratorium!

column2: You rescued Rose and brought her back to safety. Ask Rose if she is alright.
column3: Kamu telah menyelamatkan Rose dan membawanya kembali dengan aman. Tanyakan Rose apakah dia baik-baik saja.

column2: Edmundas' Worry
column3: Edmundas cemas

column2: It looks like Edmundas wants to ask you a favor. Talk to Edmundas.
column3: Sepertinya Edmundas ingin meminta bantuanmu. Bicara kepada Edmundas.

column2: Defeat monsters at the Medie State Apartments
column3: Kalahkan para monster di Medie State Apartments

column2: Edmundas is not fully recovered yet, and the monsters are worrying him. Defeat the monsters at Medie State Apartments for Edmundas and Rose.
column3: Edmundas tidak sepenuhnya pulih, dan para monster mengkhawatirkan dirinya. Kalahkan para monster di Medie State Apartments untuk Edmundas dan Rose

column2: Report to Edmundas
column3: Lapor ke Edmundas

column2: You have defeated the monsters at the Medie State Apartments. Tell Edmundas they will be safe for a while now.
column3: Kamu telah mengalahkan para monster di Medie State Apartments. Beritahu Edmundas bahwa mereka akan aman untuk sementara waktu.

column2: The monsters might be gone, but Edmundas is still worried about the demons. Talk to Edmundas.
column3: Para monster mungkin sudah pergi, tetapi Edmundas masih khawatir tentang para demon. Bicara kepada Edmundas.

column2: Relay the situation to Orsha's Wizard Submaster
column3: Laporkan situasi ke Orsha's Wizard Submaster

column2: According to Edmundas, the Wizard Submaster in Orsha owes him a favor and might be able to help them. Go see the Wizard Submaster in Orsha and explain what happened to Edmundas and Rose.
column3: Menurut Edmundas, the Wizard Submaster di Orsha berhutang padanya sebuah permintaan dan mungkin akan dapat membantu mereka. Temui Wizard Submaster di Orsha dan jelaskan apa yang terjadi kepada Edmundas dan Rose.

column2: The Wizard Submaster feels sorry about what happened to the siblings. Ask the Wizard Submaster for a way to stop the demons.
column3: The Wizard Submaster merasa menyesal tentang apa yang terjadi pada saudara kandungnya. Tanyakan Wizard Submaster cara untuk menghentikan para demon.

column2: Craft a Protection Barrier Crystal
column3: Buatlah sebuah Protection Barrier Crystal

column2: The Wizard Submaster gave you a recipe for a Protection Barrier Crystal. Defeat Deadborn Scaps at the Novaha Institute to obtain their demon essences,
column3: The Wizard Submaster memberimu resep untuk membuat Protection Barrier Crystal. Kalahkan Deadborn Scaps di Novaha Institute untuk mendapatkan Demon Essence.

column2: then press the key to enter Rest Mode and craft a Protection Barrier Crystal.
column3: Kemudian tekan tombol untuk memasuki Rest Mode dan craft Protection Barrier Crystal.

column2: Place the Protection Barrier Crystal
column3: Letakkan the Protection Barrier Crystal

column2: The Protection Barrier Crystal is completed. Go back to Edmundas and place the crystal.
column3: The Protection Barrier Crystal telah selesai. Kembali kepada Edmundas dan letakkan Crystal.

column2: Craft a %s
column3: Craft %s

column2: Edmundas and Rose will now be protected from demon attacks. Tell Edmundas about this.
column3: Edmundas dan Rose sekarang akan dilindungi dari serangan demon. Beritahu Edmundas tentang ini.

column2: It looks like Traveling Merchant Rose has a final favor to ask of you. Talk to Rose.
column3: Sepertinya Traveling Merchant Rose memiliki permintaan terakhir untuk ditanyakan kepadamu. Bicaralah dengan Rose.

column2: Remove the power sources of the Giant Bracken Spore Breeding Device in Sotras Chapel
column3: Hilangkan sumber kekuatan dari Giant Bracken Spore Breeding Device di Sotras Chapel

column2: Remove the power sources of the giant bracken spore breeding device inside Sotras Chapel. To keep the power sources from reactivating, you will have to remove them in the correct order.
column3: Hilangkan sumber kekuatan dari Giant Bracken Spore Breeding Device di dalam Sotras Chapel. Untuk menjaga sumber kekuatan dari aktivasi ulang, kamu harus menghilangkannya dengan urutan yang benar.

column2: You have deactivated the spore breeding device. Tell Traveling Merchant Rose about it.
column3: Kamu telah mematikan Spore Breeding Device. Katakan kepada Traveling Merchant Rose tentang ini.

column2: Listen to Rose's detailed testimony
column3: Dengarkan kesaksian yang rinci dari Rose

column2: Traveling Merchant Rose believes she was able to read part of the wizard's mind when she was under mind contol. Listen to her testimony.
column3: Traveling Merchant Rose percaya bahwa dia dapat membaca bagian dari pikiran wizard ketika dia sedang dibawah kendali pikiran. Dengarkan kesaksiannya.

column2: Rose seems devastated after hearing from Tess that her brother was taken to a different location. Talk to Traveling Merchant Rose.
column3: Rose terlihat hancur setelah dia mendengar dari Tess bahwa kakaknya dibawa ke lokas yang berbeda. Bicaralah kepada Traveling Merchant Rose.

column2: Rose is back to her senses after hearing your words of comfort. Talk to Rose about what to do next.
column3: Rose kembali ke akal sehatnya setelah mendengar dan merasa nyaman oleh kata-katamu. Bicara kepada Rose tentang apa yang harus dilakukan selanjutnya.

column2: Member Grazina feels at risk and wants you to deliver the objects hidden in the Astral Tower. Deliver Grazina's objects to Member Irmantas.
column3: Anggota Grazina merasa beresiko dan ingin kamu untuk mengantarkan objek tersembunyi di Astral Tower. Antarkan Grazina's Objects kepada Member Irmantas

column2: Member Grazina needs you to find Member Alina. She says she saw her running South past Member Irmantas; head downwards and find Member Alina.
column3: Member Grazina perlu kamu untuk menemukan Member Alina. Dia mengatakan bahwa dia melihat Member Alina berlari ke arah selatan melewati Member Irmantas; pergi ke arah bawah dan temukan member Alina.

column2: Tell Member Irmantas about the death of Member Alina and her objects.
column3: Beritahu Member Irmantas tentang kematian Member Alina dan objek miliknya.

column2: Demon Lord Hauberk needs his servants to help him defeat the demons chasing after him. To help Hauberk call his servants, disable the monsters and let Hauberk absorb them.
column3: Demon Lord Hauberk perlu pelayannya untuk membantunya mengalahkan para demon yang sedang mengejarnya. Untuk membantu Hauberk memanggil pelayannya, lumpuhkan para monster dan biarkan Hauberk menyerap mereka.

column2: Defeat Drapeliun
column3: Kalahkan Drapeliun

column2: Demon Lord Hauberk thinks it's time to defeat Drapeliun. He hopes to drag Drapeliun out of the suspicious device in the Fiskavi Plains and defeat it with your help.
column3: Demon Lord Hauberk berpikir ini saatnya untuk mengalahkan Drapeliun. Dia berharap untuk menyeret Drapeliun dari perangkat yang mencurigakan di Fiskavi Plains dan kalahkan itu dengan bantuanmu.

column2: You have defeated Drapeliun. Talk to Demon Lord Hauberk.
column3: Kamu telah mengalahkan Drapeliun. Bicara kepada Demon Lord Hauberk.

column2: Collect %s by defeating monsters at Apgaudin Crossroads
column3: Kumpulkan dengan mengalahkan monster di Apgaudin Crossroads

column2: Collect Mochia Stems at Mochia Fields
column3: Kumpulkan Mochia Stems di Mochia Fields

column2: Gailus Legwyn's spirit says the Kartas Hunter is encapsuled inside the Blessing Crystal, which means unless the demon is defeated, there is no way to get back the crystal. Collect some Mochia Stems at Mochia Fields in order to summon the vassals of the Legwyn family against the hunter.
column3: Spirit dari Gailus Legwyn mengatakan bahwa Kartas Hunter dikurung didalam Blessing Crystal, yang artinya kecuali demon dikalahkan, tidak ada jalan untuk mendapatkan kembali crystal itu. Kumpulkan sejumlah Mochia Stems di Mochia Fields untuk memanggil pengikut dari keluarga Legwyn terhadap pemburu.

column2: You have collected enough Mochia Stems. Bring them to Gailus Legwyn's spirit.
column3: Kamu telah cukup mengumpulkan Mochia Stems. Berikan kepada jiwa Gailus Legwyn.

column2: The Journey Begins
column3: Perjalanan dimulai

column2: What a horrific dream. But it's time to head to Orsha. Talk to Settler Bowein by the Lemprasa Pond.
column3: Mimpi yang mengerikan. Tapi ini waktunya untuk menuju ke Orsha. Bicara kepada Settler Bowein lewat Lemprasa Pond.

column2: Press the M key to view the map to find Settler Brophen.
column3: Tekan tombol "M" untuk menampilkan peta dan pergi temukan Settler Brophen.

column2: Press the M key to open the map. Confirm Settler Brophen's location, then go and talk to him.
column3: Tekan tombol "M" untuk membuka peta. Periksa lokasi Settler Brophen pada peta, lalu pergi dan bicara padanya.

column2: Defeat the swarm of Kepas
column3: Kalahkan gerombolan Kepa

column2: You have protected Settler Brophen from the Kepas' attack. Talk to Settler Brophen.
column3: Kamu telah melindungi Settler Brophen dari serangan Kepa. Bicara pada Settler Brophen.

column2: Use a Status Point
column3: Gunakan Status Point

column2: Brophen says you can use Status Points by leveling up to become even stronger. Press the F1 key and distribute your new Status Point.
column3: Brophen mengatakan kamu dapat menggunakan Status Point dengan menaikkan level untuk menjadi lebih kuat. Tekan tombol "F1" dan mendistribusikan Status Point baru milikmu.

column2: You feel stronger now after using the Status Point. Talk to Settler Brophen again.
column3: Kamu merasa lebih kuat sekarang setelah menggunakan Status Point. Bicara kembali kepada Settler Brophen.

column2: Settler Brophen taught you how to use Status Points. Talk to Settler Brophen again and find out what to do next.
column3: Settler Brophen mengajarkanmu bagaimana menggunakan Status Point. Bicara kepadanya lagi dan cari tahu apa yang harus dilakukan selanjutnya.

column2: Deliver Grass Leaf Ointment to Settler Layla
column3: Antarkan Grass Leaf Ointment kepada Settler Layla

column2: Settler Brophen says Settler Layla might know where the mayor is. He also asked you to deliver some grass leaf ointment to her. On your way to the Temporary Settler Camp, go see Layla and give her the grass leaf ointment.
column3: Settler Brophen mengatakan bahwa Settler Layla mungkin tahu dimana mayor berada. Dia juga memintamu untuk mengantarkan sejumlah Grass leaf ointment kepadanya. Di perjalanan ke Temporary Settler Camp, pergi temui Layla dan berikan Grass Leaf Ointment kepadanya.

column2: Settler Layla says Mayor Romanas is headed to the Temporary Settler Camp. Go and talk to Mayor Romanas.
column3: Settler Layla mengatakan bahwa Mayor Romanas sedang menuju ke Temporary Settler Camp. Pergi dan bicara kepada Mayor Romanas.

column2: Mayor Romanas believes in your talent and will make sure you're admitted into Orsha immediately. Officer Lutas is looking for you; go find him at the Orsha Migration Office.
column3: Mayor Romanas percaya pada bakatmu dan akan memastikan kamu dipersilakan memasuki Orsha segera. Officer Lutas sedang mencarimu; pergi temui dia di Orsha Migration Office.

column2: Officer Lutas is processing the settlers' entrance into Orsha but the task feels endless. Talk to Officer Lutas again.
column3: Officer Litas sedang memproses the settler memasuki Orsha tetapi tugas ini terasa tidak ada habisnya. Bicara kembali kepada Officer Lutas.

column2: A Poata suddenly appeared at the entrance to Orsha and it's threatening the settlers! Defeat the Poata and make the entrance to Orsha safe again.{nl}{nl}A Poata suddenly appeared at the entrance to Orsha and it's threatening the settlers! Defeat the Poata and make the entrance to Orsha safe again.
column3: Poata tiba-tiba muncul di pintu gerbang menuju Orsha dan itu mengancam para pemukim! Kalahkan Poata dan amankan kembali pintu gerbang Orsha.{nl}{nl}Poata  tiba-tiba muncul di pintu gerbang menuju Orsha dan itu mengancam para pemukim! Kalahkan Poata dan amankan kembali pintu gerbang Orsha.

column2: You have defeated the Poata. Talk to Officer Lutas again.
column3: Kamu telah mengalahkan Poata. Bicara kembali kepada Officer Lutas.

column2: Defeat the Poata attacking Orsha's Migration Office
column3: Kalahkan Poata yang sedang menyerang Orsha's Migration Office

column2: You have defeated the Poata. Talk to Officer Lutas again.
column3: Kamu telah mengalahkan Poata. Bicara kembali kepada Officer Lutas.

column2: Your entrance formalities have been processed. You can visit Orsha now.
column3: Formalitas masuk kamu telah di proses. Kamu dapat mengunjungi Orsha sekarang.

column2: Talk to Inesa Hamondale, the lord of Orsha
column3: Bicara kepada Inesa Hamondale, [Pemimpin Orsha]

column2: Inesa Hamondale, the lord of Orsha, is looking for someone with skills. To find Urbonas, the bishop of Orsha, talk to Inesa Hamondale at the Central Plaza first.
column3: Pemimpin Orsha sedang mencari seseorang yang memiliki kemampuan. Untuk menemukan bishop dari Orsha, Urbonas, bicara kepada Inesa Hamondale, [Pemimpin Orsha], di Central Plaza.

column2: Settler Izna is looking fixedly at you. Talk to Settler Izna.
column3: Settler Izna sedang memperhatikanmu. Bicara kepada Settler Izna.

column2: Defeat Leaf Bugs to obtain Red Leaves
column3: Kalahkan Leaf Bugs untuk mendapatkan Red Leaves

column2: Settler Izna wants to make some medicine for you as a token of appreciation. Defeat some Leaf Bugs around Ziedo Pond to obtain Red Leaves for the medicine.
column3: Settler Izna ingin membuat sejumlah obat untukmu sebagai tanda penghargaan. Kalahkan sejumlah Leaf Bugs di sekitar Ziedo Pond untuk mendapatkan Red Leaves untuk pembuatan obat.

column2: Deliver the Red Leaves to Settler Izna
column3: Antarkan Red Leaves kepada Settler Izna

column2: You have collected enough Red Leaves as requested by Settler Izna. Bring them to her.
column3: Kamu telah mengumpulkan cukup Red Leaves seperti yang diminta oleh Settler Izna,. Bawakan kepadanya.

column2: Defeat Leaf Bugs to obtain %s
column3: Kalahkan Leaf Bugs untuk mendapatkan %

column2: Settler Izna seems to have a request for you. Talk to Settler Izna.
column3: Settler Izna tampaknya memiliki permintaan kepadamu. Bicara kepada Settler Izna.

column2: Defeat Chinencys to obtain Rampar Mucus
column3: Kalahkan Chinencys untuk mendapatkan Rampar Mucus

column2: Settler Izna wants to make Stamina Pills for the new settlers arriving to Orsha. Defeat Chinencys around Ziedo Pond and collect the Rampar Mucus used to make Stamina pills.
column3: Settler Izna ingin membuat Stamina pills untuk settler yang baru tiba di Orsha. Kalahkan Chinencys disekitar Ziedo Pond dan kumpulkan Rampar Mucus yang digunakan untuk membuat Stamina pills.

column2: Deliver the Rampar Mucus to Settler Izna
column3: Berikan Rampar Mucus kepada Settler Izna

column2: You have collected enough Rampar Mucus as requested by Settler Izna. Bring it to her.
column3: Kamu telah cukup mengumpulkan Rampar Mucus yang diminta oleh Settler Izna. Berikan kepadanya.

column2: Defeat Chinencys to obtain %s
column3: Kalahkan Chinencys untuk mendapatkan %s

column2: Settler Izna seems to be deeply worried about something. Talk to Settler Izna.
column3: Settler Izna tampaknya sangat khawatir mengenai sesuatu. Bicara kepada Settler Izna.

column2: Make a bonfire on Adata Highway
column3: Buatlah bonfire di Adata Highway

column2: Settler Izna believes some village residents have gotten lost on their way to Orsha. Go to Adata Highway and make a bonfire so they can spot the smoke and find their way.
column3: Settler Izna percaya beberapa penduduk desa tersesat dalam perjalanan ke Orsha. Pergi ke Adata Highway dan buatlah bonfire jadi mereka dapat melihat asap dan menemukan jalan kembali.

column2: Report to Settler Izna
column3: Laporkan kepada Settler Izna

column2: You successfully made a bonfire. Go and tell Settler Izna.
column3: Kamu berhasil membuat bonfire. Pergi dan beritahu Settler Izna.

column2: The bonfire may be set, but Settler Izna is still worried about something. Talk to Settler Izna again.
column3: Bonfire mungkin sudah dibuat, tetapi Settler Izna masih khawatir pada sesuatu. Bicara kembali dengan Settler Izna.

column2: Set fire to the firewood on Adata Highway
column3: Buatlah api unggun dengan Firewood di Adata Highway

column2: Settler Izna thinks the bonfire may be hard to spot by the residents. Go to Adata Highway and set fire to the firewood there.
column3: Settler Izna berpikir bahwa bonfire mungkin sulit untuk dilihat. {nl}Pergi ke Adata Highway dan buatlah api unggun dengan Firewood Pile disana.

column2: You successfully defeated the Woodspirit. Go back to Settler Izna.
column3: Kamu berhasil mengalahkan Woodspirit. Kembali kepada Settler Izna.

column2: Settler Ivanayus seems to be struggling with something. Go and talk to Settler Ivanayus.
column3: Settler Ivanayus terlihat berjuang dengan sesuatu. Pergi dan bicara pada Settler Ivanayus.

column2: Collect Useful Object
column3: Kumpulkan Objek yang berguna

column2: Settler Ivanayus is in desperate need of supplies and willing to settle for used ones. Go to the Lumberjack Cabin and collect useful objects.
column3: Settler Ivanayus sangat membutuhkan persediaan dan bersedia menerima imbalannya. Pergi ke Lumberjack Cabin dan kumpulkan objek yang masih berguna.

column2: Deliver the useful objects to Settler Ivanayus
column3: Berikan Objek yang berguna untuk Settler Ivanayus

column2: You have collected enough useful objects. Bring them to Settler Ivanayus.
column3: Kamu telah cukup mengumpulkan objek berguna. Berikan kepada Settler Ivanayus.

column2: Settler Dallanas is giving you a quizzical look. Talk to Settler Dallanas.
column3: Settler Dallanas memperlihatkan ekspresi kebingungan. Bicara kepada Settler Dallanas.

column2: Worship the Statue of Goddess Zemyna at the Randoluma Rest Place
column3: Menghormati Statue of Goddess Zemyna di Randoluma Rest Place

column2: Settler Dallanas says the goddesses bless those who worship their statues. Worship the statue of Goddess Zemyna at the Randoluma Rest Place and receive Her blessings.
column3: Settler Dallanas mengatakan Goddess memberkati setiap orang yang menghormati patung mereka. Hormati Statue Goddess Zemyna di Randoluma Rest Place dan dapatkah berkatnya.

column2: Settler Dallanas seems worried about something. Talk to Settler Dallanas.
column3: Settler Dallanas terlihat khawatir tentang sesuatu. Bicara kepada Settler Dallanas.

column2: Defeat Monsters at the Randoluma Rest Place
column3: Kalahkan Monster di Randoluma Rest Place

column2: Settler Dallanas was told to wait at the Randoluma Rest Place before coming to Orsha, but staying there proved impossible due to the amount of monsters. Go to the Randoluma Rest Place and defeat the monsters there.
column3: Settler Dallanas telah diberitahu untuk menunggu di Randoluma Rest Place sebelum datang ke Orsha, tetapi tinggal disana tidaklah mungkin karena jumlah monster yang sangat banyak. Pergi ke Randoluma Rest Place dan kalahkan para monster disana.

column2: The Randoluma Rest Place is safer now. Go and tell Settler Dallanas.
column3: Randoluma Rest Place menjadi lebih aman sekarang. Pergi dan beritahu Settler Dallanas.

column2: Settler Dallanas seems anxious about something. Ask them what is wrong.
column3: Settler Dallanas terlihat cemas pada suatu hal. Tanyakan apakah ada yang salah.

column2: Randoluma Rest Place
column3: Randoluma Rest Place

column2: Settler Dallanas says her people arrived at the Randoluma Rest Place but had to scatter because of the monsters. Go to Randoluma Rest Place and find the villagers hiding there.
column3: Settler Dallanas mengatakan bahwa penduduknya telah tiba di Randoluma Rest Place tetapi mereka menyebar karena monster. Pergi ke Randoluma Rest Place dan temukan penduduk desa yang sedang bersembunyi disana.

column2: You have found the villagers and brought them back to safety. Tell Settler Dallanas.
column3: Kamu telah menemukan penduduk desa dan membawa mereka kembali ke tempat aman. Beritahu Settler Dallanas.

column2: The Lord of Orsha, Inesa Hamondale, wants you to hear about what is happening in Orsha before you start your journey. Talk to Inesa Hamondale about the situation in Orsha.
column3: Inesa Hamondale, [Pemimpin Orsha], ingin kamu mendengar tentang apa yang terjadi di Orsha sebelum kamu memulai perjalanan. Bicara kepada Inesa Hamondale tentang situasi di Orsha.

column2: Inesa Hamondale has asked you to find the bishop of Orsha, Urbonas, who is missing. Talk to Inesa Hamondale again.
column3: Inesa Hamondale memintamu untuk menemukan bishop dari Orsham, Urbonas, yang sedang hilang. Bicara kembali dengan Inesa Hamondale.

column2: Inesa Hamondale seems to have something prepared for you before you set out to find Bishop Urbonas. Talk to Inesa Hamondale about it.
column3: Inesa Hamondale tampaknya harus mempersiapkan sesuatu untukmu sebelum kamu pergi mencari Bishop Urbonas. Bicara kepada Inesa Hamondale mengenai ini

column2: Worship the Statue of Goddess Ausrine in the Central Plaza
column3: Menghormati Statue of Goddess Ausrine di Central Plaza

column2: Before you leave, Inesa Hamondale has asked you to worship the statue of Goddess Ausrine in the Central Plaza.
column3: Sebelum kamu pergi, Inesa Hamondale telah memintamu untuk menghormati Statue Goddess Ausrine di Central Plaza.

column2: Visit the Item Merchant in the Shopping District
column3: Kunjungi Item Merchant di Shopping District

column2: Inesa Hamondale has prepared a little gift for you. Go see the Item Merchant in the Shopping District.
column3: Inesa Hamondale telah mempersiapkan hadiah kecil untukmu. Pergi temui Item Merchant di Shopping District.

column2: It seems the Item Merchant has something else to ask you. Talk to the Item Merchant again.
column3: Tampaknya Item Merchant memiliki sesuatu untuk ditanyakan. Bicara kembali dengan Item Merchant.

column2: Visit the Accessory Merchant
column3: Kunjungi Accessory Merchant

column2: It seeems Inesa Hamondale has asked the Accessory Merchant to prepare another gift for you. Go find the Accessory Merchant in the Shopping District.
column3: Tampaknya Inesa Hamondale telah meminta Accessory Merchant untuk mempersiapkan hadiah lainnya untukmu. Pergi temui Accessory Merchant di Shopping District.

column2: The Item Merchant says Inesa Hamondale is looking for you. Return to Inesa Hamondale.
column3: Item Merchant mengatakan bahwa Inesa Hamondale sedang mencarimu. Kembali kepada Inesa Hamondale.

column2: Talk to Agent Cherasia at the Woods of the Linked Bridges
column3: Bicara kepada Informer Cherasia di the Woods of the Linked Bridges

column2: News just came in from Agent Cherasia, who is searching for the missing bishop. Go find the agent in the Woods of the Linked Bridges.
column3: Berita baru datang dari Informer Cherasia, yang sedang mencari bishop yang hilang. Pergi temukan Informer di the Woods of the Linked Bridges.

column2: Collect Priest Irma's Journal Pages
column3: Kumpulkan Priest Irma's Diary Pages

column2: Agent Cherasia seems to have found part of Priest Irma's journal while looking for the missing bishop. Try and recover the rest of the journal from monsters nearby.
column3: Informer Cherasia tampaknya telah menemukan bagian dari Priest Irma's Diary selagi mencari bishop yang hilang. Mencoba memperoleh kembali sisa buku diary dari monster terdekat.

column2: Deliver to Agent Cherasia
column3: Kirimkan kepada Informer Cherasia

column2: You have collected as much of the journal as possible. Deliver it to Agent Cherasia.
column3: Kamu telah mengumpulkan diary sebanyak yang kamu bisa. Berikan ini kepada Informer Cherasia.

column2: Collect %s from monsters nearby
column3: Kumpulkan %s dari Monster di dekat sini

column2: Agent Cherasia seems to have found some revealing contents in Priest Irma's journal. Take the journal to Moren.
column3: Informer Cherasia tampaknya telah menemukan beberapa konten yang di ungkapkan pada Priest Irma's Diary. Ambil buku harian untuk

column2: Help Agent Moren
column3: Membantu Informer Moren

column2: Protect Agent Moren while he investigates. The more monsters you defeat in the area, the faster the agent will finish his investigation.
column3: Lindungi Informer Moren selagi dia sedang menyelidik. Semakin banyak monster yang kamu kalahkan di area ini, semakin cepat Informan yang akan menyelesaikan Penyelidikan.

column2: Agent Moren's investigation is now complete. Ask him whether he has found anything.
column3: Penyelidikan Informer Moren sekarang sudah selesai. tanyakan padanya apakah dia telah menemukan sesuatu.

column2: Agent Moren seems to be pondering something. Keep talking to him.
column3: Informer Moren terlihat memikirkan sesuatu. Terus bicara dengan nya.

column2: Collect clues from the Smoking Piles of Grass
column3: Kumpulkan petunjuk dari Smoky Greenery

column2: Agent Moren is convinced there might be other clues around. Look for leads in piles of grass with smoke coming out.
column3: Informer Moren yakin mungkin disekitar sini ada petunjuk lainnya. Cari petunjuk di Smoky Greenery sepertinya ada asap yang keluar darinya.

column2: Deliver to Agent Moren
column3: Antarkan kepada Informer Moren

column2: You have collected a good amount of clues. Bring them to Agent Moren.
column3: Kamu telah mengumpulkan banyak petunjuk. Berikan kepada Informer Moren.

column2: Imminent Danger
column3: Imminent Danger

column2: Agent Moren thinks Priest Pranas might know something about the clues found here. Tracer Ulysses and Priest Pranas are traveling upwards; go and meet them.
column3: Informer Moren berpikir Priest Pranas mungkin tahu sesuatu tentang petunjuk yang ditemukan disini. Tracer Ulysses dan Priest Pranas bepergian keatas; pergi dan temui mereka.

column2: Investigate the Great Stone Face Hill
column3: Selidiki the Great Stone Face Hill

column2: Priest Pranas instructed Tracer Ulysses to investigate, but he finds it difficult because of the monsters. Go and investigate the Great Stone Face Hill for them.
column3: Priest Pranas memberikan instruksi kepada Tracer Ulysses untuk menyelidiki, tetapi dia merasa kesulitan karena para monster. Pergi dan selidiki the Great Stone Face Hill untuk mereka.

column2: Read the Unknown Diary
column3: Bacalah Unknown Diary

column2: An unknown diary was found in the tent destroyed by the Minotaur. Read what it says.
column3: Sebuah unknown diary telah ditemukan didalam tenda yang telah dihancurkan oleh Minotaur. Bacalah isinya.

column2: Deliver to Tracer Ulysses
column3: Antarkan kepada Tracer Ulysses

column2: The diary belongs to the missing Bishop Urbonas. Bring the diary to Tracer Ulysses.
column3: Buku Diary ini milik Bishop Urbonas yang hilang. Bawakan Diary ini kepada Tracer Ulysses.

column2: Talk to Tracer Talbasi at Paupys Crossing
column3: Bicara kepada Tracer Talbasi di Paupys Crossing

column2: Tracer Ulysses seems extremely worried about the demons. He wants you to go to Paupys Crossing immediately and find Tracer Talbasi, who is helping Priest Pranas.
column3: Tracer Ulysses tampaknya sangat khawatir tentang Demon. Dia ingin kamu segera pergi ke Paupys Crossing dan menemui Tracer Talbasi, dia adalah orang yang membantu Priest Pranas.

column2: Tracer Ulysses is worried about the demons and thinks it's best for you to go and help Priest Pranas instead. Go to Paupys Crossing and talk to Tracer Talbasi, who is there investigating with Priest Pranas.{nl}
column3: Tracer Ulysses khawatir tentang para Demon dan berpikir sebaiknya kamu pergi dan membantu Priest Pranas sebagai gantinya. Pergilah menuju Paupys Crossing dan berbicara kepada Tracer Talbasi, dia adalah seseorang yang diutus untuk menyelidiki Priest Pranas.{nl}

column2: Agent Pierneef looks extremely worn out. Try and talk to Agent Pierneef.
column3: Informer Pierneef terlihat sangat tidak terurus. Cobalah bicara kepada Informer Pierneef.

column2: Defeat the monsters at the Zbuka Inner Court
column3: Kalahkan para monsters di Zbuka Inner Court

column2: Agent Pierneef is helping other agents investigate the area. Defeat some monsters at the Zbuka Inner Court.
column3: Informer Pierneef membantu informer lain untuk menyelidiki area ini. Kalahkan sejumlah monster di Zbuka Inner Court,

column2: Report to Agent Pierneef
column3: Laporkan kepada Informer Pierneef

column2: The area seems safer now. Report back to Agent Pierneef.
column3: Area ini tampaknya jadi lebih aman sekarang. Laporkan kembali pada Informer Pierneef.

column2: A nauseating smell permeates the air all around. Ask Agent Pierneef about it.
column3: Bau memuakkan itu menyebar di udara sekitar. Tanyakan kepada Inforemer Pierneef tentang ini.

column2: Agent Pierneef says the smell of defeated monsters is making other monsters go wild. Go to the Zbuka Inner Court and eliminate the smelly cart there.
column3: Informer Pierneef mengatakan bau monster yang telah dikalahkan membuat semua monster menjadi liar. Pergi ke Zbuka Inner Court dan hancurkan gerobak berbau tak sedap itu.

column2: You have burned down the smelly cart. Go and tell Agent Pierneef.
column3: Kamu sudah membakar gerobak berbau. Pergi dan beritahu Informer Pierneef.

column2: Tracer Germeja is happy to see you. Talk to Tracer Germeja.
column3: Tracer Germeja sangat senang bertemu kamu. Bicara kepada Tracer Germeja.

column2: Use the stimulant on the monsters
column3: Gunakan stimulant kepada monsters

column2: Tracer Germeja wants to give the monsters a stimulant drug that makes them fight each other. Use the stimulant on monsters.
column3: Tracer Germeja ingin memberikan para monster stimulant drug yang dapat membuat mereka bertarung satu sama lain. Gunakan Stimulant pada monster.

column2: The stimulant works perfectly. Go and talk to Tracer Germeja again.
column3: The Stimulant bekerja sempurna. Pergi dan bicara kembali kepada Tracer Germeja.

column2: Tracer Raitis looks worryingly livid. Ask Tracer Raitis if there is a problem.
column3: Tracer Raitis terlihat sangat khawatir. Tanyakan Tracer Raitis apakah ada masalah.

column2: Defeat the monsters at Bonan Forest Road
